GS24pmbhasuu:1094: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . tyadādipradhānaḥ eṣaḥ samāsaḥ . atha vā na idam sañjñākaraṇam . pāṭhaviśeṣaṇam idam : sarveṣām yāni nāmāni tāni sarvādīni . sañjñopasarjane ca viśeṣe avatiṣṭhete . yadi evam sañjñāśrayam yat kāryam tat na sidhyati : sarvanāmnaḥ smai , āmi sarvanāmnaḥ suṭ iti anvarthagrahaṇam tatra vijñāsyate : sarveṣām yat nāma tat sarvanāma .
GS24pmbhasuu:1095: sarvanāmnaḥ uttarasya ṅeḥ smai bhavati . sarvanāmnaḥ uttarasya āmaḥ suṭ bhavati . yadi evam sakalam , kṛtsnam , jagat iti atra api prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1096: eteṣām ca api śabdānām ekaikasya saḥ saḥ viṣayaḥ . tasmin tasmin viṣaye
GS24pmbhasuu:1097: yaḥ yaḥ śabdaḥ vartate tasya tasya tasmin tasmin vartamānasya sarvanāmakāryam prāpnoti . evam tarhi ubhayam anena kriyate . pāṭhaḥ ca eva viśeṣyate sañjñā ca . katham punaḥ ekena yatnena ubhayam labhyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1098: labhyam iti āha . katham. ekaśeṣanirdeśāt . ekaśeṣanirdeśaḥ ayam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1099: sarvādīni ca sarvādīni ca sarvādīni . sarvanāmāni ca sarvanāmāni ca sarvanāmāni . sarvādīni sarvanānasañjñāni bhavanti . sarveṣām yāni ca
GS24pmbhasuu:1100: nāmāni tāni sarvādīni . sañjñopasarjane ca viśeṣe avatiṣṭhete . atha vā mahatī iyam sañjñā kriyate . sañjñā ca nāma yataḥ na laghīyaḥ . kutaḥ etat . laghvartham hi sañjñākaraṇam . tatra mahatyāḥ sañjñāyāḥ karaṇe etat prayojanam anvarthasañjñā yathā vijñāyeta . sarvādīni sarvanānasañjñāni bhavanti sarveṣām nāmāni iti ca ataḥ sarvanāmāni . sañjñopasarjane ca viśeṣe avatiṣṭhete .
GS24pmbhasuu:1101: (P_1,1.27.4) KA_I,89.4-90.3 Ro_I,286-289 atha ubhasya sarvanāmatve kaḥ arthaḥ . ubhasya sarvanāmatve akajarthaḥ . ubhasya sarvanāmatve akajarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1102: pāṭhaḥ kriyate : ubhakau . kim ucyate akajarthaḥ iti na punaḥ anyāni api sarvanāmakāryāṇi . anyābhāvaḥ dvivacanaṭābviṣayatvāt . anyeṣām sarvanāmkāryāṇām abhāvaḥ . kim kāraṇam . dvivacanaṭābviṣayatvāt ubhaśabdaḥ ayam dvivacanaṭābviṣayaḥ . anyāni ca sarvanāmakāryāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:1103: ekavacanabahuvacaneṣu ucyante . yadā punaḥ ayam ubhaśabdaḥ dvivacanaṭābviṣayaḥ kaḥ idānīm asya anyatra bhavati . ubhayaḥ anyatra .
GS24pmbhasuu:1104: ubhayaśabdaḥ asya anyatra bahvati . ubhaye devamanuṣyāḥ , ubhayaḥ maṇiḥ iti . kim ca syāt yadi atra akac na syāt . kaḥ prasajyeta . kaḥ ca idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:1105: kākacoḥ viśeṣaḥ . ubhaśabdaḥ ayam dvivacanaṭābviṣayaḥ iti uktam . tatra akaci sati akacaḥ tanmadhyapatitatvāt śakyate etat vaktum : dvivacanaparaḥ ayam iti . ke punaḥ sati na ayam dvivacanaparaḥ syāt . tatra dvivacanaparatā vaktavyā . yathā eva tarhi ke sati na ayam dvivacanaparaḥ evam āpi api sati na ayam dvivacanaparaḥ syāt . tatra api dvivacanaparatā
GS24pmbhasuu:1106: vaktavyā . avacanāt api tatparavijñānam . antareṇa api vacanam āpi dvivacanaparaḥ ayam bhaviṣyati . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . ekādeśe kṛte dvivacanaparaḥ ayam antādivadbhāvena .
GS24pmbhasuu:1107: avacanāt āpi tatparavijñānam iti cet ke api tulyam . avacanāt āpi tatparavijñānam iti cet ke api antareṇa vacanam dvivacanaparaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:1108: . katham . svārthikāḥ pratyayāḥ prakṛtitaḥ aviśiṣṭāḥ bhavanti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1109: prakṛtigrahaṇena svārthikānām api grahaṇam bhavati . atha bhavataḥ sarvanāmatve kāni projanāni . bhavataḥ akaccheṣātvāni . bhavataḥ akaccheṣātvāni prayojanāni . akac : bhavakān . śeṣaḥ : saḥ ca bhavān ca bhavantau . ātvam : bhavādṛk iti . kim punaḥ idam parigaṇanam āhosvit udāharaṇamātram . udāharaṇamātram iti āha . tṛtīyādayaḥ api hi iṣyante .
GS24pmbhasuu:1110: sarvanāmnaḥ tṛtīyā ca : bhavatā hetunā , bhavataḥ hetoḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1111: (P_1,1.28) KA_I,90.5-26 Ro_I,289-291 diggrahaṇam kimartham . na bahuvrīhau iti pratiṣedham vakṣyati . tatra na jñāyate kva vibhāṣā kva
GS24pmbhasuu:1112: pratiṣedhaḥ iti . diggrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1113: digupadiṣṭe vibhāṣā anyatra pratiṣedhaḥ . atha samāsagrahaṇam kimartham.
GS24pmbhasuu:1114: samāsaḥ eva yaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ tatra yathā syāt . bahuvrīhivadbhāvena yaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ tatra mā bhūt iti : dakṣiṇadakṣiṇasyai dehi iti . atha bahuvrīhigrahaṇam kimartham . dvandve mā bhūt dakṣiṇottarapūrvāṇām iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1115: na etat asti prayojanam . dvandve ca iti pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati . na aprāpte pratiṣedhe iyam paribhāṣā ārabhyate . sā yathā eva bahuvrīhau iti etam pratiṣedham bādhate evam dvandve ca iti etam api bādheta . na bādhate . kim kāraṇam . yena na aprāpte tasya bādhanam bhavati . na ca aprāpte na bahuvrīhau iti etasmin pratiṣedhe iyam paribhāṣā ārabhyate . dvandve ca iti etasmin punaḥ prāpte ca aprāpte ca . atha vā purastāt apavādāḥ anantarān vidhīn bādhante iti evam iyam vibhāṣā na bahuvrīhau iti etam
GS24pmbhasuu:1116: pratiṣedham bādhiṣyate dvandve ca iti etam pratiṣedham na bādhiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:1117: atha vā idam tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ . iha kasmāt na bhavati : yā pūrvā sā
GS24pmbhasuu:1118: uttarā asya unmugdhasya saḥ ayam pūrvottaraḥ unmugdhaḥ , tasmai pūrvottarāya dehi . lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti . yadi evam na arthaḥ bahuvrīhigrahaṇena . dvandve kasmāt na bhavati lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti . uttarārtham tarhi bahuvrīhigrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . kriyate tatra eva bahuvrīhau iti . dvitīyam kartavyam . bahuvrīhiḥ eva yaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ tatra yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1119: . bahuvrīhivadbhāvena yaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ tatra mā bhūt iti : ekaikasmai dehi .
GS24pmbhasuu:1120: etat api na asti prayojanam. samāse iti vartate . tena bahuvrīhim viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ : samāsaḥ yaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ iti . idam tarhi prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1121: avayavabhūtasya api bahuvrīheḥ pratiṣedhaḥ yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:1122: vastram antaram eṣām te ime vastrāntarāḥ vasanam antaram eṣām te ime vasanāntarāḥ vastrāntarāḥ ca vasanāntarāḥ ca vastrāntaravasanāntarāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1124: na etat asti prayojanam . sarvādyantasya bahuvrīheḥ pratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:1125: bhavitavyam . vakṣyati ca etat : bahuvrīhau sarvanāmasaṅkhyayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam iti . tatra viśvapriyāya iti bhavitavyam . idam tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:1126: dvyanyāya tryanyāya . nanu ca atra api sarvanāmnaḥ eva pūrvanipātena bhavitavyam . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . vakṣyati etat : saṅkhyāsarvanāmnoḥ yaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ paratvāt tatra saṅkhyāyāḥ pūrvanipātaḥ bhavati iti . idam ca api udāharaṇam priyaviśvāya . nanu ca uktam viśvapriyāya iti bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:1127: iti . vakṣyati etat : vā priyasya iti . na khalu api avaśyam sarvādyantasya eva bahuvrīheḥ pratiṣedhena bhavitavyam . kim tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:1128: asarvādyantasya api bhavitavyam . kim prayojanam . akac mā bhūt . kim ca syāt yadi akac syāt . kaḥ na syāt . kaḥ ca idānīm kākacoḥ viśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1129: vyañjanānteṣu viśeṣaḥ . ahakam pitā asya makatpitṛkaḥ , tvakam pitā asya
GS24pmbhasuu:1130: tvakatpitṛkaḥ iti prāpnoti , matkapitṛkaḥ tvatkapitṛkaḥ iti ca iṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:1131: katham punaḥ icchatā api bhavatā bahiraṅgena pratiṣedhena antaraṅgaḥ vidhiḥ śakhyaḥ bādhitum . antaraṅgān api vidhīn bahiraṅgaḥ vidhiḥ bādhate
GS24pmbhasuu:1132: gomatpriyaḥ iti yathā . kriyate tatra yatnaḥ : pratyayottarapadayoḥ ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1133: . nanu ca iha api kriyate : na bahuvrīhau iti . asti anyat etasya vacane prayojanam . kim . priyaviśvāya . upasarjanapratiṣedhena api etat siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:1134: . ayam khalu api bahuvrīhiḥ asti eva prāthamakalpikaḥ yasmin aikapadyam
GS24pmbhasuu:1135: aikasvaryam aikavibhaktikatvam ca . asti tādarthyāt tācchabdyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1136: bahuvrīhyarthāni padāni bahuvrīhiḥ iti . tat yat tādarthyāt tācchabdyam tasya idam grahaṇam . gonardīyaḥ āha akacsvarau tu kartavyau pratyaṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:1137: muktasaṃśayau . tvakatpitṛkaḥ makatpitṛkaḥ iti eva bhavitavyam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1138: (P_1,1.29.2) KA_I,91.22-92.5 Ro_I,293-294 pratiṣedhe bhūtapūrvasya upasaṅkhyānam . pratiṣedhe bhūtapūrvasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . āḍhyaḥ bhūtapūrvaḥ āḍhyapūrvaḥ , āḍhyapūrvāya dehi iti . pratiṣedhe bhūtapūrvasya upasaṅkhyānānarthakyam pūrvādīnām vyavasthāyām iti vacanāt . pratiṣedhe bhūtapūrvasya upasaṅkhyānam narthakam . kim kāraṇam . pūrvādīnām vyavasthāyām iti vacanāt . pūrvādīnām vyavasthāyām sarvanāmasñjñā ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:1140: (P_1,1.30) KA_I,92. 7-14 Ro_I,294 samāse iti vartamāne punaḥ samāsagrahaṇam kimartham . ayam tṛtīyāsamāsaḥ asti eva prāthamakalpikaḥ yasmin aikapadyam aikasvaryam aikavibhaktikatvam ca . asti tādarthyāt tācchabdyam : tṛtīyāsamāsārthāni padāni tṛtīyāsamāsaḥ iti . tat yat tādarthyāt tācchabdyam tasya idam grahaṇam . atha vā samase iti vartamāne punaḥ samāsagrahaṇasya etat prayojanam : yogāṅgam yathā upajāyeta . sati yogāṅge yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . tṛtīyā . tṛtīyāsamāse sarvādīni sarvanāmasañjñāni na bhavanti . māsapūrvāya dehi saṃvatsarapūrvāya dehi .
GS24pmbhasuu:1141: tataḥ asamāse . asamāse ca tṛtīyāyāḥ sarvādīni sarvanāmasañjñāni na
GS24pmbhasuu:1143: (P_1,1.32) KA_I,92.16 Ro_I,295 jasaḥ kāryam prati vibhāṣā , akac hi na
GS24pmbhasuu:1145: (P_1,1.34) KA_I,92.19-93.6 Ro_I,295-297 avarādīnām ca punaḥ sūtrapāṭhe grahaṇānarthakyam gaṇe paṭhitatvāt . avarādīnām ca punaḥ sūtrapāṭhe grahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . gaṇe paṭhitatvāt . gaṇe hi etāni
GS24pmbhasuu:1146: paṭhyante . katham punaḥ jñāyate saḥ pūrvaḥ pāṭhaḥ ayam punaḥ pāṭhaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1147: tāni hi pūrvādīni imāni avarādīni . imāni api pūrvādīni . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati saḥ pūrvaḥ pāṭhaḥ ayam punaḥ pāṭhaḥ iti yat ayam pūrvādibhyaḥ navabhyaḥ vā iti navagrahaṇam karoti . nava eva pūrvādīni .
GS24pmbhasuu:1148: idam tarhi prayojanam : vyavasthāyām asañjñāyām iti vakṣyāmi iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . evaṃviśiṣṭāni eva etāni gaṇe paṭhyante . idam tarhi prayojanam dvyādiparyudāsena paryudāsaḥ mā bhūt iti . etat api na
GS24pmbhasuu:1149: asti prayojanam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na eṣām dvyādiparyudāsena paryudāsaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam pūrvatra asiddham iti nipātanam karoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1150: vārttikakāraḥ ca paṭhati : jaśbhāvāt iti cet uttaratra abhāvāt apavādaprasaṅgaḥ iti . idam tarhi prayojanam jasi vibhāṣām vakṣyāmi iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1152: jñātidhanaparyāyavācī yaḥ svaśabdaḥ tasya yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt : sve putrāḥ svāḥ putrāḥ sve gāvaḥ svāḥ gāvaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1153: (P_1,1.36.1) KA_I,93.11-17 Ro_I,298-299 upasaṃvyānagrahaṇam anarthakam bahiryogeṇa kṛtatvāt . upasaṃvyānagrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1154: bahiryogeṇa kṛtatvāt . bahiryoge iti eva siddham . na vā śāṭakayugādyartham . na vā anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . śāṭakayugādyartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:1155: śāṭakayugādyartham tarhi idam vaktavyam yatra etat na jñāyate kim antarīyam kim uttarīyam iti. atra api yaḥ eṣaḥ manuṣyaḥ prekṣāpūrvakārī
GS24pmbhasuu:1156: bhavati nirjñātam tasya bhavati idam antarīyam idam uttarīyam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1157: (P_1,1.36.2) KA_I,93.18-23 Ro_I,299 apuri iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:1158: : antarāyām puri vasati iti . vāprakaraṇe tīyasya ṅitsu upasaṅkhyānam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1159: vāprakaraṇe tīyasya ṅitsu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam : dvitīyāyai dvitīyasyai tṛtīyāyai tṛtīyasyai . vibhāṣā dvitīyātṛtīyābhyām iti etat na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:1160: bhavati . kim punaḥ atra jyāyaḥ . upasaṅkhyānam eva atra jyāyaḥ . idam api siddham bhavati : dvitīyāya dvitīyasmai tṛtīyāya tṛtīyasmai .
GS24pmbhasuu:1162: svarādīnām kriyate na cādiṣu eva paṭhyeran . cādīnām vai asattvavacanānām
GS24pmbhasuu:1163: nipātasañjñā svarādīnām punaḥ sattvavacanānām asattvavacanānām ca . atha kimartham ubhe sañjñe kriyete na nipātsañjñā eva syāt . na evam śakyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1164: nipātaḥ ekāc anāṅ iti pragṛhyasañjñā uktā . sā svarādīnām api ekācām prasajyeta . evam tarhi avyayasañjñā eva astu . tat ca aśakyam . vakṣyati etat : avyaye nañkunipātānām iti . tat garīyasā nyāsena parigaṇanam kartavyam syāt . tasmāt pṛthak grahaṇam kartavyam ubhe ca sañjñe kartavye (P_1,1.38.1) KA_I,94.10-19 Ro_I,300-301 asarvavibhaktau avibhaktinimittasya upasaṅkhyānam . asarvavibhaktau avibhaktinimittasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam : nānā vinā . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1165: sarvavibhaktiḥ hi aviśeṣāt. sarvavibhaktiḥ hi eṣaḥ bhavati . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1166: aviśeṣāt . aviśeṣeṇa vihitatvāt . tralādīnām ca upasaṅkhyānam . tralādīnām ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . tatra yatra tataḥ yataḥ . nanu ca viśeṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:1167: ete vidhīyante : pañcamyāḥ tasil saptamyāḥ tral iti . vakṣyati etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:1170: śabdaḥ avyayasañjñaḥ bhavati iti ucyeta . avibhaktau itaretarāśrayatvāt aprasiddhiḥ . avibhaktau itaretarāśrayatvāt aprasiddhiḥ sañjñāyāḥ . kā itaretarāśrayatā . sati avibhaktitve sañjñayā bhavitavyam sañjñayā ca
GS24pmbhasuu:1171: avibhaktitvam bhāvyate . tat itaretarāśrayam bhavati , itaretarāśrayāṇi ca kāryāṇi na prakalpante . aliṅgam asaṅkhyam iti vā . atha vā aliṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:1172: asaṅkhyam avyayam iti vaktavyam . evam api itaretarāśrayam eva bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1173: kā itaretarāśrayatā . sati aliṅgāsaṅkhyatve sañjñayā bhavitavyam sañjñayā ca aliṅgāsaṅkhyatvam bhāvyate . tat itaretarāśrayam bhavati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1174: itaretarāśrayāṇi ca kāryāṇi na prakalpante . na idam vācanikam aliṅgatā asaṅkhyatā ca . kim tarhi . svābhāvikam etat . tat yathā : samānam īhamānānām adhīyānānām ca ke cit arthaiḥ yujyante apare na . tatra kim asmābhiḥ kartum śakyam . svābhāvikam etat . tat tarhi vaktavyam aliṅgam asaṅkhyam iti . na vaktavyam . siddham tu pāṭhāt . pāṭhāt vā siddham etat.
GS24pmbhasuu:1175: katham pāṭhaḥ kartavyaḥ . tasilādayaḥ prāk pāsapaḥ , śasprabhṛtayaḥ prāk samāsāntebhyaḥ , māntaḥ , kṛtvorthaḥ , tasivatī , nānāñau iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1176: (P_1,1.38.3) KA_I,95.12-22 Ro_I,303-304 atha vā punaḥ astu avibhaktiḥ śabdaḥ avyayasañjñaḥ bhavati iti eva . nanu ca uktam avibhaktau itaretarāśrayatvāt aprasiddhiḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . idam tāvat ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:1177: praṣṭavyaḥ . yadi api vaiyākaraṇāḥ vibhaktilopam ārabhamāṇāḥ avibhaktikān
GS24pmbhasuu:1178: śabdāñ prayuñjate ye tu ete vaiyākaraṇebhyaḥ anye manuṣyāḥ katham te avibhaktikān śabdān prayuñjate iti . abhijñāḥ ca punaḥ laukikāḥ ekatvādīnām arthānām . ātaḥ ca abhijñāḥ : anyena hi vasnena ekam gām krīṇanti , anyena dvau , anyena trīn . abhijñāḥ ca na ca prayuñjate . tat etat evam sandṛśyatām : artharūpam etat evañjātīyakam yena atra vibhaktiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1179: na bhavati iti . tat ca api etat evam anugamyamānam dṛśyatām : kim cit avyayam vibhaktyarthapradhānam kim cit kriyāpradhānam . uccaiḥ , nīcaiḥ iti vibhaktyarthapradhānam , hiruk pṛthak iti kriyāpradhānam . taddhitaḥ ca api kaḥ cit vibhaktyarthapradhānaḥ kaḥ cit kriyāpradhānaḥ . tatra yatra iti vibhaktyarthapradhānaḥ , nānā vina iti kriyāpradhānaḥ . na ca etayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1181: (P_1,1.38.4) KA_I,95.23-96.5 Ro_I,304-307 atha api asarvavibhaktiḥ iti ucyate evam api na doṣaḥ . katham . idam ca api adyatve atibahu kriyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:1182: ekasmin ekavacanam , dvayoḥ dvivacanam , bahuṣu bahuvacanam iti . katham tarhi . ekavacanam utsargaḥ kariṣyate . tasya dvibahvoḥ arthayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1183: dvivacanabahuvacane bādhake bhaviṣyataḥ . na ca api evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate : na sarvāḥ asarvāḥ , asarvāḥ vibhaktayaḥ asmāt iti . katham tarhi . na sarvā asarvā , asarvā vibhaktiḥ asmāt iti . trikam punaḥ vibhaktisañjñam . evam gate kṛti api tulyam etat māntasya kāryam grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1184: na tatra . tataḥ pare ca abhimatāḥ kāryāḥ trayaḥ kṛdarthāḥ grahaṇena yogāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1185: . kṛttaddhitānām grahaṇam tu kāryam saṅkhyāviśeṣam hi abhiniśritāḥ ye .
GS24pmbhasuu:1186: teṣām pratiṣedhaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt : ekaḥ , dvau ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1187: bahavaḥ iti . tasmāt svarādigrahaṇam ca kāryam kṛttaddhitānām ca pāṭhe .
GS24pmbhasuu:1189: kriyate . sā iha na prāpnoti : paramoccaiḥ , paramanīcaiḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1190: tadantavidhinā bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi prāpnoti : atyuccaiḥ atyuccaisau atyuccaisaḥ iti . upasarjanasya na iti pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . sarvanāmasañjñāyām prakṛtaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ iha anuvartiṣyate . saḥ vai tatra pratyākhyāyate . yathā saḥ tatra pratyākhyāyate iha api tathā śakyaḥ pratyākhyātum . katham saḥ tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:1191: pratyākhyāyate . mahatī iyam sañjñā kriyate . iyam api ca mahatī sañjñā kriyate . sañjñā ca nāma yataḥ na laghīyaḥ . kutaḥ etat . laghvartham hi sañjñākaraṇam . tatra mahatyāḥ sañjñāyāḥ karaṇe etat prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:1192: anvarthasañjñā yathā vijñāyeta : na vyeti iti avyayam iti . kva punaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:1193: vyeti . strīpuṃnapuṃsakāni sattvaguṇāḥ ekatvadvitvabahutvāni ca . etān arthān ke cit viyanti ke cit na viyanti . ye na viyanti tad avyayam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1194: sadṛśam triṣu liṅgeṣu sarvāsu ca vibhaktiṣu vacaneṣu ca sarveṣu yat na vyeti tat avyayam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1195: (P_1,1.39.1) KA_I,96.19-97.2 Ro_I,308-310 katham idam vijñāyate : kṛt yaḥ māntaḥ iti āhosvit kṛdantam yat māntam iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate kṛt yaḥ māntaḥ iti kārayām cakāra hārayām cakāra iti atra na prāpnoti . atha vijñāyate kṛdantam yat māntam iti pratāmau pratāmaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1196: atra api prāpnoti . yathā icchasi tathā astu . astu tāvat kṛt yaḥ māntaḥ iti . katham kārayām cakāra hārayām cakāra iti . kim punaḥ atra
GS24pmbhasuu:1197: avyayasañjñayā prārthyate . avyayāt iti luk yathā syāt . mā bhūt evam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1198: āmaḥ iti evam bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati . ligrahaṇam tatra anuvartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:1199: ligrahaṇam nivartiṣyate . yadi nivartate pratyayamātrasya luk prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1200: iṣyate ca pratyayamātrasya . ātaḥ ca iṣyate . evam hi āha : kṛñ ca anuprayujyate liṭi iti . yadi ca pratyayamātrasya luk bhavati tataḥ etat upapannam bhavati . atha vā punaḥ astu kṛdantam yat māntam iti . katham pratāmau pratāmaḥ iti . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na pratyayalakṣaṇena avyayasañjñā bhavati iti yat ayam praśānśabdam svarādiṣu paṭhati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1202: anikārokāraprakṛtiḥ . kṛt mejantaḥ ca anikārokāraprakṛtiḥ iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1203: iha mā bhūt : ādhaye , ādheḥ , cikīrṣave , cikīrṣoḥ iti . ananyaprakṛtiḥ iti vā . atha vā ananyaprakṛtiḥ kṛt avyayasañjñaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1204: kim punaḥ atra jyāyaḥ . ananyaprakṛtivacanam eva jyāyaḥ . idam api siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:1205: bhavati : kumbhakārebhyaḥ , nagarakārebhyaḥ iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vā sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ animittam tadvighātasya . na vā vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1206: kim kāraṇam . sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ animittam tadvighātasya iti eṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:1207: paribhāṣā kartavyā . kaḥ punaḥ atra viśeṣaḥ eṣā vā paribhāṣā kriyeta ananyaprakṛtiḥ iti vā ucyeta . avaśyam eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . bahūni etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni . kāni punaḥ tāni . prayojanam hrasvatam tugvidheḥ grāmaṇikulam . grāmaṇikulam , senānikulam iti atra hrasvatve kṛte hrasvasya piti kṛti tuk bhavati iti tuk prāpnoti . sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ animittam tadvighātasya iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:1208: prayojanam . bahiraṅgam hrasvatvam . antaraṅgaḥ tuk . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . nalopaḥ vṛtrahabhiḥ . vṛtrhabhiḥ , bhrūṇhabhiḥ iti atra nalope kṛte hrasvasya piti kṛti tuk bhavati iti tuk prāpnoti . sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ animittam tadvighātasya iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . asiddhaḥ nalopaḥ . tasya asiddhatvāt na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1209: udupadhatvam akittvasya nikucite . udupadhatvam akittvasya animittam . kva
GS24pmbhasuu:1210: . nikucite . nikucitaḥ iti atra nalope kṛte udupadhāt bhāvādikarmaṇoḥ anyatarasyām iti akittvam prāpnoti . sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ animittam
GS24pmbhasuu:1211: tadvighātasya iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . astu atra akittvam . na dhātulope ārdhadhātuke iti pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1212: nābhāvaḥ yañi dīrghatvasya amunā . nābhāvaḥ yañi dīrghatvasya asnimittam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1213: kva . amunā . nābhāve kṛte ataḥ dīrghaḥ yañi supi ca iti dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:1214: prāpnoti . sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ animittam tadvighātasya iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . vakṣyati etat : na mu ṭādeśe iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1215: āttvam kittvasya upādāsta . āttvam kittvasya animittam . kva . upādāsta asya svaraḥ śikṣakasya iti . āttve kṛte sthāghvoḥ it ca iti ittvam prāpnoti . sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ animittam tadvighātasya iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . uktam etat : dīṅaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ sthāghvoḥ ittve iti . tisṛcatasṛtvam ṅībvidheḥ . tisṛcatasṛtvam ṅībvidheḥ animittam . tisraḥ tiṣṭhanti catasraḥ tiṣṭhanti . tisṛcatasṛbhāve kṛte ṛnnebhyaḥ ṅīp iti ṅīp prāpnoti . sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ animittam
GS24pmbhasuu:1216: tadvighātasya iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1217: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na tisṛcatasṛbhāve kṛte ṅīp bhavati iti yat ayam na tisṛcatasṛ iti nāmi dīrghatvapratiṣedham śāsti . imāni tarhi prayojanāni : śatāni sahasrāṇi . numi kṛte ṣṇāntā ṣaṭ it ṣaṭsañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:1218: prāpnoti . sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ animittam tadvighātasya iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . śakaṭau paddhatau . attve kṛte ataḥ iti ṭāp prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1219: sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ animittam tadvighātasya iti na doṣaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1220: iyeṣa , uvoṣa . guṇe kṛte ijādeḥ ca gurumataḥ anṛcchaḥ iti ām prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1221: sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ animittam tadvighātasya iti na doṣaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1222: tasya doṣaḥ varṇāśrayaḥ pratyayaḥ varṇavicālasya . tasya etasya lakṣaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1223: doṣaḥ varṇāśrayaḥ pratyayaḥ varṇavicālasya animittam syāt . kva . ata iñ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1224: dākṣiḥ , plākṣiḥ . na pratyayaḥ sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ . aṅgasañjñā tarhi animittam syāt . āttvam pugvidheḥ krāpayati . āttvam pugvidheḥ animittam
GS24pmbhasuu:1225: syāt . kva . krāpayati iti . pug hrasvatvasya adīdapat . puk hrasvatvasya animittam syāt . kva . adīdapat iti . tyadādyakāraḥ ṭābvidheḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1226: tyadādyakāraḥ ṭābvidheḥ animittam syāt . kva . yā sā . iḍvidhiḥ ākāralopasya papivān . iḍvidhiḥ ākāralopasya animittam syāt . kva .
GS24pmbhasuu:1228: matubvibhaktyudāttatvam pūrvanighātasya animittam syāt . kva . agnimān vāyumān paramavācā paramavāce . nadīhrasvratvam sambuddhilopasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:1229: nadīhrasvratvam sambuddhilopasya animittam syāt . kva . nadi kumāri kiśori
GS24pmbhasuu:1230: brāhmaṇi brahmabandhu . hrasvatve kṛte eṅhrasvāt sambuddheḥ iti lopaḥ na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam . ṅyantāt iti evam bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1231: dīrghāt iti ucyate . hrasvāntāt ca na prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1232: hrasvatvam kriyatām sambuddhilopaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt hrasvatvam . nityaḥ sambuddhilopaḥ . kṛte api hrasvatve prāpnoti akṛte api
GS24pmbhasuu:1233: . anityaḥ sambuddhilopaḥ . na hi kṛte hrasvatve prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1234: sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ animittam tadvighātasya iti . ete doṣāḥ samāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1235: bhūyāṃsaḥ vā . tasmāt na arthaḥ anayā paribhāṣayā . na hi doṣāḥ santi iti paribhāṣā na kartavyā lakṣaṇam vā na praṇeyam . na hi bhikṣukāḥ santi iti sthālyaḥ na adhiśrīyante na ca mṛgāḥ santi iti yavāḥ na upyante . doṣāḥ khalu api sākalyena parigaṇitāḥ prayojanānām udāharaṇamātram . kutaḥ etat . na hi doṣāṇām lakṣaṇam asti . tasmāt yāni etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni tadartham eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā pratividheyam ca doṣeṣu .
GS24pmbhasuu:1236: (P_1,1.41) KA_I,100.6-26 Ro_I,318-320 avyayībhāvasya avyayatve prayojanam lugmukhsvaropacārāḥ . avyayībhāvasya avyayatve prayojanam kim .
GS24pmbhasuu:1237: lugmukhsvaropacārāḥ . luk : upāgni pratyagni . avyayāt iti luk siddhaḥ bhavati . mukhasvaraḥ . upāgnimukhaḥ , pratyagnimukhaḥ . na avyayadikśabdgomahatsthūlapṛthuvatsebhyaḥ iti pratiṣedhaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:1238: . upacāraḥ : upapayaḥkāraḥ , upapayaḥkāmaḥ iti . ataḥ kṛkamikaṃsakumbhapātrakuśākarṇīṣu anavyayasya iti pratiṣedhaḥ siddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1239: bhavati . kim punaḥ idam parigaṇanam āhosvit udāharaṇamātram . parigaṇanam iti āha . api khalu api āhuḥ . yat anyat avyayībhāvasya avyayakṛtam prāpnoti tasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti . kim punaḥ tat .
GS24pmbhasuu:1240: parāṅgavadbhāvaḥ . parāṅgavadbhāve avyayapratiṣedhaḥ coditaḥ uccaiḥ adhīyāna nīcaiḥ adhīyāna iti evamartham . saḥ iha api prāpnoti : upāgni adhīyāna pratyagni adhīyāna . akaci avyayagrahaṇam kriyate uccakaiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1241: nīcakaiḥ iti evamartham . tat iha api prāpnoti : upāgnikam , pratyagnikam iti . mumi avyayapratiṣedhaḥ ucyate doṣāmanyam ahaḥ , divāmanyā rātriḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1242: evamartham . saḥ iha api prāpnoti : aupakumbhammanyaḥ , upamaṇikammanyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1243: asya cvau avyayapratiṣedhaḥ ucyate doṣābhūtam ahaḥ , divābhūtā rātriḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1244: evamartham . saḥ iha api prāpnoti : upakumbhībhūtam upamaṇikībhūtam . yadi parigaṇanam kriyate na arthaḥ avyayībhāvasya avyayasañjñayā . katham yāni avyayībhāvasya avyayatve prayojanāni . na etāni santi . yat tāvat ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1245: luk iti : ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati avyayībhāvāt luk iti yad ayam na avyayībhāvāt ataḥ iti pratiṣedham śāsti . upacāraḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1246: anuttarapadasthasya iti vartate . tatra mukhasvaraḥ ekaḥ prayojayati . na ca ekam prayojanam yogārambham prayojayati . yadi etāvat prayojanam syāt tatra eva ayam brūyāt nāvyayāt avyayībhāvāt ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1248: anapuṃsakasya iti cet jasi śipratiṣedhaḥ . śi sarvanāmasthānam suṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:1249: anapuṃsakasya iti cet jasi śeḥ pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti : kuṇḍāni tiṣṭhanti vanāni tiṣṭhanti . asamarthasamāsaḥ ca ayam draṣṭavyaḥ anapuṃsakasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1250: na hi nañaḥ napuṃsakena sāmarthyam. kena tarhi . bhavatinā : na bhavati napuṃsakasya iti . yat tāvat ucyate śi sarvanāmasthānam suṭ anapuṃsakasya iti cet jasi śipratiṣedhaḥ iti . na apratiṣedhāt . na ayam prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ : napuṃsakasya na iti . kim tarhi . paryudāsaḥ ayam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1251: yat anyat napuṃsakāt iti . napuṃsake avyāpāraḥ . yadi kena cit prāpnoti tena bhaviṣyati . pūrveṇa ca prāpnoti . aprāpteḥ vā . atha vā anantarā yā prāptiḥ sā pratiṣidhyate . kutaḥ etat . anantarasya vidhiḥ vā bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ vā iti . pūrvā prāptiḥ apratiṣiddhā . tayā bhaviṣyati . nanu ca iyam prāptiḥ pūrvām prāptim bādhate . na utsahate pratiṣiddhā satī bādhitum . yat api ucyate . asamarthasamāsaḥ ca ayam draṣṭavyaḥ iti yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:1252: api vaktavyaḥ atha vā etarhi bahūni prayojanāni . kāni . asūryampaśyāni mukhāni , apunargeyāḥ ślokāḥ , aśrāddhabhojī brāhmaṇaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1253: (P_1,1.44.1) KA_I,101.18-102.10 Ro_I,322-323 na vā iti vibhāṣāyām arthasañjñākaraṇam . na vā iti vibhāṣāyām arthasya sañjñā kartavyā .
GS24pmbhasuu:1254: navāśabdasya yaḥ arthaḥ tasya sañjñā bhavati iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . śabdasañjñāyām hi arthāsampratyayaḥ yathā anyatra .
GS24pmbhasuu:1255: śabdasañjñāyām hi satyām arthasya asampratyayaḥ syāt yathā anyatra .
GS24pmbhasuu:1256: anyatra api śabdasañjñāyām śabdasya sampratyayaḥ bhavati na arthasya . kva anyatra . dādhāḥ ghu adāp taraptamapau ghaḥ iti ghugrahaṇeṣu ghagrahaṇeṣu ca śabdasya sampratyayaḥ bhavati na arthasya . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . itikaraṇaḥ arthanirdeśārthaḥ . itikaraṇaḥ kriyate . saḥ arthanirdeśārthaḥ bhaviṣyati . kim gatam etat itinā āhosvit śabādhikyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1257: arthādhikyam . gatam iti āha . kutaḥ . lokataḥ . tat yathā loke gauḥ ayam iti āha iti gośabdāt itikaraṇaḥ paraḥ prayujyamānaḥ gośabdam svasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1258: padārthāt pracyāvayati . saḥ asau svasmāt padārthāt pracyutaḥ yā asau arthapadārthakatā tasyāḥ śabdapadārthakaḥ sampadyate . evam iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:1259: navāśabdāt itikaraṇaḥ paraḥ prayujyamānaḥ navāśabdam svasmāt padārthāt pracyāvayati . saḥ asau svasmāt padārthāt pracyutaḥ yā asau śabdapadārthakatā tasyāḥ laukikam artham sampratyāyayati . na vā iti yat gamyate na vā iti yat pratīyate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1261: samānaśabdānām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : navā kuṇḍikā navā ghaṭikā iti . kim ca syāt yadi eteṣām api vibhāṣāsañjñā syāt . vibhāṣā diksamāse bahuvrīhau
GS24pmbhasuu:1262: : dakṣiṇapūrvasyām śālāyām . acirakṛtāyām sampratyayaḥ syāt . na vā vidhipūrvakatvāt pratiṣedhasamapratyayaḥ yathā loke . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1263: kim kāraṇam . vidhipūrvakatvāt . vidhāya kim cit na vā iti ucyate . tena pratiṣedhavācinaḥ samapratyayaḥ bhavati . tat yathā loke : grāmaḥ bhavatā gantavyaḥ na vā . na iti gamyate . asti kārṇam yena loke pratiṣedhavācinaḥ samapratyayaḥ bhavati . kim kāraṇam . viliṅgam hi bhavān loke nirdeśam karoti . āṅga hi samānaliṅgaḥ nirdeśaḥ kriyatām pratyagravācinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1264: sampratyayaḥ bhaviṣyati . tat yathā : grāmaḥ bhavatā gantavyaḥ navaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1265: pratyagraḥ iti gamyate . etat ca eva na jānīmaḥ : kva cit vyākaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:1266: samānaliṅgaḥ nirdeśaḥ kriyate iti . api ca kāmacāraḥ prayoktuḥ śabdānām abhisambandhe . tat yathā : yavāgūḥ bhavatā bhoktavyā navā . yadā yavāgūśabdaḥ bhujinā abhisambadhyate bhujiḥ navāśabdena tadā pratiṣedhavācinaḥ sampratyayaḥ bhavati : yavāgūḥ bhavatā bhoktavyā navā .
GS24pmbhasuu:1267: na iti gamyate . yadā yavāgūśabdaḥ navāśabdena abhisambadhyate na bhujinā
GS24pmbhasuu:1268: tadā pratyagravācinaḥ sampratyayaḥ bhavati : yavāgūḥ navā bhavatā
GS24pmbhasuu:1269: bhoktavyā . pratyagrā iti gamyate . na ca iha vayam vibhāṣāgrahaṇena sarvādīni abhisambadhnīmaḥ : diksamāse bahuvrīhau sarvādīni vibhāṣā bhavanti iti . kim tarhi . bhavatiḥ abhisambadhyate : diksamāse bahuvrīhau sarvādīni bhavanti vibhāṣā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1270: (P_1,1.44.3) KA_I,103.3-104.7 Ro_I,325-328 vidhyanityatvam anupapannam pratiṣedhasañjñākaraṇāt . vidhyanityatvam na upapadyate : śuśāva ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1271: śuśuvatuḥ , śuśuvuḥ , śiśvāya , śiśviyatuḥ , śiśviyuḥ . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1272: pratiṣedhasañjñākaraṇāt . pratiṣedhasya iyam sañjñā kriyate . tena vibhāṣāpradeśeṣu pratiṣedhasya eva sampratyayaḥ syāt . siddham tu prasajyapratiṣedhāt . siddham etat . katham . prasajyapratiṣedhāt prasajya kim cit na vā iti ucyate . tena ubhayam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1273: vipratiṣiddham tu . vipratiṣiddham tu bhavati . atra na jñāyate : kena abhiprāyeṇa prasajati kena nivṛttim karoti iti . na vā prasaṅgasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1274: anyatra pratiṣedhaviṣayāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1275: prasaṅgasāmarthyāt . prasaṅgasāmarthyāt ca vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati anyatra pratiṣedhaviṣayāt pratiṣedhasāmarthyāt ca pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:1276: vidhiviṣayāt . tat etat kva siddham bhavati . yā aprāpte vibhāṣā . yā hi prāpte kṛtasāmarthyaḥ tatra pūrveṇa vidhiḥ iti kṛtvā pratiṣedhasya eva
GS24pmbhasuu:1277: sampratyayaḥ syāt . etat api siddham . katham . vibhāṣā iti mahatīsañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:1278: kriyate . sañjñā ca nāma yataḥ na laghīyaḥ . kutaḥ etat . laghvartham hi sañjñākaraṇam . tatra mahatyāḥ sañjñāyāḥ karaṇe etat prayojanam ubhayoḥ sañjñā yathā vijñāyeta : na iti ca vā iti ca . tatra yā tāvat aprāpte vibhāṣā tatra pratiṣedhyam na asti iti kṛtvā vā iti anena vikalpaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1279: bhaviṣyati . yā hi prāpte vibhāṣā tatra ubhayam upasthitam bhavati : na iti ca vā iti ca . tatra na iti anena pratiṣiddhe vā iti anena vikalpaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1281: vipratiṣedhayoḥ yugapadvacanam na upapadyate : śuśāva śuśuvatuḥ śuśuvuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1282: śiśvāya śiśviyatuḥ śiśviyuḥ . kim kāraṇam . bhavati iti cet na pratiṣedhaḥ . bhavati iti cet pratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti . na iti cet na vidhiḥ . na it cet vidhiḥ na sidhyati . siddham tu pūrvasya uttareṇa bādhitatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:1283: siddham etat. katham . pūrvavidhim uttarvidhiḥ bādhate . itikaraṇaḥ arthanirdeśāṛthaḥ iti uktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1285: vibhāṣā tasya sādhutvam . sādhvanuśāsane asmin śāstre yasya vibhāṣā kriyate saḥ vibhāṣā sādhuḥ syāt . samāsaḥ ca eva hi vibhāṣā . tena samāsasya eva vibhāṣā sādhutvam syāt . astu . yaḥ sādhuḥ saḥ prayokṣyate.
GS24pmbhasuu:1286: asādhuḥ na prayokṣyate . na ca eva hi kadā cit rājapuruṣaḥ iti asyām
GS24pmbhasuu:1287: avasthāyām asādhutvam iṣyate . api ca dvedhāpratipattiḥ . dvaidham śabdānām apratipattiḥ . icchāmaḥ ca punaḥ vibhāṣāpradeśeṣu dvaidham śabdānām pratipattiḥ syāt iti tat ca na sidhyati . yasya punaḥ kāryāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1288: śabdāḥ vibhāṣā asau samāsam nirvartayati . yasya api nityāḥ śabdāḥ tasya api eṣaḥ na doṣaḥ . katham . na vibhāṣāgrahaṇena sādhutvam abhisambadhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1289: . kim tarhi . samāsasañjñā abhisambadhyate : samāsaḥ iti eṣā sañjñā vibhāṣā bhavati iti . tat yathā : medhyaḥ paśuḥ vibhāṣitaḥ . medhyaḥ anaḍvān vibhāṣitaḥ iti . na etat vicāryate : anaḍvān na anaḍvān iti . kim tarhi ālabdhavyaḥ na ālabdhavyaḥ iti . kārye yugapadanvācayayaugapadyam kāryeṣu śabdeṣu yugapat anvācayena ca yat ucyate tasya yugapadvacanatā prāpnoti : tavyattavyānīyaraḥ , ḍhak ca maṇḍūkāt iti . yasya punaḥ nityāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1290: śabdāḥ prayuktānām asau sādhutvam anvācaṣṭe . nanu ca yasya api kāryāḥ tasya api eṣaḥ na doṣaḥ . katham . pratyayaḥ paraḥ bhavati iti ucyate . na ca ekasyāḥ prakṛteḥ anekasya pratyayasya yugapat paratvena sambhavaḥ asti
GS24pmbhasuu:1291: . na api brūmaḥ pratyayamālā prāpnoti . kim tarhi . kartavyam iti prayoktavye yugapat dvitīyasya tṛtīyasya ca prayogaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . arthagatyarthaḥ śabdaprayogaḥ . artham sampratyāyayiṣyāmi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1292: śabdaḥ prayujyate . tatra ekena uktatvāt tasya arthasya dvitīyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1293: prayogeṇa na bhavitavyam uktārthānām aprayogaḥ iti . ācāryadeśaśīlane ca tadviṣayatā . ācāryadeśaśīlanena yat ucyate tasya tadviṣayatā prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1294: ikaḥ hrasvaḥ aṅyaḥ gālavasya prācām avṛddhāt phin bahulam iti gālavāḥ eva hrasvān prayuñjīran prākṣu ca eva hi phin syāt . tat yathā : jamadagniḥ vai etat pañcamam avadānam avādyat tasmāt na ajāmadagnyaḥ pañcāvattam juhoti . yasya punaḥ nityāḥ śabdāḥ gālavagrahaṇam tasya pūjārtham deśagrahaṇam ca kīrtyartham . nanu ca yasya api kāryāḥ tasya api pūjārtham gālavagrahaṇam syāt deśagraham ca kīrtyartham . tatkīrtane ca dvedhāpratipattiḥ . tatkīrtane ca dvaidham śabdānām apratipattiḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:1295: icchāmaḥ ca punaḥ ācāryagrahaṇeṣu deśagrahaṇeṣu ca dvaidham śabdānām pratipattiḥ syāt iti tat ca na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1297: aśiṣyaḥ vā punaḥ ayam yogaḥ . kim kāraṇam . viditatvāt . yat anena yogena
GS24pmbhasuu:1298: prārthyate tasya arthasya viditatvāt . ye api hi etām sañjñām na ārabhante te api vibhāṣā iti ukte anityatvam avagacchanti . yājñikāḥ khalu api
GS24pmbhasuu:1299: sañjñām anārabhamāṇāḥ vibhāṣā iti ukte anityatvam avagacchanti . tat yathā . medhyaḥ paśuḥ vibhāṣitaḥ . medhyaḥ anaḍvān vibhāṣitaḥ iti . ālabdhavyaḥ na ālabdhavyaḥ iti gamyate . ācāryaḥ khalu api sañjñām ārabhamāṇaḥ bhūyiṣṭham anyaiḥ api śabdaiḥ etam artham sampratyāyayati bahulam anyatarasyām ubhayathā vā ekeṣām iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1300: (P_1,1.44.6) KA_I,105.21-108.7 Ro_I,333-339 aprāpte trisaṃśayāḥ . itaḥ uttaram yāḥ vibhāṣāḥ anukramiṣyāmaḥ aprāpte tāḥ draṣṭavyāḥ . trisaṃśayāḥ tu bhavanti : prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti . dvandve ca vibhāṣā jasi :
GS24pmbhasuu:1301: prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti sandehaḥ . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham vā ubhayatra . ubhayaśabdaḥ sarvādiṣu paṭhyate tayapaḥ ca ayajādeśaḥ kriyate . tena vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte ubhayatra vā
GS24pmbhasuu:1302: iti . aprāpte . ayac pratyayāntaram . yadi pratyayāntaram ubhayī iti īkāraḥ na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam . mātracaḥ iti evam bhaviṣyati . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:1303: . mātrac iti na idam pratyayagrahaṇam . kim tarhi . pratyāhāragrahaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1304: kva sanniviṣṭānām pratyāhāraḥ . mātraśabdāt prabhṛti ā āyacaḥ cakārāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:1305: yadi pratyāhāragrahaṇam kati tiṣṭhanti : atra api prāpnoti . ataḥ iti vartate . evam api tailamātrā ghrtamātrā iti atra api prāpnoti . sadṛśasya api asanniviṣṭasya na bhaviṣyati pratyāhāreṇa grahaṇam . ūrṇoḥ vibhāṣā :
GS24pmbhasuu:1306: prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti sandehaḥ . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham vā ubhayatra . asaṃyogāt liṭ kit iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti . aprāpte . anyat hi kittvam anyat ṅittvam . ekam cet ṅitkitau . yadi ekam ṅitkitau tataḥ asti sandehaḥ atha hi nānā na asti sandehaḥ . yadi api nānā evam api sandehaḥ . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:1307: praurṇuvi iti . sārvadhātukam apit iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:1308: ubhayatra vā iti . aprāpte . vibhāṣā upayamane : prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra
GS24pmbhasuu:1309: vā iti sandehaḥ . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham vā ubhayatra .
GS24pmbhasuu:1310: gandhane iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti . aprāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:1311: . gandhane iti nivṛttam . anupasargāt vā : prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti sandehaḥ . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham vā ubhayatra .
GS24pmbhasuu:1312: vṛttisargatāyaneṣu kramaḥ iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti . aprāpte . vṛttyādiṣu iti nivṛttam . vibhāṣā vṛkṣamṛgādīnām :
