GS24pmbhasuu:1356: samprasāraṇasañjñā kriyate : ik yaṇaḥ iti etat vākyam samprasāraṇasañjñam
GS24pmbhasuu:1357: bhavati iti , āhosvit varṇasya : ik yaḥ yaṇaḥ sthāne saḥ samprasāraṇasañjñaḥ bhavati iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1358: samprasāraṇasañjñāyām vākyasañjñā cet varṇavidhiḥ . samprasāraṇasañjñāyām vākyasañjñā cet varṇavidhiḥ na sidhyati : samprasāraṇāt paraḥ pūrvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1359: bhavati , samprasāraṇasya dīrghaḥ bhavati iti . na hi vākyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1360: samprasāraṇasañjñāyām satyām eṣaḥ nirdeśaḥ upapadyate na api etayoḥ kāryayoḥ sambhavaḥ asti . astu tarhi varṇasya . varṇasañjñā cet nirvṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1361: . varṇasañjñā cet nirvṛttiḥ na sidhyati : ṣyaṅaḥ samprasāraṇam iti . saḥ eva hi tāvat ik durlabhaḥ yasya sañjñā kriyate . atha api katham cit labhyeta kena asu yaṇaḥ sthāne syāt . anena eva hi asau vyavasthāpyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:1362: tat etat itaretarāśrayam bhavati , itaretarāśrayāṇi ca kāryāṇi na prakalpante . vibhaktiviśeṣanirdeśaḥ tu jñāpakaḥ ubhayasañjñātvasya . yat ayam vibhaktiviśeṣaiḥ nirdeśam karoti samprasāraṇāt paraḥ pūrvaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:1363: samprasāraṇasya dīrghaḥ bhavati ṣyaṅaḥ samprasāraṇam iti tena jñāyate ubhayoḥ sañjñā bhavati iti . yat tāvat āha samprasāraṇāt paraḥ pūrvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1364: bhavati samprasāraṇasya dīrghaḥ bhavati iti tena jñāyate varṇasya bhavati iti . yat api āha ṣyaṅaḥ samprasāraṇam iti tena jñāyate vākyasya api sañjñā bhavati iti . atha vā punaḥ astu vākyasya eva . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:1365: samprasāraṇasañjñāyām vākyasañjñā cet varṇavidhiḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1366: yathā kākāt jātaḥ kākaḥ , śyenāt jātaḥ śyenaḥ evam samprasāraṇāt jātam
GS24pmbhasuu:1367: samprasāraṇam . yat tat samprasāraṇāt jātam samprasāraṇam tasmāt paraḥ pūrvaḥ bhavati tasya dīrghaḥ bhavati iti . atha vā dṛśyante hi vākyeṣu vākyaikadeśān prayuñjānāḥ padeṣu ca padaikadeśān . vākyeṣu tāvat vākyaikadeśān : praviśa piṇḍīm , praviśa tarparṇam . padeṣu padaikadeśān devadattaḥ dattaḥ , satyabhāmā bhāmā iti . evam iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:1368: samprasāraṇanirvṛttāt samprasāraṇanirvṛttasya iti etasya vākyasya arthe samprasāraṇāt samprasāraṇasya iti vākyaikadeśaḥ prayujyate . tena nirvṛttasya vidhim vijñāsyāmaḥ . samprasāraṇanirvṛttāt samprasāraṇanirvṛttasya iti . atha vā āha ayam samprasāraṇāt paraḥ pūrvaḥ bhavati samprasāraṇasya dīrghaḥ bhavati iti . na ca vākyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1369: samprasāraṇasañjñāyām satyām eṣaḥ nirdeśaḥ upapadyate na api etayoḥ kāryayoḥ sambhavaḥ asti . tatra vacanāt bhaviṣyati . atha vā punaḥ astu varṇasya . nanu ca uktam varṇasañjñā cet nirvṛttiḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1370: itaretarāśrayamātram etat coditam . sarvāṇi ca itaretarāśrayāṇi ekatvena parihṛtāni siddham tu nityaśabdatvāt iti . na idam tulyam anyaiḥ itaretarāśrayaiḥ . na hi tatra kim cit ucyate asya sthāne ye
GS24pmbhasuu:1371: ākāraikāraukārāḥ bhāvyante te vṛddhisañjñāḥ bhavanti iti . iha punaḥ ucyate ik yaḥ yaṇaḥ sthāne saḥ samprasāraṇasañjñaḥ bhavati iti . evam tarhi bhāvinī iyam sañjñā vijñāsyate . tat yathā : kaḥ cit kam cit tantuvāyam āha : asya sūtrasya śāṭakam vaya iti . saḥ paśyati : yadi śāṭakaḥ na vātavyaḥ atha vātavyaḥ na śāṭakaḥ . śāṭakaḥ vātavyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1372: vipratiṣiddham . bhāvinī khalu asya sañjñā abhipretā . saḥ manye vātavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1373: yasmin ute śāṭakaḥ iti etat bhavati iti . evam iha api saḥ yaṇaḥ sthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:1374: bhavati yasya abhinirvṛttasya samprasāraṇam iti eṣā sañjñā bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1375: atha vā ijādiyajādipravṛttiḥ ca eva hi loke lakṣyate . yajādyupadeśāt tu ijādinivṛttiḥ prasaktā . prayuñjate ca punaḥ lokāḥ iṣṭam uptam iti . te manyāmahe : asya yaṇaḥ sthāne imam ikam prayuñjate iti . tatra tasya asādhvabhimatasya śāstreṇa sādhutvam avasthāpyate : kiti sādhuḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:1377: (P_1,1.46.1) KA_I,112.19-22 Ro_I, 346 samāsanirdeśaḥ ayam . tatra na jñāyate kaḥ ādiḥ kaḥ antaḥ iti . tat yathā : ajāvidhanau devadattayajñadattau iti ukte na jñāyate kasya ajāḥ dhanam kasya avayaḥ iti . yadi api tāvat loke eṣaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ dṛṣṭāntasya api puruṣārambhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1378: nivartakaḥ bhavati . asti ca iha kaḥ cit puruṣārambhaḥ . asti iti āha .
GS24pmbhasuu:1381: ādyantau bhavataḥ . āgamau iti āha . yuktam punaḥ yat nityeṣu nāma śabdeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:1382: āgamaśāsanam syāt na nityeṣu śabdeṣu kūṭasthaiḥ avicālibhiḥ varṇaiḥ bhavitavyam anapāyopajanavikāribhiḥ . āgamaḥ ca nāma apūrvaḥ śabdopajanaḥ . atha yuktam yat nityeṣu śabdeṣu ādeśāḥ syuḥ . bāḍham yuktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1383: śabdāntaraiḥ iha bhavitavyam . tatra śabdāntarāt śabdāntarasya pratipattiḥ yuktā . ādeśāḥ tarhi ime bhaviṣyanti anāgamakānām sāgamakāḥ . tat katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:1384: sañjñādhikāraḥ ayam . ādyantau ca iha saṅkīrtyete . ṭakārkakārau itau udāhriyete . tatra ādyantayoḥ ṭakārakakārau itau sañjñe bhaviṣyataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1385: tatra ārdhadhātukasya iṭ valādeḥ iti upasthitam idam bhavati : ādiḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1386: tena ikārādiḥ ādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . etāvat iha sūtram iṭ iti . katham punaḥ iyatā sūtreṇa ikārādiḥ ādeśaḥ labhyaḥ . labhyaḥ iti āha . katham.
GS24pmbhasuu:1387: bahuvrīhinirdeśāt . bahuvrīhinirdeśaḥ ayam : ikāraḥ ādiḥ asya iti . yadi api tāvat atra etat śakyate vakutm iha katham : luṅlaṅlṛṅkṣu aṭ udāttaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1388: iti yatra aśakyam udāttagrahaṇena akāraḥ viśeṣayitum . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1389: aṅgasya udāttatvam prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . tripadaḥ ayam bahuvrīhiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1390: tatra vākye eva udāttagrahaṇena akāraḥ viśeṣyate : akāraḥ udāttaḥ ādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1391: asya iti . yatra tarhi anuvṛttyā etat bhavati : āṭ ajādīnām iti . vakṣyati etat : ajādīnām aṭā siddham iti . atha vā yat tāvat ayam sāmānyena śaknoti upadeṣṭum tat tāvat upadiśati prakṛtim tataḥ valādi ārdhadhātukam tataḥ paścāt ikāram . tena ayam viśeṣeṇa śabdāntaram samudāyam pratipadyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:1392: tat yathā khadiraburburayoḥ : khadiraburburau gaurakāṇḍau sūkṣmaparṇau .
GS24pmbhasuu:1393: tataḥ paścāt āha kaṇṭakavān khadiraḥ iti . tena asau viśeṣeṇa dravyāntaram samudāyam pratipadyate . atha vā etayā ānupūrvyā ayam śabdāntaram
GS24pmbhasuu:1394: upadiśati : prakṛtim tataḥ valādi ārdhadhātukam tataḥ paścāt ikāram yasmin tasya āgamabuddhiḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1395: (P_1,1.46.3) KA_I,113.16-114.16 Ro_I,349-351 ṭakitoḥ ādyantavidhāne pratyayapratiṣedhaḥ . ṭakitoḥ ādyantavidhāne pratyayasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . pratyayaḥ ādiḥ antaḥ vā mā bhūt : careḥ ṭaḥ ātaḥ anupasarge kaḥ iti . paravacanāt siddham . paravacanāt pratyayaḥ ādiḥ antaḥ vā na
GS24pmbhasuu:1396: bhaviṣyati . paravacanāt siddham iti cet na apavādatvāt . paravacanāt siddham iti cet na . kim kāraṇam . apavādatvāt . apavādaḥ ayam yogaḥ . tat yathā mit acaḥ antyāt paraḥ iti eṣaḥ yogaḥ sthāneyogatvasya pratyayaparatvasya ca apavādaḥ . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . yuktam tatra yat
GS24pmbhasuu:1397: anavakāśam mitkaraṇam sthāneyogatvam pratyayaparatvam ca bādhate . iha punaḥ ubhayam sāvakāsam . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . ṭitkaraṇasya avakāśaḥ : ṭitaḥ iti īkāraḥ yathā syāt . kitkaraṇasya avakāśaḥ : kiti iti ākāralopaḥ yathā syāt . prayojanam nāma tat vaktavyam yat niyogataḥ syāt . yadi ca ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:1398: niyogataḥ paraḥ syāt tataḥ etat prayojanam syāt . kutaḥ nu khalu etat ṭitkaraṇāt ayam paraḥ bhaviṣyati na punaḥ ādiḥ iti kitkaraṇāt ca paraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1399: bhaviṣyati na punaḥ antaḥ iti . ṭitaḥ khalu api eṣaḥ parihāraḥ yatra na asti sambhavaḥ yat paraḥ ca syāt ādiḥ ca . kitaḥ tu aparihāraḥ . asti hi sambhavaḥ yat paraḥ ca syāt antaḥ ca . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . upasarge ghoḥ kiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1400: : ādhyoḥ , pradhyoḥ . noṅdhātvoḥ iti pratiṣedhaḥ prasajyeta . ṭitaḥ ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:1401: aparihāraḥ . syāt eva hi ayam ṭitkaraṇāt ādiḥ na punaḥ paraḥ . kva tarhi idānīm idam syāt : ṭitaḥ īkāraḥ bhavati iti . yaḥ ubhayavān : gāpoḥ ṭak iti . siddham tu ṣaṣṭhyadhikāre vacanāt . siddham etat . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:1402: ṣaṣṭhyadhikāre ayam yogaḥ karatvyaḥ : ādyantau ṭakitau ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1403: iti . ādyantayoḥ vā ṣaṣthyarthatvāt tadabhāve asampratyayaḥ . ādyantayoḥ vā ṣaṣthyarthatvāt ṣaṣṭhyāḥ abhāve asampratyayaḥ . ādiḥ antaḥ vā na bhaviṣyati . yuktam punaḥ yat śabdanimittakaḥ nāma arthaḥ syāt na arthanimittakena śabdena bhavitavyam . arthanimittakaḥ eva śabdaḥ . tat katham . ādyantau ṣaṣṭhyarthau . na ca atra ṣaṣṭhīm paśyāmaḥ . te manyāmahe : ādyantau eva atra na staḥ . tayoḥ abhāve ṣaṣṭhī api na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:1405: (P_1,1.47.1) KA_I,114.18-115.4 Ro_I,352 kimartham idam ucyate . mit acaḥ antyāt paraḥ iti sthānaparapratyayāpavādaḥ . mit acaḥ antyāt paraḥ iti ucyate sthāneyogatvasya pratyayaparatvasya ca apavādaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1406: sthāneyogatvasya tāvat : kuṇḍāni vanāni payāṃsi yaśāṃsi .
GS24pmbhasuu:1407: pratyayaparatvasya : bhinatti chinatti . bhavet idam yuktam udāharaṇam kuṇḍāni vanāni yatra na asti sambhavaḥ yat ayam acaḥ anytāt paraḥ ca syāt sthāne ca iti . idam tu ayuktam payāṃsi yaśāṃsi . asti hi sambhavaḥ yat acaḥ anytāt paraḥ ca syāt sthāne ca . etat api yuktam . katham . na eva īśvaraḥ ājñāpayati na api dharmasūtrakārāḥ paṭhanti apavādaiḥ utsargāḥ bādhyantām iti . kim tarhi . laukikaḥ ayam dṛṣṭāntaḥ . loke hi sati api sambhave bādhanam bhavati . tat yathā : dadhi brāhmaṇebhyaḥ dīyatām takram kauṇḍinyāya iti sati api sambhave dadhidānasya takradānam nivartakam
GS24pmbhasuu:1408: bhavati . evam iha api sati api sambhave acām antyāt paratvam
GS24pmbhasuu:1411: anuṣaṅgasaṃyogādilopārtham . antyāt pūrvaḥ masjeḥ mit vaktavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . anuṣaṅgasaṃyogādilopārtham . anuṣaṅgalopārtham saṃyogādilopārtham ca . anuṣaṅgalopārtham tāvat : magnaḥ , magnavān .
GS24pmbhasuu:1412: saṃyogādilopārtham maṅktā maṅktum , maṅktavyam . bharjimarcyoḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:1413: bharjimarcyoḥ ca antyāt pūrvaḥ mit vaktavyaḥ . bharūjā marīcayaḥ iti . saḥ tarhi vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . nipātanāt siddham . kim nipātanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1415: (P_1,1.47.3) KA_I,115.13-117.2 Ro_I,353-357 kim punaḥ ayam pūrvāntaḥ āhosvit parādiḥ āhosvit abhaktaḥ . katham ca ayam pūrvāntaḥ syāt katham vā parādiḥ katham vā abhaktaḥ . yadi antaḥ iti vartate tataḥ pūrvāntaḥ . atha ādiḥ iti vartate tataḥ parādiḥ . atha ubhayam nivṛttam tataḥ abhaktaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1416: kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . abhakte dīrghanalopasvaraṇatvānusvāraśībhāvāḥ . yadi abhaktaḥ dīrghatvam na prāpnoti : kuṇḍāni vanāni . nopadhāyāḥ sarvanāmasthāne ca asambuddhau iti dīrghatvam na prāpnoti . dīrgha .
GS24pmbhasuu:1417: nalopa : nalopaḥ ca na sidhyati : agne trī te vajinā trī sadhasthā , ta tā piṇḍānām . nalopaḥ prātipadikāntasya iti nalopaḥ na prāpnoti . nalopa .
GS24pmbhasuu:1418: svara : svaraḥ ca na sidhyati : sarvāṇi jyotīṃṣi . sarvasya supi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1419: ādyudāttatvam na prāpnoti . svara . ṇatva : ṇatvam ca na sidhyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:1420: māṣavāpāṇi vrīhivāpāṇi . pūrvānte prātipadikāntanakārasya iti siddham ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1421: parādau vibhaktinakārasya , abhakte numaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . kriyate nyāse eva : prātipadikāntanumvibhaktiṣu iti . ṇatva .
GS24pmbhasuu:1422: anusvāra : anusvāraḥ ca na sidhyati : dviṣantapaḥ , parantapaḥ . maḥ anusvāraḥ hali iti anusvāraḥ na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam . naḥ ca apadāntasya jhali iti evam bhaviṣyati . yaḥ tarhi na jhalparaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1423: vahaṃlihaḥ gauḥ , abhraṃlihaḥ vāyuḥ . anusvāra . śībhāva : śībhāvaḥ ca na
GS24pmbhasuu:1424: sidhyati : trapuṇī jatunī tumburuṇī . napuṃsakāt uttarasya auṅaḥ śībhāvaḥ bhavati iti śībhāvaḥ na prāpnoti . śībhāva . evam tarhi parādiḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1426: yadi parādiḥ guṇaḥ pratiṣedhyaḥ : trapuṇe jatune tumburuṇe . gheḥ ṅiti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1427: guṇaḥ prāpnoti . guṇa . vṛddhi : vṛddhiḥ pratiṣedhyā : atisakhīni brāhmaṇakulāni . sakhyuḥ asambuddhau iti ṇittve acaḥ ñṇiti iti vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti . vṛddhi . auttva : auttvam ca pratiṣedhyam : trapuṇi jatuni tumburuṇi . idudbhyām aut at ca gheḥ iti auttvam prāpnoti . auttva .
GS24pmbhasuu:1428: dīrgha : dīrghatvam ca na sidhyati : kuṇḍāni vanāni . nopadhāyāḥ sarvanāmasthāne ca asambuddhau iti dīrghatvam na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1429: ataḥ dīrghaḥ yañi supi ca iti evam bhaviṣyati . iha tarhi : asthīni dadhīni priyasakhīni brāhmaṇakulāni . dīrgha . nalopa : nalopaḥ ca na
GS24pmbhasuu:1430: sidhyati : agne trī te vajinā trī sadhasthā , ta tā piṇḍānām . nalopaḥ prātipadikāntasya iti nalopaḥ na prāpnoti . nalopa . anusvāra : anusvāraḥ ca na sidhyati : dviṣantapaḥ , parantapaḥ . maḥ anusvāraḥ hali iti anusvāraḥ na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam . naḥ ca apadāntasya jhali iti evam
GS24pmbhasuu:1431: bhaviṣyati . yaḥ tarhi na jhalparaḥ : vahaṃlihaḥ gauḥ , abhraṃlihaḥ vāyuḥ . anusvāra . śībhāvenakārapratiṣedhaḥ : śībhāve nakārasya pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1432: vaktavyaḥ : trapuṇī jatunī tumburuṇī . sanumkasya śībhāvaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . nirdiśyamānasya ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti evam na bhaviṣyati . yaḥ tarhi nirdiśyate tasya na prāpnoti . kasmāt . numā vyavahitatvāt . evam tarhi pūrvāntaḥ kariṣyate . pūrvānte napuṃsakopasarjanahrasvatvam dvigusvaraḥ ca . yadi pūrvantaḥ kriyate napuṃsakopasarjanahrasvatvam dvigusvaraḥ ca na sidhyati . napuṃsakopasarjanahrasvatvam : ārāśastriṇī dhānāśaṣkulinī niṣkauśāmbinī nirvārāṇasinī . dvigusvara : pañcāratninī daśāratninī . numi kṛte anantyatvāt ete vidhayaḥ na prāpnunvanti . na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1433: bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . bahiraṅgaḥ num , antaraṅgāḥ ete vidhayaḥ . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . dvigusvare bhūyān parihāraḥ : saṅghātabhaktaḥ asau na utsahate avayavasya igantatām vihantum iti kṛtvā dvigusvaraḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:1434: (P_1,1.48) KA_I,117.4-118.4 Ro_I,357-359 kimartham idam ucyate . ecaḥ ik savarṇākāranivṛttyartham . ecaḥ ik bhavati iti ucyate savarṇanivṛttyartham akāranivṛttyartham ca . savarṇnivṛttyartham tāvat :
GS24pmbhasuu:1435: eṅaḥ hrasvaśāsaneṣu ardhaḥ ekāraḥ ardhaḥ okāraḥ vā mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1436: akāranivṛttyartham ca . imau aicau samāhāravarṇau . mātrā avarṇasya mātrā
GS24pmbhasuu:1437: ivarṇovarṇayoḥ . tayoḥ hrasvaśāsaneṣu kadā cit avarṇaḥ syāt kadā cit ivarṇovarṇau . mā kadā cit avarṇam bhūt iti evamartham idam ucyate . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . dīrghaprasaṅgaḥ . dīrghāḥ tu ikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1438: prāpnuvanti . kim kāraṇam . sthāne antaratamaḥ bhavati iti . nanu ca hrasvādeśe iti ucyate . tena dīrghāḥ na bhaviṣyanti . viṣyārtham etat syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1439: . ecaḥ hrasvaprasaṅge ik bhavati iti . dīrghāprasaṅgaḥ tu nivartakatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:1440: dīrghāṇām tu ikām aprasaṅgaḥ . kim kāraṇam . nivartakatvāt . na anena ikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1441: nirvartyante . kim tarhi . anikaḥ nivartyante . siddhāḥ eva hrasvāḥ ikaḥ ca anikaḥ ca . tatra anena anikaḥ nivartyante . savarṇanivṛttyarthena tāvat na arthaḥ . siddham eṅaḥ sasthānatvāt . siddham etat . katham . eṅaḥ sasthānatvāt ikārokārau bhaviṣyataḥ . ardhaḥ ekāraḥ aradhaḥ okāraḥ vā na
GS24pmbhasuu:1442: bhaviṣyati . nanu ca eṅaḥ sasthānatarau ardhaḥ ekāraukārau . na tau staḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1443: yadi hi tau syātām tau eva ayam upadiśet . nanu ca bhoḥ chandogānām sātyamugrirāṇāyanīyāḥ ardham ekāram ardham okāram ca adhīyate : sujāte eśvasūnṛte , adhvaryo odribhiḥ sutam , śukram te enyat yajatam te enyat
GS24pmbhasuu:1444: iti . pārṣadakṛtiḥ eṣā tatrabhavatām . na eva loke na anyasmin vede ardhaḥ ekāraḥ ardhaḥ okāraḥ vā asti . akāranivṛttyarthena api na arthaḥ . aicoḥ ca uttarabhūyastvāt . aicoḥ ca uttarabhūyastvāt avarṇaḥ na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1445: bhūyasī mātrā ivarṇovarṇayoḥ alpīyasī avarṇasya . bhūyasaḥ eva grahaṇāni
GS24pmbhasuu:1446: bhaviṣyanti . tat yathā brāhmaṇagrāmaḥ ānīyatām iti ucyate tatra ca avarataḥ pañcakārukī bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1447: (P_1,1.49.1) KA_I,118.6-7 Ro_I,360 kim idam sthāneyogā iti . sthāne yogaḥ asyāḥ sā iyam sthāneyogā . saptamyalopaḥ nipātanāt . tṛtiyāyā vā etvam : sthānena yogaḥ asyāḥ sā iyam sthāneyogā .
GS24pmbhasuu:1449: ucyate . ṣaṣṭhyāḥ sthāneyogavacanam niyamārtham . niyamāṛthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . ekaśatam ṣaṣṭhyarthāḥ yāvantaḥ vā te sarve ṣaṣṭhyām uccāritāyām prāpnuvanti . iṣyate ca vyākaraṇe yā ṣaṣṭhī sā sthāneyogā eva syāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1450: tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati iti ṣaṣṭhyāḥ sthāneyogavacanam niyamārtham . evamartham idam ucyate . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . avayavaṣaṣṭhyādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ śāsaḥ gohaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1451: avayavaṣaṣṭhyādayaḥ tu na sidhyanti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . śāsaḥ it aṅhaloḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1452: iti śāseḥ ca antyasya syāt upadhāmātrasya ca . ūt upadhāyāḥ gohaḥ iti gohaḥ ca antyasya syāt upadhāmātrasya ca . avayavaṣaṣṭhyādīnām ca aprāptiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1453: yogasya asandigdhatvāt . avayavaṣaṣṭhyādīnām ca niyamasya aprāptiḥ . kim kāraṇam . yogasya asandigdhatvāt . sandehe niyamaḥ na ca avayavaṣaṣṭhyādiṣu sandehaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate. laukikaḥ ayam dṛṣṭāṇtaḥ . tat yathā loke : kam cit kaḥ cit pṛcchati : grāmāntaram gamiṣyāmi panthānam me bhavān upadiśatu iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1454: . saḥ tasmai ācaṣṭe . amuṣmin avakāśe hastadakṣiṇaḥ grahītavyaḥ amuṣmin avakāśe hastavāmaḥ iti . yaḥ tu atra tiryakpathaḥ bhavati na tasmin sandehaḥ iti kṛtvā na asau upadiśyate . evam iha api sandehe niyamaḥ na ca avayavaṣaṣṭhyādiṣu sandehaḥ . atha vā sthāne ayogā sthāneyogā kim idam ayogā iti . avyaktayogā ayogā . atha vā yogavatī yogā . kā punaḥ yogavatī
GS24pmbhasuu:1455: . yasyāḥ bahavaḥ yogāḥ . kutaḥ etat . bhūmni hi matup bhavati . viśiṣṭā vā ṣaṣṭhī sthāneyogā . atha vā kim cid liṅgam āsajya vakṣyāmi : itthaṃliṅgā ṣaṣṭhī sthāneyogā bhavati iti . na tat liṅgam avayavaṣaṣṭhyādiṣu kariṣyate . yadi evam śāsaḥ it aṅhaloḥ śā hau śāsigrahaṇam kartavyam sthāneyogārtham liṅgam āsaṅkṣyāmi iti . na kartavyam . yat eva adaḥ purastāt avayavaṣaṣṭhyartham prakṛtam etat uttaratra anuvṛttam sat sthāneyogārtham bhaviṣyati . katham . adhikāraḥ nāma triprakāraḥ . kaḥ cit ekadeśasthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1456: sarvam śāstram abhijvalayati yathā pradīpaḥ supravijvalitaḥ sarvam veśma abhijvalayati . aparaḥ adhikāraḥ yathā rajjvā ayasā vā baddham kāṣṭham anukṛṣyate tadvat anukṛṣyate cakāreṇa . aparaḥ adhikāraḥ pratiyogam tasya anirdeśārthaḥ iti yoge yoge upatiṣṭhate . tat yadā eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ adhikāraḥ pratiyogam tasya anirdeśārthaḥ iti tadā hi yat eva adaḥ purastāt avayavaṣaṣṭhyartham prakaṛtam etat uttaratra anuvṛttam sat sthāneyogārtham bhaviṣyati . sampratyayamātram etat bhavati . na hi anuccārya śabdam liṅgam śakyam āsaṅktum . evam tarhi ādeśe tat liṅgam kariṣyate tat prakṛtim āskantsyati . yadi niyamaḥ kriyate yatra ekā ṣaṣṭhī anekam ca viśeṣyam tatra na sidhyati : aṅgasya , halaḥ , aṇaḥ , samprasāraṇasya iti . hal api viśeṣyaḥ aṇ api viśeṣyaḥ samprasāraṇam api viśeṣyam . asati punaḥ niyame kāmacāraḥ ekayā ṣaṣthyā anekam viśeṣayitum . tat yathā .
GS24pmbhasuu:1457: devadattasya putraḥ pāṇiḥ kambalaḥ iti . tasmāt na arthaḥ niyamena . nanu ca uktam ekaśatam ṣaṣṭhyarthāḥ yāvantaḥ vā te sarve ṣaṣṭhyām uccāritāyām prāpnuvanti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yadi api loke bahavaḥ abhisambandhāḥ ārthāḥ yaunāḥ maukhāḥ srauvāḥ ca śabdasya tu śabdena kaḥ anyaḥ abhisambandhaḥ bhavitum arhati anyat ataḥ sthānāt . śabdasya api śabdena
GS24pmbhasuu:1458: anantarādayaḥ abhisambandhāḥ . asteḥ bhūḥ bhavati iti sandehaḥ : sthāne anantare samīpe iti . sandehamātram etat bhavati . sarvasandeheṣu ca idam
GS24pmbhasuu:1459: upatiṣṭhate : vyākhyānataḥ viśeṣapratipattiḥ na hi sandehāt alakṣaṇam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1460: . sthāne iti vyākhyāsyāmaḥ . na tarhi idānīm ayam yogaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1461: vaktavyaḥ ca . kim prayojanam . ṣaṣṭhyantam sthānena yathā yujyeta yataḥ ṣaṣṭhī uccāritā . kim kṛtam bhavati . nirdiśyamānasya ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti eṣā paribhāṣā na kartavyā bhavati (P_1,1.50.1) KA_I,120.2-13 Ro_I,364-366 kim udāharaṇam . ikaḥ yaṇ aci
GS24pmbhasuu:1462: : dadhi atra madhu atra : tālusthānasya tālusthānaḥ oṣṭhasthānasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1463: oṣṭhasthānaḥ yathā syāt . na etat asti . saṅkhyātānudeśena api etat
GS24pmbhasuu:1464: siddham . idam tarhi : tasthasthamipām tāmtamtāmaḥ iti ekārthasya ekārthaḥ dvyarthasya dvyarthaḥ bahvarthasya bahuvarthaḥ yathā syāt . nanu ca etat
GS24pmbhasuu:1465: api saṅkhyātānudeśena eva siddham . idam tarhi : akaḥ savarṇe dīrghaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1466: : daṇḍāgram , kṣupāgram , dadhi indraḥ , madhu uṣṭraḥ iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:1467: kaṇṭhasthānayoḥ kaṇṭhasthānaḥ tālusthānayoḥ tālusthānaḥ oṣṭhasthānayoḥ oṣṭhasthānaḥ yathā syāt iti . atha sthāne iti vartamāne punaḥ sthānagrahaṇam kimartham . yatra anekavidham āntaryam tatra sthānataḥ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:1468: āntaryam balīyaḥ yathā syāt . kim punaḥ tat . cetā stotā : pramāṇataḥ akāraḥ guṇaḥ prāpnoti sthānataḥ ekāraukārau . punaḥ sthānagrahaṇāt ekāraukārau bhavataḥ . atha tamabgrahaṇam kimartham . jhayaḥ haḥ anyatarasyām iti atra soṣmaṇaḥ soṣmāṇaḥ iti dvitīyāḥ prasaktāḥ nādavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1469: nādavantaḥ iti tṛtīyāḥ . tamapgrahaṇena soṣmāṇaḥ nādavantaḥ ca te bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:1470: caturthāḥ : vāg ghasati triṣṭub bhasati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1472: ucyate . sthāninaḥ ekatvanirdeśāt anekādeśanirdeśāt ca sarvaprasaṅgaḥ tasmāt sthānentaratamavacanam . sthānī ekatvena nirdiśyate : akaḥ iti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1473: anekaḥ ca punaḥ ādeśaḥ pratinirdiśyate : dīrghaḥ iti . sthāninaḥ ekatvanirdeśāt anekādeśanirdeśāt ca sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . sarve sarvatra prāpnuvanti . iṣyate ca antaratamāḥ eva syuḥ iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati . tasmāt sthāne antaratamaḥ iti vacanam niyamārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:1474: evamartham idam ucyate . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . yathā punaḥ iyam antaratamanirvṛtttiḥ sā kim prakṛtitaḥ bhavati : sthānini antaratame ṣaṣṭhī , āhosvit ādeśataḥ : sthāne prāpyamāṇānām antaratamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1475: ādeśaḥ bhavati iti . kutaḥ punaḥ iyam vicāraṇā . ubhayathā api tulyā
GS24pmbhasuu:1476: saṃhitā : sthānentaratama , uraṇ raparaḥ iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi prakṛtitaḥ : ikaḥ yaṇ aci : yaṇām ye antaratamāḥ ikaḥ tatra ṣaṣṭhī , yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti iha eva syāt : dadhi atra madhu atra .
GS24pmbhasuu:1477: kumārī atra brahmabandhvartham iti atra na syāt . ādeśataḥ punaḥ antaratamanirvṛttau satyām sarvatra ṣaṣṭhī , yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti sarvatra siddham bhavati . tathā ikaḥ guṇavṛddhī :
GS24pmbhasuu:1478: guṇavṛddhyoḥ ye antaratamāḥ ikaḥ tatra ṣaṣṭhī , yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti iha eva syāt : netā lavitā nāyakaḥ lāvakaḥ . cetā stotā cāyakaḥ stāvakaḥ iti atra na syāt . ādeśataḥ punaḥ antaratamanirvṛttau
GS24pmbhasuu:1479: satyām sarvatra ṣaṣṭhī , yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti sarvatra siddham bhavati . tathā ṛvarṇasya guṇavṛddhiprasaṅge guṇavṛddhyoḥ yat antaratamam ṛvarṇam tatra ṣaṣṭhī , yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1480: iha eva syāt : kartā hartā , āstārakaḥ , nipārakaḥ . āstaritā niparitā kārakaḥ , hārakaḥ iti atra na syāt . ādeśataḥ punaḥ antaratamanirvṛttau
GS24pmbhasuu:1481: satyām sarvatra ṣaṣṭhī , yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti sarvatra siddham bhavati . atha ādeśataḥ antaratamanirvṛttau satyām ayam doṣaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1482: vāntaḥ yi pratyaye : sthāninirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . okāraukārayoḥ iti vaktavyam ekāraikārayoḥ mā bhūt iti . prakṛtitaḥ punaḥ antaratamanirvṛttau
GS24pmbhasuu:1483: satyām vāntādeśasya yā antaratamā prakṛtiḥ tatra ṣaṣṭhī , yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti antareṇa sthāninirdeśam siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1484: ādeśataḥ api antaratamanirvṛttau satyām na doṣaḥ . katham . vāntagrahaṇam na kariṣyate . yi pratyaye ecaḥ ayādayaḥ bhavanti iti eva. yadi na kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1485: ceyam , jeyam iti atra api prāpnoti . kṣayyajayyau śakyārthe iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati : kṣijyoḥ eva ecaḥ iti . tayoḥ tarhi śakyārthāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1486: anyatra api prāpnoti : kṣeyam pāpam jeyaḥ vṛṣalaḥ iti . ubhayataḥ niyamaḥ vijñāsyate : kṣijyoḥ eva ecaḥ anayoḥ ca śakyāṛthe eva iti . iha api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:1487: niyamāt na prāpnoti : lavyam , pavyam avaśyalāvyam avaśyapāvyam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1488: tulyajātīyasya niyamaḥ . kaḥ ca tulyajātīyaḥ . yathājātīyakaḥ kṣijyoḥ ec .
GS24pmbhasuu:1489: kathañjātīyakaḥ kṣijyoḥ ec . ekāraḥ . evam api rāyam icchati raiyati atra
GS24pmbhasuu:1490: api prāpnoti . rāyiḥ chāndasaḥ . dṛṣṭānuvidhiḥ chandasi bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1491: ūdupadhayāḥ gohaḥ : ādeśataḥ antaratamanirvṛttau satyām upadhāgrahaṇam kartavyam . prakṛtitaḥ punaḥ antaratamanirvṛttau satyām ūkārasya gohaḥ yā antaratamā prakṛtiḥ tatra ṣaṣṭhī , yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1492: antareṇa upadhāgrahaṇam siddham bhavati . ādeśataḥ api antaratamanirvṛttau
GS24pmbhasuu:1493: satyām na doṣaḥ . kriyate etat nyāse eva . radābhyām niṣṭhātaḥ naḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1494: pūrvasya ca daḥ : ādeśataḥ antaratamanirvṛttau satyām takāragrahaṇam kartavyam . prakṛtitaḥ punaḥ antaratamanirvṛttau satyām nakārasya niṣṭhāyām yā antaratamā prakṛtiḥ tatra ṣaṣṭhī , yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti antareṇa takāragrahaṇam siddham bhavati . ādeśataḥ api antaratamanirvṛttau satyām na doṣaḥ . kriyate etat nyāse eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:1495: (P_1,1.50.3) KA_I,122.1-20 Ro_I,370-372 kim punaḥ idam nirvartakam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1496: antaratamāḥ anena nirvartyante , āhosvit pratipādakam : anyena nirvṛttānām anena pratipattiḥ . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . sthāne antaratamanirvatake sthāninivṛttiḥ . sthāne antaratamanirvatake sarvasthāninām nivṛttiḥ prāpnoti . asya api prāpnoti : dadhi madhu . astu . na kaḥ cit anyaḥ ādeśaḥ pratinirdiśyate . tatra āntaryataḥ dadhiśabdasya dadhiśabdaḥ eva madhuśabdasya madhuśabdaḥ eva ādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . yadi ca evam kva cit vairūpyam tatra doṣaḥ syāt : bisam bisam , musalam musalam . iṇkoḥ iti ṣatvam prāpnoti . api ca iṣṭā vyavasthā na prakalpeta . tat yathā tapte
GS24pmbhasuu:1497: bhrāṣṭre tilāḥ kṣiptāḥ muhūrtam api na avatiṣṭhante evam ime varṇāḥ muhūrtam api na avatiṣṭheran . astu tarhi pratipādakam : anyena nirvṛttānām anena pratipattiḥ . nirvṛttapratipattau nirvṛttiḥ nirvṛttapratipattau nirvṛttiḥ na sidhyati . sarve sarvatra prāpnuvanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1498: kim tarhi ucyate nirvṛttiḥ na sidhyati iti . na sādhīyaḥ nirvṛttiḥ siddhā bhavati . na brūmaḥ nirvṛttiḥ na sidhyati iti . kim tarhi . iṣṭā vyavasthā na prakalpeta . na sarve sarvatra iṣyante . idam idānīm kimartham syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:1499: anarthakam ca . anarthakam etat syāt . yaḥ hi bhuktavantam brūyāt mā bhukthāḥ iti kim tena kṛtam syāt . uktam vā . kim uktam . siddham tu ṣaṣṭhyadhikāre vacanāt iti . ṣaṣṭhyadhikāre ayam yogaḥ kartvyaḥ : sthāne antaratamaḥ ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:1501: pratyātmam iti ca vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . yaḥ yasya antaratamaḥ sa tasya sthāne yathā syāt anyasya antaratamaḥ anyasya sthāne mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1503: kim kāraṇam . svabhāvasiddhatvāt . svabhāvataḥ etat siddham . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:1504: samājeṣu samāśeṣu samavāyeṣu ca āsyatām iti ucyate . na ca ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1505: pratyātmam iti pratyātmam ca āsate . antaratamavacanam ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:1506: antaratamavacanam ca aśiṣyam . yogaḥ ca api ayam aśiṣyaḥ . kutaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1507: svabhāvasiddhatvāt eva . tat yathā : samājeṣu samāśeṣu samavāyeṣu ca āsyatām iti ukte na eva kṛśāḥ kṛśaiḥ saha āsata na pāṇḍavaḥ pāṇḍubhiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1508: yeṣām eva kim cit arthakṛtam āntaryam taiḥ eva saḥ āsate . tathā gāvaḥ divasam caritavatyaḥ yaḥ yasyāḥ prasavaḥ bhavati tena saha śerate . tathā yāni etāni goyuktakāni saṅghuṣṭakāni bhavanti tāni anyonyam paśyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:1509: sabdam kurvanti . evam tāvat cetanāvatsu . acetaneṣu api . loṣṭaḥ kṣiptaḥ bāhuvegam gatvā na eva tiryak gacchati na ūrdhvam ārohati pṛthivīvikāraḥ pṛthivīm gacchati āntaryataḥ . tathā yā etāḥ āntarikṣyaḥ sūkṣmāḥ āpaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1510: tāsām vikāraḥ dhūmaḥ saḥ ākāśadeśe nivāte na eva tiryak gacchati na avāk avarohati abvikāraḥ apaḥ eva gacchati āntaryataḥ . tathā jyotiṣaḥ vikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1511: arciḥ ākāśadeśe nivāte suprajvalitaḥ na eva tiryak gacchati na avāk avarohati jyotiṣaḥ vikāraḥ jyotiḥ eva gacchati āntaryataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1512: (P_1,1.50.5) KA_I,123.17-125.15 Ro_I, 373-377 vyañjanasvaravyatikrame ca tatkālaprasaṅgaḥ . vyañjanavyatikrame svaravyatikrame ca tatkālatā prāpnoti . vyañjanavyatikrame : iṣṭam uptam . āntaryataḥ ardhamātrikasya vyañjanasya ardhamātrikaḥ ik prāpnoti . na eva loke na ca vede
GS24pmbhasuu:1513: ardhamātrikaḥ ik asti . kaḥ tarhi . mātrikaḥ . yaḥ asti saḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1514: svaravyatikrame : dadhi atra madhu atra kumārī atra brahmabandhvartham iti . āntaryataḥ mātrikasya dvimātrikasya ikaḥ mātrikaḥ dvimātrikaḥ vā yaṇ prāpnoti . na eva loke na ca vede mātrikaḥ dvimātrikaḥ vā yaṇ asti .kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1515: tarhi . ardhamātrikaḥ . yaḥ asti saḥ bhaviṣyati . akṣu ca anekavarṇādeśeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:1516: . akṣu ca anekavarṇādeśeṣu tatkālatā prāpnoti . idamaḥ iś : āntaryataḥ ardhtṛtīyamātrasya idamaḥ sthāne ardhtṛtīyamātram ivarṇam prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . bhāvyamānena savarṇānām grahaṇam na iti evam na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1517: guṇavṛddhyejbhāveṣu ca . guṇavṛddhyejbhāveṣu ca tatkālatā prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:1518: khaṭvā indraḥ khaṭvendraḥ khaṭvā udakam khaṭvodakam khaṭvā īṣā khaṭveṣā khaṭvā ūḍhā khaṭvoḍhā khaṭvā elakā khaṭvailakā khaṭvā odanaḥ khaṭvaudanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1519: , khaṭvā aitikayanaḥ khaṭvaitikāyanaḥ , khaṭvā aupagavaḥ khaṭvaupagavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1520: iti . āntaryataḥ trimātrcaturmātrāṇām sthāninām trimātracaturmātrāḥ ādeśāḥ prāpnuvanti . na eṣaḥ doṣāḥ . tapare guṇavṛddhī . nanu ca taḥ paraḥ yasmāt saḥ ayam taparaḥ . na iti āha . tāt api paraḥ taparaḥ . yadi tāt api paraḥ taparaḥ ṝdoḥ ap iti iha eva syāt : yavaḥ , stavaḥ . lavaḥ , pavaḥ iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:1521: na syāt . na eṣaḥ takāraḥ . kaḥ tarhi . dakāraḥ . kim dakāre prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1522: atha kim takāre prayojanam . yadi asandehārthaḥ takāraḥ dakāraḥ api . atha mukhasukhārthaḥ takāraḥ dakāraḥ api . ejbhāve : kurvāte kurvāthe .
GS24pmbhasuu:1523: āntaryataḥ ardhatṛtīyamātrasya ṭisañjñakasya ardhatṛtīyamātraḥ eḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:1524: . na eva loke na ca vede ardhatṛtīyamātraḥ eḥ asti . ṛvarṇasya guṇavṛddhiprasaṅge sarvaprasaṅgaḥ aviśeṣāt . ṛvarṇasya guṇavṛddhiprasaṅge sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . sarve guṇavṛddhisañjñakāḥ ṛvarṇasya sthāne prāpnuvanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1525: kim kāraṇam . aviśeṣāt . na hi kaḥ cit viśeṣaḥ upādīyate evañjātīyakaḥ guṇavṛddhisañjñakaḥ ṛvarṇasya sthāne bhavati iti . anupādīyamāne viśeṣe sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . na vā ṛvarṇasya sthāne raparaprasaṅgāt avarṇasya āntaryam
GS24pmbhasuu:1526: . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . ṛvarṇasya sthāne raparaprasaṅgāt . uḥ sthāne aṇ prasajyamānaḥ eva raparaḥ bhavati iti ucyate . tatra ṛvarṇasya āntaryataḥ rephavataḥ rephavān akāraḥ eva antaratamaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1527: sarvādeśaprasaṅgaḥ tu anekāltvāt . sarvādeśaprasaṅgaḥ tu guṇavṛddhisañjñakaḥ ṛvarṇasya prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . anekāltvāt . anekāl śit sarvasya iti . na vā anekāltvasya tadāśrayatvāt ṛvarṇādeśasya avighātaḥ . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . anekāltvasya tadāśrayatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:1528: yadā ayam uḥ sthāne tadā anekāl . anekāltvasya tadāśrayatvāt ṛvarṇādeśasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1529: vighātaḥ na bhaviṣyati . athavā anāntaryam eva etayoḥ āntaryam . ekasya api antaratamā prakṛtiḥ na asti aparasya api antaratamaḥ ādeśaḥ na asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1530: etat eva etayoḥ āntaryam . samprayogaḥ vā naṣṭāśvadagdharathavat . atha vā naṣṭāśvadagdharathavat samprayogaḥ bhavati . tat yathā : tava aśvaḥ naṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1531: mama api rathaḥ dagdhaḥ . ubhau samprayujyāvahai iti . evam iha api : tava api antaratamā prakṛtiḥ na asti mama api antaratamaḥ ādeśaḥ na asti . astu nau samprayogaḥ iti . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . cetanāvatsu arthāt prakaraṇāt vā loke samprayogaḥ bhavati . varṇāḥ ca punaḥ acetanāḥ . tatra kiṅkṛtaḥ samprayogaḥ . yadi api varṇāḥ acetanāḥ yaḥ tu asau prayuṅkte saḥ cetanāvān
GS24pmbhasuu:1532: . ejavarṇayoḥ ādeśe avarṇam sthāninaḥ avarṇapradhānatvāt . ejavarṇayoḥ ādeśe avarṇam prāpnoti :khaṭvā elakā , mālā aupagavaḥ . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1533: sthāninaḥ avarṇapradhānatvāt . sthānī hi atra avarṇapradhānaḥ . siddham tu ubhayāntaryāt . siddham etat . katham . ubhayoḥ yaḥ antaratamaḥ tena bhavitavyam . na ca avarṇam ubhayoḥ antaratamam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1534: (P_1,1.51.1) KA_I,125.17-126.19 Ro_I,378-381 kim idam uraṇraparavacanam anyanivṛttyartham : uḥ sthāne aṇ eva bhavati raparaḥ ca iti , āhosvit raparatvam anena vidhīyate : uḥ sthāne aṇ ca anaṇ ca aṇ tu raparaḥ eva . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . uraṇraparavacanam anyanivṛttyartham cet udāttādiṣu doṣaḥ . uraṇraparavacanam anyanivṛttyartham cet udāttādiṣu doṣaḥ bhavati . ke punaḥ udāttādayaḥ . udāttānudāttasvaritānunāsikāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1535: kṛtiḥ , hṛtiḥ , kṛtam , hṛtam , prakṛtam , prahṛtam nṝṃḥ pāhi . astu tarhi uḥ sthāne aṇ ca anaṇ ca aṇ tu raparaḥ iti . yaḥ uḥ sthāne saḥ raparaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1536: cet guṇavṛddhyoḥ avarṇāpratipattiḥ . yaḥ uḥ sthāne saḥ raparaḥ iti cet guṇavṛddhyoḥ avarṇāpratipattiḥ . kartā hartā vārṣagaṇyaḥ . kim hi sādhīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1537: ṛvarṇasya asavarṇe yat avarṇam syāt na punaḥ eṅaicau . pūrvasmin api pakṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:1538: eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim hi sādhīyaḥ tatra api ṛvarṇasya asavarṇe yat avarṇam syāt na punaḥ ivarṇovarṇau . atha matam etat uḥ sthāne aṇaḥ ca anaṇaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:1539: prasaṅge aṇ eva bhavati raparaḥ ca iti siddhā pūrvasmin pakṣe avarṇasya pratipattiḥ . yat tu tat uktam udāttādiṣu doṣaḥ bhavati iti iha saḥ doṣaḥ jāyate . na jāyate . jāyate saḥ doṣaḥ . katham . udāttaḥ iti anena aṇaḥ api pratinirdiśyante anaṇaḥ api . yadi api pratinirdiśyante na tu prāpnuvanti . kim kāraṇam . sthāne antaratamaḥ bhavati . kutaḥ nu khalu
GS24pmbhasuu:1540: dvayoḥ paribhāṣayoḥ sāvakāśayoḥ samavasthitayoḥ sthāne antaratamaḥ uḥ aṇ raparaḥ iti ca sthāne antaratamaḥ iti anayā paribhāṣayā vyavasthā bhaviṣyati na punaḥ uḥ aṇ raparaḥ iti . ataḥ kim . ataḥ eṣaḥ doṣaḥ jāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1541: : udāttādiṣu doṣaḥ iti . ye ca api ete ṛvarṇasya sthāne pratipadam ādeśāḥ ucyante teṣu raparatvam na prāpnoti : ṝtaḥ it dhātoḥ ut oṣṭhyapūrvasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1542: . siddham tu prasaṅge raparatvāt . siddham etat . katham . prasaṅge raparatvāt . uḥ sthāne aṇ prasajyamānaḥ eva raparaḥ bhavati iti . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . sthāne iti vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:1543: sthānaśabdaḥ ca prasaṅgavācī . yadi evam ādeśaḥ aviśeṣitaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1544: ādeśaḥ ca viśeṣitaḥ . katham . dvitīyam sthānagrahaṇam prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:1545: anuvartate. tatra evam abhisambandhaḥ kariṣyate : uḥ sthāne aṇ sthāne iti . uḥ prasaṅge aṇ prasajyamānaḥ eva raparaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1546: (P_1,1.51.2) KA_I,126.20-127.3 Ro_I,382 atha aṇgrahaṇam kimartham na uḥ raparaḥ iti eva ucyeta . uḥ raparaḥ iti iyati ucyamāne kaḥ idānīm raparaḥ syāt . yaḥ uḥ sthāne bhavati . kaḥ ca uḥ sthāne bhavati . ādeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1547: ādeśaḥ raparaḥ iti cet rīrividhiṣu raparapratiṣedhaḥ . ādeśaḥ raparaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1548: cet rīrividhiṣu raparatvasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ke punaḥ rīrividhayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1550: . ānaṅ : hotāpotārau . anaṅ : kartā hartā . rīṅ : mātrīyati pitrīyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1551: riṅ : kriyate hriyate . udāttādiṣu ca . kim . raparatvasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kṛtiḥ , hṛtiḥ , kṛtam , hṛtam , prakṛtam , prahṛtam nṝṃḥ pāhi
GS24pmbhasuu:1554: ekādeśasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam : khaṭvarśyaḥ , mālarśyaḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . uḥ sthāne aṇ prasajyamānaḥ eva raparaḥ bhavati iti ucyate na ca ayam uḥ eva sthāne aṇ śiṣyate . kim tarhi . uḥ ca anyasya ca
GS24pmbhasuu:1555: . avayavagrahaṇāt siddham . yat atra ṛvarṇam tadāśrayam raparatvam bhaviṣyati . tat yathā māṣāḥ na bhoktavyāḥ iti miśrāḥ api na bhujyante .
GS24pmbhasuu:1556: avayavagrahaṇāt siddham iti cet ādeśe rāntapratiṣedhaḥ . avyayavagrahaṇāt siddham iti cet ādeśe rāntasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : hotāpotārau . yathā eva uḥ ca anyasya ca sthāne aṇ raparaḥ bhavati evam yaḥ uḥ sthāne aṇ ca anaṇ ca saḥ api raparaḥ syāt . yadi punaḥ ṛvarṇāntasya sthāninaḥ raparatvam ucyeta : khaṭvarśyaḥ , mālarśyaḥ . na evam śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt : kartā hartā kirati girati . ṛvarṇāntasya iti ucyate . na ca etat ṛvarṇāntam . nanu ca etat api vyapadeśivadbhāvena ṛvarṇāntam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1557: arthavatā vyapadeśivadbhāvaḥ na ca eṣaḥ arthavān . tasmāt na evam śakyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1558: na cet evam upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . iha ca raparatvapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1559: vaktavyaḥ : mātuḥ , pituḥ iti . ubhayam na vaktavyam . katham . iha yaḥ dvayoḥ ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭayoḥ prasaṅge bhavati labhate asau anyatarataḥ vyapadeśam . tat yathā devadattasya putraḥ , devadattāyāḥ putraḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1560: katham mātuḥ pituḥ iti . astu atra raparatvam . kā rūpasiddiḥ . rāt sasya iti sakārasya lopaḥ rephasya visarjanīyaḥ . na evam śakyam . iha hi mātuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1561: karoti , pituḥ karoti iti apratyayavisarjanīyasya iti ṣatvam prasajyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:1562: apratyayasvisarjanīyasya iti ucyate . pratyayavisarjanīyaḥ ca ayam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1563: lupyate atra pratyayaḥ rāt sasya iti . evam tarhi bhrātuṣputragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1564: jñāpakam ekādeśanimittāt ṣatvapratiṣedhasya . yat ayam kaskādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:1565: bhrātuṣputraśabdam paṭhati tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na ekādeśanimitttāt ṣatvam bhavati iti.
GS24pmbhasuu:1566: (P_1,1.51.4) KA_I,127.25-130.2 Ro_I,385-391 kim punaḥ ayam pūrvāntaḥ āhosvit parādiḥ āhosvit abhaktaḥ . katham ca ayam pūrvāntaḥ syāt katham vā parādiḥ katham vā abhaktaḥ . yadi antaḥ iti vartate tataḥ pūrvāntaḥ . atha ādiḥ iti vartate tataḥ parādiḥ . atha ubhayam nivṛttam tataḥ abhaktaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1567: kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . abhakte dīrghalatvayagabhyastasvarahalādiśeṣavisarjanīyapratiṣedhaḥ pratyayāvyavasthā ca . yadi abhaktaḥ dīrghatvam na prāpnoti : gīḥ , pūḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1568: rephavakārāntasya dhātoḥ iti dīrghatvam na prāpnoti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1569: rephavakārābhyām dhātuḥ viśeṣyate na punaḥ padam viśeṣyate rephavakārāntasya padasya iti . na evam śakyam . iha api prasajyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:1570: agniḥ , vāyuḥ iti . evam tarhi rephavakārābhyām padam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ dhātunā ikam : rephavakārāntasya padasya ikaḥ dhātoḥ iti . evam api priyam
GS24pmbhasuu:1571: grāmaṇi kulam asya priyagrāmaṇiḥ , priyasenāniḥ atra api prāpnoti . tasmāt dhātuḥ eva viśeṣyate . dhātau ca viśeṣyamāṇe iha dīrghatvam na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:1572: gīḥ , pūḥ . dīrgha . latva : latvam ca na sidhyati : nijegilyate . graḥ yaṅi iti latvam na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . graḥ iti anantarayogā eṣā ṣaṣṭhī . evam api svaḥ jegilyate iti atra api prāpnoti . evam tarhi yaṅā
GS24pmbhasuu:1573: ānantaryam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . atha vā graḥ iti pañcamī . latva . yaksvara :
GS24pmbhasuu:1574: yaksvaraḥ ca na sidhyati . gīryate svayam eva , puryate svayam eva . acaḥ kartṛyaki iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prāpnoti repheṇa vyavahitatvāt . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . svaravidhau vyañjanam avidyamānavat iti na asti vyavadhānam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1575: yaksvara . abhyastasvara : abhyastasvaraḥ ca na sidhyati : ma hi sma te piparuḥ , ma hi sma te bibharuḥ . abhyastānām ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati ajādau lasārvadhātuke iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prāpnoti repheṇa vyavahitatvāt . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . svaravidhau vyañjamam avidyamānavat iti na asti vyavadhānam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1576: abhyastasvara . halādiśeṣa : halādiśeṣaḥ ca na sidhyati : vavṛte vavṛdhe .
GS24pmbhasuu:1577: abhyāsasya iti halādiśeṣaḥ na prāpnoti . halādiśeṣa . visarjanīya :
GS24pmbhasuu:1578: visarjanīyasya ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : nārkuṭaḥ , nārpatyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1579: kharavasānayoḥ visarjanīyaḥ iti visarjanīyaḥ prāpnoti . visarjanīya .
GS24pmbhasuu:1580: pratyayāvyavasthā : pratyaye vyavasthā na prakalpate : kirataḥ , girataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1581: rephaḥ api abhaktaḥ pratyayaḥ api . tatra vyavasthā na prakalpate . evam tarhi pūrvāntaḥ kariṣyate . pūrvānte rvavadhāraṇam visarjanīyapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1582: yaksvaraḥ ca . yadi pūrvāntaḥ roḥ avadhāraṇam kartavyam : roḥ supi . roḥ eva supi na anyasya rephasya : sarpiṣṣu dhanuṣṣu . iha mā bhūt : gīrṣu pūrṣu . parādau api sati avadhāraṇam kartavyam caturṣu iti evam artham .
GS24pmbhasuu:1584: nārkuṭaḥ , nārpatyaḥ . kharavasānayoḥ visarjanīyaḥ iti visarjanīyaḥ prāpnoti . parādau api visarjanīyasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ nārkalpiḥ iti evamartham . kalpipadasaṅghātabhaktaḥ asau na utsahate avayavasya padāntatām vihantum iti kṛtvā visarjanīyaḥ prāpnoti . yaksvaraḥ yaksvaraḥ ca na sidhyati : gīryate svayam eva , puryate svayam eva . acaḥ kartṛyaki iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . upadeśe iti vartate . atha vā punaḥ astu parādiḥ . parādau akāralopautvapukpratiṣedhaḥ caṅi upadhāhrasvatvam iṭaḥ avyavasthā abhyāsalopaḥ abhyastatādisvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1585: dīrghatvam ca . yadi parādiḥ akāralopaḥ pratiṣedhyaḥ : kartā hartā : ataḥ lopaḥ ārdhadhātuke iti akāralopaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . upadeśe iti vartate . yadi upadeśe iti vartate dhinutaḥ , kṛṇutaḥ atra lopaḥ na prāpnoti . na upadeśagrahaṇena prakṛtiḥ abhisambadhyate . kim tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:1586: ārdhadhātukam abhisambadhyate . ārdhadhātukopadeśe yat akārāntam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1587: akāralopa . autva : autvam ca pratiṣedhyam : cakāra jahāra . ātaḥ au ṇalaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1588: iti autvam prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . nirdiśyamānasya ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti evam na bhaviṣyati . yaḥ tarhi nirdiśyate tasya kasmāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1589: rephena vyavahitatvāt . autva . pukpratiṣedhaḥ : puk ca pratiṣedhyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1590: kārayati hārayati . ātām puk iti puk prāpnoti . pukpratiṣedhaḥ . caṅi upadhāhrasvatvam ca na sidhyati : acīkarat ajīharat . ṇau caṅi upadhāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1591: hrasvaḥ iti hrasvatvam na prāpnoti . caṅi upadhāhrasvatvam . iṭaḥ avyavasthā : iṭaḥ ca vyavasthā na prakalpate : āstaritā niparitā . iṭ api parādiḥ rephaḥ api . tatra vyavasthā na prakalpate . iṭaḥ avyavasthā .
GS24pmbhasuu:1592: abhyāsalopaḥ : abhyāsalopaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ : vavṛte vavṛdhe . abhyāsasya iti halādiśeṣaḥ na prāpnoti . abhyāsalopaḥ . abhyastasvara : abhyastasvaraḥ ca na sidhyati : ma hi sma te piparuḥ , ma hi sma te bibharuḥ . abhyastānām ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati ajādau lasārvadhātuke iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1593: abhyastasvara . tādisvaraḥ : tādisvaraḥ ca na sidhyati : prakartā prakartum , prahartā prahartum . tādau ca niti kṛti atau iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . uktam etat : kṛdupadeśe vā tādyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:1594: iḍartham iti . tādisvaraḥ . dīrghatvam : dīrghatvam ca na sidhyati : gīḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1595: pūḥ . rephavakārāntasya dhātoḥ iti dīrghatvam na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1597: antyaviśeṣaṇam āhosvit ādeśaviśeṣaṇam . kim ca ataḥ . yadi antyaviśeṣaṇam ādeśaḥ aviśeṣitaḥ bhavati . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . anekāl api ādeśaḥ antyasya prasajyeta . yadi punaḥ al antyasya iti ucyeta . tatra ayam api arthaḥ anekāl śit sarvasya iti etat na vaktavyam bhavati . idam niyamārtham bhaviṣyati : al eva antyasya bhavati na anyaḥ iti . evam api antyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1598: aviśeṣitaḥ bhavati . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . vākyasya api padasya api antyasya prasajyeta . yadi khalu api eṣaḥ abhiprāyaḥ tat na kriyeta iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1599: antyaviśeṣaṇe api sati tat na kariṣyate . katham . ṅit ca alaḥ antyasya iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati : ṅit eva anekāl antyasya bhavati na anyaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1600: (P_1,1.52.2) KA_I,130.12-20 Ro_I,392-394 kimartham punaḥ idam ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:1601: alaḥ antyasya iti sthāne vijñātasya anusaṃhāraḥ . alaḥ antyasya iti sthāne vijñātasya anusaṃhāraḥ kriyate sthāne prasaktasya . itarathā hi aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ . itarathā hi aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ prasajyeta . ṭitkinmitaḥ api antyasya syuḥ . yadi punaḥ ayam yogaśeṣaḥ vijñāyeta . yogaśeṣe ca . kim .
GS24pmbhasuu:1602: aniṣṭam prasajyete . ṭitkinmitaḥ api antyasya syuḥ . tasmāt suṣṭhu ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1603: : alaḥ antyasya iti sthāne vijñātasya anusaṃhāraḥ itarathā hi aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1604: (P_1,1.53) KA_I,130.21-131.7 Ro_I,394-395 tātaṅ antyasya kasmāt na bhavati . ṅit ca alaḥ antyasya iti prāpnoti . tātaṅi ṅitkaraṇasya sāvakāśatvāt vipratiṣedhāt sarvādeśaḥ . tātaṅi ṅitkaraṇasya sāvakāśam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1605: kaḥ avakāśaḥ . guṇavṛddhipratiṣedhārthaḥ ṅakāraḥ . tātaṅi ṅitkaraṇasya sāvakāśatvāt vipratiṣedhāt sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . prayojanam nāma tat
GS24pmbhasuu:1606: vaktavyam yat niyogataḥ syāt . yadi ca ayam niyogataḥ sarvādeśaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1607: tataḥ etat prayojanam syāt . kutaḥ nu khalu etat ṅitkaraṇāt ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:1608: sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati na punaḥ antyasya syāt iti . evam tarhi etat eva jñāpayati na tātaṅ antyasya sthāne bhavati iti yat etam ṅitam karoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1609: itarathā hi loṭaḥ eruprakaraṇe eva brūyāt tihyoḥ tāt āśiṣi anyatarasyām iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1610: (P_1,1.54) KA_I,131.9-17 Ro_I,395-396 alaḥ antyasya adeḥ parasya anekāl śit sarvasya iti apavādavipratiṣedhāt sarvādeśaḥ . alaḥ antyasya iti utsargaḥ . tasya ādeḥ parasya anekālśit sarvasya iti apavādau .
GS24pmbhasuu:1611: apavādavipratiṣedhāt tu sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . ādeḥ parasya iti asya avakāśaḥ dvyantarupasargebhyaḥ apaḥ īt : dvīpam anvīpam . anekālśit sarvasya iti asya avakāśaḥ asteḥ bhūḥ : bhavitā bhavitum . iha ubhayam prāpnoti : ataḥ bhisaḥ ais . anekālśit sarvasya iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . śit sarvasya iti asya avakāśaḥ idamaḥ iś : itaḥ , iha .
GS24pmbhasuu:1612: ādeḥ parasya iti asya avakāśaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti : aṣṭābhyaḥ auś . śit sarvasya iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:1613: (P_1,1.55) KA_I,131.19-132.7 Ro_I,396-397 śit sarvasya iti kim udāharaṇam . idamaḥ iś : itaḥ , iha . na etat asti prayojanam . śitkaraṇāt eva atra sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi : aṣṭābhyaḥ auś . nanu ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:1614: api śitkaraṇāt eva sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi : jasaḥ śī jaśśasoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1615: śiḥ . nanu ca atra api śitkaraṇāt eva sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . asti anyat śitkaraṇe prayojanam . kim . viśeṣaṇārthaḥ . kva viśeṣaṇārthena arthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1616: śi sarvanāmasthānam vibhāṣā ṅiśyoḥ iti . śit sarvasya iti śakyam akartum .
GS24pmbhasuu:1617: katham . antyasya ayam sthāne bhavan na pratyayaḥ syāt . asatyām pratyayasañjñāyām itsañjñā na syāt . asatyām itsañjñāyām lopaḥ na syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:1618: asati lope anekāl . yadā anekāl tadā sarvādeśaḥ . yadā sarvādeśaḥ tada
GS24pmbhasuu:1619: pratyayaḥ . yadā pratyayaḥ tadā itsañjñā . yadā itsañjñā tadā lopaḥ . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat śit sarvasya iti āha tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ asti eṣā paribhāṣā : na anubandhakṛtam anekāltvam bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane
GS24pmbhasuu:1621: anākārāntatvāt iti uktam . tat na vaktavyam bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1622: (P_1,1.56.1) KA_I,133.2-16 Ro_I,398-401 vatkaraṇam kimartham . sthānī ādeśaḥ analvidhau iti iyati ucyamāne sañjñādhikaraḥ ayam tatra sthānī ādeśasya sañjñā syāt . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . āṅaḥ yamahanaḥ ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:1623: bhavati iti vadheḥ eva syāt . hanteḥ na syāt . vatkaraṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:1624: na doṣaḥ bhavati . sthānikāryam ādeśe atidiśyate guruvat guruputraḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1625: yathā . atha ādeśagrahaṇam kimartham . sthānivat analvidhau iti iyati ucyamāne kaḥ idānīm sthānivat syāt . yaḥ sthāne bhavati . kaḥ ca sthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:1626: bhavati . ādeśaḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam ādeśamātram sthānivat yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1627: . ekadeśavikṛtasya upasaṅkhyānam codayiṣyati . tat na vaktavyam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1628: atha vidhigrahaṇam kimartham. sarvavibhaktyantaḥ samāsaḥ yathā vijñāyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:1629: alaḥ parasya vidhiḥ alvidhiḥ , alaḥ vidhiḥ alvidhiḥ , ali vidhiḥ alvidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1630: , alā vidhiḥ alvidhiḥ iti . na etat asti prayojanam . prātipadikarnirdeśaḥ ayam . prātipadikarnirdeśāḥ ca arthatantrāḥ bhavanti . na kāṃ cit
GS24pmbhasuu:1631: prādhānyena vibhaktim āśrayanti . tatra prātipadikārthe nirdiṣṭe yām yām vibhaktim āśrayitum buddhiḥ upajāyate sā sā āśrayitavyā . idam tarhi prayojanam : uttarapadalopaḥ yathā vijñāyeta : alam āśrayate alāśṛayaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1632: alāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ alvidhiḥ iti . yatra prādhānyena al āśrīyate tatra eva
GS24pmbhasuu:1633: pratiṣedhaḥ syāt . yatra viśeṣaṇatvena al āśrīyate tatra pratiṣedhaḥ na syāt . kim prayojanam . pradīvya prasīvya iti valādilakṣaṇaḥ iṭ mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1635: ucyate . sthānyādeśapṛthaktvāt ādeśe sthānivadanudeśaḥ guruvat guruputre iti yathā . anyaḥ sthānī anyaḥ ādeśaḥ . sthānyādeśapṛthaktvāt etasmāt kāraṇāt sthānikāryam ādeśe na prāpnoti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . āṅaḥ yamahanaḥ ātmanepadam bhavati iti hanteḥ eva syāt vadheḥ na syāt . iṣyate ca vadheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1636: api syāt iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati . tasmāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:1637: sthānivadanudeśaḥ . evamartham idam ucyate . guruvat guruputraḥ iti yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:1638: . tat yathā guruvat asmin guruputre vartitavyam iti gurau yat kāryam tat guruputre atidiśyate , evam iha api sthānikāryam ādeśe atidiśyate . na etat asti prayojanam . lokataḥ etat siddham . tat yathā loke yaḥ yasya prasaṅge bhavati labhate asau tatkāryāṇi . tat yathā upādhyāyasya śiṣyaḥ yājyakulāni gatvā agrāsanādīni labhate . yadi api tāvat loke eṣaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ dṛṣṭāntasya api tu puruṣārambhaḥ nivartakaḥ bhavati . asti ca iha kaḥ cit puruṣārambhaḥ . asti iti āha . kaḥ . svarūpavidhiḥ . hanteḥ ātmanepadam ucyamānam hanteḥ eva syāt vadheḥ na syāt . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati sthānivat ādeśaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam yuṣmadasmadoḥ anādeśe iti ādeśapratiṣedham śāsti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1639: yuṣmadasmadoḥ vibhaktau kāryam ucyamānam kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ yat ādeśe syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:1640: paśyati tu ācāryaḥ sthānivat ādeśaḥ bhavati iti . ataḥ ādeśe pratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:1641: śāsti . idam tarhi prayojanam : analvidhau iti pratiṣedham vakṣyāmi iti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1642: iha mā bhūt : dyauḥ , panthāḥ , saḥ iti . etat api na asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1643: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati alvidhau sthānivadbhāvaḥ na bhavati iti yat ayam adaḥ jagdhiḥ lyap ti kiti iti ti kiti iti eva siddhe lyabgrahaṇam karoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1646: yoge alvidhau pratiṣedhe aviśeṣaṇe aprāptiḥ tasya adarśanāt . alvidhau pratiṣedhe asati api viśeṣaṇe samāśrīyamaṇe asati tasmin viśeṣaṇe aprāptiḥ vidheḥ : pradīvya prasīvya . kim kāraṇam . tasya adarśanāt . valādeḥ iti ucyate na ca atra valādim paśyāmaḥ . nanu ca evamarthaḥ eva ayam yatnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1647: kriyate : anyasya kāryam ucyamānam anyasya yathā syāt iti . satyam evamarthaḥ na tu prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . sāmānyātideśe viśeṣānatideśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1648: sāmanye hi atidiśyamāne viśeṣaḥ na atidiṣṭaḥ bhavati . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:1649: brahmaṇavat asmin kṣatriye vartitavyam iti sāmānyam yat brāhmaṇakāryam tat kṣatriye atidiśyate . yat viśiṣṭam māṭhare kauṇḍinye vā na tat atidiśyate . evam iha api sāmānyam yat pratyayakāryam tat atidiśyate yat viśiṣṭam valādeḥ iti na tat atidiśyate . yadi evam agrahīt iti iṭaḥ īṭi iti sicaḥ lopaḥ na prāpnoti . analvidhau iti punaḥ ucyamāne iha api pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati : pradīvya prasīvya iti . viśiṣṭam hi eṣaḥ alam āśrayate valam
GS24pmbhasuu:1650: nāma . iha ca pratiṣedhaḥ na bhaviṣyati : agrahīt iti . viśiṣṭam hi eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1651: analam āśrayati iṭam nāma . yadi tarhi sāmānyam api atidiśyate viśeṣaḥ ca sati āśraye vidhiḥ iṣṭaḥ . sati ca valāditve iṭā bhavitavyam : aruditām aruditam arudita . kim ataḥ yat sati bhavitavyam . pratiṣedhaḥ tu prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:1652: alvidhitvāt . pratiṣedhaḥ tu prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . alvidhitvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:1653: alvidhiḥ ayam bhavati . tatra analvidhau iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . na vā ānudeśikasya pratiṣedhāt itareṇa bhāvaḥ . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1654: ānudeśikasya pratiṣedhāt . astu atra ānudeśikasya valāditvasya pratiṣedhaḥ . svāśrayam atra valāditvam bhaviṣyati . na etat vivadāmahe valādiḥ na valādiḥ iti . kim tarhi . sthānivadbhāvāt sārvadhātukatvam eṣitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1656: (P_1,1.56.4) KA_I,135.9-136.4 Ro_I,406-408 kim punaḥ ādeśini ali āśrīyamāṇe pratiṣedhaḥ bhavati āhosvit aviśeṣeṇa ādeśe ādeśini ca . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . ādeśyalvidhipratiṣedhe kuruvadhapibām guṇavṛddhipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1658: kuru iti atra sthānivadbhāvāt aṅgasañjñā śvāśrayam ca laghūpadhatvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1659: tatra laghūpadhaguṇaḥ prāpnoti . vadhakam iti atra sthānivadbhāvāt aṅgasañjñā śvāśrayam ca adupadhatvam . tatra vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti . piba iti atra sthānivadbhāvāt aṅgasañjñā śvāśrayam ca laghūpadhatvam . tatra guṇaḥ prāpnoti . astu tarhi aviśeṣeṇa ādeśe ādeśini ca . ādeśyādeśe iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:1660: suptiṅkṛdatidiṣṭeṣu upasaṅkhyānam . ādeśyādeśe iti cet suptiṅkṛdatidiṣṭeṣu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . sup : vṛkṣāya plakṣāya . sthānivadbhāvāt supsañjñā svāśrayam ca yañāditvam . tatra pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . sup . tiṅ
GS24pmbhasuu:1661: : aruditām aruditam arudita . sthānivadbhāvāt sārvadhātukasañjñā svāśrayam
GS24pmbhasuu:1662: ca valāditvam . tatra pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . tiṅ . kṛdatidiṣṭam : bhuvanam
GS24pmbhasuu:1663: , suvanam , dhuvanam . sthānivadbhāvāt pratyayasañjñā svāśrayam ca ajāditvam . tatra pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . kim punaḥ atra jyāyaḥ . ādeśini ali āśrīyamāṇe pratiṣedhaḥ iti jyāyaḥ . kutaḥ etat . tathā hi ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:1664: viśiṣṭam sthānikāryam ādeśe atidiśati guruvat guruputre iti yathā . tat yathā : guruvat guruputre vartitavyam anyatra ucchiṣṭabhojanāt pādopasaṅgrahaṇāc ca iti . yadi ca guruputraḥ api guruḥ bhavati tat api kartavyam . astu tarhi ādeśini ali āśrīyamāṇe pratiṣedhaḥ . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:1665: ādeśyalvidhipratiṣedhe kuruvadhapibām guṇavṛddhipratiṣedhaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . karotau taparakaraṇanirdeśāt siddham . pibatiḥ adantaḥ . vadhakam iti na ayam ṇvul . anyaḥ ayam akaśabdaḥ kit auṇādikaḥ rucakaḥ iti yathā .
GS24pmbhasuu:1666: (P_1,1.56.5) KA_I,136.5-137.2 Ro_I,408-411 ekadeśavikṛtasya upasaṅkhyānam . ekadeśavikṛtasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . kim prayojanam . pacatu pacantu . tiṅgrahaṇena grahaṇam yathā syāt . ekadeśavikṛtasya ananyatvāt siddham . ekadeśavikṛtam ananyavat bhavati iti tiṅgrahaṇena grahaṇam bhaviṣyati . tat yatha : śvā karṇe vā pucche vā chinne śvā eva bhavati na aśvaḥ na gardabhaḥ iti . anityatvavijñānam tu tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1667: upasaṅkhyanam . anityatvavijñānam tu bhavati . nityāḥ śabdāḥ . nityeṣu nāma śabdeṣu kūṭasthaiḥ avicālibhiḥ varṇaiḥ bhavitavyam anapāyopajanavikāribhiḥ . tatra saḥ eva ayam vikṛtaḥ ca etat nityeṣu na
GS24pmbhasuu:1668: upapadyate . tasmāt upasaṅkhyanam kartavyam . bhāradvājīyāḥ paṭhanti :
GS24pmbhasuu:1670: kim prayojanam . pacatu pacantu : tiṅgrahaṇena grahaṇam yathā syāt . kim ca kāraṇam na syāt . anādeśatvāt . ādeśaḥ sthānivat iti ucyate , na ca ime
GS24pmbhasuu:1671: ādeśāḥ . rūpānyatvāt ca . anyat khalu api rūpam pacati iti anyat pacatu iti . ime api ādeśāḥ . katham . ādiśyate yaḥ saḥ ādeśaḥ . ime ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:1672: ādiśyante . ādeśaḥ sthānivat iti cet na anāśritatvāt . ādeśaḥ sthānivat iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . anāśritatvāt . yaḥ atra ādeśaḥ na asau āśrīyate yaḥ ca āśrīyate na asau ādeśaḥ . na etat mantavyam : samudāye āśrīyamāṇe avayavaḥ na āśrīyate iti . abhyantaraḥ hi samudāyasya avayavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1673: . tat yathā : vṛkṣaḥ pracalan saha avayavaiḥ pracalati . āśrayaḥ iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:1674: alvidhiprasaṅgaḥ . āśrayaḥ iti cet alvidhiḥ ayam bhavati . tatra analvidhau iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na evam sati kaḥ cit api analvidhiḥ syāt . ucyate ca idam analvidhau iti . tatra prakarṣagatiḥ vijñāsyate : sādhīyaḥ yaḥ alvidhiḥ iti . kaḥ ca sādhīyaḥ alvidhiḥ . yatra prādhānyena al āśrīyate . yatra nāntarīyakaḥ al āśrīyate na asau alvidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1675: . atha vā uktam ādeśagrahaṇasya prayojanam : ādeśamātram sthānivat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:1677: (P_1,1.56.6) KA_I,137.3-26 Ro_I,411-412 anupapannam sthānyādeśatvam nityatvāt . sthānī ādeśaḥ iti etat nityeṣu śabdeṣu na upapadyate . kim kāraṇam . nityatvāt . sthānī hi nām yaḥ bhūtvā na bhavati . ādeśaḥ hi nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:1678: yaḥ abhūtvā bhavati . etat ca nityeṣu śabdeṣu na upapadyate yat sataḥ nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:1679: vināśaḥ syāt asataḥ vā prādurbhāvaḥ iti . siddham tu yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:1680: laukikavaidikeṣu abhūtapūrve api sthānaśabdaprayogāt . siddham etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:1681: katham . yathā laukikeṣu vaidikeṣu ca kṛtānteṣu abhūtapūrve api sthānaśabdaḥ vartate . loke tāvat : upādhyāyasya sthāne śiṣyaḥ iti ucyate na ca tatra upādhyāyaḥ bhūtapūrvaḥ bhavati . vede api : somasya sthāne pūtīkatṛṇāni abhiṣuṇuyāt iti ucyate na ca tatra somaḥ bhūtapūrvaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:1682: . kāryavipariṇāmāt vā siddham . atha vā kāryavipariṇāmāt siddham etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:1683: kim idam kāryavipariṇāmāt iti . kāryā buddhiḥ . sā vipariṇamyate . nanu ca kāryāvipariṇāmāt iti bhavitavyam . santi ca eva hi auttarpadikāni hrasvatvāni . api ca buddhiḥ sampratyayaḥ iti anarthāntaram . kāryā buddhiḥ kāryaḥ sampratyayaḥ kāryasya sampratyayasya vipariṇāmaḥ kāryavipariṇāmaḥ kāryavipariṇāmāt iti . parihārantaram eva idam matvā paṭhitam . katham ca idam parihārāntaram syāt . yadi bhūtapūrve sthānaśabdaḥ vartate . bhūtapūrve ca api sthānaśabdaḥ vartate . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:1684: buddhyā . tat yathā kaḥ cit kasmai cit upadiśati prācīnam grāmāt āmrāḥ iti . tasya sarvatra āmrabuddhiḥ prasaktā . tataḥ paścāt aha ye kṣīriṇaḥ avarohavantaḥ pṛthuparṇāḥ te nyagrodhāḥ iti. saḥ tatra āmrabuddhyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1685: nyagrodhabuddhim pratipadyate . saḥ tataḥ paśyati buddhyā āmrān ca
GS24pmbhasuu:1686: apakṛṣyamāṇān nyagrodhān ca ādhīyamānān . nityāḥ eva ca svasmin viṣaye āmrāḥ nityāḥ ca nyagrodhāḥ . buddhiḥ tu asya vipariṇamyate . evam iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:1687: astiḥ asmai aviśeṣeṇa upadiṣṭaḥ . tasya sarvatra astibuddhiḥ prasaktā .
GS24pmbhasuu:1688: saḥ asteḥ bhūḥ iti astibuddhyāḥ bhavatibuddhim pratipadyate . saḥ tataḥ paśyati buddhyā astim ca apakṛṣyamāṇam bhavatim ca ādhīyamānam . nityaḥ eva svasmin viṣaye astiḥ nityaḥ bhavatiḥ . buddhiḥ tu asya vipariṇamyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:1689: (P_1,1.56.7) KA_I,138.1-10 Ro_I,413-414 apavādaprasaṅgaḥ tu sthānivattvāt . apavāde utsargakṛtam ca prāpnoti . karmaṇi aṇ ātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1690: anupasarge kaḥ iti ke api aṇi kṛtam prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . sthānivattvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1691: . uktam vā . kim uktam . viṣayeṇa tu nānāliṅgakaraṇāt siddham iti . atha vā . siddham tu ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya sthānivadvacanāt . siddham etat . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:1692: . ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya ādeśaḥ sthānivat iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭagrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:1693: kva prakṛtam . ṣaṣṭhī sthāneyogā iti . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na apavāde utsargakṛtam bhavati iti yat ayam śyanādīnām kān cit śitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1694: karoti : śyan , śnam , śnā , śaḥ , śnuḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1696: ubhayapratiṣedhaḥ . tasya etasya lakṣaṇasya doṣaḥ : tayādeśe ubhayapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : ubhaye devamanuṣyāḥ . tayapaḥ grahaṇena grahaṇāt jasi vibhāṣā prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ayac pratyayāntaram .
GS24pmbhasuu:1697: yadi pratyayāntaram ubhayī iti īkāraḥ na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1698: mātracaḥ iti evam bhaviṣyati . katham . mātrac iti na idam pratyayagrahaṇam . kim tarhi . pratyāhāragrahaṇam . kva sanniviṣṭānām pratyāhāraḥ . mātraśabdāt prabhṛti ā āyacaḥ cakārāt . yadi pratyāhāragrahaṇam kati tiṣṭhanti atra api prāpnoti . ataḥ iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:1699: evam api tailamātrā ghrtamātrā iti atra api prāpnoti . sadṛśasya api asanniviṣṭasya na bhaviṣyati pratyāhāreṇa grahaṇam . jātyakhyāyām vacanātideśe sthānivadbhāvapratiṣedhaḥ . jātyakhyāyām vacanātideśe sthānivadbhāvasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . vrīhibhyaḥ āgataḥ iti atra gheḥ ṅiti it guṇaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . uktam etat : arthātideśāt siddham iti . ṅyābgrahaṇe adīrghaḥ . ṅyābgrahaṇe adīrghaḥ ādeśaḥ na sthānivat iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1700: vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . niṣkauśāmbiḥ , atikhaṭvaḥ . ṅyābgrahaṇena grahaṇāt sulopaḥ mā bhūt iti . nanu ca dīrghāt iti ucyate . tat na vaktavyam bhavati . kim punaḥ atra jyāyaḥ . sthānivatpratiṣedhaḥ eva jyāyān . idam api siddham bhavati : atikhaṭvāya atimālāya . yāṭ āpaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1701: yāṭ na bhavati . atha idānīm asati api sthānivadbhāve dīrghatve kṛte pit ca asau bhūtapūrvaḥ iti kṛtvā yāṭ āpaḥ iti yāṭ kasmāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1702: lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti . nanu ca idānīm sati api sthānivadbhāve etayā paribhāṣayā śakyam iha upasthātum . na iti āha . na hi idānīm kva cit api sthānivadbhāvaḥ syāt . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na

GS24pmbhasuu:1706: bhūtapūrvagatiḥ yathā vijñāyeta : jhalādiḥ yaḥ bhūtapūrvaḥ iti . yadi evam thavacanam anarthakam syāt . āthim eva ayam uccārayet : bruvaḥ pañcānām āditaḥ āthaḥ bruvaḥ iti . bhavateḥ ca api na vaktavyaḥ . astisicaḥ apṛkte iti dvisakārakaḥ nirdeśaḥ : asteḥ sakārāntāt iti . vadhyādeśe vṛddhitatvapratiṣedhaḥ . vadhyādeśe vṛddhitatvapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ :

GS24pmbhasuu:1709: nipātanasvaraḥ prakṛtisvaram bādhate evam pratyayasvaram api bādheta :
GS24pmbhasuu:1710: āvadhiṣīṣṭa iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ārdhadhātukīyāḥ sāmānyena bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:1711: anavasthiteṣu pratyayeṣu . tatra ārdhadhātukasāmānye vadhibhāve kṛte sati śiṣṭatvāt pratyayasvaraḥ bhaviṣyati . ākārāntāt nukṣukpratiṣedhaḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:1720: tisṛṇām . tisṛbhāve kṛte treḥ trayaḥ iti trayādeśaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . idam iha sampradhāryam : tisṛbhāvaḥ kriyatām trayādeśaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt tisṛbhāvaḥ . atha idānīm tisṛbhāve kṛte punaḥprasaṅgavijñānāt trayādeśaḥ kasmāt na bhavati . sakṛdgatau vipratiṣedhe yat bādhitam tat bādhitam eva iti . āmvidhau ca . āmvidhau ca srantasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : catasraḥ tiṣṭhanti . catasṛbhāve kṛte caturanaḍuhoḥ ām udāttaḥ iti ām prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . idam iha sampradhāryam : catasṛbhāvaḥ kriyatām caturanaḍuhoḥ ām udāttaḥ iti ām iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt catasṛbhāvaḥ . atha idānīm catasṛbhāve kṛte punaḥprasaṅgavijñānāt ām kasmāt na bhavati . sakṛdgatau vipratiṣedhe yat
GS24pmbhasuu:1721: bādhitam tat bādhitam eva iti . svare vasvādeśe . svare vasvādeśe pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : viduṣaḥ paśya . śatuḥ anumaḥ nadyajādī antodāttāt iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . anumaḥ iti pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1722: bhaviṣyati . anumaḥ iti ucyate na ca atra numam paśyāmaḥ . anumaḥ iti na
GS24pmbhasuu:1723: idam āgamagrahaṇam . kim tarhi . pratyāhāragrahaṇam . kva sanniviṣṭānām pratyāhāraḥ . ukārāt prabhṛti ā numaḥ makārāt . yadi pratyāhāragrahaṇam lunata punata atra api prāpnoti . anumgrahaṇena na śatrantam viśeṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:1724: kim tarhi . śatā eva viśeṣyate : śatā yaḥ anumkaḥ iti . avaśyam ca etat
GS24pmbhasuu:1725: evam vijñeyam . āgamagrahaṇe hi sati iha prasajyeta : muñcatā muñcataḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1727: vaktavyaḥ : citragvagram , śabalagvagram . sarvatra vibhāṣā goḥ iti vibhāṣā pūrvatvam prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . eṅaḥ iti vartate . tatra analvidhau iti pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam api he citrago agram atra
GS24pmbhasuu:1728: prāpnoti . ṇittvam : citraguḥ , citragū citragavaḥ . goto ṇit iti ṇittvam prāpnoti . ātvam : citragum paśya śabalagum paśya . ā otaḥ iti ātvam prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . taparakaraṇāt siddham . taparakaraṇasāmārthyāt ṇittvātve na bhaviṣyataḥ . svara : bahugumān . na gośvansāvavarṇa iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1729: pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . karotipibyoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . karotipibyoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : kuru piba iti . sthānivadbhāvāt laghūpadhaguṇaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1730: uktam vā . kim uktam . karotau taparakaraṇanirdeśāt siddham , pibatiḥ adantaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1732: praśnaḥ , dyūtvā , ākrāṣṭām āgatya . praśnaḥ , viśnaḥ iti atra chakārasya śakāraḥ paranimittakaḥ . tasya sthānivadbhāvāt che ca iti tuk prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1733: acaḥ iti vacanāt na bhavati . na etat asti prayojanam . kriyamāṇe api vai
GS24pmbhasuu:1734: ajgrahaṇe avaśyam atra tugabhāve yatnaḥ kartavyaḥ . antaraṅgatvāt hi tuk
GS24pmbhasuu:1735: prāpnoti . idam tarhi : dyūtvā . vakārasya ūṭh paranimittakaḥ . tasya sthānivadbhāvāt aci iti yaṇādeśaḥ na prāpnoti . acaḥ iti vacanāt bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1736: etat api na asti prayojanam . svāśrayam atra actvam bhaviṣyati . atha vā yaḥ atra ādeśaḥ na asau āśrīyate yaḥ ca āśrīyate na asau ādeśaḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam : ākrāṣṭām . sicaḥ lopaḥ paranimittakaḥ . tasya sthānivadbhāvāt ṣaḍhoḥ kaḥ si iti katvam prāpnoti . acaḥ iti vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1737: bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam .vakṣyati etat : pūrvatrāsiddhe na sthānivat iti . idam tarhi prayojanam : āgatya , abhigatya .
GS24pmbhasuu:1738: anunāsikalopaḥ paranimittakaḥ . tasya sthānivadbhāvāt hrasvasya iti tuk na
GS24pmbhasuu:1739: prāpnoti . acaḥ iti vacanāt bhavati . atha parasmin iti kimartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:1740: yuvajāniḥ , dvipadikā , vaiyāghrapadyaḥ , ādīdhye . yuvajāniḥ , vadhūjāniḥ iti : jāyāyāḥ niṅ na paranimittakaḥ . tasya sthānivadbhāvāt vali iti yalopaḥ na prāpnoti . parasmin iti vacanāt bhavati . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:1741: prayojanam . svāśrayam atra valtam bhaviṣyati . atha vā yaḥ atra ādeśaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:1742: asau āśrīyate yaḥ ca āśrīyate na asau ādeśaḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1743: dvipadikā tripadikā . pādasya lopaḥ na paranimittakaḥ . tasya sthānivadbhāvāt padbhāvaḥ na prāpnoti . parasmin iti vacanāt bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1744: etat api na asti prayojanam . punarlopavacanasāmarthyāt sthānivadbhāvaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:1745: bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam : vaiyāghrapadyaḥ . nanu ca atra api punarvacanasāmarthyāt eva na bhaviṣyati . asti hi anyat punarlopavacane prayojanam . kim . yatra bhasañjñā na : vyāghrapāt , śyenapāt iti . idam ca api udāharaṇam : ādīdhye , āvevye . ikārasya ekāraḥ na paranimittakaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1746: tasya sthānivadbhāvāt yīvarṇayoḥ dīdhīvevyoḥ iti lopaḥ prāpnoti . parasmin iti vacanāt bhavati . atha pūrvavidhau iti kim artham . he gauḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1747: bābhravīyāḥ , naidheyaḥ . he gauḥ iti aukāraḥ paranimittakaḥ . tasya sthānivadbhāvāt eṅhrasvāt sambuddheḥ iti lopaḥ prāpnoti . pūrvavidhau iti vacanāt na bhavati . na etat asti prayojanam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na sambuddhilope sthānivadbhāvaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam eṅhrasvāt sambuddheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1748: iti eṅgrahaṇam karoti . na etat asti jñāpakam . gortham etat syāt . yat tarhi pratyāhāragrahaṇam karoti . itarathā hi ohrasvāt iti eva brūyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:1749: idam tarhi prayojanam : bābhravīyāḥ , mādhavīyāḥ . vāntādeśaḥ paranimittakaḥ . tasya sthānivadbhāvāt halaḥ taddhitasya iti yalopaḥ na prāpnoti . pūrvavidhau iti vacanāt na bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . svāśrayam atra haltvam bhaviṣyati . atha vā yaḥ atra ādeśaḥ na asau āśrīyate yaḥ ca āśrīyate na asau ādeśaḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1750: naidheyaḥ . ākāralopaḥ paranimittakaḥ . tasya sthānivadbhāvāt dvyajlakṣaṇaḥ ḍhak na prāpnoti . pūrvavidhau iti vacanāt na bhavati . atha vidhigrahaṇam kimartham . sarvavibhaktyantaḥ samāsaḥ yathā vijñāyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:1751: pūrvasya vidhiḥ pūrvavidhiḥ , pūrvasmāt vidhiḥ pūrvavidhiḥ iti . kāni punaḥ pūrvasmāt vidhau sthānivadbhāvasya prayojanāni . bebhiditā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1752: māthitikaḥ , apīpacan . bebhiditā , cecchiditā iti akāralope kṛte ekājlakṣaṇaḥ iṭpratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . sthānivadbhāvāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1753: māthitikaḥ iti akāralope kṛte tāntāt kaḥ iti kādeśaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1754: sthānivadbhāvāt na bhavati . apīpacan iti ekādeśe kṛte abhyastāt jheḥ jus bhavati iti jusbhāvaḥ prāpnoti . sthānivadbhāvāt na bhavati . na etāni santi prayojanāni . kutaḥ . prātipadikarnirdeśaḥ ayam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1755: prātipadikarnirdeśāḥ ca arthatantrāḥ bhavanti . na kāṃ cit prādhānyena vibhaktim āśrayanti . tatra prātipadikārthe nirdiṣṭe yām yām vibhaktim
GS24pmbhasuu:1756: āśrayitum buddhiḥ upajāyate sā sā āśrayitavyā . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1757: vidhimātre sthānivat yathā syāt anāśrīyamāṇāyām api prakṛtau : vāyvoḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1758: adhvaryvoḥ . lopaḥ vyoḥ vali iti yalapaḥ mā bhūt iti . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . aparavidhau iti tu vaktavyam . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1759: svavidhau api sthānivadbhāvaḥ yathā syāt . kāni punaḥ svavidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:1760: sthānivadbhāvasya prayojanāni . āyan , āsan , dhinvanti kṛṇvanti dadhi
GS24pmbhasuu:1761: atra , madhu atra cakratuḥ , cakruḥ . iha tāvat : āyan , āsan iti iṇastyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1762: yaṇlopayoḥ kṛtayoḥ anajāditvāt āṭ ajādīnām iti āṭ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1763: sthānivadbhāvāt bhavati . dhinvanti kṛṇvanti iti yaṇādeśe kṛte valādilakṣaṇaḥ iṭ prāpnoti . sthānivadbhāvāt na bhavati . dadhi atra madhu
GS24pmbhasuu:1764: atra iti yaṇādeśe kṛte saṃyogāntalopaḥ prāpnoti . sthānivadbhāvāt na bhavati . cakratuḥ , cakruḥ iti yaṇādeśe kṛte anactvāt dvirvacanam na prāpnoti . sthānivadbhāvāt bhavati . yadi tarhi svavidhau api sthānivadbhāvaḥ bhavati dvābhyām , deyam , lavanam atra api prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1765: dvābhyām iti atra atvasya sthānivadbhāvāt dīrghatvam na prāpnoti . deyam iti īttvasya sthānivadbhāvāt guṇaḥ na prāpnoti . lavanam iti guṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1766: sthānivadbhāvāt avādeśaḥ na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . svāśrayāḥ atra ete
GS24pmbhasuu:1767: vidhayaḥ bhaviṣyanti . tat tarhi vaktavyam aparavidhau iti . na vaktavyam . pūrvavidhau iti eva siddham . katham . na pūrvgrahaṇena ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1768: abhisambadhyate : ajādeśaḥ paranimittakaḥ pūrvasya vidhim prati sthānivat
GS24pmbhasuu:1769: bhavati . kutaḥ pūrvasya . ādeśāt iti . kim tarhi . nimittam abhisambadhyate : ajādeśaḥ paranimittakaḥ pūrvasya vidhim prati sthānivat
GS24pmbhasuu:1770: bhavati . kutaḥ pūrvasya . nimittāt iti . atha nimitte abhisambadhyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:1771: yat tat asya yogasya mūrdhābhiṣiktam udāharaṇam tat api saṅgṛhītam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:1772: . kim punaḥ tat . paṭvyā mṛdvyā iti . bāḍham saṅgṛhītam . nanu ca īkārayaṇā vyavahitatvāt na asau nimittāt pūrvaḥ bhavati . vyavahite api pūrvaśabdaḥ vartate . tat yathā : pūrvam mathurāyāḥ pāṭaliputram iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1773: atha vā ādeśaḥ eva abhisambadhyate . katham yāni svavidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:1774: sthānivadbhāvasya prayojanāni . na etāni santi . iha tāvat āyan , āsan ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1775: dhinvanti kṛṇvanti iti . ayam vidhiśabdaḥ asti eva karmasādhanaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1776: vidhīyate vidhiḥ . asti bhāvasādhanaḥ : vidhānam vidhiḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1777: karmasādhanasya vidhiśabdasya upādāne na sarvam iṣṭam saṅgṛhītam iti kṛtvā bhāvasādhanasya vidhiśabdasya upādānam vijñāsyate : pūrvasya vidhānam prati pūrvasya bhāvam prati pūrvaḥ syāt iti sthānivat bhavati iti evam āṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:1778: bhaviṣyati iṭ ca na bhaviṣyati . dadhi atra madhu atra cakratuḥ cakruḥ iti parihāram vakṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:1779: (P_1,1.57.2) KA_I,144.18-146.5 Ro_I,431-435 kāni punaḥ asya yogasya prayojanāni . stoṣyāmi aham pādikam audavāhim tataḥ śvobhūte śātanīm pātanīm ca . netārau āgacchatam dhāraṇim rāvaṇim ca tataḥ paścāt sraṃsyate dhvaṃsyate ca . iha tāvat pādikam audavāhim śātanīm pātanīm dhāraṇim rāvaṇim iti akāralope kṛte padbhāvaḥ ūṭh allopaḥ ṭilopaḥ iti ete vidhayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1780: prāpnuvanti . sthānivadbhāvāt na bhavanti . sraṃsyate dhvaṃsyate : ṇilope kṛte aniditām halaḥ upadhāyāḥ kṅiti iti nalopaḥ prāpnoti . sthānivadbhāvāt na bhavati . na etāni santi prayojanāni . asiddhavat atra ā bhāt iti anena
GS24pmbhasuu:1781: api etāni siddhāni . idam tarhi prayojanam : yājyate vāpyate . ṇilope kṛte yajādīnām kiti iti samprasāraṇam prāpnoti . sthānivadbhāvāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1782: etat api na asti prayojanam . yajādibhiḥ atra kitam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ yajādīnām yaḥ kit iti . kaḥ ca yajādīnām kit . yajādibhyaḥ yaḥ vihitaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1783: . idam tarhi prayojanam : paṭvyā mṛdvyā iti . parasya yaṇādeśe kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:1784: pūrvasya na prāpnoti īkārayaṇā vyavahitatvāt . sthānivadbhāvāt bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1785: kim punaḥ kāraṇam parasya tāvat bhavati na punaḥ pūrvasya . nityatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:1786: nityaḥ parayaṇādeśaḥ . kṛte api pūrvayaṇādeśe prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:1787: . nityatvāt parayaṇādeśe kṛte pūrvasya na prāpnoti . sthānivadbhāvāt bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . asiddham bahiraṅgalakṣaṇam antaraṅgalakṣaṇe iti asiddhatvāt bahiraṅgalakṣaṇasya parayaṇādeśasya antaraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ pūrvayaṇādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . avaśyam ca eṣā paribhāṣā āśrayitavyā svarārtham kartrya hartrya iti udāttayaṇaḥ halpūrvāt iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ yathā syāt . anena api siddhaḥ svaraḥ . katham . ārabhyamāṇe nityaḥ asau . ārabhyamāṇe tu asmin yoge nityaḥ pūrvayaṇādeśaḥ . kṛte api parayaṇādeśe prāpnoti akṛte api . parayaṇādeśaḥ api nityaḥ . kṛte api pūrvayaṇādeśe prāpnoti akṛte api . paraḥ ca asau vyavasthā . vyavasthayā ca asau paraḥ . yugapatsambhavaḥ na asti . na ca asti yaugapadyena sambhavaḥ . katham ca sidhyati . bahiraṅgeṇa sidhyati . asiddham bahiraṅgalakṣaṇam antaraṅgalakṣaṇe iti anena sidhyati . evam tarhi yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1788: atra udāttayaṇ tadāśrayaḥ svaraḥ bhaviṣyati . īkārayaṇā vyavahitatvāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:1789: prāpnoti . svaravidhau vyañjanam avidyamānavat bhavati iti na asti vyavadhānam . sā tarhi eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . nanu ca iyam api kartavyā : asiddham bahiraṅgalakṣaṇam antaraṅgalakṣaṇe iti . bahuprayojanā eṣā paribhāṣā . avaśyam eṣā kartavyā . sā ca api eṣā lokataḥ siddhā . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:1790: pratyaṅgavartī lokaḥ lakṣyate . tat yathā : puruṣaḥ ayam prātaḥ utthāya yāni asya pratiśarīram kāryāṇi tāni tāvat karoti tataḥ suhṛdām tataḥ sambandhinām . prātipadikam ca api upadiṣṭam sāmānyabhūte arthe vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:1791: sāmanye vartamānasya vyaktiḥ upajāyate . vyaktasya sataḥ liṅgasaṅkhyābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:1792: anvitasya bāhyena arthena yogaḥ bhavati . yayā eva ānupūrvyā arthānām prādurbhāvaḥ tayā eva śabdānām api tadvat kāryaiḥ api bhavitavyam . imāni tarhi prayojanāni : paṭayati , avadhīt , bahukhaṭvakaḥ . paṭayati laghayati iti ṭilope kṛte ataḥ upadhāyāḥ iti vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1793: sthānivadbhāvāt na bhavati . avadhīt iti akāralope kṛte ataḥ halādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1794: laghoḥ iti vibhāṣā vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti . sthānivadbhāvāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1795: bahukhaṭvakaḥ it āpaḥ anyatarasyām hrasvatve kṛte hrasvānte antyāt pūrvam iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ prāpnoti . sthānivadbhāvāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1796: (P_1,1.57.3) KA_I,146.6-16 Ro_I,435-436 iha vaiyākaraṇaḥ , sauvaśvaḥ iti yvoḥ sthānivadbhāvāt āyāvau prāpnutaḥ . tayoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1797: acaḥ pūrvavijñānāt aicoḥ siddham . yaḥ anādiṣṭāt acaḥ pūrvaḥ tasya vidhim
GS24pmbhasuu:1798: prati sthānivadbhāvaḥ . ādiṣṭāt ca eṣaḥ acaḥ pūrvaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:1799: na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . acaḥ iti pañcamī : acaḥ pūrvasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:1800: yadi evam ādeśaḥ aviśeṣitaḥ bhavati . ādeśaḥ ca viśeṣitaḥ . katham . na brūmaḥ yat ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭam ajgrahaṇam tat pañcamīnirdiṣṭam kartavyam . kim tarhi anyat kartavyam . anyat ca na kartavyam . yat eva adaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1801: ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭam ajgrahaṇam tasya dikśabdaiḥ yoge pañcamī bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:1802: ajādeśaḥ paranimittakaḥ pūrvasya vidhim prati sthānivat bhavati . kutaḥ pūrvasya . acaḥ iti . tat yathā ādeśaḥ prathamānirdiṣṭaḥ . tasya dikśabdaiḥ yoge pañcamī bhavati : ajādeśaḥ paranimittakaḥ pūrvasya vidhim prati sthānivat bhavati . kutaḥ pūrvasya . ādeśāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1803: (P_1,1.57.4) KA_I,146.17-147.18 Ro_I,436-438 tatra ādeśalakṣaṇapratiṣedhaḥ . tatra ādeśalakṣaṇam kāryam prāpnoti . tasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : vāyvoḥ , adhvaryvoḥ . lopaḥ vyoḥ vali iti yalopaḥ prāpnoti . asiddhavacanāt siddham . ajādeśaḥ paranimittakaḥ pūrvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1804: vidhim prati asiddhaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . asiddhavacanāt siddham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1805: cet utsargalakṣaṇānām anudeśaḥ . asiddhavacanāt siddham iti cet utsargalakṣaṇānām anudeśaḥ kartavyaḥ : paṭvyā mrdvyā iti . nanu ca etat
GS24pmbhasuu:1806: api asiddhavacanāt siddham . asiddhavacanāt siddham iti cet na anyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1807: asiddhavacanāt anyasya bhāvaḥ . asiddhavacanāt siddham iti cet tat na .
GS24pmbhasuu:1808: kim kāraṇam . na anyasya asiddhavacanāt anyasya bhāvaḥ . na hi anyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1809: asiddhavacanāt anyasya prādurbhāvaḥ bhavati . na hi devadattasya hantari hate devadattasya prādurbhāvaḥ bhavati . tasmāt sthānivadvacanam asiddhatvam ca . tasmāt sthānivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ asiddhatvam ca . paṭvyā mṛdvyā iti atra sthānivadbhāvaḥ . vāyvoḥ , adhvaryvoḥ iti asiddhatvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1810: uktam vā . kim uktam . sthānivadvacanānarthakyam śāstrāsiddhatvāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1811: viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . yuktam tatra yat ekādeśaśāstram tukśāstre asiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:1812: syāt : anyat anyasmin . iha punaḥ na yuktam . katham hi tad eva nāma tasmin asiddham syāt . tad eva ca api tasmin asiddham bhavati . vakṣyati hi ācāryaḥ : ciṇaḥ luki tagrahaṇānarthakyam saṅghātasya apratyayatvāt talopasya ca asiddhatvāt iti . ciṇaḥ luk ciṇaḥ luki eva asiddhaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1813: kāmam atidiśyatām vā sat ca asat ca api na iha bhāraḥ asti . kalpyaḥ hi vākyaśeṣaḥ vākyam vaktari adhīnam hi . atha vā vatinirdeśaḥ ayam .

GS24pmbhasuu:1905: ṇiḥ lupyate tasya sthānivadbhāvāt hrasvatvam na prāpnoti . nanu ca etat

GS24pmbhasuu:1908: pūrvatrāsiddhe ca na sthānivat iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . prayojanam ksalopaḥ salope ksalopaḥ salope prayojanam : adugdha , adugdhāḥ . luk vā duhadihalihaguhām ātmanepade dantye iti luggrahaṇam na kartavyam . dadhaḥ ākāralope ādicaturthatve . dadhaḥ ākāralope ādicaturthatve prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1909: dhatse dhaddhve dhaddhvam iti . dadhaḥ tathoḥ ca iti cakāraḥ na kartavyaḥ bhavati . halaḥ yamām yami lope . halaḥ yamām yami lope prayojanam :

GS24pmbhasuu:2072: cet na anarthake alontyavidhiḥ anabhyāsavikāre . antyavijñānāt siddham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2073: cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . na anarthake alontyavidhiḥ anabhyāsavikāre .
GS24pmbhasuu:2074: anarthake alontyavidhiḥ na iti eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . kim aviśeṣeṇa . na iti āha . anabhyāsavikāre . abhyāsavikārān varjayitvā . bhṛñām it ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2075: artipipartyoḥ ca iti . kāni etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni . prayojanam avyaktānukaraṇasya ataḥ itau . antyasya prāpnoti . anarthake alontyavidhiḥ na bhavati iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . na etat asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2076: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na antyasya pararūpam bhavati iti yat ayam na āmreḍitasya antyasya tu vā iti āha . ghvasoḥ et hau abhyāsalopaḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:2077: ghvasoḥ et hau abhyāsalopaḥ ca iti antyasya prāpnoti . anarthake alontyavidhiḥ na bhavati iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . punarlopavacanasāmarthyāt sarvasya bhaviṣyati . atha vā śit
GS24pmbhasuu:2078: lopaḥ kariṣyate . saḥ śit sarvasya iti sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . saḥ tarhi śakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . kriyate nyāse eva . dviśakārakaḥ nirdeśaḥ : ghvasoḥ et hau abhyāsalopaśśca iti . āpi lopaḥ akaḥ anaci .
GS24pmbhasuu:2079: tiṣṭhati sūtram . anyathā vyākhyāyate : āpi hali lopaḥ iti antyasya prāpnoti . anarthake alontyavidhiḥ na bhavati iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . anaḥ eva lopam vakṣyāmi . tat anaḥ grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2080: kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . an āpi akaḥ iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam . ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣtena ca iha arthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2081: hali iti eṣā saptamī an iti prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati : tasmin iti nirdiṣṭe pūrvasya iti . atra lopaḥ abhyāsasya . atra lopaḥ abhyāsasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2082: iti antyasya prāpnoti . anarthake alontyavidhiḥ na bhavati iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . atragrahaṇasāmarthyāt sarvasya bhaviṣyati . asti anyat atragrahaṇasya prayojanam . kim . sanadhikāraḥ apekṣyate , iha mā bhūt : dadhau dadau . antareṇa api atragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2083: sanadhikāram apekṣiṣyāmahe . san tarhi sakārādiḥ apekṣyate sani sakārādau
GS24pmbhasuu:2084: iti , iha mā bhūt : jijñāpayiṣati . antareṇa api atragrahaṇam sanam sakārādim apekṣiṣyāmahe . prakṛtayaḥ tarhi apekṣyante . etāsām prakṛtīnām lopaḥ yathā syāt , iha mā bhūt : pipakṣati yiyakṣati . antareṇa api atragrahaṇam etāḥ prakṛtīḥ apekṣiṣyāmahe . viṣayaḥ tarhi apekṣyate . mucaḥ akarmakasya guṇaḥ vā iti iha mā bhūt : mumukṣati gām iti . antareṇa api atragrahaṇam viṣayam apekṣiṣyāmahe . katham . akarmakasya iti ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:2085: tena yatra eva ayam muciḥ akarmakaḥ tatra eva bhaviṣyati . tasmāt na arthaḥ anayā paribhāṣayā
