GS24pmbhasuu:2087: vā . atha vā vyaktam eva pathitavyam alaḥ antyāt pūrvaḥ al upadhāsañjñaḥ bhavati iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . avacanāt lokavijñānāt siddham . antareṇa api vacanam lokavijñānāt siddham etat . katham . loke amīṣām brāhmaṇānām antyāt pūrvaḥ ānīyatām iti ukte yathājātīyakaḥ antyaḥ tathājātīyakaḥ antyāt pūrvaḥ ānīyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:2088: (P_1,1.66-67.1) KA_I,171.18-172.17 Ro_I,507-511 kim udāharaṇam . iha tāvat : tasmin iti nirdiṣṭe pūrvasya iti : ikaḥ yaṇ aci : dadhi atra madhu
GS24pmbhasuu:2089: atra . iha : tasmāt iti uttarasya iti : dvayantarupasargebhyaḥ apaḥ īt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2090: dvīpam antarīpam samīpam . anyathājātīyakena śabdena nirdeśaḥ kriyate anyathājātīyakaḥ udāhriyate . kim punaḥ udāharaṇam . iha tāvat : tasmin iti nirdiṣṭe pūrvasya iti : tasmin aṇi ca yuṣmākāsmākau iti . tasmāt iti uttarasya iti : tasmāt śasaḥ naḥ puṃsi iti . idam ca api udāharaṇam : ikaḥ yaṇ aci dvyantarupasargebhyaḥ apaḥ īt iti . katham . sarvanāmnā ayam nirdeśaḥ kriyate sarvanāma ca sāmānyavāci . tatra sāmānye nirdiṣṭe viśeṣāḥ api udāharaṇāni bhavanti . kim punaḥ sāmānyam kaḥ vā viśeṣaḥ . gauḥ sāmānyam kṛṣṇaḥ viśeṣaḥ . na tarhi idānīm kṛṣṇaḥ sāmānyam bhavati gauḥ viśeṣaḥ bhavati . bhavati ca . yadi sāmānyam api viśeṣaḥ viśeṣaḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:2091: sāmānyam sāmānyaviśeṣau na prakalpete . prakalpete ca . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:2092: vivakṣātaḥ . yadā asya gauḥ sāmānyena vivakṣitaḥ bhavati kṛṣṇaḥ viśeṣatvena tadā gauḥ sāmānyam kṛṣṇaḥ viśeṣaḥ . yadā kṛṣṇaḥ sāmānyena
GS24pmbhasuu:2093: vivakṣitaḥ bhavati gauḥ viśeṣatvena tadā kṛṣṇaḥ sāmānyam kṛṣṇaḥ viśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2094: aparaḥ āha : prakalpete ca . katham . pitāputravat . tat yathā saḥ eva kam cit prati pitā bhavati kam cit prati putraḥ bhavati evam iha api saḥ eva kam cit prati sāmānyam kam cit prati viśeṣaḥ . ete khalu api nairdeśikānām vārttatarakāḥ bhavanti ye sarvanāmnā nirdeśāḥ kriyante . etaiḥ hi bahutarakam vyāpyate . atha kimartham upasargeṇa nirdeśaḥ kriyate . śabde saptamyā nirdiṣṭe pūrvasya kāryam yathā syāt arthe mā bhūt : janapade atiśāyane iti . kim gatam etat upasargeṇa āhosvit śabdādhikyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2095: arthādhikyam . gatam iti āha . katham . niḥ ayam bahirbhāve vartate . tat yathā : niṣkrāntaḥ deśāt nirdeśaḥ . bahirdeśaḥ iti gamyate . śabdaḥ ca śabdāt bahirbhūtaḥ arthaḥ abahirbhūtaḥ . atha nirdiṣṭagrahaṇam kimartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:2097: . ānantaryamātre kāryam yathā syāt . ikaḥ yaṇ aci : dadhi atra madhu atra
GS24pmbhasuu:2098: . iha mā bhūt :samidhau samidhaḥ , dṛṣadau dṛṣadaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2100: ucyate . tasmin tasmāt iti pūrvottarayoḥ yogayoḥ aviśeṣāt niyamārtham vacanam dadhi udakam pacati odanam . tasmin tasmāt iti pūrvottarayoḥ yogayoḥ aviśeṣāt niyamārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . grāme devadattaḥ . pūrvaḥ paraḥ iti sandehaḥ . grāmāt devadattaḥ . pūrvaḥ paraḥ iti sandehaḥ . evam iha api : ikaḥ yaṇ aci . dadhi udakam , pacati odanam . ubhau ikau ubhau
GS24pmbhasuu:2101: acau . aci pūrvasya aci parasya iti sandehaḥ . tiṅ atiṅaḥ iti atiṅaḥ pūrvasya atiṅaḥ parasya iti sandehaḥ . iṣyate ca atra aci pūrvasya syāt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2102: atiṅaḥ parasya iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati iti niyamārtham vacanam . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . atha yatra ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:2103: nirdiśyate kim tatra pūrvasya kāryam bhavati āhosvit parasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2104: ubhayanirdeśe vipratiṣedhāt pañcamīnirdeśaḥ . ubhayanirdeśe vipratiṣedhāt pañcamīnirdeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . kim prayojanam . prayojanam ataḥ lasārvadhātukanudāttatve . vakṣyati tāsyādibhyaḥ anudāttatve
GS24pmbhasuu:2105: saptamīnirdeśaḥ abhyastasijarthaḥ iti . tasmin kriyamāṇe tāsyādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2106: parasya lasārvadhātukasya lasārvadhātuke parataḥ tāsyādīnām iti sandehaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2107: tāsyādibhyaḥ parasya lasārvadhātukasya . bahoḥ iṣṭhādīnām ādilopaḥ . bahoḥ uttareṣām iṣṭhemeyasām iṣṭhemayaḥsu parataḥ bahoḥ iti sandehaḥ . bahoḥ uttareṣām iṣṭhemeyasām . gotaḥ ṇit . gotaḥ parasya sarvanāmasthānasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2108: sarvanāmasthāne parataḥ gotaḥ iti sandehaḥ . gotaḥ parasya sarvanāmasthānasya . rudādibhyaḥ sārvadhātuke . rudādibhyaḥ parasya sārvadhātukasya sārvadhātuke parataḥ rudādīnām iti sandehaḥ . rudādibhyaḥ parasya sārvadhātukasya . āne muk īt āsaḥ . āsaḥ uttarasya ānasya , āne parataḥ āsaḥ iti sandehaḥ . āsaḥ uttarasya ānasya . āmi sarvanāmnaḥ suṭ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2109: sarvanāmnaḥ uttarasya āmaḥ āmi parataḥ sarvanāmnaḥ iti sandehaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2110: sarvanāmnaḥ uttarasya . gheḥ ṅiti āṭ nadyāḥ . nadyāḥ uttareṣām ṅitām ṅitsu parataḥ nadyāḥ iti sandehaḥ . nadyāḥ uttareṣām ṅitām . yāṭ āpaḥ . āpaḥ uttarasya ṅitaḥ ṅiti parataḥ āpaḥ iti sandehaḥ . āpaḥ uttarasya ṅitaḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:2114: (P_1,1.66-67.3) KA_I,174.6-175.18 Ro_I,515-518 yathārtham vā ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśaḥ . yathārtham vā ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . yatra pūrvasya kāryam iṣyate tatra pūrvasya ṣaṣṭhī kartavyā . yatra parasya kāryam iṣyate tatra parasya ṣaṣṭhī kartavyā . saḥ tarhi tathā nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . anena eva prakḷptiḥ bhaviṣyati : tasmin iti nirdiṣṭe pūrvasya ṣaṣṭhī . tasmāt iti nirdiṣṭe parasya ṣaṣṭhī . tat tarhi ṣaṣṭhīgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2115: kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . ṣaṣṭhī sthāneyogā iti . prakalpakam iti cet niyamābhāvaḥ . prakalpakam iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:2116: niyamasya abhāvaḥ . uktam ca etat : niyamārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2117: pratyayavidhau khalu api pañcamyāḥ prakalpikāḥ syuḥ . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2118: guptijkibhyaḥ san iti eṣā pañcamī san iti prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayet tasmāt iti uttarasya iti . astu . na kaḥ cit ādeśaḥ pratinirdiśyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:2119: tatra āntaryataḥ sanaḥ san eva bhaviṣyati . na evam śakyam . itsañjñā na prakalpeta . upadeśe iti itsañjñā ucyate . prakṛtivikārāvyavasthā ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:2120: prakṛtivikārayoḥ ca vyavasthā na prakalpeta . ikaḥ yaṇ aci : aci iti eṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:2121: saptamī yaṇ iti prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayet tasmin iti nirdiṣṭe pūrvasya iti . saptamīpañcamyoḥ ca bhāvāt ubhayatra ṣaṣṭhīprakḷptiḥ tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:2122: ubhayakāryaprasaṅgaḥ . saptamīpañcamyoḥ ca bhāvāt ubhayatra eva ṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:2123: prāpnoti . tāsyādibhyaḥ iti eṣā pañcamī lasārvadhātuke iti asyāḥ saptamyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayet tasmāt iti uttarasya iti . tathā lasārvadhātuke iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2124: eṣā saptamī tāsyādibhyaḥ iti pañcamyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayet tasmin iti nirdiṣṭe pūrvasya iti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . ubhayoḥ kāryam tatra prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2125: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat tāvat ucyate : prakalpakam iti cet niyamābhāvaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2126: mā bhūt niyamaḥ . saptamīnirdiṣṭe pūrvasya ṣaṣṭhī prakalpyate pañcamīnirdiṣṭe parasya . yāvatā saptamīnirdiṣṭe pūrvasya ṣaṣṭhī prakalpyate evam pañcamīnirdiṣṭe parasya . na utsahate saptamīnirdiṣṭe
GS24pmbhasuu:2127: parasya kāryam bhavitum na api pañcamīnirdiṣṭe pūrvasya . yat api ucyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2128: pratyayavidhau khalu api pañcamyāḥ prakalpikāḥ syuḥ iti . santu prakalpikāḥ . nanu ca uktam guptijkibhyaḥ san iti eṣā pañcamī san iti prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayet tasmāt iti uttarasya iti . parihṛtam etat : na kaḥ cit ādeśaḥ pratinirdiśyate . tatra āntaryataḥ sanaḥ san eva bhaviṣyati iti . nanu ca uktam : na evam śakyam . itsañjñā na prakalpeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:2129: upadeśe iti itsañjñā ucyate iti . syāt eṣaḥ doṣaḥ yadi itsañjñā ādeśam
GS24pmbhasuu:2130: pratīkṣeta . tatra khalu kṛtāyām itsañjñāyām lope ca kṛte ādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . upadeśe iti hi itsañjñā ucyate . atha vā na anutpanne sani prakḷptyā bhavitavyam . yadā ca utpannaḥ san tadā kṛtasāmarthyā pañcamī iti kṛtvā prakḷptiḥ na bhaviṣyati . yat api ucyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2131: prakṛtivikārāvyavasthā ca iti . tatra api kṛtā prakṛtau ṣaṣṭhī ikaḥ iti vikṛtau prathamā yaṇ iti . yatra ca nāma sautrī ṣaṣṭhī na asti tatra prakḷptyā bhavitavyam . atha vā astu tāvat ikaḥ yaṇ aci iti yatra nāma sautrī ṣaṣṭhī . yadi ca idānīm aci iti eṣā saptamī yaṇ iti prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayet tasmin iti nirdiṣṭe pūrvasya iti astu . na kaḥ cit
GS24pmbhasuu:2132: anyaḥ ādeśaḥ pratinirdiśyate . tatra āntaryataḥ yaṇaḥ yaṇ eva bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2133: yat api ucyate : saptamīpañcamyoḥ ca bhāvāt ubhayatra ṣaṣṭhīprakḷptiḥ tatra ubhayakāryaprasaṅgaḥ iti . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na ubhe yugapat prakalpike bhavataḥ iti yat ayam ekaḥ pūrvaparayoḥ iti pūrvagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2135: (P_1,1.68.1) KA_I,175.20-23 Ro_I,519-520 rūpagrahaṇam kim artham na svam śabdasya aśabdasañjñā bhavati iti eva rūpam śabasya sañjñā bhaviṣyati . na hi anyat svam śabdasya asti anyat ataḥ rūpāt . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat rūpagrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ asti anyat rūpāt svam śabdasya iti . kim punaḥ tat . arthaḥ . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam .

GS24pmbhasuu:2139: . gām ānaya dadhi aśāna iti arthaḥ ānīyate arthaḥ ca bhujyate . arthasya asambhavāt . iha vyākaraṇe arthe kāryasya asambhavaḥ . agneḥ ḍak iti : na śakyate aṅgārebhyaḥ paraḥ ḍhak kartum . śabdena arthagateḥ arthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2140: asambhavāt yāvantaḥ tadvācinaḥ śabdāḥ tāvadbhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ utpattiḥ prāpnoti . iṣyate ca tasmāt eva syāt iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati iti tadvācinaḥ sañjñāpratiṣedhārtham svaṃrūpavacanam . evamartham idam ucyate . na vā śabdapūrvakaḥ hi arthe sampratyayaḥ tasmāt arthanivṛttiḥ . na vā etat prayojanam asti . kim kāraṇam . śabdapūrvakaḥ hi arthe sampratyayaḥ . śabdapūrvakaḥ hi arthasya sampratyayaḥ . ātaḥ ca śabdapūrvakaḥ : yaḥ api hi asau āhūyate nāmnā nāma yadā anena na upalabdham bhavati tada pṛcchati kim bhavān āha iti . śabdapūrvakaḥ ca arthasya sampratyayaḥ iha ca vyākaraṇe śabde kāryasya sambhavaḥ arthe
GS24pmbhasuu:2141: asambhavaḥ . tasmāt arthanivṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2142: aśabdasañjñā iti vakṣyāmi iti . iha mā bhūt : dādhāḥ ghu adāp taraptamapau ghaḥ iti . sañjñāpratiṣedhānarthakyam vacanaprāmāṇyāt . sañjñāpratiṣedhaḥ ca anarthakaḥ . śabdasañjñāyām svarūpavidhiḥ kasmāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2144: sañjñinām sampratyayaḥ syāt svarūpagrahaṇāt ca sañjñāyāḥ . etat api na
GS24pmbhasuu:2145: asti prayojanam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati śabdasañjñāyām na svarūpavidhiḥ bhavati iti yat ayam ṣṇāntā ṣaṭ iti ṣakārāntāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ ṣaṭsañjñām śāsti . itarathā hi vacanaprāmāṇyāt nakārāntāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ sampratyayaḥ syāt svarūpagrahaṇāt ca ṣakārāntāyāḥ . na etat asti

GS24pmbhasuu:2147: vaktavyam . mantre , ṛci yajuṣi iti yat ucyate tat mantraśabde ṛkśabde ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2148: yajuḥśabde ca mā bhūt . mantrādyartham iti cet śāstrasāmarthyāt arthagateḥ siddham . mantrādyartham iti cet na . kim kāraṇam . śāstrasāmarthyāt arthasya gatiḥ bhaviṣyati . mantre , ṛci yajuṣi iti yat ucyate tat
GS24pmbhasuu:2149: mantraśabde ṛkśabde ca yajuḥśabde ca tasya kāryasya sambhavaḥ na asti iti kṛtvā mantrādisahacaritaḥ yaḥ arthaḥ tasya gatiḥ bhaviṣyati sāhacaryāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:2150: (P_1,1.68.3) KA_I,176.25-177.16 Ro_I,523-525 sit tadviśeṣāṇām vṛkṣādyartham . sinnirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . tataḥ vaktavyam : tadviśeṣāṇām grahaṇam bhavati iti . kim prayojanam . vṛkṣādyartham . vibhāṣā vṛkṣamṛga iti : plakṣanyagrodham , plakṣanyagrodhāḥ . pit paryāyavacanasya ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2151: svādyartham . pinnirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . tataḥ vaktavyam : paryāyavacanasya tadviśeṣāṇām ca grahaṇam bhavati svasya ca rūpasya iti . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2152: svādyartham . sve puṣaḥ : svapoṣam puṣyati raipoṣam , vidyāpoṣam , gopoṣam aśvapoṣam . jit paryāyavacanasya eva rājādyartham . jinnirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . tataḥ vaktavyam paryāyavacanasya eva grahaṇam bhavati . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2153: rājādyartham . sabhā rājāmanuṣyapūrvā : inasabham īśvarasabham . tasya eva na bhavati : rājasabhā . tadviśeṣāṇām ca na bhavati : puṣyamitrasabhā candraguptasabhā . jhit tasya ca tadviśeṣāṇām ca matsyādyartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:2154: jhinnirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . tataḥ vaktavyam : tasya ca grahaṇam bhavati tadviśeṣāṇām ca iti . kim prayojanam . matsyādyartham . pakṣimatsyamṛgān hanti : mātsyikaḥ . tadviśeṣāṇām : śāpharikaḥ , śākulikaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2155: paryāyavacanānām na bhavati : ajihmān hanti iti . asya ekasya paryāyavacanasya iṣyate : mīnān hanti mainikaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2157: sanāśaṃsabhikṣaḥ uḥ , a sāmpratike . atyalpam idam ucyate : apratyayaḥ iti . apratyayādeśaṭitkinmitaḥ iti vaktavyam . pratyaye udāhṛtam . ādeśe :
GS24pmbhasuu:2158: idamaḥ iś : iha , itaḥ . ṭiti . lavitā lavitum . kiti . babhūva . miti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2159: he anaḍvan . ṭitaḥ parihāraḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na ṭitaḥ savarṇānām grahaṇam bhavati iti yat ayam grahaḥ aliṭi dīrghatvam śāsti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2160: na etat asti jñāpakam . niyamārtham etat syāt : grahaḥ aliṭi dīrghaḥ eva iti . yat tarhi vṝtaḥ vā iti vibhāṣām śāsti . sarveṣām eva parihāraḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2161: bhāvyamānena savarṇānām grahaṇam na iti evam bhaviṣyati . pratyaye bhūyān parihāraḥ : anabhidhānāt pratyayaḥ savarṇān na grahīṣyati . yān hi pratyayaḥ savarṇagrahaṇena gṛhṇīyāt na taiḥ arthasya abhidhānam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:2162: anabhidhānāt na bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam : iha ke cit pratīyante ke cit pratyāyyante . hrasvāḥ pratīyante ḍīrghāḥ pratyāyyante . yāvat brūyāt pratyāyyamānena savarṇānam grahaṇam na iti tāvat apratyayaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2163: kam punaḥ dīrghaḥ savarṇagrahaṇena gṛhṇīyāt . hrasvam . yatnādhikyāt na grahīṣyati . plutam tarhi gṛhṇīyāt . anaṇtvāt na grahīṣyati . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat apratyayaḥ iti pratiṣedham śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati eṣā paribhāṣā : bhāvyamānena savarṇānām grahaṇam na iti (P_1,1.69.2) KA_I,178.8-179.12 Ro_I,528-531 kimartham punaḥ idam
GS24pmbhasuu:2164: ucyate . aṇ savarṇasya iti svarānunāsikyakālabhedāt . aṇ savarṇasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2165: ucyate . svarabhedāt ānunāsikyabhedāt kālabhedāt ca aṇ savarṇān na gṛhṇīyāt . iṣyate ca savarṇagrahaṇam syāt iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati iti evamartham idam ucyate . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2166: . tatra pratyāhāragrahaṇe savarṇāgrahaṇam anupadeśāt . tatra pratyāhāragrahaṇe savarṇānām grahaṇam na prāpnoti : akaḥ savarṇe dīrghaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2167: iti . kim kāraṇam . anupadeśāt . yathājātīyakānām sañjñā kṛtā
GS24pmbhasuu:2168: tathājātīyakānām sampratyāyikā syāt . hrasvānām ca kriyate . hrasvānām eva sampratyāyikā syāt dīrghānām na syāt . nanu ca hrasvāḥ pratīyamānāḥ dīrghān sampratyāyayiṣyanti . hrasvasampratyayāt iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:2169: uccāryamāṇasampratyāyakatvāt śabdasya avacanam . hrasvasampratyayāt iti cet uccāryamāṇaḥ śabdaḥ sampratyāyakaḥ bhavati na sampratīyamanaḥ . tat yathā ṛk iti ukte sampāṭhamātram gamyate na asyāḥ arthaḥ gamyate . evam tarhi varṇapāṭhe eva upadeśaḥ kariṣyate . varṇapāṭhe upadeśaḥ iti cet avarkālatvāt paribhāṣāyāḥ anupadeśaḥ . varṇapāṭhe upadeśaḥ iti cet avarkālatvāt paribhāṣāyāḥ anupadeśaḥ . kim parā sūtrāt kriyate iti ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2170: avarakālā . na iti āha . sarvathā avarakālā eva . varṇānām upadeśaḥ tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:2171: . upadeśottarakālaḥ ādiḥ antyena saha itā iti pratyāhāraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2172: pratyāhārottarakālā savarṇasañjñā . savarṇasañjñottarakālam aṇudit savarṇasya ca apratyayaḥ iti . sā eṣā upadeśottarakālā avarakālā satī varṇānām utpattau nimittatvāya kalpayiṣyate iti tat na . tasmāt upadeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2173: tasmāt upadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . tatra anuvṛttinirdeśe savarṇāgrahaṇam anaṇtvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2174: . tatra anuvṛttinirdeśe savarṇānām grahaṇam na prāpnoti : asya cvau yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2175: īti ca . kim kāraṇam . anaṇtvāt . na hi ete aṇaḥ ye anuvṛttinirdeśe . ke tarhi . ye akṣarasamāmnāye upadiśyante . evam tarhi anaṇtvāt anuvṛttau na anupadeśāt ca pratyāhāre na . ucyate ca idam aṇ savarṇān gṛhṇāti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2176: tatra vacanāt bhaviṣyati . vacanāt yatra tat na asti . na idam vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2177: labhyam . asti hi anyat etasya vacane prayojanam . kim . ye ete pratyāhārāṇām āditaḥ varṇāḥ taiḥ savarṇānām grahaṇam yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:2179: aṇgrahaṇam aparibhāṣyam ākṛtigrahaṇāt . savarṇe aṇgrahaṇam aparibhāṣyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2180: kutaḥ . ākṛtigrahaṇāt . avarṇākṛtiḥ upadiṣṭā sā sarvam avarṇakulam grahīṣyati . tathā ivarṇakulākṛtiḥ . tathā uvarṇakulākṛtiḥ . nanu ca anyā
GS24pmbhasuu:2181: ākṛtiḥ akārasya ākārasya ca . ananyatvāt ca . ananyākṛtiḥ akārasya ākārasya ca . anekāntaḥ hi ananyatvakaraḥ . yaḥ hi anekāntena bhedaḥ na asau anyatvam karoti . tat yathā : na yaḥ goḥ ca goḥ ca bhedaḥ saḥ anyatvam karoti . yaḥ tu khalu goḥ ca aśvasya ca bhedaḥ saḥ anyatvam karoti . aparaḥ āha : savarṇe aṇgrahaṇam aparibhāṣyam . ākṛtigrahaṇāt ananyatvam . savarṇe aṇgrahaṇam aparibhāṣyam . ākṛtigrahaṇāt ananyatvam bhaviṣyati . ananyākṛtiḥ akārasya ākārasya ca . anekāntaḥ hi ananyatvakaraḥ . yaḥ hi anekāntena bhedaḥ na asau anyatvam karoti . tat yathā : na yaḥ goḥ ca goḥ ca bhedaḥ saḥ anyatvam karoti . yaḥ tu khalu goḥ ca aśvasya ca bhedaḥ saḥ anyatvam karoti . tadvat ca halgrahaṇeṣu . evam ca kṛtvā ca halgrahaṇeṣu siddham bhavati . jhalaḥ jhali : avāttām avāttam avātta yatra etat na asti aṇ savarṇān gṛhṇāti iti . anekāntaḥ hi ananyatvakaraḥ iti uktārtham . drutavilambitayoḥ ca anupadeśāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:2182: drutavilambitayoḥ ca anupadeśāt manyāmahe ākṛtigrahaṇāt siddham iti . yat ayam kasyām cit vṛttau varṇān upadiśya sarvatra kṛtī bhavati . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . vṛttipṛthaktvam tu na upapadyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:2183: vṛtteḥ tu pṛthaktvam na upapadyate . tasmāt tatra taparanirdeśāt siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:2184: tasmāt tatra taparanirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . kriyate etat nyāse
GS24pmbhasuu:2186: (P_1,1.70.1) KA_I,180.14-20 Ro_I,535-536 ayuktaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ . tat iti anena kālaḥ pratinirdiśyate tat iti ayam ca varṇaḥ . tatra ayuktam varṇasya kālena saha sāmanādhikaraṇyam . katham tarhi nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2187: tatkālakālasya iti . kim idam tatkālakālasya iti . tasya kālaḥ tatkālaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2188: tatkālaḥ kālaḥ yasya saḥ ayam tatkālakālaḥ , tatkālakālasya iti . saḥ tarhi tathā nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . uttarapadalopaḥ atra draṣṭavyaḥ . tat yathā uṣṭramukham iva mukham asya uṣṭramukhaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2189: kharamukhaḥ . evam tatkālakālaḥ tatkālaḥ , tatkālasya iti . atha vā sāhacaryāt tācchabdyam bhaviṣyati . kālasahacaritaḥ varṇaḥ api kālaḥ eva.
GS24pmbhasuu:2191: niyamārtham āhosvit prāpakam . katham ca niyamārtham syāt katham vā
GS24pmbhasuu:2192: prāpakam . yadi atra aṇgrahaṇam anuvartate tataḥ niyamārtham . atha nivṛttam tataḥ prāpakam . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . taparaḥ tatkālasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2193: niyamāṛtham iti cet dīrghagrahaṇe svarabhinnāgrahaṇam . taparaḥ tatkālasya iti niyamāṛtham iti cet dīrghagrahaṇe svarabhinnānām grahaṇam na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2194: . keṣām . udāttānudāttasvaritānām . astu tarhi prāpakam . prāpakam iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:2195: hrasvagrahaṇe dīrghaplutapratiṣedhaḥ . prāpakam iti cet hrasvagrahaṇe dīrghaplutayoḥ tu pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . vipratiṣedhāt siddham . aṇ savarṇān gṛhṇāti iti etat astu taparaḥ tatkālasya iti vā . taparaḥ tatkālasya iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . aṇ savarṇān gṛhṇāti iti asya avakāśaḥ hrasvāḥ ataparāḥ aṇaḥ . taparaḥ tatkālasya iti asya avakāśaḥ dīrghāḥ taparāḥ . hrasveṣu tapareṣu ubhayam prāpnoti . taparaḥ tatkālasya iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . yadi evam drutāyām taparakaraṇe madhyamavilambitayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam kālabhedāt . drutāyām taparakaraṇe madhyamavilambitayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam tathā madhyamāyām drutavilambitayoḥ tathā vilambitāyām drutamadhyamayoḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2196: na sidhyati . kālabhedāt . ye hi drutāyām vṛttau varṇāḥ tribhāgādhikāḥ te madhyamāyām . ye madhyamāyām varṇāḥ tribhāgādhikāḥ te vilambitāyām .
GS24pmbhasuu:2197: siddham tu avasthitāḥ varṇāḥ vaktuḥ cirāciravacanāt vṛttayaḥ viśiṣyante .
GS24pmbhasuu:2198: siddham etat . katham . avasthitāḥ varṇāḥ drutamadhyamavilambitāsu .
GS24pmbhasuu:2199: kiṅkṛtaḥ tu vṛttiviśeṣaḥ . vaktuḥ cirāciravacanāt vṛttayaḥ viśiṣyante .
GS24pmbhasuu:2200: vaktā kaḥ cit āśvabhidhāyī bhavati , āśu varṇān abhidhatte . kaḥ cit cireṇa kaḥ cit ciratareṇa . tat yathā : tam eva adhvānam kaḥ cit āśu
GS24pmbhasuu:2201: gacchati kaḥ cit cireṇa gacchati kaḥ cit ciratareṇa gacchati . rathikaḥ āśu gacchati āśvikaḥ cireṇa padātiḥ ciratareṇa . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2202: adhikaraṇam atra adhvā vrajikriyāyāḥ . tatra ayuktam yat adhikaraṇasya vṛddhihrāsau syātām . evam tarhi sphoṭaḥ śabdaḥ dhvaniḥ śabdaguṇaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2203: katham . bheryāghātavat . tat yathā bheryāghātaḥ bherīm āhatya kaḥ cit viṃśati padāni gacchati kaḥ cit triṃśat kaḥ cit catvāriṃśat . sphoṭaḥ ca tāvān eva bhavati . dhvanikṛtā vṛddhiḥ . dhvaniḥ sphoṭaḥ ca śabdānām dhvaniḥ tu khalu lakṣyate |
GS24pmbhasuu:2204: alpaḥ mahān ca keṣām cit ubhayam tat svabhāvataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2205: (P_1,1.71) KA_I,182.2-13 Ro_I,541-542 ādiḥ antyena saha iti asampratyayaḥ sañjñinaḥ anirdeśāt . ādiḥ antyena saha iti asampratyayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2206: kim kāraṇam . sañjñinaḥ anirdeśāt . na hi sañjñinaḥ nirdiśyante . siddham tu ādiḥ itā saha tanmadhyasya iti vacanāt . siddham etat . katham . ādiḥ antyena saha itā gṛhyamāṇaḥ svasya ca rūpasya grāhakaḥ tanmadhyānām ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2207: vaktavyam . sambandhiśabdaiḥ vā tulyam . sambandhiśabdaiḥ vā tulyam etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:2208: tat yathā sambandhiśabdāḥ : mātari vartitavyam , pitari śuśrūṣitavyam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2209: . na ca ucyate svasyām mātari svasmin pitari iti sambandhāt ca gamyate yā
GS24pmbhasuu:2210: yasya mātā yaḥ ca yasya pitā iti . evam iha api ādiḥ antyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2211: sambandhiśabdau etau . tatra sambandhāt etat gantavyam : yam prati ādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2212: antyaḥ iti ca bhavati tasya grahaṇam bhavati svasya ca rūpasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2213: (P_1,1.72.1) KA_I,182.15-183.2 Ro_I,542-544 iha kasmāt na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2214: ikaḥ yaṇ aci : dadhi atra madhu atra . astu . alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2215: bhavanti iti antyasya bhaviṣyati . na evam śakyam . ye anekālaḥ ādeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2216: teṣu doṣaḥ syāt : ecaḥ ayavāyāvaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yathā eva prakṛtitaḥ tadantavidhiḥ bhavati evam ādeśataḥ api bhaviṣyati . tatra ejantasya ayādyantā ādeśāḥ bhaviṣyanti . yadi ca evam kva cit vairūpyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2217: tatra doṣaḥ syāt . api ca antaraṅgabahiraṅge na prakalpyeyātām . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . syonaḥ , syonā : antaraṅgalakṣaṇasya yaṇādeśasya bahiraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2218: guṇaḥ bādhakaḥ prasajyeta . ūnaśabdam hi āśritya yaṇādeśaḥ naśabdam āśritya guṇaḥ . alvidhiḥ ca na prakalpeta : dyauḥ , panthāḥ , saḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2219: tasmāt prakṛte tadantavidhiḥ iti vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . yena iti karaṇe eṣā tṛtīyā anyena ca anyasya vidhiḥ bhavati . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2220: devadattasya samāśam śarāvaiḥ odanena ca yajñadattaḥ pratividhatte , tathā saṅgrāmam hastyaśvarathapadātibhiḥ . evam iha api acā dhātoḥ yatam
GS24pmbhasuu:2222: (P_1,1.72.2) KA_I,183.3-16 Ro_I,544-546 yena vidhiḥ tadantasya iti cet grahaṇopādhīnām tadantopādhiprasaṅgaḥ . yena vidhiḥ tadantasya iti cet grahaṇopādhīnām tadantopādhitāprasaṅgaḥ . ye grahaṇopādhayaḥ te api tadantopādhayaḥ syuḥ . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . utaḥ ca pratyayāt asaṃyogapūrvāt iti asaṃyogapūrvagrahaṇam ukārāntviśeṣaṇam syāt . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2223: asaṃyogapūrvagrahaṇena iha eva paryudāsaḥ syāt:: akṣṇuhi takṣṇuhi iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2224: iha na syāt : āpnuhi śaknuhi iti . tathā ut oṣthyapūrvasya iti oṣṭhyapūrvagrahaṇam ṝkārāntaviśeṣaṇam syāt . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2225: oṣṭhyapūrvagrahaṇena iha ca prasajyeta : saṅkīrṇam iti . iha ca na syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2226: nipūrtāḥ piṇḍāḥ iti . siddham tu viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoḥ yatheṣṭatvāt . siddham etat . katham . yatheṣṭam viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoḥ yogaḥ bhavati . yāvatā yatheṣṭam iha tāvat : utaḥ ca pratyayāt asaṃyogapūrvāt iti na
GS24pmbhasuu:2227: asaṃyogapūrvagrahaṇena ukārāntam viśeṣyate . kim tarhi . ukāraḥ eva viśeṣyate : ukāraḥ yaḥ asaṃyogapūrvaḥ tadantāt pratyayāt iti . tathā ut oṣthyapūrvasya iti na oṣṭhapūrvagrahaṇena ṝkārāntam viśeṣyate . kim tarhi . ṝkāraḥ eva viśeṣyate : ṝkāraḥ yaḥ oṣṭhyapūrvaḥ tadantasya dhātoḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2228: (P_1,1.72.3) KA_I,183.17-184.25 Ro_I,546-550 samāsapratyayavidhau pratiṣedhaḥ . samāsavidhau pratyayavidhau ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2229: samāsavidhau tāvat : dvitīyā śritādibhiḥ samasyate : kaṣṭaśritaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2230: narakaśritaḥ . kaṣṭam paramaśrita iti atra mā bhūt . pratyayavidhau :
GS24pmbhasuu:2231: naḍasya apatyam nāḍāyanaḥ . iha na bhavati : sūtranaḍasya apatyam sautranāḍiḥ . kim aviśeṣeṇa . na iti āha . ugidvarṇagrahaṇavarjam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2232: ugidgrahaṇam varṇagrahaṇam ca varjayitvā . ugidgrahaṇam : bhavatī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2233: atibhavatī mahatī , atimahatī . varṇagrahaṇam : ataḥ iñ : dākṣiḥ , plākṣiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2234: . asti ca idānīm kaḥ cit kevalaḥ akāraḥ prātipadikam yadarthaḥ vidhiḥ syāt . asti iti āha . atateḥ ḍaḥ : aḥ , tasya apatyam : ataḥ iñ iḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2235: akacśnamvataḥ sarvanāmāvyayadhātuvidhau upasaṅkhyānam . akacvataḥ sarvanāmāvyayavidhau śnamvataḥ dhātuvidhau upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
