GS24pmbhasuu:2808: dvivacanabahuvacanāni vidheyāni : vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣau , vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣāḥ iti . dvandvapratiṣedhaḥ ca . dvandvasya ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣau , vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣāḥ iti . cārthe dvandvaḥ iti dvandvaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . anavakāśaḥ ekaśeṣaḥ dvandvam bādhiṣyate . sāvakāśaḥ ekaśeṣaḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . tiṅantāni avakāśaḥ . yadi punaḥ pṛthak sarveṣām vibhaktyantānām ekaśeṣaḥ ucyeta . kim kṛtam bhavati . kaḥ cit vacanalopaḥ parihṛtaḥ bhavati . vibhaktyantānām ekaśeṣe vibhaktyantānām ekaśeṣe vibhaktyantānām eva tu nivṛttiḥ bhavati . ekavibhaktyantānām iti tu
GS24pmbhasuu:2809: pṛthagvibhaktipratiṣedhārtham . ekavibhaktyantānām iti tu vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . pṛthagvibhaktipratiṣedhārtham . pṛthagvibhaktyantānām mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:2810: : brāhmaṇābhyām ca kṛtam brāhmaṇābhyām ca dehi . na vā arthavipratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2811: yugapadvacanābhāvaḥ . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . arthavipratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2812: . vipratiṣiddhau etau arthau kartā saṃpradānam iti aśakyau yugapat nirdeṣṭum . tayoḥ vipratiṣiddhatvāt yugapadvacanam na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2813: anekārthāśrayaḥ ca punaḥ ekaśeṣaḥ . anekam artham sampratyāyayiṣyāmi iti ekaśeṣaḥ ārabhyate . tasmāt na ekaśabdatvam . tasmāt ekaśabdatvam na
GS24pmbhasuu:2814: bhaviṣyati . ayam tarhi doṣaḥ : kaḥ cit vacanalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2815: dvivacanabahuvacanavidhiḥ dvandvapratiṣedhaḥ ca iti . yadi punaḥ prātipadikānām ekaśeṣaḥ ucyeta . kim kṛtam bhavati . vacanalopaḥ parihṛtaḥ bhavati . prātipadikānām ekaśeṣe mātṛmātroḥ pratiṣedhaḥ sarūpatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:2816: prātipadikānām ekaśeṣe mātṛmātroḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : mātā ca janayitrī mātārau ca dhānyasya mātṛmātāraḥ . kim kāraṇam . sarūpatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:2817: sarūpāṇi hi etāni prātipadikāni . kim ucyate prātipadikānām ekaśeṣe mātṛmātroḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti na punaḥ yasya api vibhaktyantānām ekaśeṣaḥ tena api mātṛmātroḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ syāt . tasya api hi
GS24pmbhasuu:2818: etāni kva cit vibhaktyantāni sarūpāṇi : mātṛbhyām ca mātṛbhyāṃ ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2819: atha matam etat vibhaktyantānām sārūpye bhavitavyam eva ekaśeṣeṇa iti prātipadikānām eva ekaśeṣe doṣaḥ bhavati . evam ca kṛtvā codyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:2822: haritasya strī hariṇī hariṇasya api hariṇī , hariṇī ca hariṇī ca hariṇyau . śyetasya strī śyenī śyenasya api śyenī , śyenī ca śyenī ca śyenyau .
GS24pmbhasuu:2823: rohitasya strī rohiṇī rohiṇasya api rohiṇī , rohiṇī ca rohiṇī ca rohiṇyau . na vā padasya arthe prayogāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . padasya arthe prayogāt . padam arthe prayujyate vibhaktyantam ca padam . rūpam ca iha āśrīyate . rūpanirgrahaḥ ca śabdasya na antareṇa laukikam prayogam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2824: tasmin ca laukike prayoge sarūpāṇi etāni . aparaḥ āha : na vā padasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2825: arthe prayogāt . na vā eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ eva asti prātipadikānām ekaśeṣaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2826: kim kārāṇam . padasya arthe prayogāt . padam arthe prayujyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2827: vibhaktyantam ca padam . rūpam ca iha āśrīyate rūpanirgrahaḥ ca śabdasya na antareṇa laukikam prayogam . tasmin ca laukike prayoge prātipadikānām prayogaḥ na asti . atha anena pakṣeṇa arthaḥ syāt : prātipadikānām ekaśeṣaḥ iti . bāḍham arthaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . etena eva abhihitam sūtreṇa sarūpāṇām ekaśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2828: ekavibhaktau iti . katham . vibhaktiḥ sārūpyeṇa āśrīyate . anaimittikaḥ ekaśeṣaḥ . ekavibhaktau yāni sarūpāṇi teṣām ekaśeṣaḥ bhavati . kva . yatra vā tatra vā iti . atha anena pakṣeṇa arthaḥ syāt : vibhaktyantānām ekaśeṣaḥ iti . bāḍham arthaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . etat api etena eva abhihitam sūtreṇa sarūpāṇām ekaśeṣaḥ ekavibhaktau iti . katham . na idam pāribhāṣikyāḥ vibhakteḥ grahaṇam . kim tarhi . anvarthagrahaṇam : vibhāgaḥ vibhaktiḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2829: ekavibhāge yāni sarūpāṇi teṣām ekaśeṣaḥ bhavati iti . nanu ca uktaṃ : kaḥ cit vacanalopaḥ dvivacanabahuvacanavidhiḥ dvandvapratiṣedhaḥ ca iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat tāvat ucyate kaḥ cit vacanalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2830: dvivacanabahuvacanavidhiḥiti . sahavivakṣāyām ekaśeṣaḥ . yugapadvivakṣāyām ekaśeṣeṇa bhavitavyam . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati : vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣau , vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣāḥ iti . na etat sahavivakṣāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:2831: bhavati . atha api nidarśayitum buddhiḥ evam nidarśayitavyam : vṛkṣau ca vṛkṣau ca vṛkṣau , vṛkṣāḥ ca vṛkṣāḥ ca vṛkṣāḥ ca vṛkṣāḥ iti . yat api ucyate dvandvapratiṣedhaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . anavakāśaḥ ekaśeṣḥ dvandvam bādhiṣyate . nanu ca uktam sāvakāśaḥ ekaśeṣaḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . tiṅantāni avakāśaḥ iti . na tiṅantāni ekaśeṣārambham
GS24pmbhasuu:2832: prayojayanti . kim kāṛaṇam . yathājātīyakānām dvitīyasya padasya prayoge sāmarthyam asti tathājātīyakānām ekaśeṣaḥ . na ca tiṅantānām dvitīyasya padasya prayoge sāmarthyam asti . kim kāraṇam . ekā hi kriyā . ekena uktatvāt tasya arthasya dvitīyasya prayogeṇa na bhavitavyam uktārthānām
GS24pmbhasuu:2833: aprayogaḥ iti . yadi tarhi ekā kriyā dvivacanabahuvacanāni na sidhyanti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2834: pacataḥ pacanti . na etāni kriyāpekṣāṇi . kim tarhi . sādhanāpekṣāṇi .
GS24pmbhasuu:2835: atha vā punaḥ astu ekavibhaktau iti . nanu ca uktam ekavibhaktau iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:2836: na abhāvāt vibhakteḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . parihṛtam etat : arthavat prātipadikam iti prātipadikasañjñā bhaviṣyati iti . nanu ca uktam niyamāt na prāpnoti arthavatsamudāyānām samāsagrahaṇam niyamārtham iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . tulyajātīyasya niyamaḥ . kaḥ ca tulyajātīyaḥ . yathājātīyakānām samāsaḥ . kathañjātīyakānām samāsaḥ . subantānām .
GS24pmbhasuu:2837: (P_1,2.64.4) KA_I,238.18-239.11 Ro_II,133-136 sarvatra apatyādiṣu upasaṅkhyānam . sarveṣu pakṣeṣu apatyādiṣu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2838: bhikṣāṇām samūhaḥ bhaikṣam iti . sarvatra iti ucyate prātipadikāṇām ca ekaśeṣe siddham . apatyādiṣu iti ucyate bahavaḥ ca apatyādayaḥ : gargasya apatyam bahavaḥ gargāḥ . ekā prakṛtiḥ bahavaḥ ca yañaḥ . asārūpyāt ekaśeṣaḥ na prāpnoti . nanu ca yathā eva bahavaḥ yañaḥ evam prakṛtayaḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:2839: bahvyaḥ syuḥ . na evam śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt : gargāḥ , vatsāḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2840: bidāḥ , urvāḥ iti . añ yaḥ bahuṣu yañ yaḥ bahuṣu iti ucyamānaḥ luk na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam . añantam yat bahuṣu yañantam yat bahuṣu iti evam bhaviṣyati . nanu ca uktam : na evam śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2841: kāśyapapratikṛtayaḥ kāśyapāḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . laukikasya tatra gotrasya grahaṇam na ca etat laukikam gotram . atha vā punaḥ astu ekā prakṛtiḥ bahavaḥ ca yañaḥ . nanu ca uktam : asārūpyāt ekaśeṣaḥ na prāpnoti iti . siddham tu samānārthānām ekaśeṣavacanāt . siddham etat . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:2842: samānārthānām ekaśeṣaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . yadi samānārthānām ekaśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2843: ucyate katham akṣāḥ , pādāḥ , māṣāḥ iti . nānārthānām api sarūpāṇām .
GS24pmbhasuu:2844: nānārthānām api sarūpāṇām ekaśeṣḥ vaktavyaḥ . ekārthānām api virūpāṇām .
GS24pmbhasuu:2845: ekārthānām api virūpāṇām ekaśeṣaḥ vaktavyaḥ : vakradaṇḍaḥ ca kuṭiladaṇḍaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2846: ca vakradaṇḍau kuṭiladaṇḍāu iti vā . svarabhinnānām yasya uttarasvaravidhiḥ . svarabhinnānām yasya uttarasvaravidhiḥ tasya ekaśeṣaḥ vaktavyaḥ . akṣaḥ ca akṣaḥ ca akṣau , mīmaṃsakaḥ ca mīmāṃsakaḥ ca mīmaṃsakau .
GS24pmbhasuu:2847: (P_1,2.64.5) KA_I,239.12-240.11 Ro_II,136-139 iha kasmāt na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2848: ekaḥ ca ekaḥ ca , dvau ca dvau ca iti . saṅkhyāyāḥ arthāsampratyayāt anyapadārthatvāt ca anekaśeṣaḥ . saṅkhyāyāḥ arthāsampratyayāt ekaśeṣaḥ na bhaviṣyati . na hi ekau iti anena arthaḥ gamyate . anyapadārthatvāt ca saṅkhyāyāḥ ekaśeṣaḥ na bhaviṣyati . ekaḥ ca ekaḥ ca iti asya dvau iti arthaḥ . dvau ca dvau ca iti asya catvāraḥ iti arthaḥ . na etau staḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2849: parihārau . yat tāvat ucyate saṅkhyāyāḥ arthāsampratyayāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2850: arthāsampratyaye api ekaśeṣaḥ bhavati . tat yathā . gārgyaḥ ca gārgyāyaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2851: ca gārgyau . na ca ucyate vṛddhayuvānau iti bhavati ca ekaśeṣaḥ . yat api ucyate : anyapadārthatvāt ca iti . anyapadārthe api ekaśeṣaḥ bhavati . tat yathā : viṃśatiḥ ca viṃśatiḥ ca viṃśatī iti . tayoḥ catvāriṃśat iti arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2852: . evam tarhi na imau pṛthak parihārau . ekaparihāraḥ ayam : saṅkhyāyāḥ arthāsampratyayāt anyapadārthatvāt ca iti . yatra hi arthāsampratyayaḥ eva vā anyapadārthatā eva vā bhavati tatra ekaśeṣaḥ gārgyau viṃśatī iti yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:2853: . atha vā na ime ekaśeṣaśabdāḥ . yadi tarhi na ime ekaśeṣaśabdāḥ samudāyaśabdāḥ tarhi bhavanti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . ekavacanam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2854: ekārthāḥ hi samudāyāḥ bhavanti . tat yathā yūtham , śatam , vanam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2855: santu tarhi ekaśeṣaśabdāḥ . kiṅkṛtam sārūpyam . anyonyakṛtam sārūpyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2856: santi punaḥ ke cit anye api śabdāḥ yeṣām anyonyakṛtaḥ bhāvaḥ . santi iti āha . tad yathā mātā pitā bhrātā iti . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . sakṛt ete śabdāḥ pravṛttāḥ apāyeṣu api vartante . iha punaḥ ekena api apāye na
GS24pmbhasuu:2857: bhavati catvāraḥ iti . anyat idānīm etat ucyate sakṛt ete śabdāḥ pravṛttāḥ apāyeṣu api vartante iti . yat tu bhavān asmān codayati santi punaḥ ke cit
GS24pmbhasuu:2858: anye api śabdāḥ yeṣām anyonyakṛtḥ bhāvaḥ iti tatra ete asmābhiḥ upanyastāḥ . tatra etat bhavān āha sakṛt ete śabdāḥ pravṛttāḥ apāyeṣu api vartante iti . etat ca vārttam . ekaikaḥ na udyantum bhāram śaknoti yat katham tatra |
GS24pmbhasuu:2859: ekaikaḥ kartā syāt sarve vā syuḥ katham yuktam || kāraṇam udyamanam cet na udyacchati ca antareṇa tat tulyam |
GS24pmbhasuu:2860: tasmāt pṛthak pṛthak te kartāraḥ savyapekṣāḥ tu ||
GS24pmbhasuu:2861: (P_1,2.64.6) KA_I,240.12-15 Ro_II,140 prathamamadhyamottamānām ekaśeṣaḥ sarūpatvāt . prathamamadhyamottamānām ekaśeṣaḥ vaktavyaḥ : pacati ca pacasi ca pacathaḥ , pacasi ca pacāmi ca pacāvaḥ , pacati ca pacasi ca pacāmi ca pacāmaḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . asarūpatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:2863: dvivacanabahuvacanayoḥ ca aprasiddhiḥ . kim kāraṇam . ekārthatvāt . ekaḥ ayam avaśiṣyate . tena anena tadarthena bhavitavyam . kimarthena .
GS24pmbhasuu:2864: yadarthaḥ ekaḥ . kimarthaḥ ca ekaḥ . ekaḥ ekārthaḥ . na aikārthyam . na ayam ekārthaḥ . kim tarhi . dvyarthaḥ bahvarthaḥ ca . na aikārthyam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2865: cet ārambhānarthakyam . na aikārthyam iti cet ekaśeṣārambhaḥ anarthakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2866: syāt . iha hi śabdasya svābhāvikī vā anekārthatā syāt vācanikī vā . tat yadi tāvat svābhāvikī aśiṣyaḥ ekaśeṣaḥ ekena uktatvāt . aśiṣyaḥ ekaśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2867: kim kāraṇam . ekena uktatvāt tasya arthasya dvitīyasya prayogeṇa na bhavitavyam uktārthānām aprayogaḥ iti . atha vācanikī tat vaktavyam : ekaḥ ayam aviśiṣyate saḥ ca dvyarthaḥ bhavati bahvarthaḥ ca iti . na vaktavyam . siddham ekaśeṣaḥ iti eva . katham punaḥ ekaḥ ayam aviśiṣyate iti anena dvyarthatā bahvarthatā vā śakyā labdhum . tat ca ekaśeṣakṛtam . na hi antareṇa tadvācinaḥ śabdasya prayogam tasya arthasya gatiḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2868: paśyāmaḥ ca punaḥ antareṇa api tadvācinaḥ śabdasya prayogam tasya arthasya gatiḥ bhavati iti agnicit somasut iti yathā . te manyāmahe : lopakṛtam etat yena atra antareṇa api tadvācinaḥ śabdasya prayogam tasya arthasya gatiḥ bhavatiti . evam iha api ekaśeṣakṛtam etat yena atra ekaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:2869: avaśiṣyate iti anena dvyarthatā bahvarthatā vā bhavati . ucyeta tarhi na
GS24pmbhasuu:2870: tu gamyeta . yaḥ hi gām aśvaḥ iti brūyāt aśvam vā gauḥ iti na jātu cit sampratyayaḥ syāt . tena anekārthābhidhāne yatnam kurvatā avaśyam lokaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2871: pṛṣṭhataḥ anugantavyaḥ : keṣu artheṣu laukikāḥ kān śabdān prayuñjate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2872: loke ca ekasmin vṛkṣaḥ iti prayuñjate dvayoḥ vṛkṣau iti bahuṣu vṛkṣāḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2873: . yadi tarhi lokaḥ avaśyam śabdeṣu pramāṇam kimartham ekaśeṣaḥ ārabhyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:2874: atha kimartham lopaḥ ārabhyate . pratyayalakṣaṇam ācāryaḥ prārthayamānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2875: lopam ārabhate . ekaśeṣārambhe punaḥ asya na kim cit prayojanam asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2876: nanu ca uktam : pratyartham śabdaniveśāt na ekena anekasya abhidhānam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2877: . yadi ca ekena śabdena anekasya arthasya abhidhānam syāt na pratyartham śabdaniveśaḥ kṛtaḥ syāt . pratyartham śabdaniveśāt ekena anekasya abhidhānāt apratyartham iti cet tat api pratyartham eva . pratyartham śabdaniveśāt ekena anekasyābhidhānāt apratyartham iti cet evam ucyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2878: yat api ekena anekasya abhidhānam bhavati tat api pratyartham eva . yat api hi arthau arthau prati tat api pratyartham eva . yat api hi arthān arthān prati tat api pratyartham eva . yāvatām abhidhānam tāvatām prayogaḥ nyāyyaḥ . yāvatām arthānām abhidhānam bhavati tāvatām śabdānām prayogaḥ iti eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ nyāyyaḥ . yāvatām abhidhānam tāvatām prayogaḥ nyāyyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2879: cet ekena api anekasya abhidhānam . yāvatām abhidhānam tāvatām prayogaḥ nyāyyaḥ iti cet evam ucyate : eṣaḥ api nyāyyaḥ eva yat api ekena api anekasya abhidhānam bhavati . yadi tarhi ekena anekasya abhidhānam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2880: plakṣanyagrodhau : ekena uktatvāt aparasya prayogaḥ anupapannaḥ . ekena uktatvāt tasya arthasya aparasya prayogeṇa na bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2881: uktārthānām aprayogaḥ iti . ekena uktatvāt aparasya prayogaḥ anupapannaḥ iti cet anuktatvāt plakṣeṇa nyagrodhasya nyagrodhaprayogaḥ . ekena uktatvāt aparasya prayogaḥ anupapannaḥ iti cet anuktaḥ plakṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:2882: nyagrodhārthaḥ iti kṛtvā nyagrodhaśabdaḥ prayujyate . katham anuktaḥ yāvatā idānīm eva uktam ekena api anekasya abhidhānam bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2883: sarūpāṇām ekena api anekasya abhidhānam bhavati na virūpāṇām . kim punaḥ kāraṇam sarūpāṇām ekena api anekasya abhidhānam bhavati na punaḥ virūpāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:2884: . abhidhānam punaḥ svābhāvikam . svābhāvikam abhidhānam . ubhayadarśanāt ca . ubhayam khalu api dṛśyate : virūpāṇām api ekena anekasya abhidhānam bhavati . tat yathā : dyavā ha kṣamā . dyavā cit asmai pṛthivī namete iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2885: . virūpāṇām kila nāma ekena anekasya abhidhānam syāt kim punaḥ sarūpāṇām .
GS24pmbhasuu:2887: vibhaktau vājapyāyanaḥ . ākṛtyabhidhānāt vā ekam śabdam vibhaktau vājapyāyanaḥ ācāryaḥ nyāyyam manyate : ekā ākṛtiḥ sā ca abhidhīyate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2888: katham punaḥ jñāyate ekā ākṛtiḥ sā ca abhidhīyate iti . prakhyāviśeṣāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:2889: na hi gauḥ iti ukte viśeṣaḥ prakhyāyate śuklā nīlā kapilā kapotikā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2890: yadi api tāvat prakhyāviśeṣāt jñāyate ekā ākṛtiḥ iti kutaḥ tu etat sā abhidhīyate iti . avyapavargagateḥ ca . avyapavargagateḥ ca manyāmahe
GS24pmbhasuu:2891: ākṛtiḥ abhidhīyate iti . na hi gauḥ iti ukte vyapavargaḥ gamyate śuklā nīlā kapilā kapotikā iti . jñāyate ca ekopadiṣṭam . jñāyate khalu api
GS24pmbhasuu:2892: ekopadiṣṭam . gauḥ asya kadā cit upadiṣṭaḥ bhavati . saḥ tam anyasmin deśe anyasmin kāle anyasyām ca vayovasthāyām dṛṣṭvā jānāti ayam gauḥ iti . kaḥ punaḥ asya viśeṣaḥ prakhyāviśeṣāt iti ataḥ . tasya eva upodbalakam etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:2893: prakhyāviśeṣāt jñāyate ca ekopadiṣṭam iti . dharmaśāstram ca tathā . evam ca kṛtvā dharmaśāstram pravṛttam : brāhmaṇaḥ na hantavyaḥ . surā na peyā
GS24pmbhasuu:2894: iti . brāhmaṇamātram na hanyate surāmātram ca na pīyate . yadi dravyam padārthaḥ syāt ekam brāhmaṇam ahatvā ekām ca surām apītvā anyatra kāmacāraḥ syāt . kaḥ punaḥ asya viśeṣaḥ avyapavargagateḥ ca iti ataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2895: tasya eva upodbalakam etat : avyapavargagateḥ ca dharmaśāstram ca tathā iti . asti ca ekam anekādhikaraṇastham yugapat . asti khalu api ekam anekādhikaraṇastham yugapat upalabhyate . kim . ādityaḥ . tad yathā ekaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2896: ādityaḥ anekādhikaraṇasthaḥ yugapat upalabhyate . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . na ekaḥ draṣṭā ādityam anekādhikaraṇastham yugapat upalabhate . evam tarhi itīndravat viṣayaḥ . tat yathā ekaḥ indraḥ anekasmin kratuśate āhūtaḥ yugapat sarvatra bhavati evam ākṛtiḥ api yugapat sarvatra bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2897: avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam ekam anekādhikaraṇastham yugapat upalabhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2898: iti. na ekam anekādhikaraṇastham yugapat iti cet tathā ekaśeṣe . yaḥ hi manyate na ekam anekādhikaraṇastham yugapad upalabhyate iti ekaśeṣe tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2899: doṣaḥ syāt . ekaśeṣe api na ekaḥ vṛkṣaśabdaḥ anekam artham yugapat abhidadhīta . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam ākṛtiḥ abhidhīyate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2900: dravyābhidhāne hi ākṛtyasampratyayaḥ . dravyābhidhāne sati ākṛteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2901: asampratyayaḥ syāt . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra asarvadravyagatiḥ . tatra asarvadravyagatiḥ prāpnoti . asarvadravyagatau kaḥ doṣaḥ . gauḥ anubandhyaḥ ajaḥ agnīṣomīyaḥ iti : ekaḥ śāstroktam kurvīta aparaḥ aśāstroktam . aśāstrokte ca kriyamāṇe viguṇam karma bhavati . viguṇe ca karmaṇi phalānavāptiḥ . nanu ca yasya api ākṛtiḥ padārthaḥ tasya api yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:2902: anavayavena codyate na ca anubadhyate viguṇam karma bhavati . viguṇe ca karmaṇi phalānavāptiḥ . ekā ākṛtiḥ iti ca pratijñā hīyeta . yat ca asya
GS24pmbhasuu:2903: pakṣasya upādāne prayojanam ekaśeṣaḥ na vaktavyaḥ iti saḥ ca idānīm vaktavyaḥ bhavati . evam tarhi anavayavena codyate pratyekam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2904: parisamāpyate yathā ādityaḥ . nanu ca yasya api dravyam padārthaḥ tasya api anavayavena codyate pratyekam ca parisamāpyate . ekaśeṣaḥ tvayā vaktavyaḥ . tvayā api tarhi dvivacanabahuvacanāni sādhyāni . codanāyām ca ekasya upādhivṛtteḥ . codanāyām ca ekasya upādhivṛtteḥ manyāmahe ākṛtiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2905: abhidhīyate iti . āgneyam aṣṭākapālam nirvapet : ekam nirupya dvitīyas
GS24pmbhasuu:2906: tṛtīyaḥ ca nirupyate . yadi ca dravyam padārthaḥ syāt ekam nirupya dvitīyasya tṛtīyasya ca nirvapaṇam na prakalpeta . kaḥ punaḥ etayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2907: jāticodanayoḥ viśeṣaḥ . ekā nirvṛttena aparā nirvartyena .
GS24pmbhasuu:2909: dravyābhidhānam vyāḍiḥ ācāryaḥ nyāyyam manyate : dravyam abhidhīyate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2910: tathā ca liṅgavacanasiddhiḥ . evam ca kṛtvā liṅgavacanāni siddhāni bhavanti : brāhmaṇī brāhmaṇaḥ , brāhmaṇau brāhmaṇāḥ iti . codanāsu ca tasya ārambhāt . codanāsu ca tasya ārambhāt manyāmahe dravyam abhidhīyate iti . gauḥ anubandhyaḥ ajaḥ agnīṣomīyaḥ iti : ākṛtau coditāyām dravye
GS24pmbhasuu:2912: anekādhikaraṇastham yugapat . na khalu api ekam anekādhikaraṇastham yugapat upalabhyate . na hi ekaḥ devadattaḥ yugapat srughne bhavati mathurāyām ca . vināśe prādurbhāve ca sarvam tathā syāt . kim . vinaśyet ca prāduḥ ṣyāt ca . śvā mṛtaḥ iti śvā nāma loke na pracaret . gauḥ jātaḥ iti sarvam gobhūtam anavakāśam syāt . asti ca vairūpyam . asti khalu api
GS24pmbhasuu:2913: vairūpyam : gauḥ ca gauḥ ca khaṇḍaḥ muṇḍaḥ iti . tathā ca vigrahaḥ . evam ca kṛtvā vigrahaḥ upapannaḥ bhavati : gauḥ ca gauḥ ca iti . vyartheṣu ca muktasaṃśayam . vyartheṣu ca muktasaṃśayam bhavati . ākṛtau api padārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:2914: ekaśeṣaḥ vaktavyaḥ : akṣāḥ , pādāḥ , māṣāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2915: (P_1,2.64.10) KA_I,245.6-247.16 Ro_II,153-159 liṅgavacanasiddhiḥ guṇasya anityatvāt . liṅgavacanāni siddhāni bhavanti . kutaḥ . guṇasya anityatvāt . anityāḥ guṇāḥ apāyinaḥ upāyinaḥ ca . kim ye ete śuklādayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2916: na iti āha . strīpuṃnapuṃsakāni sattvaguṇāḥ ekatvadvitvabahutvāni ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:2917: kadā cit ākṛtiḥ ekatvena yujyate kadā cit dvitvena kadā cit bahutvena kadā cit strītvena kadā cit puṃstvena kadācit napuṃsakatvena . bhavet liṅgaparihāraḥ upapannaḥ vacanaparihāraḥ tu na upapadyate . yadi hi kadā
GS24pmbhasuu:2918: cit ākṛtiḥ ekatvena yujyate kadā cit dvitvena kadā cit bahutvena ekā ākṛtiḥ iti pratijñā hīyeta . yat ca asya pakṣasya upādāne prayojanam uktam ekaśeṣaḥ na vaktavyaḥ iti saḥ ca idānīm vaktavyaḥ bhavati . evam tarhi liṅgavacanasiddhiḥ guṇavivakṣānityatvāt . liṅgavacanāni siddhāni bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:2919: . kutaḥ . guṇavivakṣāyāḥ anityatvāt . anityā guṇavivakṣā . kadā cit ākṛtiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2920: ekatvena vivakṣitā bhavati kadā cit dvitvena kadā cit bahutvena kadā cit strītvena kadā cit puṃstvena kadā cit napuṃsakatvena . bhavet liṅgaparihāraḥ upapannaḥ vacanaparihāraḥ tu na upapadyate . yadi kadā cit
GS24pmbhasuu:2921: ākṛtiḥ ekatvena vivakṣitā bhavati kadā cit dvitvena kadā cit bahutvena ekā ākṛtiḥ iti pratijñā hīyeta . yat ca asya pakṣasya upādāne prayojanam uktam ekaśeṣaḥ na vaktavyaḥ iti saḥ ca idānīm vaktavyaḥ bhavati . liṅgaparihāraḥ ca api na upapadyate . kim kāraṇam . āviṣṭaliṅgā jātiḥ yat liṅgam upādāya pravartate utpattiprabhṛti ā vināśāt tat liṅgam na jahāti . tasmāt na vaiyākaraṇaiḥ śakyam laukikam liṅgam āsthātum . avaśyam kaḥ cit
GS24pmbhasuu:2922: svakṛtāntaḥ āstheyaḥ . kaḥ asau svakṛtāntaḥ . saṃstyānaprasavau liṅgam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2923: saṃstyānaprasavau liṅgam āstheyau . kim idam saṃstyānaprasavau iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2924: saṃstyāne styāyateḥ ḍraṭ : strī . sūteḥ sap prasave pumān . nanu ca loke
GS24pmbhasuu:2925: api styāyateḥ eva strī sūteḥ ca pumān . adhikaraṇasādhanā loke strī :
GS24pmbhasuu:2926: styāyati asyām garbhaḥ iti . kartṛsādhanaḥ ca pumān : sūte pumān iti . iha punaḥ ubhayam bhāvasādhanam : styānam pravṛttiḥ ca . kasya punaḥ styānam
GS24pmbhasuu:2927: strī pravṛttiḥ vā pumān . guṇānām . keṣām . śabdasparśarūparasagandhānām .
GS24pmbhasuu:2928: sarvāḥ ca punaḥ mūrtayaḥ evamātmikāḥ saṃstyānaprasavaguṇāḥ śabdasparśarūparasagandhavatyaḥ . yatra alpīyāṃsaḥ guṇāḥ tatra avarataḥ trayaḥ : śabdaḥ sparśaḥ rūpam iti . rasagandhau na sarvatra . pravṛttiḥ khalu api nityā . na hi iha kaḥ cit api svasmin ātmani muhūrtam api avatiṣṭhate . vardhate yāvat anena vardhitavyam apacayena vā yujyate . tat ca ubhayam sarvatra . yadi ubhayam sarvatra kutaḥ vyavasthā . vivakṣātaḥ.
GS24pmbhasuu:2929: saṃstyānavivakṣāyām strī prasavavivakṣāyām pumān ubhayoḥ api avivakṣāyām napuṃsakam . tatra liṅgavacanasiddhiḥ guṇavivakṣānityatvāt iti liṅgaparihāraḥ upapannaḥ . vacanaparihāraḥ tu na upapadyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:2930: vacanaparihāraḥ ca api upapannaḥ . idam tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ : atha yasya dravyam padārthaḥ katham tasya ekavacanadvivacanabahuvacanāni bhavanti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2931: . evam saḥ vakṣyati : ekasmin ekavacanam dvayoḥ dvivacanam bahuṣu bahuvacanam iti . yadi tasya api vācanikāni na svābhāvikāni aham api evam
GS24pmbhasuu:2932: vakṣyāmi : ekasmin ekavacanam dvayoḥ dvivacanam bahuṣu bahuvacanam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2933: na hi ākṛtipadārthikasya dravyam na padārthaḥ dvavyapadārthikasya vā ākṛtiḥ na padārthaḥ . ubhayoḥ ubhayam padārthaḥ . kasya cit tu kim cit pradhānabhūtam kim cit guṇabhūtam . ākṛtipadārthikasya ākṛtiḥ pradhānabhūtā dravyam guṇabhūtam . dravyapadārthikasya dravyam pradhānabhūtam ākṛtiḥ guṇabhūtā . guṇavacanavat vā . guṇavacanavat vā liṅgavacanāni bhaviṣyanti . tat yathā guṇavacanānām śabdānām āśrayataḥ liṅgavacanāni bhavanti : śuklam vastram , śuklā śāṭī śuklaḥ kambalaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2934: śuklau kambalau śuklāḥ kambalāḥ iti . yat asau dravyam śritaḥ bhavati guṇaḥ tasya yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat guṇasya api bhavati . evam iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:2935: yat asau dravyam śritā ākṛtiḥ tasya yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat ākṛteḥ api bhaviṣyati . adhikaraṇagatiḥ sāhacaryāt . ākṛtau ārambhaṇādīnām sambhavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2936: na asti iti kṛtvā ākṛtisahacarite dravye ārambhaṇādīni bhaviṣyanti . na ca ekam anekādhikaraṇastham yugapat iti ādityavat viṣayaḥ . na khalu api ekam anekādhikaraṇastham yugapat upalabhyate iti ādityavat viṣayaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2937: tat yathā ekaḥ ādityaḥ anekādhikaraṇasthaḥ yugapat upalabhyate . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . na ekaḥ draṣṭā anekādhikaraṇastham ādityam yugapat upalabhate
GS24pmbhasuu:2938: . evam tarhi itīndravat viṣayaḥ . tad yathā ekaḥ indraḥ anekasmin kratuśate āhūtaḥ yugapat sarvatra bhavati evam ākṛtiḥ yugapat sarvatra
GS24pmbhasuu:2939: bhaviṣyati . avināśaḥ anāśritatvāt . dravyavināśe ākṛteḥ avināśaḥ . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2940: . anāśritatvāt . anāśritā ākṛtiḥ dravyam . kim ucyate anāśritatvāt iti yat idānīm eva uktam adhikaraṇagatiḥ sāhacaryāt iti . evam tarhi avināśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2941: anaikātmyāt . dravyavināśe ākṛteḥ avināśaḥ . kutaḥ . anaikātmyāt . anekaḥ ātmā ākṛteḥ dravyasya ca . tat yathā vṛkṣasthaḥ avatānaḥ vṛkṣe chinne api na vinaśyati . vairūpyavigrahau dravyabhedāt . vairūpyavigrahau api dravyabhedāt bhaviṣyataḥ . vyartheṣu ca sāmānyāt siddham . vibhinnārtheṣu ca sāmānyāt siddham sarvam . aśnoteḥ akṣaḥ . padyateḥ pādaḥ . mimīteḥ māṣaḥ . tatra kriyāsāmānyāt siddham . aparaḥ tu āha . purākalpe etat āsīt
GS24pmbhasuu:2942: ṣoḍaśa māṣāḥ kārṣāpaṇam ṣoḍaśaphalāḥca māṣaśambaṭyaḥ . tatra saṃkhyāsāmānyāt siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:2943: (P_1,2.65) KA_I,247.18-20 Ro_II,160 iha kasmāt na bhavati : ajaḥ ca barkaraḥ ca , aśvaḥ ca kiśoraḥ ca , uṣṭraḥ ca karabhaḥ ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2944: tallakṣaṇaḥ cet eva viśeṣaḥ iti ucyate na ca atra tallakṣaṇaḥ eva viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2945: . tallakṣaṇaḥ eva viśeṣaḥ yat samānāyām ākṛtau śabdabhedaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2947: vicāryate : strīgrahaṇe strīpratyayagrahaṇam vā syāt stryarthagrahaṇam vā
GS24pmbhasuu:2948: strīśabdagrahaṇam vā iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi pratyayagrahaṇam vā
GS24pmbhasuu:2949: śabdagrahaṇam vā gārgī ca gārgyāyaṇau ca gargāḥ : kena yaśabdaḥ na śrūyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:2950: . astriyām iti hi luk ucyate . iha ca gārgī ca gārgyāyaṇau ca gargān paśya : tasmāt śasaḥ naḥ puṃsi iti natvam na prāpnoti . atha arthagrahaṇam na
GS24pmbhasuu:2951: doṣaḥ bhavati . yathā na doṣaḥ tathā astu
GS24pmbhasuu:2952: (P_1,2.66.2) KA_I,248.4-6 Ro_II,161 iha kasmāt na bhavati : ajā ca barkaraḥ ca , vaḍavā ca kiśoraḥ ca , uṣṭrī ca karabhaḥ ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2953: tallakṣaṇaḥ cet eva viśeṣaḥ iti ucyate . na ca atra tallakṣaṇaḥ eva viśeṣaḥ . tallakṣaṇaḥ eva viśeṣaḥ yat samānāyām ākṛtau śabdabhedaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2954: (P_1,2.67) KA_I,248.8-10 Ro_II,162 iha kasmāt na bhavati : haṃsaḥ ca varaṭā ca kacchapaḥ ca ḍulī ca , rśyaḥ ca rohit ca iti . tallakṣaṇaḥ cet eva viśeṣaḥ iti ucyate . na ca atra tallakṣaṇaḥ eva viśeṣaḥ . tallakṣaṇaḥ eva viśeṣaḥ yat samānāyām ākṛtau śabdabhedaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2955: (P_1,2.68.1) KA_I,248.12-18 Ro_II,162 kimartham idam ucyate na pumān striyā iti eva siddham . na sidhyati . tallakṣaṇaḥ cet eva viśeṣaḥ iti ucyate . na ca atra tallakṣaṇaḥ eva viśeṣaḥ . tallakṣaṇaḥ eva viśeṣaḥ yat samānāyām ākṛtau śabdabhedaḥ . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat imam yogam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ : yatra ūrdhvam prakṛteḥ tallakṣaṇaḥ eva viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2956: tatra ekaśeṣaḥ bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . haṃsaḥ ca varaṭā ca , kacchapaḥ ca ḍulī ca , rśyaḥ ca rohit ca iti atra ekaśeṣaḥ na bhavati . pūrvayoḥ yogayoḥ bhūyān parihāraḥ . yāvat brūyāt gotram yūnā iti tāvat vṛddhaḥ yūnā iti . pūrvasūtre gotrasya vṛddham iti sañjñā kriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:2957: (P_1,2.68.2) KA_I,248.19-249.20 Ro_II,163-165 asarūpāṇām yuvasthavirastrīpuṃsānām viśeṣasya avivakṣitatvāt sāmānyasya ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2958: vivakṣitatvāt siddham . asarūpāṇām yuvasthavirastrīpuṃsānām viśeṣaḥ ca avivakṣitaḥ sāmānyam ca vivakṣitam . viśeṣasya avivakṣitatvāt sāmānyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2959: ca vivakṣitatvāt sarūpāṇām ekaśeṣaḥ ekavibhaktau iti eva siddham . pumān striyā iha kasmāt na bhavati : brāhmaṇavatsā ca brāhmaṇīvatsaḥ ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2961: . brāhmaṇavatsābrāhmaṇīvatsayoḥ liṅgasya vibhaktiparasya viśeṣavācakatvāt ekaśeṣaḥ na bhaviṣyati . yatra liṅgam vibhaktiparam eva viśeṣavācakam tatra ekaśeṣaḥ bhavati . na atra liṅgam vibhaktiparam eva viśeṣavācakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2962: yadi tarhi yatra liṅgam vibhaktiparam eva viśeṣavācakam tatra ekaśeṣaḥ bhavati iha na prāpnoti : kārakaḥ ca kārikā ca kārakau . na hi atra liṅgam vibhaktiparam eva viśeṣavācakam . katham punaḥ idam vijñāyate : śabdaḥ yā strī tallakṣaṇaḥ cet eva viśeṣaḥ iti āhosvit arthaḥ yā strī tallakṣaṇaḥ cet eva viśeṣaḥ iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate śabdaḥ yā strī tallakṣaṇaḥ cet eva viśeṣaḥ iti siddham kārakaḥ ca kārikā ca kārakau .
GS24pmbhasuu:2963: idam tu na sidhyati : gomān ca gomatī ca gomantau . atha vijñāyate arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2964: yā strī tallakṣaṇaḥ cet eva viśeṣaḥ iti siddham gomān ca gomatī ca gomantau . idam tu na sidhyati : kārakaḥ ca kārikā ca kārakau . ubhayathā api paṭuḥ ca paṭvī ca paṭū* iti etat na sidhyati . evam tarhi na evam vijñāyate śabdaḥ yā strī tallakṣaṇaḥ cet eva viśeṣaḥ iti na api arthaḥ yā strī tallakṣaṇaḥ cet eva viśeṣaḥ iti . katham tarhi . śabdārthau yā strī
GS24pmbhasuu:2965: tatsadbhāvena ca tallakṣaṇaḥ viśeṣaḥ āśrīyate . evam ca kṛtvā iha api prāptiḥ : brāhmaṇavatsā ca brāhmaṇīvatsaḥ ca iti . evam tarhi idam iha vyapadeśyam sat ācāryaḥ na vyapadiśati . kim . tat iti anuvartate . tat iti anena prakṛtau strīpuṃsau pratinirdiśyete . kau ca prakṛtau . pradhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:2966: . pradhānam yā śabdastrī pradhānam yā arthastrī iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2967: (P_1,2.69) KA_I,249.22-250.10 Ro_II,166-167 ayam yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum
GS24pmbhasuu:2968: . katham śuklaḥ ca kambalaḥ śuklam ca vastram tat idam śuklam , te* ime śukle , śuklaḥ ca kambalaḥ śuklā ca bṛhatikā śuklam ca vastram tat idam śuklam , tāni imani śuklāni . pradhāne kāryasampratyayāt śeṣaḥ . pradhāne kāryasampratyayāt śeṣaḥ bhaviṣyati . kim ca pradhānam . napuṃsakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2969: katham punaḥ jñāyate napuṃsakam pradhānam iti . evam hi dṛśyate loke :
GS24pmbhasuu:2970: anirjñāte arthe guṇasandehe ca napuṃsakaliṅgam prayujyate . kim jātam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2971: ucyate . dvayam ca eva hi jāyate strī vā pumān vā . tathā vidūre avyaktam
GS24pmbhasuu:2972: ārūpam dṛṣṭvā vaktāraḥ bhavanti mahiṣīrūpam iva brāhmaṇīrūpam iva .
GS24pmbhasuu:2973: pradhāne kāryasampratyayāt napuṃsakasya śeṣaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam : ekavat ca asya anyatarasyām iti vakṣyāmi iti . etat api na
GS24pmbhasuu:2974: asti prayojanam . ākṛtivācitvāt ekavacanam . ākṛtivācitvāt ekavacanam bhaviṣyati . yadā dravyābhidhānam tadā dvivacanabahuvacane bhaviṣyataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2976: na pumān striyā iti eva siddham . bhrātṛputrapitṛśvaśurāṇām kāraṇāt dravye
GS24pmbhasuu:2977: śabdaniveśaḥ . bhrātṛputrapitṛśvaśurāṇām kāraṇāt dravye śabdaniveśaḥ bhavati . bhrātṛputrapitṛśvaśurāṇām kāraṇād dravye śabdaniveśaḥ iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:2978: tulyakāraṇatvāt siddham . yadi tāvat bibharti iti bhrātā svasari api etat bhavati . tathā yadi punāti prīṇāti iti vā putraḥ duhitari api etat bhavati . tathā yadi pāti pālayati iti vā pitā mātari api etat bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2979: tathā yadi āśu āptavyaḥ śvaśuraḥ śvaśrvām api etat bhavati . darśanam vai hetuḥ . na hi svasari bhrātṛśabdaḥ dṛśyate . darśanam hetuḥ iti cet tulyam . darśanam hetuḥ iti cet tulyam etat bhavati . svasari api bhrātṛśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2980: dṛśyatām . tulyam hi kāraṇam . na vai eṣaḥ loke sampratyayaḥ . na hi loke
GS24pmbhasuu:2981: bhrātā ānīyatām iti ukte svasā ānīyate . tadviṣayam ca . tadviṣayam ca etat draṣṭavyam bhavati : svasari bhrātṛtvam . kiṃviṣayam . ekaśeṣaviṣayam
GS24pmbhasuu:2982: . yuktam punaḥ yat niyataviṣayāḥ śabdāḥ syuḥ . bāḍham yuktam . anyatra api tadviṣayadarśanāt . anyatra api tadviṣayāḥ śabdāḥ dṛśyante . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2983: samāne rakte varṇe gauḥ lohitaḥ iti bhavati aśvaḥ śoṇaḥ iti . samāne ca kāle varṇe gauḥ kṛṣṇaḥ iti bhavati aśvaḥ hemaḥ iti . samāne ca śukle varṇe gauḥ śvetaḥ iti bhavati aśvaḥ karkaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2984: (P_1,2.72.1) KA_I,251.9-14 Ro_II,169-170 tyadāditaḥ śeṣe punnapuṃsakataḥ liṅgavacanāni . tyadāditaḥ śeṣe punnapuṃsakataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2985: liṅgavacanāni bhavanti . sā ca devadattaḥ ca tau sā ca kuṇḍe ca tāni .
GS24pmbhasuu:2987: . iha mā bhūt . saḥ ca kukkuṭaḥ sā ca mayūrī kukkuṭamayūryau te . ardham pippalyāḥ tat ardhapippalī ca sā ardhapippalyau te .
GS24pmbhasuu:2988: (P_1,2.72.2) KA_I,251.15-252.11 Ro_II,170-171 ayam api yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham . tyadādīnām sāmānyārthatvāt . tyadādīnām sāmānyam arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2989: . ātaḥ ca sāmānyam . devadatte api hi saḥ iti etat bhavati yajñadatte api
GS24pmbhasuu:2990: . tyadādīnām sāmānyārthatvāt śeṣaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2991: parasya śeṣam vakṣyāmi iti . parasya ca ubhayavācitvāt . ubhayavāci param . pūrvaśeṣadarśanāt ca . pūrvasya khalu api śeṣaḥ dṛśyate : saḥ ca yaḥ ca tau ānaya , yau ānaya iti . idam tarhi prayojanam :dvandvaḥ mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2992: etat api na asti prayojanam . sāmānyaviśeṣavācinoḥ ca dvandvābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2993: siddham . sāmānyaviśeṣavācinoḥ ca dvandvaḥ na bhavati iti vaktavyam . yadi sāmānyaviśeṣavācinoḥ dvandvaḥ na bhavati iti ucyate śūdrābhīram ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2994: gobalīvardam , tṛṇolapam iti na sidhyati . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . iha tāvat śūdrābhīram iti : ābhīrāḥ jātyantarāṇi . gobalīvardam iti : gāvaḥ utkālitapuṃskāḥ vāhāya ca vikrayāya ca . striyaḥ eva avaśiṣyante .
GS24pmbhasuu:2995: tṛṇolapam iti : apām ulapam iti nāmadheyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . sāmānyena uktatvāt viśeṣasya prayogaḥ na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2996: sāmānyena uktatvāt tasya arthasya viśeṣasya prayogeṇa na bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . uktārthānām aprayogaḥ iti . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati : tam brāhmaṇam ānaya gārgyam iti . bhavati yadā niyogataḥ tasya eva ānayanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2997: bhavati . evam tarhi yena eva khalu api hetunā etat vākyam bhavati tam brāhmaṇam ānaya gārgyam iti tena eva hetunā vṛttiḥ api prāpnoti . tasmāt sāmānyaviśeṣavācinoḥ dvandvaḥ na bhavati iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2998: (P_1,2.73) KA_I,252.13-23 Ro_II,172 ayam api yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum .
GS24pmbhasuu:2999: katham gāvaḥ imāḥ caranti , ajāḥ imāḥ caranti . gāvaḥ utkālitapuṃskāḥ vāhāya ca vikrayāya ca . striyaḥ eva avaśiṣyante . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3000: grāmyeṣu iti vakṣyāmi iti . iha mā bhūt : nyaṅkavaḥ ime , śūkarāḥ ime iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3001: . kaḥ punaḥ arhati agrāmyāṇām puṃsaḥ utkālayitum ye grahītum aśakyāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3002: kutaḥ eva vāhāya ca vikrayāya ca . idam tarhi prayojanam : paśuṣu iti vakṣyāmi iti . iha mā bhūt : brāhmaṇāḥ ime , vṛṣalāḥ ime . kaḥ punaḥ arhati apaśūnām puṃsaḥ utkālayitum ye aśakyāḥ vāhāya ca vikrayāya ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:3003: idam tarhi prayojanam : saṅgheṣu iti vakṣyāmi iti . iha mā bhūt : etau gāvaḥ carataḥ . kaḥ punaḥ arhati nirjñāte arthe anyathā prayoktum . idam tarhi prayojanam : ataruṇeṣu iti vakṣyāmi iti . iha mā bhūt : uraṇakāḥ ime , barkarāḥ ime iti . kaḥ punaḥ arhati taruṇānām puṃsaḥ utkālayitum ye aśakyāḥ vāhāya ca vikrayāya ca . anekaśapheṣu iti vaktavyam iha mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:3005: (P_1,3.1.1) KA_I,253.2-254.12 Ro_II,173-178 kutaḥ ayam vakāraḥ . yadi tāvat saṃhitayā nirdeśaḥ kriyate bhvādayaḥ iti bhavitavyam . atha asaṃhitayā bhū-ādayaḥ iti bhavitavyam . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati : bhūvādīnām vakāraḥ ayam maṅgalārthaḥ prayujyate . māṅgalikaḥ ācāryaḥ mahataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3006: śāstraughasya maṅgalārtham vakāram āgamam prayuṅkte . maṅgalādīni maṅgalamadhyāni maṅgalāntāni hi śāstrāṇi prathante vīrapuruṣāṇi ca bhavanti āyuṣmatpuruṣāṇi ca . adhyetāraḥ ca siddhārthāḥ yathā syuḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3007: atha ādigrahaṇam kimartham . yadi tāvat paṭhyante na arthaḥ ādigrahaṇena .
GS24pmbhasuu:3008: anyatra api hi ayam paṭhan ādigrahaṇam na karoti . kva anyatra .
GS24pmbhasuu:3009: mṛḍamṛdagudhakuṣakliśavadavasaḥ ktvā iti . atha na paṭhyante natarām arthaḥ ādigrahaṇena . na hi apaṭhitāḥ śakyāḥ ādigrahaṇena viśeṣayitum .
GS24pmbhasuu:3010: evam tarhi siddhe sati yat ādigrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ asti ca pāṭhaḥ bāhyaḥ ca sūtrāt iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . pāṭhena dhātusañjñā iti etat upapannam bhavati . pāṭhena dhātusañjñāyām samānaśabdapratiṣedhaḥ . pāṭhena dhātusañjñāyām samānaśabdānām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . yā iti dhātuḥ yā iti ābantaḥ . vā iti dhātuḥ vā iti nipātaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3011: nu iti dhātuḥ nu iti pratyayaḥ ca nipātaḥ ca . div iti dhātuḥ div iti prātipadikam . kim ca syāt yadi eteṣām api dhātusañjñā syāt . dhātoḥ iti tavyādīnām utpattiḥ prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . sādhane tavyādayaḥ vidhīyante sādhanam ca kriyāyāḥ . kriyābhāvāt sādhanābhāvaḥ sādhanābhāvāt satyām api dhātusañjñāyām tavyādayaḥ na bhaviṣyanti . iha tarhi : yāḥ paśya : ātaḥ dhātoḥ iti lopaḥ prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3012: anāpaḥ iti evam saḥ . asya tarhi vāśabdasya nipātasya adhātuḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3013: prātipadikasañjñāyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ prasajyeta . aprātipadikatvāt svādyutpattiḥ na syāt . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . nipātasya anarthakasya prātipadikatvam coditam . tatra anarthakagrahaṇam na kariṣyate : nipātaḥ prātipadikam iti eva . iha tarhi : trasnū iti : aci śnudhātubhruvām yvoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3014: iyaṅuvaṅau iti uvaṅādeśaḥ prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na pratyayasya uvaṅādeśaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam tatra śnugrahaṇam karoti . asya tarhi divśabdasya adhātuḥ iti prātipadikasañjñāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3015: pratiṣedhaḥ prasajyeta . aprātipadikatvāt svādyutpattiḥ na syāt . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati utpadyante divśabdāt svādayaḥ iti yat ayam divaḥ sau auttvam śāsti . na etat asti jñāpakam . asti hi anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:3016: etasya vacane prayojanam . kim . divśabdaḥ yat prātipadikam tadartham etat syāt : akṣadyūḥ iti . na vai atra iṣyate . aniṣṭam ca prāpnoti iṣṭam ca na
GS24pmbhasuu:3017: sidhyati . evam tarhi ananubandhakagrahaṇe na sānubandhakasya iti evam etasya na bhaviṣyati . evam api ananubandhakaḥ divśabdaḥ na asti iti kṛtvā sānubandhakasya grahaṇam vijñāsyate . parimāṇagrahaṇam ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:3018: parimāṇagrahaṇam ca kartavyam . iyān avadhiḥ dhātusañjñaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam kutaḥ hi etat bhūśabdaḥ dhātusañjñaḥ bhaviṣyati na punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3021: dhātuḥ iti etat lakṣaṇam kriyeta . kā punaḥ kriyā . īhā . kā punaḥ īhā .
GS24pmbhasuu:3022: ceṣṭā . kā punaḥ ceṣṭā . vyāpāraḥ . sarvathā bhavān śabdena eva śabdān ācaṣṭe . na kim cid arthajātam nidarśayati : evañjātīyikā kriyā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3023: kriyā nāma iyam atyantāparidṛṣṭā . aśakyā kriyā piṇḍībhūtā nidarśayitum yathā garbhaḥ nirluṭhitaḥ . sā asau anumānagamyā . kaḥ asau anumānaḥ . iha sarveṣu sādhaneṣu sannihiteṣu kadā cit pacati iti etat bhavati kadācit na
GS24pmbhasuu:3024: bhavati . yasmin sādhane sannihite pacati iti etat bhavati sā nūnam kriyā
GS24pmbhasuu:3025: . atha vā yayā devadattaḥ iha bhūtvā pāṭaliputre bhavati sā nūnam kriyā .
GS24pmbhasuu:3026: katham punaḥ jñāyate kriyāvacanāḥ pacādayaḥ iti . yat eṣām karotinā
GS24pmbhasuu:3027: sāmānādhikaraṇyam : kim karoti . pacati . kim kariṣyati . pakṣyati . kim akārṣīt . apākṣīt iti . tatra kriyāvacane upasargapratyayapratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3028: kriyāvacane dhātau upasargapratyayayoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . pacati prapacati . kim punaḥ kāraṇam prāpnoti . saṅghātena arthagateḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3029: saṅghātena hi arthaḥ gamyate saprakṛtikena sapratyayakena sopasargeṇa ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:3030: astibhavatividyatīnām dhātutvam . astibhavatividyatīnām dhātusañjñā vaktavyā . yathā hi bhavatā karotinā pacādīnām sāmānādhikaraṇyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3031: nidarśitam na tathā astyādīnām nidarśyate . na hi bhavati kim karoti asti
GS24pmbhasuu:3032: iti . pratyayārthasya avyatirekāt prakṛtyantareṣu . pratyayārthasya avyatirekāt prakṛtyantareṣu manyāmahe dhātuḥ eva kriyām āha iti . pacati paṭhati : prakṛtyarthaḥ anyaḥ ca anyaḥ ca . pratyayārthaḥ saḥ eva . dhātoḥ ca arthābhedāt pratyayāntareṣu . dhātoḥ ca arthābhedāt pratyayāntareṣu manyāmahe dhātuḥ eva kriyām āha iti . paktā pacanam pākaḥ iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:3033: pratyayārthaḥ anyaḥ ca anyaḥ ca bhavati . prakṛtyarthaḥ saḥ eva. katham punaḥ jñāyate ayam prakṛtyarthaḥ ayam pratyayārthaḥ iti . siddham tu anvayavyatirekābhyām . anvayāt vyatirekāt ca . kaḥ asau anvayaḥ vyatirekaḥ vā . iha pacati iti ukte kaḥ cit śabdaḥ śrūyate : pacśabdaḥ cakārāntaḥ atiśabdaḥ ca pratyayaḥ . arthaḥ api kaḥ cit gamyate : viklittiḥ kartṛtvam ekatvam ca . paṭhati iti ukte kaḥ cit śabdaḥ hīyate kaḥ cit upajāyate kaḥ cit anvayī : pacśabdaḥ hīyate paṭhśabdaḥ upajāyate atiśabdaḥ anvayī .
GS24pmbhasuu:3034: arthaḥ api kaḥ cit hīyate kaḥ cit upajāyate kaḥ cit anvayī : viklittiḥ hīyate paṭhikriyā upajāyate kartṛtvam ca ekatvam ca anvayī . te manyāmahe : yaḥ śabdaḥ hīyate tasya asau arthaḥ yaḥ arthaḥ hīyate . yaḥ śabdaḥ upajāyate tasya asau arthaḥ yaḥ arthaḥ upajāyate . yaḥ śabdaḥ anvayī tasya asau arthaḥ yaḥ arthaḥ anvayī . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . bahavaḥ hi śabdāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3035: ekārthāḥ bhavanti . tat yathā : indraḥ śakraḥ puruhūtaḥ purandaraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3036: kanduḥ koṣṭhaḥ kuśūlaḥ iti . ekaḥ ca śabdaḥ bahvarthaḥ . tat yathā : akṣāḥ pādāḥ māṣāḥ iti . ataḥ kim na sādhīyaḥ arthavattā siddhā bhavati . na api brūmaḥ arthavattā na sidhyati iti .varṇitā arthavattā anvayavyatirekābhyām eva . tatra kutaḥ etat : ayam prakṛtyarthaḥ ayam pratyayārthaḥ iti na
GS24pmbhasuu:3037: punaḥ prakṛtiḥ eva ubhau arthau brūyāt pratyayaḥ eva vā . sāmānyaśabdāḥ ete evam syuḥ . sāmānyaśabdāḥ ca na antareṇa prakaraṇam viśeṣam vā viśeṣeṣu avatiṣṭhante . yataḥ tu khalu niyogataḥ pacati iti ukte svabhāvataḥ kasmin cit viśeṣe pacatiśabdaḥ vartate ataḥ manyāmahe na ime sāmānyaśabdāḥ iti . na cet sāmānyaśabdāḥ prakṛtiḥ prakṛtyarthe vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:3038: pratyayaḥ pratyayārthe . kriyāviśeṣakaḥ upasargaḥ . pacati iti kriyā
GS24pmbhasuu:3039: gamyate . tām praḥ viśinaṣṭi . yadi api tāvat atra etat śakyate vaktum yatra dhātuḥ upasargam vyabhicarati yatra na khalu tam vyabhicarati tatra katham : adhyeti , adhīte iti . yadi api atra dhātuḥ upasargam na
GS24pmbhasuu:3040: vyabhicarati upasargaḥ tu dhātum vyabhicarati . te manyāmahe : yaḥ eva asya adheḥ anyatra arthaḥ sa iha api iti . kaḥ punaḥ anyatra adheḥ arthaḥ . adhiḥ uparibhāve vartate . iha tarhi vyaktam arthāntaram gamyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:3041: tiṣṭhati pratiṣṭhate iti . tiṣṭhati iti vrajikriyāyāḥ nivṛttiḥ pratiṣṭhate iti vrajikriyā gamyate . te manyāmahe upasargakṛtam etat yena atra
GS24pmbhasuu:3042: vrajikriyā gamyate . praḥ ayam dṛṣṭāpacāraḥ ādikarmaṇi vartate . na ca idam na asti bahvarthāḥ api dhātavaḥ bhavanti iti . tat yathā : vapiḥ prakiraṇe ḍṛṣṭaḥ chedane api vartate : keśaśmaśru vapati iti . īḍiḥ stuticodanāyācñāsu dṛṣṭaḥ preraṇe api vartate : agniḥ vai itaḥ vṛṣṭim īṭṭe marutaḥ amutaḥ cyāvayanti iti . karotiḥ abhūtaprādurbhāve dṛṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3043: nirmalīkaraṇe api vartate : pṛṣṭham kuru pācau , kuru . unmṛdāna iti gamyate . nikṣepaṇe ca api vartate : kaṭe kuru , ghaṭe kuru , aśmānam itaḥ kuru . sthāpaya iti gamyate . evam iha api tiṣṭhatiḥ eva vrajikriyām āha tiṣṭhatiḥ eva vrajikriyāyāḥ nivṛttim . ayam tarhi doṣaḥ astibhavatividyatīnām dhātutvam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3045: dhātuḥ iti evam lakṣaṇam kriyeta . katham punaḥ jñāyate bhāvavacanāḥ pacādayaḥ iti . yat eṣām bhavatinā sāmānādhikaraṇyam : bhavati pacati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3046: bhavati pakṣyati , bhavati apākṣīt iti . kaḥ punaḥ bhāvaḥ . bhavateḥ svapadārthaḥ bhavanam bhāvaḥ iti . yadi bhavateḥ svapadārthaḥ bhavanam bhāvaḥ vipratiṣiddhānām dhātusañjñā na prāpnoti : bhedaḥ , chedaḥ . anyaḥ hi bhāvaḥ anyaḥ hi abhāvaḥ . ātaḥ ca anyaḥ bhāvaḥ anyaḥ abhāvaḥ iti . yaḥ hi yasya bhāvam icchati saḥ na tasya abhāvam yasya ca abhāvam na tasya bhāvam . pacādīnām ca dhātusañjñā na prāpnoti . yathā hi bhavatā
GS24pmbhasuu:3047: kriyāvacane dhātau karotinā pacādīnām sāmānādhikaraṇyam nidarśitam na tathā bhāvavacane dhātau nidarśyate . karotiḥ pacācīnām sarvān kālān sarvān puruṣān sarvāṇi ca vacanāni anuvartate . bhavatiḥ punaḥ vartamānakālam ca eva ekatvam ca . kā tarhi iyam vācoyuktiḥ : bhavati pacati , bhavati pakṣyati , bhavati apākṣīt iti . eṣā eṣā vācoyuktiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3048: pacādayaḥ kriyāḥ bhavatikriyāyāḥ kartryaḥ bhavanti iti . yadi api tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:3049: atra etat śakyate vaktum yatra anyā ca anyā ca kriyā yatra khalu sā eva kriyā tatra katham : bhavet api bhavet , syāt api syāt iti . atra api anyatvam asti . kutaḥ . kālabhedāt sādhanabhedāt ca . ekasya atra bhavateḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3050: bhavatiḥ sādhanam sarvakālaḥ ca pratyayaḥ . aparasya bāhyam sādhanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3051: vartamānakālaḥ ca pratyayaḥ . yāvatā atra api anyatvam asti pacādayaḥ ca kriyāḥ bhavatikriyāyāḥ kartryaḥ bhavanti iti astu ayam kartṛsādhanaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3052: bhavati iti bhāvaḥ iti . kim kṛtam bhavati . vipratiṣiddhānām dhātusañjñā siddhā bhavati . bhavet vipratiṣiddhānām dhātusañjñā siddhā syāt prātipadikānām api prāpnoti : vṛkṣaḥ , plakṣaḥ iti . kim kāraṇam . etāni api hi bhavanti . evam tarhi karmasādhanaḥ bhaviṣyati : bhāvyate yaḥ saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3053: bhāvaḥ iti . kriyā ca eva hi bhāvyate svabhāvasiddham tu dravyam . evam api bhavet keṣām cit na syāt yāni na bhāvyante . ye tu ete sambandhiśabdāḥ teṣām prāpnoti : mātā pitā bhrātā iti . sarvathā vayam prātipadikaparyudāsāt na mucyāmahe . paṭhiṣyati hi ācāryaḥ : bhūvādipāṭhaḥ prātipadikāṇapayatyādinivṛttyarthaḥ iti . yāvatā paṭhiṣyati pacādayaḥ ca kriyāḥ bhavatikriyāyāḥ kartryaḥ bhavanti iti astu ayam kartṛsādhanaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3054: bhavati iti bhāvaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . etena eva abhihitam sūtreṇa bhūvādayaḥ dhātavaḥ iti . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:3055: na idam ādigrahaṇam . vadeḥ ayam auṇādikaḥ iñ kartṛsādhanaḥ : bhuvam vadanti iti bhūvādayaḥ iti . bhāvavacane tadarthapratyayapratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3056: bhāvavacane dhātau tadarthasya pratyayasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : śiśye iti . kim ca syāt . aśiti iti āttvam prasajyeta . tat hi dhātoḥ vihitam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3057: itaretarāśrayam ca pratyaye bhāvavacanatvam tasmāt ca pratyayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3058: itaretarāśrayam ca bhavati . kā itaretarāśrayatā . pratyaye bhāvavacanatvam tasmāt ca pratyayaḥ . utpanne hi pratyaye bhāvavacanatvam gamyate saḥ ca tāvat bhāvavacanāt utpannaḥ . tat etat itaretarāśrayam
GS24pmbhasuu:3059: bhavati . itaretarāśrayāṇi ca na prakalpante . siddham tu nityaśabdatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3060: anāśritya bhāvavacanatvam pratyayaḥ . siddham etat . katham . nityāḥ śabdāḥ . nityeṣu ca śabdeṣu anāśritya bhāvavacanatvam pratyayaḥ utpadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3062: prathamam yaḥ bhāvam āha iti . kutaḥ punaḥ prāthamyam . kim śabdataḥ āhosvit arthataḥ . kim ca ataḥ . yadi śabdataḥ sanādīnām dhātusañjñā na prāpnoti : putrīyati vastrīyati iti . atha arthataḥ siddhā sanādīnām dhātusañjñā saḥ eva tu doṣaḥ bhavati : bhāvavacane tadarthapratyayapratiṣedhaḥ iti . evam tarhi na eva arthataḥ na eva śabdataḥ . kim tarhi . abhidhānataḥ . sumadhyame abhidhāne yaḥ prathamam bhāvam āha.
GS24pmbhasuu:3063: (P_1,3.1.4) KA_I,258.7-21 Ro_II,193-196 iha ye eva bhāvavacane dhātau doṣāḥ te eva kriyāvacane api . tatra te eva parihārāḥ . tatra idam aparihṛtam : astibhavatividyatīnām dhātutvam iti . tasya parihāraḥ . kām punaḥ kriyām bhavān matvā āha astibhavatividyatīnām dhātusañjñā na
GS24pmbhasuu:3064: prāpnoti iti . kim yat tat devadattaḥ kaṃsapātryām pāṇinā odanam bhuṅkte iti . na brūmaḥ kārakāṇi kriyā iti . kim tarhi . kārakāṇām pravṛttiviśeṣaḥ kriyā . anyathā ca kārakāṇi śuṣkaudane pravartante anyathā ca māṃsaudane .
GS24pmbhasuu:3065: yadi evam siddhā astibhavatividyatīnām dhātusañjñā . anyathā hi kārakāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:3066: astau pravartante anyathā hi mriyatau . ṣaṭ bhāvavikārāḥ iti ha sma āha
GS24pmbhasuu:3067: bhagavān vārṣyāyaṇiḥ : jāyate asti vipariṇamate vardhate apakṣīyate vinaśyati iti . sarvathā sthitaḥ iti atra dhātusañjñā na prāpnoti . bāhyaḥ hi ebhyaḥ tiṣṭhatiḥ . evam tarhi kriyāyāḥ kriyā nivartikā bhavati dravyam dravyasya nivartakam . evam hi kaḥ cit kam cit pṛcchati . kimavasthaḥ devadattasya vyādhiḥ iti . saḥ āha : vardhate iti . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:3068: apakṣīyate iti . aparaḥ āha : sthitaḥ iti . sthitaḥ iti ukte vardhateḥ ca apakṣīyateḥ ca nivṛttiḥ bhavati . atha vā na antareṇa kriyām bhūtabhaviṣyadvartamānāḥ kālāḥ vyajyante . astyādibhiḥ ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:3069: bhūtabhaviṣyadvartamānāḥ kālāḥ vyajyante . atha vā na anyat prṣṭena anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:3070: ākhyeyam . tena na bhaviṣyati kim karoti asti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3072: kriyāvacanaḥ dhātuḥ iti eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ atha api bhāvavacanaḥ dhātuḥ kim gatam etat iyatā sūtreṇa āhosvit anyatarasmin pakṣe bhūyaḥ sūtram kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3073: gatam iti āha . katham . ayam ādiśabdaḥ asti eva vyavasthāyām vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3074: tat yathā : devadattādīn samupaviṣṭān āha : devadattādayaḥ ānīyantām iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3075: te utthāpya ānīyante . asti prakāre vartate . tat yathā : devadattādayaḥ āḍhyāḥ abhirūpāḥ darśanīyāḥ pakṣavantaḥ . devadattaprakārāḥ iti gamyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3076: pratyekam ca ādiśabdaḥ parisamāpyate . bhvādayaḥ iti ca vādayaḥ iti ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:3077: tat yadā tāvat kriyāvacanaḥ dhātuḥ iti eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ tadā bhū iti atra yaḥ ādiśabdaḥ saḥ vyavasthāyām vartate vā iti atra yaḥ ādiśabdaḥ saḥ prakāre .
GS24pmbhasuu:3078: bhū iti evamādayaḥ vā iti evamprakārāḥ iti . yadā tu bhāvavacanaḥ dhātuḥ iti eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ tadā vā iti atra yaḥ ādiśabdaḥ saḥ vyavasthāyām bhū iti atra yaḥ ādiśabdaḥ saḥ prakāre . vā iti evamādayaḥ bhū iti evamprakārāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3079: iti . yadi tarhi lakṣaṇam kriyate na idānīm pāṭhaḥ kartavyaḥ . kartavyaḥ ca . kim prayojanam . bhūvādipāṭhaḥ prātipadikāṇapayatyādinivṛttyarthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3081: prātipadikāṇapayatyādinivṛttyarthaḥ . prātipadikanivṛttyarthaḥ āṇapayatyādinivṛttyarthaḥ ca . ke punaḥ āṇapayatyādayaḥ . āṇapayati vaṭṭati vaḍḍhati iti . svarānubandhajñāpanāya ca . svarānubandhajñāpanāya ca pāṭhaḥ kartavyaḥ : svarān anubandhān ca jñāsyāmi iti . na hi antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:3082: pātham svarāḥ anubandhāḥ vā śakyāḥ vijñātum . ye tu ete nyāyyavikaraṇāḥ udāttāḥ ananubandhakāḥ paṭhyante eteṣām pāṭhaḥ śakyaḥ akartum . eteṣām api avaśyam āṇapayatyādinivṛttyarthaḥ pāṭhaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3083: śiṣṭaprayogāt āṇapayatyādīnām nivṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati . saḥ ca avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3084: śiṣṭaprayogaḥ upāsyaḥ ye api paṭhyante teṣām api viparyāsanivṛttyarthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3085: loke hi kṛṣyarthe kasim prayuñjate dṛśyarthe ca diśim .
GS24pmbhasuu:3086: (P_1,3.2.1) KA_I,259.16-23 Ro_II,198-199 upadeśe iti kimartham . abhre āṃ apaḥ : uddeśe yaḥ anunāsikaḥ tasya mā bhūt iti . kaḥ punaḥ uddeśopadeśayoḥ viśeṣaḥ . pratyakṣam ākhyānam upadeśaḥ , guṇaiḥ prāpaṇam uddeśaḥ . pratyakṣam tāvat ākhyānam upadeśaḥ . tat yathā : agojñāya kaḥ cit gām sakhthani karṇe vā gṛhītvā upadiśati : ayam gauḥ iti . saḥ pratyakṣam ākhyātam āha : upadiṣṭaḥ me gauḥ iti . guṇaiḥ prāpaṇam uddeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3087: . tat yathā : kaḥ cit kam cit āha : devadattam me bhavān uddiśatu iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3088: saḥ ihasthaḥ pāṭaliputrastham devadattam uddiśati : aṅgadī kuṇḍalī kirīṭī
GS24pmbhasuu:3089: vyūḍhoraskaḥ vṛttabāhuḥ lohitākṣaḥ tuṅganāsaḥ citrābharaṇaḥ īdṛśaḥ devadattaḥ iti . saḥ guṇaiḥ prāpyamāṇam āha : uddiṣṭaḥ me devadattaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3090: (P_1,3.2.2) KA_I,259.24-261.3 Ro_II,199-202 itsañjñāyām sarvaprasaṅgaḥ aviśeṣāt . itsañjñāyām sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . sarvasya anunāsikasya itsañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3091: prāpnoti . asya api prāpnoti : abhre āṃ apaḥ . kim kāraṇam . aviśeṣāt . na hi kaḥ cit viśeṣaḥ : upādīyate evañjātīyakasya anunāsikasya itsañjñā bhavati iti . anupādīyamāne viśeṣe sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . kim ucyate anupādīyamāne viśeṣe iti . katham na nāma upādīyate yadā upadeśe iti ucyate . lakṣaṇena hi upadeśaḥ . saṅkīrṇau uddeśopadeśau . pratyakṣam ākhyānam uddeśaḥ guṇaiḥ ca prāpaṇam upadeśaḥ . pratyakṣam tāvat ākhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:3092: uddeśaḥ . tat yathā : kaḥ cit kam cit āha : anuvākam me bhavān uddiśatu iti . saḥ tasmai ācaṣṭe : iṣetvakam adhīṣva . śannodevīyam adhīṣva iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3093: saḥ pratyakṣam ākhyātam āha : uddiṣṭaḥ me anuvākaḥ . tam adhyeṣye iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3094: guṇaiḥ ca prāpaṇam upadeśaḥ . tat yathā : kaḥ cit kam cit āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:3095: grāmantaram gamiṣyāmi . panthānam me bhavān upadiśatu iti . saḥ tasmai ācaṣṭe : amuṣmin avakāśe hastadakṣiṇaḥ grahītavyaḥ , amuṣmin hastavāmaḥ iti . saḥ guṇaiḥ prāpyamāṇam āha : upadiṣṭaḥ me panthāḥ iti . evam etau saṅkīrṇau uddeśopadeśau . evam tarhi itkāryābhāvāt itsañjñā na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3096: . nanu ca lopaḥ eva itkāryam syāt . akāryam lopaḥ . iha hi śabdasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3097: dvyarthaḥ upadeśaḥ . kāryārthaḥ vā bhavati upadeśaḥ śravaṇārthaḥ vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:3098: kāryam ca iha na asti . kārye ca asati yadi śravaṇam api na syāt upadeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3099: anarthakaḥ syāt . idam asti itkāryam : abhre āṃ aṭitaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3100: anantaralakṣaṇāyām itsañjñāyām satyām āditaḥ ca iti iṭpratiṣedhaḥ prasajyeta . siddham tu upadeśane anunāsikavacanāt . siddham etat katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:3101: upadeśane yaḥ anunāsikaḥ saḥ itsañjñaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . kim punaḥ upadeśanam . śāstram . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam itsañjñāyām sarvaprasaṅgaḥ aviśeṣāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . upadeśaḥ iti ghañ ayam karaṇasādhanaḥ . na sidhyati . paratvāt lyuṭ prāpnoti . na brūmaḥ akartari ca kārake sañjñāyām iti . kim tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:3102: halaḥ ca iti . tatra api sañjñāyām iti vartate . na ca eṣā sañjñā .
GS24pmbhasuu:3103: prāyavacanāt asañjñāyām api bhaviṣyati . prāyavacanāt sañjñāyām eva syāt vā na vā . na hi upādheḥ upādhiḥ bhavati viśeṣaṇasya vā viśeṣaṇam . yadi na upādheḥ upādhiḥ bhavati viśeṣaṇasya vā viśeṣaṇam kalyāṇyādīnām inaṅ kulaṭāyāḥ vā inaṅ vibhāṣā na prāpnoti . inaṅ eva atra pradhānam . vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ prakṛtaḥ ca anuvartate . iha tarhi : vākinādīnām kuk ca putrāt anyatarasyām iti kuk vibhāṣā na prāpnoti . atra api kuk eva pradhānam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3104: vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ prakṛtaḥ ca anuvartate . evam na ca idam akṛtam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3105: na upādheḥ upādhiḥ bhavati viśeṣaṇasya vā viśeṣaṇam iti na ca kaḥ cit doṣaḥ bhavati . evam ca kṛtvā ghañ na prāpnoti . evam tarhi kṛtyalyuṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3106: bahulam iti evam atra ghañ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3107: (P_1,3.3.1) KA_I,261.5-15 Ro_II,202-203 halantye sarvprasaṅgaḥ sarvāntyatvāt . halantye sarvprasaṅgaḥ . sarvasya halaḥ itsañjñā prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3108: . kim kāraṇam . sarvāntyatvāt . sarvaḥ hi hal tam tam avadhim prati antyaḥ bhavati . siddham tu vyavasitāntyatvāt . siddham etat . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:3109: vyavasitāntyatvāt . vyavasitāntyaḥ hal itsañjñaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3111: sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam halantye sarvprasaṅgaḥ sarvāntyatvāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . āha ayam hal antyam itsañjñam bhavati iti . sarvaḥ ca hal tam tam avadhim prati antyaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3112: . tatra prakarṣagatiḥ vijñāsyate : sādhīyaḥ yaḥ antyaḥ iti . kaḥ ca sādhīyaḥ . yaḥ vyavasitāntyaḥ . atha vā sāpekṣaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ kriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3113: na ca anyat kim cit apekṣyam asti . te vyavasitam eva apekṣiṣyāmahe .
GS24pmbhasuu:3114: (P_1,3.3.2) KA_I,261.16-262.3 Ro_II,203-205 lakārasya anubandhājñāpitatvāt halgrahaṇāprasiddhiḥ . lakārasya anubandhatvena ajñāpitatvāt halgrahaṇāprasiddhiḥ . hal antyam itsañjñam bhavati iti ucyate . lakārasya eva tāvat itsañjñā na prāpnoti . siddham tu lakāranirdeśāt . siddham etat . katham . lakāranirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . hal antyam itsañjñam bhavati lakāraḥ ca iti vaktavyam . ekaśeṣanirdeśāt vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:3115: atha vā ekaśeṣanirdeśaḥ ayam . hal ca hal ca hal . hal antyam itsañjñam
GS24pmbhasuu:3116: bhavati iti . atha vā ḷkārasya eva idam guṇabhūtasya grahaṇam . tatra upadeśe ac anunāsika it iti itsañjñā bhaviṣyati . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3117: jñāpayati bhavati lakārasya itsañjñā iti yat ayam ṇalam litam karoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3118: (P_1,3.3.3) KA_I,262.4-17 Ro_II,205-207 prātipadikapratiṣedhaḥ akṛttaddhite . akṛttaddhitāntasya prātipadikasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3119: udaśvit śakrṭ iti . akṛttaddhitāntasya iti kimartham . kumbhakāraḥ nagarakāraḥ aupagavaḥ kāpaṭavaḥ . idarthābhāvāt siddham . itkāryābhāvāt atra itsañjña na bhaviṣyati . idam asti itkāryam titsvaritam iti svaritatvam yathā syāt . na etat asti . pratyayagrahaṇam tatra codayiṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3120: . idam tarhi : rājā takṣā . ñniti ādyudāttatvam yathā syāt . ñniti iti ucyate . tatra vyapavargābhāvāt na bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi svaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3121: upottamam riti eṣaḥ svaraḥ yathā syāt . svaritakaraṇasāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati . nyaṅsvarau svritau iti . iha tarhi antaḥ . uttamaśabdaḥ triprabhṛtiṣu vartate . na ca atra triprabhṛtayaḥ santi . iha tarhi sanutaḥ . upottamam riti iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ yathā syāt . antodāttanipātanam kariṣyate . saḥ ca nipātasvaraḥ ritsvarasya bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . etat ca atra yuktam yat itkāryābhāvāt itsañjñā na syāt . yatra itkāryam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3122: bhavati tatra itsañjñā . tat yathā āgastyakauṇḍinyayoḥ agastikuṇḍinac .
GS24pmbhasuu:3123: (P_1,3.4) KA_I,262.19-263.9 Ro_II,207-209 vibhaktau tavargapratiṣedhaḥ ataddhite . vibhaktau tavargapratiṣedhaḥ ataddhite iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . kimaḥ at kve prepsan dīpyase kva ardhamāsāḥ iti . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpāyati na
GS24pmbhasuu:3124: vibhaktau taddhite pratiṣedhaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam idamaḥ thamuḥ iti makārasye itsañjñāparitrāṇārtham ukāram anubandham karoti . yadi etat jñāpyate idānīm iti atra api prāpnoti . itkāryābhāvāt atra itsañjñā na bhaviṣyati . idam asti itkāryam mit acaḥ antyāt paraḥ iti acām antyāt paraḥ yathā syāt . iśbhāve kṛte na asti viśeṣaḥ mit acaḥ antyāt paraḥ iti vā paratve pratyayaḥ paraḥ iti vā . saḥ eva tāvat iśbhāvaḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3125: kim kāraṇam . prāk diśaḥ pratyayeṣu iti ucyate . kaḥ punaḥ arhati iśbhāvam prāg diśaḥ pratyayeṣu vaktum . kim tarhi . prāk diśaḥ artheṣu iśbhāvaḥ kiṃsarvanāmabahubhyaḥ advyādibhyaḥ pratyayotpattiḥ . evam tarhi tadaḥ api ayam vaktavyaḥ . tadaḥ ca mit acaḥ antyāt paratvena na sidhyati . nanu ca atra api atve kṛte na asti viśeṣaḥ mit acaḥ antyāt paraḥ iti vā paratve pratyayaḥ paraḥ iti vā . tat hi attvam na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3126: vibhaktau iti ucyate . evam tarhi yakārāntaḥ dānīm kariṣyate . kim yakāraḥ na śrūyate . luptanirdiṣṭaḥ yakāraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3128: cuñcupcaṇapoḥ cakārasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . keśacuñcuḥ keśacaṇaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3129: itkāryābhāvāt siddham . itkāryābhāvāt atra itsañjñā na bhaviṣyati . idam asti itkāryam citaḥ antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti antodāttatvam yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3130: pitkaraṇam idānīm kimartham syāt . pitkaraṇam kimartham iti cet paryāyārtham . pitkaraṇam kimartham iti cet paryāyārtham etat syāt . evam tarhi yakārādī cuñcupcaṇapau . kim yakāraḥ na śrūyate . luptanirdiṣṭaḥ yakāraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3131: (P_1,3.7.2) KA_I,263.19-264.10 Ro_II,210-211 iraḥ upasaṅkhyānam . iraḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam : rudhir : arudhat , arautsīt . avayavagrahaṇāt siddham . rephasya atra halantyam iti itsañjñā bhaviṣyati ikārasya upadeśe ac anunāsikaḥ iti . avayavagrahaṇāt iti cet ididvidhiprasaṅgaḥ avayavagrahaṇāt iti cet ididvidhiprasaṅgaḥ prāpnoti . bhettā chettā .
GS24pmbhasuu:3132: iditaḥ num dhātoḥ iti num prāpnoti . yadi punaḥ ayam ididvidhiḥ kumbhīdhānyanyāyena vijñāyeta . tat yathā . kumbhīdhānyaḥ śrotriyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3133: ucyate . yasya kumbhyām eva dhānyam saḥ kumbhīdhānyaḥ . yasya punaḥ kumbhyām ca anyatra ca na asau kumbhīdhānyaḥ . na ayam ididvidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3134: kumbhīdhānyanyāyena śakyaḥ vijñātum . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt . ṭunadi nandathuḥ iti . evam tarhi na evam vijñāyate ikāraḥ it yasya saḥ ayam idit tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3135: iditaḥ iti . katham tarhi . ikāraḥ eva it idit ididantasya iti . atha vā ṝkārasya eva idam irtvabhūtasya grahaṇam . tatra upadeśe ac anunāsikaḥ it iti itsañjñā bhaviṣyati . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na evañjātīyakānām ididvidhiḥ bhavati iti yat ayam iritaḥ kān cit
GS24pmbhasuu:3136: numanuṣaktān paṭhati . ubundir niśāmane . skandir gatiśoṣaṇayoḥ . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati irśabdasya itsañjñā bhavati iti yat ayam iritaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3137: vā iti āha . atha vā ante iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3139: itsañjñakaḥ pratinirdiśyate . na etat asti prayojanam . prakṛtam it iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3140: vartate . kva prakṛtam . upadeśe ac anunāsikaḥ it iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ . arthāt vibhaktivipariṇāmaḥ bhaviṣyati . tat yathā . uccāni devadattasya gṛhāṇi āmantrayasva enam . devadattam iti gamyate . devadattasya gāvaḥ aśvāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3141: hiraṇyam iti . āḍhyaḥ vaidhaveyaḥ . devadattaḥ iti gamyate . purastāt ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭam sat arthāt dvitīyānirdiṣṭam prathamānirdiṣṭam ca bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3142: evam iha api purastāt prathamānirdiṣṭam sat arthāt ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭam bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . ye anekālaḥ itsañjñāḥ teṣām lopaḥ sarvādeśaḥ yathā syāt . atha kriyamāṇe api ca tasyagrahaṇe katham iva lopaḥ sarvādeśaḥ labhyaḥ . labhyaḥ iti āha . kutaḥ . vacanaprāmāṇyāt tasyagrahaṇasāmarthyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3144: upasaṅkhyānam itpratiṣedhāt . itaḥ lope ṇalktvāniṣṭhāsu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . ṇal . aham papaca . ktvā . devitvā sevitvā . niṣṭhā . śayitaḥ śayitavān . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . itpratiṣedhāt . pratiṣidhyate atra itsañjñā . ṇal uttamaḥ ṇit vā bhavati . ktvā seṭ na kit bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3145: niṣṭhā seṭ na kit bhavati iti . siddham tu ṇalādīnām grahaṇapratiṣedhāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3146: siddham etat . katham . ṇalādīnām grahaṇāni pratiṣidhante . ṇal uttamaḥ vā
GS24pmbhasuu:3147: ṇidgrahaṇena gṛhyate . ktvā seṭ na kidgrahaṇena gṛhyate . niṣṭhā seṭ na
GS24pmbhasuu:3148: kidgrahaṇena gṛhyate iti . nirdiṣṭalopāt vā . nirdiṣṭalopāt vā siddham eva
GS24pmbhasuu:3149: . atha vā nirdiṣṭasya ayam lopaḥ kriyate . tasmāt siddham etat . tatra tusmānām pratiṣedhaḥ . tatra tusmānām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . tasmāt tasmin yasmāt yasmin vṛkṣāḥ plakṣāḥ acinavam asunavam akaravam . na vā uccāraṇasāmarthyāt . na vā vaktavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . uccāraṇasāmarthyāt atra lopaḥ na bhaviṣyati . anubandhalope bhāvābhāvayoḥ vipratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3150: aprasiddhiḥ . anubandhalope bhāvābhāvayoḥ virodhāt aprasiddhiḥ . na jñāyate kena abhiprāyeṇa prasajati kena nivṛttim karoti iti . siddham tu apavādanyāyena . siddham etat . katham . apavādanyāyena . kim punaḥ iha
GS24pmbhasuu:3151: tathā yathā utsargāpavādau . bhāvaḥ hi kāryāṛthaḥ nanyārthaḥ lopaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3152: kāryam kariṣyāmi iti anubandhaḥ āsajyate kāryād anyan mā bhūt iti lopaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3154: āsajyate kim saḥ tasya ekāntaḥ bhavati āhosvit anekāntaḥ . ekāntaḥ tatra upalabdheḥ . ekāntaḥ iti āha . kutaḥ . tatra upalabdheḥ . tatrasthaḥ hi asau upalabhyate . tat yathā vṛkṣasthā śākhā vṛkṣaikāntā upalabhyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3156: tatra asarūpavidhau doṣaḥ bhavati . karmaṇi aṇ ātaḥ anupasarge kaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3157: kaṇviṣaye aṇ api prāpnoti . sarvādeśe ca doṣaḥ bhavati . divaḥ aut sarvādeśaḥ prāpnoti . dāppratiṣedhe pṛthaktvanirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3158: adābdaipau iti vaktavyam . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . anākārāntatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3159: . nanu ca āttve kṛte bhaviṣyati . tat hi āttvam na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . anejantatvāt . astu tarhi anekāntaḥ . anekānte vṛttiviśeṣaḥ . yadi anekāntaḥ vṛttiviśeṣaḥ na sidhyati . kiti ṇiti iti kāryāṇi na sidhyanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3160: kim hi saḥ tasya it bhavati yena itkṛtam syāt . evam tarhi anantaraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3161: anantaraḥ iti cet pūrvaparayoḥ itkṛtaprasaṅgaḥ . anantaraḥ iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:3162: pūrvaparayoḥ itkṛtam prāpnoti . vuñchaṇ . siddham tu vyavasitapāṭhāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3163: siddham etat . katham . vyavasitapāṭhaḥ kartavyaḥ . vuñ chaṇ . saḥ ca avaśyam vyavasitapāṭhaḥ kartavyaḥ . itarathā hi ekānte api sandehaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3164: akriyamāṇe vyavasitapāṭhe ekānte api sandehaḥ syāt . tatra na jñāyate kim ayam pūrvasya bhavati āhosvit parasya iti . sandehamātram etat bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3165: sarvasandeheṣu ca idam upatiṣṭhate vyākhyānataḥ viśeṣapratipattiḥ na hi sandehāt alakṣaṇam iti . pūrvasya iti vyākhyāsyamaḥ . vṛttāt vā . vṛttāt vā punaḥ siddham etat . vṛddhimantam ādyudāttam dṛṣṭvā ñit iti vyavaseyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3166: . antodāttam dṛṣṭvā kit iti . yuktam punaḥ yat vṛttinimittakaḥ anubandhaḥ syāt na anubandhanimittakena nāma vṛttena bhavitavyam . vṛttinimittakaḥ eva anubandhaḥ . vṛttijñaḥ hi ācāryaḥ anubandhān āsajati . ubhayam idam anubandheṣu uktam ekāntāḥ anekāntāḥ iti . kim atra nyāyyam . ekāntāḥ iti nyāyyam . kutaḥ etat . atra hi hetuḥ vyapadiṣṭaḥ . yat ca nāma sahetukam tat nyāyyam . nanu ca uktam tatra asarūpasarvādeśadāppratiṣedhe pṛthaktvanirdeśaḥ anākārāntatvāt iti . asarūpavidhau tāvat na doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3167: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na anubandhakṛtam asārūpyam bhavati iti yat ayam dadātidadhātyoḥ vibhāṣā iti vibhāṣā śam śāsti . yat api uktam sarvādeśe iti . atra api ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na anubandhakṛtam anekāltvam bhavati iti yat ayam śit sarvasya iti āha . yat api uktam dāppratiṣedhe pṛthaktvanirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ iti . na kartavyaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na anubandhakṛtam anejantatvam bhavati iti yat ayam udīcām māṅaḥ vyatīhāre iti meṅaḥ sānubandhakasya āttvabhūtasya grahaṇam karoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3168: (P_1,3.10.1) KA_I,267.8-13 Ro_II,218 kim iha udāharaṇam . ikaḥ yaṇ aci
GS24pmbhasuu:3169: . dadhi atra madhu atra . na etat asti . sthāne antaratamena api etat siddham . kutaḥ āntaryam . tālusthānasya tālusthānaḥ oṣṭhasthānasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3170: oṣṭhasthānaḥ bhaviṣyati iti . idam tarhi . tasthasthamipām tāmtamtāmaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3171: . nanu ca etat api sthāne antaratamena eva siddham . kutaḥ āntaryam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3172: ekārthasya ekārthaḥ dvyarthasya dvyarthaḥ bahvarthasya bahvarthaḥ bhaviṣyati iti . idam tarhi tūdīśalātruavarmatīkūcavārāt ḍhakchaṇḍhañyakaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3175: yathāsaṅkhyavacanam niyamārtham . sañjñayā samāsaiḥ ca nirdeśāḥ kriyante .
GS24pmbhasuu:3178: sañjñāsamāsanirdeśāt sarvaprasaṅgaḥ anudeśasya yathāsaṅkhyavacanam niyamārtham . sarvasya uddeśasya sarvaḥ anudeśaḥ prāpnoti . iṣyate ca samasaṅkhyam yathā syāt iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati iti tatra yathāsaṅkhyavacanam niyamārtham . evamartham idam ucyate . kim punaḥ kāraṇam sañjñayā samāsaiḥ ca nirdeśāḥ kriyante . sañjñāsamāsanirdeśaḥ lpṛthak vibhaktisañjñyanuccāraṇārthaḥ . sañjñayā samāsaiḥ ca nirdeśāḥ kriyantepṛthak vibhaktīḥ sañjñinaḥ ca mā uccicīram iti . prakaraṇe ca sarvasampratyayārthaḥ . prakaraṇe ca sarveṣām sampratyayaḥ yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3180: (P_1,3.10.3) KA_I,268.3-271.17 Ro_II,220-227 kim punaḥ śabdataḥ sāmye saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ bhavati āhosvit arthataḥ . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3181: saṅkhyāsāmyam śabdataḥ cet ṇalādayaḥ parasmaipadānām ḍāraurasaḥ prathamasya ayavāyāvaḥ ecaḥ iti anirdeśaḥ . agamakaḥ nirdeśaḥ anirdeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3182: parasmaipadānām ṇalatususthalathusaṇalvamāḥ iti ṇalādayaḥ bahavaḥ parasmaipadānām iti ekaḥ śabdaḥ . vaiṣamyāt saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3183: ḍāraurasaḥ prathamasya . ḍāraurasaḥ bahavaḥ prathamasya iti ekaḥ śabdaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3184: vaiṣamyāt saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti . ecaḥ ayavāyāvaḥ . ayavāyāvaḥ bahavaḥ ecaḥ iti ekaḥ śabdaḥ . vaiṣamyāt saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3185: astu tarhi arthataḥ . arthataḥ cet lṛluṭornandyarīhaṇasindhutakṣaśilādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3187: syatāsīlṛluṭoḥ . syatāsī dvau lṛluṭoḥ iti asya trayaḥ arthāḥ . vaiṣamyāt saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti . nandigrahipacādibhyaḥ lyuṇinyacaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3188: nandyādayaḥ bahavaḥ lyuṇinyacaḥ trayaḥ . vaiṣamyāt saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:3189: prāpnoti . arīhaṇādayaḥ bahavaḥ vuñādayaḥ saptadaśa . vaiṣamyāt saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti . sindhutakṣaśilādibhyaḥ aṇañau .
GS24pmbhasuu:3190: sindhutakṣaśilādayaḥ bahavaḥ aṇañau dvau . vaiṣamyāt saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:3193: ātmanepadavidhiḥ ca na sidhyati . anudāttaṅitaḥ ātmanepadam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3194: anudāttaṅitau dvau ātmanepadam iti asya dvau arthau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . niṣṭhā . radābhyām niṣṭhātaḥ naḥ pūrvasya ca daḥ iti . rephadakārau dvau niṣṭhā iti asya dvau arthau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . sārvadhātukadvigrahaṇeṣu ca doṣaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3195: śnasoḥ allopaḥ śnamastī dvau sārvadhātukam iti asya dvau arthau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . eṅaḥ pūrvatve pratiṣedhaḥ . eṅaḥ pūrvatve pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . eṅaḥ padāntāt ati ṅasiṅasoḥ ca . ṅasiṅasau dvau eṅ
GS24pmbhasuu:3196: iti asya dvau arthau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . astu tarhi śabdataḥ . nanu ca uktam saṅkhyāsāmyam śabdataḥ cet ṇalādayaḥ parasmaipadānām ḍāraurasaḥ prathamasya ayavāyāvaḥ ecaḥ iti anirdeśaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3197: na eṣaḥ doṣāḥ . sthāne antaratamaḥ iti anena vyavasthā bhaviṣyati . kutaḥ āntaryam . ekārthasya ekārthaḥ dvyarthasya dvyarthaḥ bahvarthasya bahvarthaḥ . saṃvṛtāvarṇasya saṃvṛtāvarṇaḥ vivṛtāvarṇasya vivṛtāvarṇaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3198: atiprasaṅgaḥ guṇavṛddhipratiṣedhe kṅiti . atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati guṇavṛddhipratiṣedhe kṅiti . guṇavṛddhī dve kṅitau dvau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . gakāraḥ api atra nirdiśyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3199: tat gakāragrahaṇam api kartavyam . na kartavyam . kriyate nyāse eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:3200: kakāre gakāraḥ cartvabhūtaḥ nirdiśyate . giti kiti ṅiti iti . udi kūle rujivahoḥ . udikūle dve rujivahau dvau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3201: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na udiḥ upapadam . kim tarhi . viśeṣaṇam rujivahoḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3202: utpūrvābhyām rujivahibhyām kūle upapade iti . tacchīlādiṣu dhātutrigrahaṇeṣu . tacchīlādiṣu dhātutrigrahaṇeṣu doṣaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3203: vidibhidicchideḥ kurac . vidibhidicchidayaḥ trayaḥ tacchīlādayaḥ trayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3204: tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . ghañādiṣu dvigrahaṇeṣu . ghañādiṣu dvigrahaṇeṣu doṣaḥ bhavati . nirabhyoḥ pūlvoḥ . nirabhī dvau pūlvau dvau .
GS24pmbhasuu:3205: tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . iṣyate ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:3206: saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ : niṣpāvaḥ , abhilāvaḥ iti . evam tarhi akartari ca kārake bhāve ca iti dvau pūlvau ca dvau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3207: . ave tṝstroḥ karaṇādhikaraṇayoḥ . tṝstrau dvau karaṇādhikaraṇe dve .
GS24pmbhasuu:3208: tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . kartṛkarmaṇoḥ ca bhūkṛñoḥ . kartṛkarmaṇī dve bhūkṛñau dvau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . anavakḷptyamarṣayoḥ akiṃvṛtte api . anavakḷptyamarṣau dvau kiṃvṛttākiṃvṛtte dve . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . kṛbhvoḥ ktvāṇamulau . kṛbhvau dvau ktvāṇamulau
GS24pmbhasuu:3209: dvau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . adhīyānaviduṣoḥ chandobrāhmaṇāni . chandobrāhmaṇāni iti dve adhīte veda iti ca dvau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . ropadhetoḥ pathidūtayoḥ . ropadhetoḥ prācām tat gacchati pathidūtayoḥ . ropadhetau dvau pathidūtau dvau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . tatra bhavataḥ tasya vyākhyānaḥ kratuyajñebhyaḥ . tatra bhavatastasyavyākhyānau dvau kratuyajñau dvau .
GS24pmbhasuu:3210: tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . saṅghādiṣu añprabhṛtayaḥ ṣaṅghādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3211: añprabhṛtayaḥ saṅkhyātānudeśena na sidhyanti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3212: ghoṣagrahaṇam atra kartavyam . veśoyaśāadeḥ bhagāt yalkhau . veśoyaśāadī dvau yalkhau dvau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . ṅasiṅasoḥ khyatyāt parasya . ṅasiṅasau dvau khyatyau dvau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3213: na vā samānayogavacanāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3214: samānayogavacanāt . samānayoge saṅkhyātānudeśam vakṣyāmi . tasya doṣaḥ vidaḥ laṭaḥ vā . tasya etasya lakṣaṇasya doṣaḥ vidaḥ laṭaḥ vā iti saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti . dhmādhetṭoḥ nāḍīmuṣṭyoḥ ca . dhmādhetṭoḥ nāḍīmuṣṭyoḥ ca saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti . khalagorathāt initrakaṭyacaḥ ca . saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti . sindhvapakarābhyām kan aṇañau ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:3215: saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti . yuṣmadasmadoḥ ca ādeśāḥ . yuṣmadasmadoḥ ca ādeśāḥ saṅkhyātānudeśena na sidhyanti . tasmāt yasmin pakṣe alpīyāṃsaḥ doṣāḥ tām āsthāya pratividheyam doṣeṣu . atha vā evam vakṣyāmi .
GS24pmbhasuu:3216: yathāsaṅkhyam anudeśaḥ samānām svaritena . tataḥ adhikāraḥ . adhikāraḥ ca bhavati svaritena iti . evam api svaritam dṛṣṭvā sandehaḥ syāt . na jñāyate kim ayam samasaṅkhyārthaḥ āhosvit adhikārārthaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3217: sandehamātram etat bhavati . sarvasandeheṣu ca idam upatiṣṭhate vyākhyānataḥ viśeṣapratipattiḥ na hi sandehāt alakṣaṇam iti samasaṅkhyārthaḥ iti vyākhyāsyāmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3219: adhikāraḥ pratiyogam tasya anirdeśārthaḥ . adhikāraḥ kriyate pratiyogam
GS24pmbhasuu:3220: tasya anirdeśārthaḥ iti . kim idam pratiyogam iti . yogam yogam prati
GS24pmbhasuu:3221: pratiyogam . yoge yoge tasya grahaṇam mā kārṣam iti . kim gatam etat iyatā sūtreṇa . gatam iti āha . kutaḥ . lokataḥ . tat yathā loke adhikṛtaḥ asau grāme adhikṛtaḥ asau nagare iti ucyate yaḥ yatra vyāpāram gacchati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3222: śabdena ca api adhikṛtena kaḥ anyaḥ vyāpāraḥ śakyaḥ avagantum anyat ataḥ yoge yoge upasthānāt . na vā nirdiśyamānādhikṛtatvāt yathā loke . na vā etat prayojanam . kim kāraṇam . nirdiśyamānādhikṛtatvāt yathā loke .
GS24pmbhasuu:3223: nirdiśyamānam adhikṛtam gamyate . tat yathā . devadattāya gauḥ dīyatām
GS24pmbhasuu:3224: yajñadattāya viṣṇumitrāya iti . gauḥ iti gamyate . evam iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:3225: padarujaviśaspṛśaḥ ghañ sṛ sthire bhāve . ghañ iti gamyate . anyanirdeśaḥ tu nivartakaḥ tasmāt paribhāṣā . anyanirdeśaḥ tu loke nivartakaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3226: tat yathā . devadattāya gauḥ dīyatām yajñadattāya kambalaḥ viṣṇumitrāya ca iti . kambalaḥ gonivartakaḥ bhavati . evam iha api abhividhau bhāve inuṇ
GS24pmbhasuu:3227: ghañaḥ nivartakaḥ syāt . tasmāt paribhāṣā kartavyā .
GS24pmbhasuu:3228: (P_1,3.11.2) KA_I,272.11-273.5 Ro_II,229-230 adhikāraparimāṇājñānam tu . adhikāraparimāṇājñānam tu bhavati . na jñāyate kiyantam avadhim adhikāraḥ anuvartate iti . adhikāraparimāṇajñānārtham tu .
GS24pmbhasuu:3229: adhikāraparimāṇajñānārtham eva tarhi ayam yogaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3230: adhikāraparimāṇam jñāsyāmi iti . katham punaḥ svaritena adhikāraḥ iti anena adhikāraparimāṇam śakyam vijñātum . evam vakṣyāmi svarite na adhikāraḥ iti . svaritam dṛṣṭvā adhikāraḥ na bhavati iti . kena idānīm adhikāraḥ bhaviṣyati . laukikaḥ adhikāraḥ . na adhikāraḥ iti cet uktam kim uktam . anyanirdeśaḥ tu nivartakaḥ tasmāt paribhāṣā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3231: adhikārārtham eva tarhi ayam yogaḥ vaktavyaḥ . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:3232: adhikāraparimāṇājñānam tu iti . yāvatithaḥ al anubandhaḥ tāvataḥ yogān iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3233: vacanāt siddham . yāvatithaḥ al anubadhyate tāvataḥ yogān adhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3234: anuvartate iti vaktavyam . atha idānīm yatra alpīyāṃsaḥ alaḥ bhūyasaḥ ca yogān adhikāraḥ anuvartate katham tatra kartavyam . bhūyasi prāgvacanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3235: bhūyasi prāgvacanam kartavyam . prāk amutaḥ iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . sandehamātram etat bhavati . sarvasandeheṣu ca idam upatiṣṭhate vyākhyānataḥ viśeṣapratipattiḥ na hi sandehāt alakṣaṇam iti . prāk amutaḥ iti vyākhyāsyāmaḥ . yadi evam na arthaḥ anena . kena idānīm adhikāraḥ bhaviṣyati . laukikaḥ adhikāraḥ . nanu ca uktam na adhikāraḥ iti cet uktam . kim uktam . anyanirdeśaḥ tu nivartakaḥ tasmāt paribhāṣā . sandehamātram etat bhavati . sarvasandeheṣu ca idam
GS24pmbhasuu:3236: upatiṣṭhate vyākhyānataḥ viśeṣapratipattiḥ na hi sandehāt alakṣaṇam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3237: inuṇ ghañ iti sandehe ghañ iti vyākhyāsyāmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3238: (P_1,3.11.3) KA_I,273.6-25 Ro_II,230-232 na tarhi idānīm ayam yogaḥ vaktavyaḥ . vaktavyaḥ ca . kim prayojanam . svaritena adhikāragatiḥ yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3239: vijñāyeta , adhikam kāryam , adhikaḥ kāraḥ . adhikāragatiḥ : gostriyoḥ upasarjanam iti atra goṭāṅgrahaṇam coditam . tat na kartavyam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3240: strīgrahaṇam svarayiṣyate . svaritena adhikāragatiḥ bhavati iti striyām iti evam prakṛtya ye pratyayāḥ vihitāḥ teṣām grahaṇam vijñāsyate . tatra svaritena adhikāragatiḥ bhavati iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . adhikam kāryam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3241: apādānam ācāryaḥ kim nyāyyam manyate . yatra prāpya nivṛttiḥ . tena iha eva syāt : grāmāt āgacchati . nagarāt āgacchati . sāṅkāśyakebhyaḥ pāṭaliputrakāḥ abhirūpatarāḥ iti atra na syāt . svaritena adhikarm kāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:3242: bhavati iti atra api siddham bhavati . tathā adhikaraṇam ācāryaḥ kim nyāyyam manyate . yatra kṛtsnaḥ ādhārātmā vyāptaḥ bhavati . tena iha eva
GS24pmbhasuu:3243: syāt : tileṣu tailam . dadhni sarpiḥ iti . gaṅgāyām gāvaḥ . kūpe gargakulam iti atra na syāt . svaritena adhikarm kāryam bhavati iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:3244: api siddham bhavati . adhikam kāryam . adhikaḥ kāraḥ : pūrvavipratiṣedhāḥ na paṭhitavyāḥ bhavanti . guṇavṛddhyauttvatṛjvadbhāvebhyaḥ num pūrvavipratiṣiddham numaciratṛjvadbhāvebhyaḥ nuṭ iti . numnuṭau svarayiṣyete . tatra svaritena adhikaḥ kāraḥ bhavati iti numnuṭau bhaviṣyataḥ . katham punaḥ adhikaḥ kāraḥ iti anena pūrvavipratiṣedhāḥ śakya na paṭhitum . lokataḥ . tat yathā loke adhikam ayam kāram karoti iti ucyate yaḥ ayam durbalaḥ san balavadbhiḥ saha bhāram vahati . evam iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:3245: adhikam ayam kāram karoti iti ucyate yaḥ ayam pūrvaḥ san param bādhate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3246: adhikāragatiḥ stryarthā viśeṣāya adhikam kāryam . atha yaḥ anyaḥ adhikaḥ kāraḥ pūrvavipratiṣedhārthaḥ saḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3247: (P_1,3.12.1) KA_I,274.2-11 Ro_II,233 vikaraṇebhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . cinutaḥ sunutaḥ lunītaḥ punītaḥ . ṅitaḥ iti ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:3248: prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na evam vijñāyate ṅakāraḥ it asya saḥ ayam ṅit
GS24pmbhasuu:3249: ṅitaḥ iti . katham tarhi . ṅakāraḥ eva it ṅit ṅitaḥ . atha vā upadeśe iti vartate . atha vā uktam etat siddham tu pūrvasya kāryātideśāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3250: sarvathā caṅaṅbhyām prāpnoti . evam tarhi dhātoḥ iti vartate . kva prakṛtam . bhūvādayaḥ dhātavaḥ iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:3251: pañcamīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ . arthāt vibhaktivipariṇāmaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3252: tat yathā . uccāni devadattasya gṛhāṇi . āmantrayasva enam . devadattam iti gamyate . devadattasya gāvaḥ aśvāḥ hiraṇyam iti . āḍhyaḥ vaidhaveyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3253: devadattaḥ iti gamyate . purastāt ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭam sat arthāt dvitīyānirdiṣṭam prathamānirdiṣṭam ca bhavati . evam iha api purastāt prathamānirdiṣṭam sat arthāt pañcamīnirdiṣṭam bhaviṣyati (P_1,3.12.2) KA_I,274.11-275.15 Ro_II,233-237 kimartham punaḥ idam
GS24pmbhasuu:3254: ucyate . ātmanepadavacanam niyamārtham . niyamārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . kim ucyate niyamārthaḥ ayam iti na punaḥ vidhyarthaḥ api syāt . lavidhānāt vihitam . lavidhānāt hi ātmanepadam parasmaipadam ca vihitam . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . vikaraṇaiḥ tu vyavahitatvāt niyamaḥ na prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam . vikaraṇāḥ kriyantām niyamaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt vikaraṇāḥ . nityāḥ khalu api vikaraṇāḥ . kṛte api niyame prāpnuvanti akṛte api prāpnuvanti . nityatvāt paratvāt ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3255: vikaraṇeṣu kṛteṣu vikaraṇaiḥ vyavahitatvāt niyamaḥ na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . anavakāśaḥ niyamaḥ . sāvakāśaḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . ye ete lugvikaraṇāḥ śluvikaraṇāḥ liṅliṭau ca . yadi punaḥ iyam paribhāṣā vijñāyeta . kim kṛtam bhavati . kāryakālam sañjñāparibhāṣam yatra kāryam tatra draṣṭavyam . lasya tibādayaḥ bhavanti iti upasthitam idam bhavati anudāttaṅitaḥ ātmanepadam śeṣāt kartari parasmaipadam iti . evam api itaretarāśrayam bhavati . kā itaretarāśrayatā . abhinirvṛttānām lasya sthāne tibādīnām ātmanepadaparasmaipadasañjñayā bhavitavyam sañjñayā ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3256: tibādayaḥ bhāvyante . tat itaretarāśrayam bhavati . itaretarāśrayāṇi kāryāṇi ca na prakalpante . parasmaipadeṣu tāvat na itaretarāśrayam bhavati . parasmaipadānukramaṇam na kariṣyate . avaśyam kartavyam anuparābhyām kṛñaḥ iti evamartham . nanu ca etat api ātmanepadānukramaṇe eva kariṣye . svaritañitaḥ kartrabhipraye kriyāphale ātmanepadam bhavati kartari . anuparābhyām kṛñaḥ na iti . ātmanepadeṣu ca api na itaretarāśrayam bhavati . katham . bhāvinī sañjñā vijñāsyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3257: sūtraśāṭakavat . tat yathā : kaḥ cit kam cit tantuvāyam āha : asya sūtrasya śāṭakam vaya iti . saḥ paśyati . yadi śāṭakaḥ na vātavyaḥ atha vātavyaḥ na śāṭakaḥ . śāṭakaḥ vātavyaḥ iti vipratiṣiddham. bhāvinī khalu asya sañjñā abhipretā . saḥ manye vātavyaḥ yasmin ute śāṭakaḥ iti etat bhavati iti . evam iha api saḥ lasya sthāne kartavyaḥ lyasya abhinirvṛttasya ātmanepadam iti eṣā sañjñā bhaviṣyati . atha vā punaḥ astu niyamaḥ . nanu ca utkam vikaraṇaiḥ tu vyavahitatvāt niyamaḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3258: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati vikaraṇebhyaḥ niyamaḥ balīyān iti yat ayam vikaraṇavidhau ātmanepadaparasmaipadāni āśrayati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3259: puṣādidyutādḷrditaḥ parasmaipadeṣu ātmanepadeṣu anyatarasyām iti . na etat asti jñāpakam . abhinirvṛttāni hi lasya sthāne ātmanepadāni parasmaipadāni
GS24pmbhasuu:3260: ca . yat tarhi anupasargāt vā iti vibhāṣām śāsti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3262: pratyayaniyamaḥ : anudāttaṅitaḥ eva ātmanepadam bhavati , bhāvakarmaṇoḥ eva ātmanepadam bhavati iti . āhosvit prakṛtyarthaniyamaḥ : anudāttaṅitaḥ ātmanepadam eva , bhāvakarmaṇoḥ ātmanepadam eva . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3263: tatra pratyayaniyame śeṣavacanam parasmaipadasya anivṛttatvāt . tatra pratyayaniyame śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam parasmaipadaniyamārtham . śeṣāt kartari parasmaipadam iti . kim kāraṇam . parasmaipadasya anivṛttatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3264: pratyayāḥ niyatāḥ prakṛtyarthau aniyatau . tatra parasmaipadam prāpnoti .
