GS24pmbhasuu:6518: (P_3,1.90) KA_II,70.17-71.23 Ro_III,177-179 kuṣirajoḥ śyanvidhāne sārvadhātukavacanam .kuṣirajoḥ śyanvidhāne sārvadhātukagrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6519: . avacane hi liṅliṭoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . akriyamāṇe hi sārvadhātukagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:6520: liṅliṭoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ syāt . cukuṣe pādaḥ svayam eva . rarañje vastram svayam eva . koṣiṣīṣṭa pādaḥ svayam eva . raṅkṣīṣṭa vastram svayam
GS24pmbhasuu:6521: eva . kriyamāṇe api sārvadhātukagrahaṇe iha prāpnoti . kati iha kuṣṇāṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6522: pādāḥ . śyanā ca syādīnām bādhanam prāpnoti . koṣiṣyate pādaḥ svayam eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:6523: raṅkṣyate vastram svayam eva . akoṣi pādaḥ svayam eva . arañji vastram svayam eva . yat tāvat ucyate sārvadhātukagrahaṇam kartavyam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6524: prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . sārvadhātuke yak iti . yadi tat anuvartate pūrvasmin yoge kim samuccayaḥ . le ca sārvadhātuke ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6525: āhosvit lagrahaṇam sārvadhātukaviśeṣaṇam . kim ca ataḥ . yadi samuccayaḥ kati iha bhindānāḥ kuśūlāḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . atha lagrahaṇam sārvadhātukaviśeṣaṇam liṅliṭoḥ na sidhyati . bibhide kuśūlaḥ svayam eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:6526: bhitsīṣṭa kuśūlaḥ svayam eva iti . astu lagrahaṇam sārvadhātukaviśeṣaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6527: nanu ca uktam liṅliṭoḥ na sidhyati iti . liṅliḍgrahaṇam api prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:6528: anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . kās pratyayāt ām amantre liṭi liṅi āśiṣi āṅ iti . evam ca kṛtvā saḥ api adoṣaḥ bhavati yat uktam kati iha kuṣṇāṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6529: pādāḥ iti prāpnoti . atra api laviśiṣṭam sārvadhātukagrahaṇam anuvartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6530: yat api ucyate śyanā ca syādīnām bādhanam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6531: yakpratiṣedhasambandhena śyanaṃ vakṣyāmi . na duhasnunamām yakciṇau .
GS24pmbhasuu:6532: tataḥ kuṣirajoḥ prācām yakciṇau na bhavataḥ . tataḥ śyan parasmaipadam ca iti . yathā eva tarhi yakaḥ viṣaye śyan bhavati evam ciṇaḥ api viṣaye prāpnoti . akoṣi pādaḥ svayam eva . arañji vastram svayam eva iti . evam tarhi dvitīyaḥ yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . na duhasnunamām ciṇ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6533: tataḥ yak . yak ca na bhavati duhasnunamām . tataḥ kuṣirajoḥ prācām yak na bhavati . tataḥ śyan parasmaipadam ca . atha vā anuvṛttiḥ kariṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6534: syatāsī lṛluṭoḥ . cli luṅi . cleḥ sic bhavati . kartari śap syatāsī
GS24pmbhasuu:6535: lṛluṭoḥ cli luṅi cleḥ sic bhavati . kuṣirajoḥ prācām śyan parasmaipadam ca syatāsī lṛluṭoḥ cli luṅi cleḥ sic bhavati iti . atha vā antaraṅgāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6536: syādayaḥ . kā antaraṅgatā . lakārāvasthāyām eva syādayaḥ . sārvadhātuke śyan .
GS24pmbhasuu:6538: dhātvadhikāraḥ . kim prāk lādeśāt āhosvit ā tṛtīyādhyāyaparisamāpteḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6539: dhātuvadhikāraḥ prāk lādeśāt . prāk lādeśāt dhātvadhikāraḥ . lādeśe hi vyavahitatvāt aprasiddhiḥ . anuvartamāne hi lādeśe dhātvadhikāre vyavahitavtā aprasiddhiḥ syāt . kim ca syāt . ādye yoge na vyavāye tiṅaḥ syuḥ . ādye yoge vikaraṇaiḥ vyavahitatvāt tiṅaḥ na syuḥ . pacati paṭhati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6540: idam iha sampradhāryam . vikaraṇāḥ kriyantām āḍeśāḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt ādeśāḥ . nityāḥ vikaraṇāḥ . kṛteṣu ādeśeṣu prāpnuvanti akṛteṣu api prāpnuvanti . nityatvāt vikaraṇeṣu kṛteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:6541: vikaraṇaiḥ vyavahitatvāt ādeśāḥ na prāpnuvanti . anavakāśaḥ tarhi ādeśāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6542: sāvakāśāḥ ādeśāḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . ye ete lugvikaraṇāḥ śluvikaraṇāḥ ca liṅliṭau ca . na syāt etvam ṭeḥ ṭitām yat vidhatte . yat ca ṭitsañjñānām
GS24pmbhasuu:6543: etvam vidhatte tat ca vikaraṇaiḥ vyavahitatvāt na syāt . eśaḥ śittvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6544: ekāraḥ ca śit kartavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . śit sarvasya iti sarvādeśaḥ yathā syāt . akriyamāṇe hi śakāre tasmāt iti uttarasya ādeḥ iti takārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6545: etve kṛte dvayoḥ ekārayoḥ śravaṇam prasajyeta . nivṛtte punaḥ lādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:6546: dhātvadhikāre alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ bhavanti iti ekārasya ekārvacanane prayojanam na asti iti kṛtvā antareṇa api śakāram sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6547: yat ca loṭaḥ vidhatte . tat ca vikaraṇaiḥ vyavahitatvāt na syāt . kim punaḥ tat . loṭaḥ laṅvat eḥ uḥ seḥ hi apit ca vā chandasi iti . yat ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:6548: uktam laṅliṅoḥ tat ca na syāt . kim punaḥ tat . nityam ṅitaḥ itaḥ ca tasthasthamipām tāmtamtāmaḥ liṅaḥ sīyuṭ yāsuṭ parasmaipadeṣu udāttaḥ ṅit
GS24pmbhasuu:6549: ca iti . tasmāt prāk lādeśāt dhātvadhikāraḥ . yadi prāk lādeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6550: dhātvadhikāraḥ akāraḥ śit kartavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . śit sarvasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6551: sarvādeśaḥ yathā syāt . anuvartamāne punaḥ lādeśe dhātvadhikāre tasmāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6552: uttarasya ādeḥ iti thakārasya atve kṛte dvayoḥ akārayoḥ pararūpeṇa siddham rūpam syāt . peca yūyam . cakra yūyam iti . nanu ca nivṛtte api lādeśe dhātvadhikāre alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ bhavanti iti akārasya akārvacanane prayojanam na asti iti kṛtvā antareṇa api śakāram sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6553: asti anyat akārasya akāravacane prayojanam . kim . vakṣyati etat tat
GS24pmbhasuu:6554: akārasya akāravacanam samasaṅkhyārtham iti . ārdhadhātukasañjñāyām dhātugrahaṇam kartavyam dhātoḥ parasya ārdhadhātukasañjñā yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt : vṛkṣtvam vṛkṣatā iti . tasmāt lādeśe dhātvadhikāraḥ anuvartyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6555: nanu ca uktam ādye yoge na vyavāye tiṅaḥ syuḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6556: ānupūrvyāt siddham etat . na atra akṛteṣu ādeśeṣu vikaraṇāḥ prāpnuvanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6557: kim kāraṇam . sārvadhātuke vikaraṇāḥ ucyante . na ca akṛteṣu ādeśeṣu sārvadhātukatvam bhavati . ye tarhi na etasmin viśeṣe vidhīyante . ke punaḥ te . syādayaḥ . tatra api vihitaviśeṣaṇam dhātugrahaṇam . dhātoḥ vihitasya lasya iti . yadi evam vindati iti ṇalādayaḥ prāpnuvanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6558: dhātunā atra vihitam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ vidinā ca ānataryam . dhātoḥ vihitasya lasya videḥ anantarasya iti . iha tarhi ajakṣiṣyan ajāgairṣyan iti abhyastāt jheḥ jus bhavati iti jusbhāvaḥ prāpnoti . atra api dhātunā
GS24pmbhasuu:6559: vihitam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ abhyastena ānantaryam . dhātoḥ vihitasya abhastāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6560: anantarasya iti . ātaḥ iti atra katham viśeṣayiṣyasi . yadi tāvat dhātugrahaṇam vihitaviśeṣaṇam ākāragrahaṇam ānantaryaviśeṣaṇam alunan iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6561: atra api prāpnoti . atha ākāragrahaṇam vihitaviśeṣaṇam dhātugrahaṇam ānantaryaviśeṣaṇam apiban iti atra api prāpnoti . astu tarhi dhātugrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6562: vihitaviśeṣaṇam ākāragrahaṇam ānantaryaviśeṣaṇam . nanu ca uktam alunan iti atra api prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . lope kṛte na bhaviṣyati . na atra lopaḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . ītvena bādhyate . na atra ītvam
GS24pmbhasuu:6563: prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . antibhāvena bādhyate . na atra antibhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6564: prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . jusbhāvena bādhyate . na atra jusbhāvaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:6565: . kim kāraṇam . lopena bādhyate . lopaḥ ītvena ītvam antibhāvena antibhāvaḥ jusbhāvena jusbhāvaḥ lopena iti cakrakam avyavasthā prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:6566: . na asti cakrakaprasaṅgaḥ . na hi avyavasthākāriṇā śāstreṇa bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6567: śāstreṇa nāma vyavasthākāriṇā bhavitavyam . na ca atra halādinā muhūrtam api śakyam avasthātum . tāvati eva antibhāvena bhavitavyam . antibhāve kṛte lopaḥ . lopena vyavasthā bhaviṣyati . yat api ucyate eśaḥ śittvam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6569: (P_3,1.91.2) KA_II,74.5-75.9 Ro_III,183-185 kāni punaḥ asya yogasya prayojanāni . prayojanam prātipadikapratiṣedhaḥ . prātipadikapratiṣedhaḥ prayojanam . dhātoḥ tavyādayaḥ yathā syuḥ . prātipadikāt mā bhūvan iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6570: na etat asti prayojanam . sādhane tāvyādayaḥ vidhīyante sādhanam ca kriyāyāḥ . kriyābhāvāt sādhanābhāvaḥ . sādhanābhāvāt asati api
GS24pmbhasuu:6571: dhātvadhikāre prātipadikāt tavyādayaḥ na bhaviṣyanti . svapādiṣu .
GS24pmbhasuu:6572: svapādiṣu tarhi prayojanam . svapiti . supati iti mā bhūt . aṅgasañjñā ca . aṅgasañjñā ca prayojanam . yasmāt pratyayavidhiḥ tadādi pratyaye aṅgam iti dhātoḥ aṅgasañjñā siddhā bhavati . kṛtsañjñā ca . kṛtsañjñā ca prayojanam . dhātuvihitasya pratyayasya kṛtsañjñā siddhā bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6573: upapadasañjñā ca. upapadasañjñā ca prayojanam . tatra etasmin dhātvadhikāre saptamīnirdiṣṭam upapadasñjñam bhavati iti upapadasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:6574: siddhā bhavati . kṛdupapadasañjñe tāvan na prayojanam . adhikārāt api ete
GS24pmbhasuu:6575: siddhe . svapādiṣu tarhi aṅgasañjñā ca prayojanam . dhātugrahaṇam anarthakam yaṅvidhau dhātvadhikārāt . dhātugrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . yaṅvidhau dhātvadhikārāt . yaṅvidhau dhātugrahaṇam prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:6576: anuvartate . tat ca avaśyam anuvartyam . anadhikāre hi aṅgasañjñābhāvaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6577: anadhikāre hi sati aṅgasañjñāyāḥ abhāvaḥ syāt . kariṣyati hariṣyati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6578: yad tat anuvartate cūrṇacurādibhyaḥ ṇic bhavati dhātoḥ ca iti dhātumātrāt ṇic prāpnoti . hetumadvacanam tu jñāpakam anyatrābhāvasya . yat ayam hetumati ca iti āha tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na dhātumātrāt ṇic bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6579: iha tarhi kaṇḍvādibhyaḥ yak bhavati dhātoḥ ca iti dhātumātrāt yak prāpnoti . kaṇḍvādiṣu ca vyapadeśivadvacanāt . yat ayam kaṇḍvādibhyaḥ yak bhavati iti āha tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na dhātumātrāt yak bhavati iti . atha vā kaṇḍvādibhyaḥ dhātugrahaṇena abhisambhantsyāmaḥ . kaṇḍvādibhyaḥ dhātubhyaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6581: tatra upapadam saptamī iti iyati ucyamāne yatra eva saptamī śrūyate tatra eva syāt : stamberamaḥ karṇejapaḥ . yatra vā etena śabdena nirdeśaḥ kriyate . saptamyām janeḥ ḍaḥ iti . iha na syāt . kumbhakāraḥ nagarakāraḥ . sthagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe yatra ca saptamī śrūyate ya ca na śrūyate yatra ca etena śabdena nirdeśaḥ kriyate yatra ca anyena saptamīsthamātre siddham bhavati . atha tatragrahaṇam kimartham . tatragrahaṇam viṣayārtham . viṣayaḥ pratinirdiśyate . tatra etasmin dhātvadhikāre yat saptamīnirdiṣṭam tat upapadasañjñam bhavati iti upapadasañjñā siddhā bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6582: (P_3,1.92.2) KA_II,75.19-76.26 Ro_III,187-190 upapadasañjñāyām samarthavacanam . upapadasañjñāyām samarthagrahaṇam kartavyam . samartham upapadam pratyayasya iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . āhara kumbham . karoti kaṭam iti . kriyamāṇe ca api samarthagrahaṇe mahāntam kumbham karoti iti atra api prāpnoti . na vā bhavitavyam mahākumbhakāraḥ iti . bhavaitavyam yadā etat vākyam bhavati . mahān kumbhaḥ mahākumbhaḥ mahākumbham karoti iti mahākumbhakāraḥ . yadā tu etat vākyam bhavati mahāntam kumbham karoti iti tadā na bhavitavyam . tadā ca prāpnoti . tadā mā bhūt iti . yat tāvat ucyate samarthagrahaṇam kartavyam iti . na kartavyam . dhātoḥ iti vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:6583: . dhātoḥ karmaṇi aṇ bhavati . tatra sambandhāt etat gantavyam . yasya dhātoḥ yat karma iti . yat api ucyate kriyamāṇe ca api samarthagrahaṇe mahāntam kumbham karoti iti atra api prāpnoti iti . upapadam iti mahatīiham sañjñā kriyate . sañjñā ca nāma yataḥ na laghīyaḥ . kutaḥ etat . laghvartham hi sañjñākaraṇam . tatra mahatyāḥ sañjñāyāḥ karaṇe etat prayojanam anvarthasañjñā yathā vijñāyeta : upoccāri padam upapadam . yat ca atra upoccāri na tat padam yat ca padam na tat upoccāri . yāvatā ca idānīm padagandhaḥ asti padavidhiḥ ayam bhavati . padavidhiḥ ca samarthānām bhavati . tatra asāmārthyān na bhaviṣyati . atha cvyante upapade kim aṇā bhavitavyam . akumbham kumbham karoti kumbhīkaroti mṛdam iti . na bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . prakṛtivivakṣāyām cviḥ vidhīyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6584: tat sāpekṣam . sāpekṣam ca asamartham bhavati . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati : icchāmi aham kāśakaṭīkāram iti . iṣṭam eva etat gonardīyasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:6585: nimittopādanam ca . nimittopādanam ca kartavyam . nimittam upapadam pratyayasya iti vaktavyam . anupādāne hi anupapade pratyayaprasaṅgaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6586: akriyamāṇe hi nimittopādāne anupapade api prasajyeta . nirdeśaḥ idānīm kimarthaḥ syāt . nirdeśaḥ sañjñākaraṇārthaḥ . yadā upapade pratyayaḥ tadā upapadasañjñām vakṣyāmi iti . tat tarhi nimittopādanam kartavyam . na kartavyam . tatravacanam upapadasanniyogārtham . tatravacanam kriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6587: tat upapadasanniyogārtham bhaviṣyati . karmaṇi aṇ vidhīyate tatra cet pratyayaḥ bhavati iti . nanu ca anyat tatragrahaṇasya prayojanam uktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6588: kim . tatragrahaṇam viṣayārtham iti . adhikārāt api etat siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:6589: (P_3,1.93) KA_II,77.2-17 Ro_III,190-192 atiṅ iti kimartham . pacati karoti . atiṅ iti śakyam akartum . kasmāt na bhavati pacati karoti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6590: dhātoḥ parasya kṛtsañjñā . prāk ca lādeśāt dhātvadhikāraḥ . evam api sthānivadbhāvāt kṛtsañjña prāpnoti . yathā atiṅ iti ucyamāne yāvatā sthānivadbhāvaḥ katham eva etat sidhyati . pratiṣedhavacanasāmarthyāt atha vā tiṅbhāvinaḥ lakārasya kṛtsañjñāpratiṣedhaḥ . kim ca syāt yati atra kṛtsañjñā syāt . kṛtprātipadikam iti prātipadikasañjñā syāt . prātipadikāt iti svādyutpattiḥ prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ekatvādiṣu artheṣu svādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6591: vidhīyante . te ca atra tiṅoktāḥ ekatvādayaḥ iti kṛtvā uktārthatvāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:6592: bhaviṣyanti . ṭābādayaḥ tarhi tiṅantāt mā bhūvan iti . striyām ṭābādayaḥ vidhīyante . na ca tiṅantasya strītvena yogaḥ asti . aṇādayaḥ tarhi tiṅantāt mā bhūvan iti . apatyādiṣu artheṣu aṇādayaḥ vidhīyante . na ca tiṅantasya apatyādibhiḥ yogaḥ asti . atha api katham cit yogaḥ syāt . evam api na doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na tiṅantāt aṇādayaḥ bhavanti iti yat ayam kva cit taddhitavidhau tiṅgrahaṇam karoti . atiśāyane tamabiṣṭhanau tiṅaḥ ca iti . iha tarhi pacati paṭhati iti . hrasvasya piti kṛti tuk bhavati iti tuk prāpnoti . dhātoḥ iti vartate . evam api cikīrṣati iti atra prāpnoti . atra api śapā vyavadhānam . ekādeśe kṛte na
GS24pmbhasuu:6593: asti vyavadhānam . ekādeśaḥ pūrvavidhau sthānivat bhavati iti sthānivadbhāvāt vyavadhānam eva iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6595: striyām abhidheyāyām vā asrūpaḥ na bhavati iti āhosvit strīpratyayeṣu iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6596: . kim ca ataḥ . yadi striyām abhidheyāyām iti lavyā lavitavyā atra vā asarūpaḥ na prāpnoti . atha vijñāyate strīpratyayeṣu iti vyāvakrośī vayatikruṣṭiḥ iti na sidhyati . evam tarhi na evam vijñāyate striyām
GS24pmbhasuu:6597: abhidheyāyām na api strīpratyayeṣu iti . katham tarhi strīgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6598: svarayiṣyate . tatra svaritena adhikāragatiḥ bhavati iti striyām iti adhikṛtya ye pratayāḥ vihitāḥ teṣām pratiṣedhaḥ vijñāsyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6600: ucyate . asarūpasya vāvacanam utsargasya bādhakaviṣaye anivṛttyartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:6601: asarūpasya vāvacanam kriyate utsargasya bādhakaviṣaye anivṛttiḥ yathā syāt . tavyattavyānīyaraḥ utsargāḥ . teṣām ajantāt yat apavādaḥ . ceyam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6602: cetavyam iti api yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . ajantāt yat vidhīyate . halantāt ṇyat vidhīyate . etāvantaḥ ca dhātavaḥ yat uta ajantāḥ halantāḥ ca . ucyante ca tavyādayaḥ . te vacanāt bhaviṣyanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6603: evam tarhi ṇvultṛcau utsargau . tayoḥ pacādibhyaḥ ac apavādaḥ . pacati iti pacaḥ . paktā pācakaḥ iti api yathā syāt . etat api na asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6604: vakṣyati etat . ac api sarvadhātubhyaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti . evam tarhi ṇvultṛjacaḥ utsargāḥ teṣām igupadhāt kaḥ apavādaḥ . vikṣipaḥ vilikhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6605: vikṣeptā vikṣepakaḥ iti api yathā syāt . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . tatra utpattivāprasaṅgaḥ yathā taddhite . tatra utpattiḥ vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:6606: prāpnoti yathā taddhite . astu . yadā vikṣipaḥ vilikhaḥ iti etat na tadā vikṣeptā vikṣepakaḥ iti etat bhaviṣyati . yadi etat labhyeta kṛtam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:6607: tat tu na labhyam . kim kāraṇam . yathā taddhite iti ucyate . tadditeṣu ca sarvam eva utsargāpavādam vibhāṣā . utpadyate vā na vā . siddham tu asarūpasya bādhakasya vāvacanāt . siddham etat . katham . asarūpasya bādhakasya vāvacanāt . asarūpaḥ bādhakaḥ vā bādhakaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6608: . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:6609: tatra utpattivāprasaṅgaḥ yathā taddhite iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . asti kāraṇam yena taddhite vibhāṣā utpattiḥ bhavati . kim kāraṇam . prakṛtiḥ tatra prakṛtyarthe vartate . anyena śabdena pratyayārthaḥ abhidhīyate . iha punaḥ na kevalā prakṛtiḥ prakṛtyarthe vartate na ca anyaḥ śabdaḥ asti yaḥ tam artham abhidadhīta iti kṛtvā anutpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati . atha vā samayaḥ kṛtaḥ . na kevalā prakṛtiḥ prayoktavyā na ca kevalaḥ pratyayaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6610: . etasmāt samayāt anutpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati . nanu ca yaḥ eva tasya samayasya kartā saḥ eva idam api āha . yadi asau tatra pramāṇam iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:6611: pramāṇam bhavitum arhati . pramāṇam asau tatra ca iha ca . sāmarthyam tu iha draṣṭavyam prayoge . na ca anutpattau sāmarthyam asti . tena anutpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati . katham tarhi taddhiteṣu anutpattau sāmarthyam bhavati . anyena pratyayena sāmarthyam . kena . ṣaṣṭhyā . atha vā rūpavattām āśritya vāvidhiḥ ucyate . na ca anutpattiḥ rūpavatī . tena anutpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati . evam api kutaḥ etat apavādaḥ vibhāṣā bhaviṣyati na punaḥ utsargaḥ iti . na ca eva asti viśeṣaḥ yat apavādaḥ vibhāṣā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6612: utsargaḥ vā . api ca sāpekṣaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ kriyate vā asarūpaḥ iti . na ca utsargavelāyām kim cit apekṣyam asti . apavādavelāyām punaḥ utsargaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6613: apekṣyate . tena yaḥ rūpavān anyapūrvakaḥ bādhakaḥ prāpnoti saḥ vā bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . kaḥ punaḥ asau . apavādaḥ . yadi yaḥ rūpavān
GS24pmbhasuu:6614: anyapūrvakaḥ bādhakaḥ prāpnoti saḥ vā bādhakaḥ bhavati iti ucyate kvibādiṣu samāveśaḥ na prāpnoti . grāmaṇīḥ grāmaṇāyaḥ iti . na hi ete
GS24pmbhasuu:6615: rūpavantaḥ . ete api rūpavantaḥ . kasyām avasthāyām . upadeśāvasthāyām .
GS24pmbhasuu:6616: yadi evam anubandhabhinneṣu vibhāṣāprasaṅgaḥ . anubandhabhinneṣu vibhāṣā prāpnoti . karmaṇi aṇ ātaḥ anupasarge kaḥ iti kaviṣaye aṇ api prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6617: siddham anubandhasya anekāntatvāt . siddham etat . katham . anubandhasya anekāntatvāt . anekāntāḥ anubandhāḥ . atha vā prayoge asarūpāṇām vāvidhiḥ nyāyyaḥ . prayoge cet lādeśeṣu pratiṣedhaḥ . prayoge cet lādeśeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:6618: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . hyaḥ apacat iti atra luṅ api prāpnoti . śvaḥ paktā iti atra lṛṭ api prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na
GS24pmbhasuu:6619: lādeśeṣu vā asarūpaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam haśaśvatoḥ laṅ ca iti āha . atha vā prayoge asarūpāṇām vāvidhau na sarvam iṣṭam saṅgṛhītam iti kṛtvā dvitīyaḥ prayogaḥ upāsyate . kaḥ asau . upadeśaḥ nāma . upadeśe ca ete
GS24pmbhasuu:6620: sarūpāḥ . nanu ca uktam anubandhabhinneṣu vibhāṣāprasaṅgaḥ iti . parihṛtam etat . katham . siddham anubandhasya anekāntatvāt . atha ekānte doṣaḥ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:6621: . ekānte ca na doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na anubandhakṛtam asārūpyam bhavati iti yat ayam dadādidadhātyoḥ vibhāṣā śam śāsti . atha vā asarūpaḥ bādhakaḥ vā bādhakaḥ bhavati iti ucyate . apavādaḥ nāma anubandhabhinnaḥ vā bhavati rūpānyatvena vā . tena anena avaśyam kim cit tyājyam kim cit tu saṅgrahītavyam . tat yat anubandhakṛtam asārūpyam tat na āśrayiṣyāmaḥ yat tu rūpānyatvena asārūpyam tat āśrayiṣyāmaḥ . atha vā asarūpaḥ bādhakaḥ vā bādhakaḥ bhavati iti ucyate sarvaḥ ca asarūpaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6622: tatra prakarṣagatiḥ vijñāsyate : sādhīyaḥ yaḥ asarūpaḥ iti . kaḥ ca sādhīyaḥ . yaḥ prayoge ca prāk ca prayogāt . atha vā asarūpaḥ bādhakaḥ vā bādhakaḥ bhavati iti ucyate . na ca evam kaḥ cit api sarūpaḥ . te evam vijñāsyāmaḥ : kvat cit ye asarūpāḥ . anubandhabhinnāḥ ca prayoge sarūpāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6623: (P_3,1.94.3) KA_II,80.15-26 Ro_III,199-200 atha katham idam vijñāyate astriyām iti . kim striyām na bhavati āhosvit prāk striyāḥ bhavati iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:6628: āsitvā bhuṅkte . āsyate bhoktum iti api yathā syāt . kālādiṣu tumuni .
GS24pmbhasuu:6629: kālādiṣu tumuni vāvacanam kartavyam . kālaḥ bhoktum . kālaḥ bhojanasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6631: (P_3,1.94.4) KA_II,81.1-6 Ro_III,200 arhe tṛjvidhānam . arhe tṛc vidheyaḥ . ime arhe kṛtyāḥ vidhīyante . te viśeṣavihitāḥ sāmānyavihitam
GS24pmbhasuu:6632: tṛcam bādheran . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . bhāvakarmaṇoḥ kṛtyāḥ vidhīyante kartari tṛc . kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ yat bhāvakarmaṇoḥ kṛtyāḥ kartari tṛcam bādheran . evam tarhi arhe kṛtyatṛjvidhānam . arhe kṛtyatṛcaḥ vidheyāḥ . ayam arhe liṅ
GS24pmbhasuu:6633: vidhīyate . saḥ viśeṣavihitaḥ sāmānyavihitān kṛtyatṛcaḥ bādheta .
GS24pmbhasuu:6635: kṛtyasañjñāyām prāk ṇvulaḥ iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . ṇvulaḥ kṛtyasañjñā mā bhūt . arhe kṛtyatrjvacanam tu jñāpakam prāṅṇvulavanānarthyasya . yat ayam arhe kṛtyatṛcaḥ ca iti tṛjgrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ prāk ṇvulaḥ kṛtyasañjñā bhavati iti . evam api ṇvulaḥ kṛtyasañjñā prāpnoti . yogāpekṣam jñāpakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6637: kelimaraḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . pacelimāḥ māṣāḥ . paktavyāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6638: bhidelimāḥ saralāḥ . bhettavyāḥ . vaseḥ tavyat kartari ṇit ca . vaseḥ tavyat kartari vaktavyaḥ . ṇit ca asau bhavati iti vaktavyam . vasati iti vāstavyaḥ . taddhitaḥ vā . taddhitaḥ vā punaḥ eṣaḥ bhaviṣyati . vāstuni bhavaḥ vāstavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6640: ajantāt yathā syāt . halantāt mā bhūt iti . na etat asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6641: halantāt ṇyat vidhīyate . saḥ bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . yathā eva tarhi ṇyat yatam bādhate evam tavyādīn api bādheta . ajgrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:6642: ajantāt yat vidhīyate halantāt ṇyat . etāvantaḥ ca dhātavaḥ yat uta ajantāḥ halantāḥ ca . ucyante ca tavyādayaḥ . te vacanāt bhaviṣyanti . na etat asti prayojanam . vāsarūpeṇa tavyādayaḥ bhaviṣyanti . idam tarhi prayojanam . ajantabhūtapūrvamātrāt api yathā syāt . lavyam pavyam ārdhadhātukasāmānye guṇe kṛte yi pratyayasāmānye ca vāntādeśe kṛte halantāt iti ṇyat prāpnoti . tathā ditsyam dhitsyam . ārdhadhātukasāmānye akāralope kṛte halantāt iti ṇyat prāpnoti . ajgrahaṇasāmarthyāt yat eva
GS24pmbhasuu:6645: yati jāteḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . janyam vatsena . atyalpam idam ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6646: . takiśasicatiyatijanīnām upasaṅkhyānam iti vaktavyam . taki takyam : śasi śasyam . yati yatyam : jani : janyam . hanaḥ vā vadha ca . hanaḥ vā yat
GS24pmbhasuu:6647: vaktavyaḥ vadha iti ayam ca ādeśaḥ vaktavyaḥ . vadhyaḥ ghātyaḥ . taddhitaḥ vā . taddhitaḥ vā punaḥ eṣaḥ bhaviṣyati . vadham arhati vadhyaḥ . yadi taddhitaḥ samāsaḥ na prāpnoti : asivadhyaḥ , musalavadhyaḥ iti . yadi punaḥ sati sādhanam kṛtā iti vā pādahārakādyartham iti samāsaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . yadi punaḥ asivadhaśabdāt utpattiḥ syāt . asivadham arhati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6648: na evam śakyam . svare hi doṣaḥ syāt . asivadhyaḥ evam svaraḥ prasajyeta .

GS24pmbhasuu:6651: anupasargāt careḥ iti atra āṅi ca agurau iti vaktavyam . ācaryaḥ deśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6653: (P_3,1.103) KA_II,83.6-7 Ro_III,203 svāmini antodāttatvam ca . svāmini antodāttatvam ca vaktavyam . āryaḥ svāmī .
GS24pmbhasuu:6655: pratyudāhriyate . ajaraḥ kambalaḥ . ajaritā kambalaḥ iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam kartṛsādhanaḥ pratyudāhriyate . na bhāvasādhanaḥ pratyudāhāryaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6656: evam tarhi ajaryam kartari . ajaryam kartari iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . gatyarthānām ktaḥ kartari vidhīyate . tena yogāt ajaryam kartari bhaviṣyati . gatyarthānām vai ktaḥ karmaṇi api vidhīyate . tena yogāt ajaryam karmaṇi api prāpnoti . jīryatiḥ akarmakaḥ bhāve tarhi prāpnoti . saṅgatagrahaṇam idānīm kimartham syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:6657: kartṛviśeṣaṇam saṅgatagrahaṇam . saṅgatam cet kartṛ bhavati iti . tat yathā hṛṣeḥ lomasu iti lomāni cet kartṝṇi bhavanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6658: (P_3,1.106) KA_II,83.18-84.2 vadaḥ supi anupasargagrahaṇam . vadaḥ supi anupasargagrahaṇam kartavyam . iha mā bhūt . pravādyam apavādyam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6659: . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . anupasarge iti vartate . evam tarhi anvācaṣṭe anupasarge iti vartate . na etat anvākhyeyam adhikārāḥ anuvartante iti . eṣaḥ eva nyāyaḥ yat uta adhikārāḥ anuvarteran iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6661: karmaṇi mā bhūt iti . na etat asti prayojanam . bhavatiḥ ayam akarmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6662: akarmakāḥ api vai dhātavaḥ sopasargāḥ sakarmakāḥ bhavanti . tena anubhavyam āmantraṇam iti atra api prāpnoti . etat api na asti prayojanam . anupasarge iti vartate . uttarārtham tarhi bhāvagrahaṇam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6663: hanaḥ ta ca bhāve yathā syāt . śvahatyā vartate . kva mā bhūt . śvaghātyaḥ vṛṣālaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6664: (P_3,1.108) KA_II,84.10-13 Ro_III,206 hanaḥ taḥ cit striyām chandasi .
GS24pmbhasuu:6665: hanaḥ taḥ ca iti atra cit striyām chandasi vaktavyaḥ . tām bhrūṇahatyām nigṛhya anucaraṇam . asyai tvām bhrūṇahatyāyai caturtham pratigṛhāṇa .
GS24pmbhasuu:6666: striyām iti kimartham . āghnate dasyuhatyāya . chandasi iti kimartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:6668: (P_3,1.109) KA_II,84.15-85.5 Ro_III,206-207 kyap iti vartamāne punaḥ kyabgrahaṇam kimartham . kyap eva yathā syāt . anyat yat prāpnoti tat mā bhūt iti . kim ca anyat prāpnoti . ṇyat . oḥ āvaśyake ṇyataḥ stoteḥ kyap pūrvavipratiṣiddham iti vakṣyati . saḥ pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ na paṭhitavyaḥ bhavati . atha vā hanaḥ taḥ cit striyām chandasi coditaḥ . saḥ na vaktavyaḥ bhavati . kyabvidhau vṛñgrahaṇam . kyabvidhau vṛñgrahaṇam kartavyam . iha mā bhūt . vāryāḥ ṛtvijaḥ iti . añjeḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:6669: sañjñāyām . sañjñāyām añjeḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . ājyam . yadi kyap vṛddhiḥ na prāpnoti . tasmāt ṇyat eṣaḥ . yadi ṇyat upadhālopaḥ na prāpnoti . tasmāt kyap eṣaḥ . nanu ca uktam vṛddhiḥ na prāpnoti iti . āṅpūrvasya eṣaḥ prayogaḥ bhaviṣyati . yadi evam avagrahaḥ prāpnoti . na lakṣaṇena padakārāḥ anuvartyāḥ . padkāraiḥ nāma lakṣaṇam anuvartyam . yathālakṣaṇam padam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6670: (P_3,1.111) KA_II,85.7-10 Ro_III,207-208 dīrghoccāraṇam kimartham na i ca khanaḥ iti eva ucyeta . kā rūpasiddhiḥ : kheyam . ādguṇena siddham . na sidhyati . ṣatvatukoḥ asiddhaḥ ekādeśaḥ iti ekādeśasya asiddhatvāt tuk prasajyeta . na etat asti . padāntapadādyoḥ ekādeśaḥ asiddhaḥ . na ca eṣaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:6674: . bhṛñaḥ sañjñāpratiṣedhe striyām apratiṣedhaḥ . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . kim kāraṇam . anyena vihitatvāt . anyena lakṣaṇena striyām
GS24pmbhasuu:6676: pratiṣedhaḥ idānīm kimarthaḥ syāt . pratiṣedhaḥ kimarthaḥ iti cet astrīsañjñāpratiṣedhārthaḥ . pratiṣedhaḥ kimarthaḥ iti cet astrīsañjñā asti tadarthaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ syāt . bhāryāḥ nāma kṣatriyāḥ . siddham tu striyām sañjñāpratiṣedhāt . siddham etat . katham . striyām sañjñāpratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . sañjñāyām samajaniṣadanipatamanavidaṣuñśīṅbhṛñiṇaḥ tataḥ na striyām bhṛñaḥ iti sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:6677: bhṛñaḥ sañjñāpratiṣedhe striyām apratiṣedhaḥ anyena vihitatvāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . bhāve iti tatra anuvartate . karmasādhanaḥ ca ayam . atha vā ye ete sañjñāyām vidhīyante teṣu na evam vijñāyate sañjñāyām abhidheyāyām iti . kim tarhi . pratyayāntena cet sañjñā gamyate iti . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:6678: sañjñāyām puṃsi dṛṣṭatvāt na te bhāryā prasidhyati . sañjñāyām puṃsi dṛṣṭatvāt tava bhāryāśabdaḥ na sidhyati . striyām bhāvādhikāraḥ asti tena bhāryā prasidhyati . bhāve iti tatra vartate . karmasādhanaḥ ca ayam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6679: atha vā bahulam kṛtyāḥ sañjñāyām iti tat smṛtam . atha vā kṛtyalyuṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6680: bahulam iti evam atra api ṇyat bhaviṣyati . yathā yatyam janyam yathā bhittiḥ tathā eva sā . samaḥ ca bahulam . samaḥ ca bahulam upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . sambhṛtyāḥ eva sambhārāḥ . sambhāryāḥ eva sambhārāḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:6751: (P_3,2.1.2) KA_II,94.16-95.15 Ro_III,221-223 akārāt anupapadāt karmopapadaḥ vipratiṣedhena . akārāt anupapadāt karmopapadaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . anupapadasya avakāśaḥ pacati iti pacaḥ . karmopapadasya avakāśaḥ kumbhakāraḥ nagarakāraḥ . odanapāce ubhayam prāpnoti . karmopadaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . anupapadasya avakāśaḥ vikṣipaḥ vilikhaḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:6771: hva anyatra . āhvaḥ prahvaḥ iti . ke hi samprasāraṇaprasaṅgaḥ . ke hi sati
GS24pmbhasuu:6772: samprasāraṇam prasajyeta . samprasāraṇe kṛte samprasāraṇapūrvatve ca uvaṅādeśe āhuvaḥ iti etat rūpam syāt . saḥ tarhi vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . astu atra samprasāraṇam . samprasāraṇe kṛte ākāralopaḥ . tasya sthānivadbhāvāt uvaṅādeśaḥ na bhaviṣyati . pūrvatve kṛte prāpnoti . evam tarhi idam iha sampradhāryam . ākāralopaḥ kriyatām pūrvatvam iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt ākāralopaḥ . na sidhyati . antaraṅgatvāt pūrvatvam prāpnoti . evam tarhi vārṇāt āṅgam balīyaḥ bhavati iti ākāralopaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam tarhi idam iha sampradhāryam . ākāralopaḥ kriyatām samprasāraṇam iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt ākāralopaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6773: nityam samprasāraṇam . kṛte api ākāralope prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6774: ākāralopaḥ api nityaḥ . kṛte api samprasāraṇe prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:6775: . anityaḥ ākāralopaḥ . na hi kṛte samprasāraṇe prāpnoti . antaraṅgam hi pūrvatvam bhādhate . yasya lakṣaṇāntareṇa nimittam vihanyate na tat
GS24pmbhasuu:6776: anityam . na ca samprasāraṇam eva ākāralopasya nimittam hanti . avaśyam lakṣaṇāntaram pūrvatvam pratīkṣyam . ubhayoḥ nityayoḥ paratvāt ākāralopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6777: . ākāralope kṛte samprasāraṇam . samprasāraṇe kṛte yaṇādeśe siddham rūpam āhvaḥ prahvaḥ iti . evam api na sidhyati . yaḥ anādiṣṭād acaḥ pūrvaḥ tasya vidhim prati sthānivadbhāvaḥ . ādiṣṭāt ca eṣaḥ acaḥ pūrvaḥ bhavati . evam tarhi ākāralopasya asiddhatvāt uvaṅādeśaḥ na bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:6778: ākāralopasya asiddhatvāt uvaṅādeśaḥ na syāt . juhuvatuḥ jhuhuvuḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6779: asti atra viśeṣaḥ . akṛte atra āttve pūrvatvam bhavati . idam iha sampradhāryam āttvam kriyatām pūrvatvam iti . kim atra kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6780: paratvāt pūrvatvam . na sidhyati . antaraṅgatvāt āttvam prāpnoti . evam tarhi idam iha sampradhāryam . āttvam kriyatām samprasāraṇam iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt āttvam . nityam samprasāraṇam . kṛte api āttve
GS24pmbhasuu:6781: prāpnoti akṛte api . āttvam api nityam . kṛte api samprasāraṇe prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti . anityam āttvam . na hi samprasāraṇe kṛte prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6782: paratvāt pūrvatvena eva bhavitavyam . yasya lakṣaṇāntareṇa nimittam
GS24pmbhasuu:6783: vihanyate na tat anityam . na ca samprasāraṇam eva āttvasya nimittam

GS24pmbhasuu:6987: tatra ekādeśaḥ . vyañjane yaṇādeśārtham vā . atha vā vyañjane eva yaṇādeśaḥ nipātyate . yaṇādeśe kṛte ekācaḥ iti iṭ siddhaḥ bhavati . aparaḥ āha : na upeyivān nipātyaḥ . dvirvacanād iṭ bhaviṣyati paratvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:6988: dvirvacanam kriyatām iṭ iti iṭ bhaviṣyati vipratiṣedhena . iha api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:6989: dvirvacanāt iṭ syāt bibhidvān cicchidvān . anyeṣām ekācām dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:6990: nityam iti āhuḥ . anyeṣām ekācām nityam dvirvacanam . kṛte api iṭi
GS24pmbhasuu:6991: prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti . asya punaḥ iṭ ca nityaḥ dvivracanam ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:6992: asya punaḥ iṭ ca eva nityaḥ dvivracanam ca . dvirvacane ca kṛte ekāc bhavati . katham . ekādeśe kṛte . tasmāt iṭ bādhate dvitvam . tasmāt iṭ dvirvacanam bādhate . anūcānaḥ kartari . anūcānaḥ kartarīti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6993: anūktavān anūcānaḥ . anūktam iti eva anyatra . na upeyivān nipātyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6994: dvirvacanād iṭ bhaviṣyati paratvāt . anyeṣām ekācām dvirvacanam nityam iti āhuḥ . asya punaḥ iṭ ca nityaḥ dvivracanam ca . na vihanyate hi asya .
GS24pmbhasuu:6995: dvirvacane ca ekāctvāt . tasmāt iṭ bādhate dvitvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6996: (P_3,2.110.1) KA_II,117.25-111.14 Ro_III,266-267 luṅlṛṭoḥ apavādaprasaṅgaḥ bhūtabhaviṣyatoḥ aviśeṣavacanāt . luṅlṛṭoḥ apavādaḥ prāpnoti . agāma ghoṣān . apāma payaḥ . aśayiṣmahi pūtīkatṛṇeṣu gamiṣyāmaḥ ghoṣān . pāsyāmaḥ payaḥ . śayiṣyāmahe pūtīkatṛṇeṣu . kim kāraṇam . bhūtabhaviṣyatoḥ aviśeṣavacanāt . bhūtabhaviṣyatoḥ aviśeṣeṇa vidhīyete luṅlṛṭau . tayoḥ viśeṣavihitau lanluṭau apavādau prāpnutaḥ . na vā apavādasya nimittābhāvāt anadyatane hi tayoḥ vidhānam . na vā eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6997: doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . apavādasya nimittābhāvāt . na atra apavādasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6998: nimittam asti . kim kāraṇam . anadyatane hi tayoḥ vidhānam . anadyatane hi tau vidhīyete laṅluṭau . na ca atra anadyatanaḥ kālaḥ vivakṣitaḥ . kim tarhi . bhūtakālasāmānyam bhaviṣyatkālasāmānyam ca . yadi api tāvat atra etat śakyate vaktum gamiṣyāmaḥ ghoṣān pāsyāmaḥ payaḥ śayiṣyāmahe
GS24pmbhasuu:6999: pūtīkatṛṇeṣu iti yatra etat na jñāyate kim kadā iti . iha tu katham agāma ghoṣān apāma payaḥ aśayiṣmahi pūtīkatṛṇeṣu yatra etat nirjñātam bhavati amuṣmin ahani gatam iti . atra api na vā apavādasya nimittābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7000: anadyatane hi tayoḥ vidhānam iti eva . katham punaḥ sataḥ nāma avivakṣā syāt . sataḥ api avivakṣā bhavati . tat yathā . alomikā eḍakā . anudarā kanyā . asataḥ ca vivakṣā bhavati . tat yathā . samudraḥ kuṇḍikā .
GS24pmbhasuu:7002: (P_3,2.110.2) KA_II,118.15-20 Ro_III,268 vaseḥ luṅ rātriśeṣe . vaseḥ luṅ rātriśeṣe vaktavyaḥ . nyāyye pratyutthāne pratyutthitam kaḥ cit kam
GS24pmbhasuu:7003: cit pṛcchati . kva bhavān uṣitaḥ iti . saḥ āha . amutra avātsam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7004: amutra avasam iti prāpnoti . jāgaraṇasantatau . jāgaraṇasantatau iti vaktavyam . yaḥ hi muhūrtamātram api svapiti tatra amutra avasam iti eva bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7005: (P_3,2.111) KA_II,118.22-119.7 Ro_III,268-269 anadyatane iti bahuvrīhinirdeśaḥ adya hyaḥ abhukṣmahi iti . anadyatane iti bahuvrīhinirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . avidyamānādyatane anadyatane iti . kim prayojanam . adya hyaḥ abhukṣmahi iti . adya ca hyaḥ ca abhukṣmahi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7006: vyāmiśre luṅ eva yathā syāt . yadi evam adyatane api laṅ prāpnoti . na hi adyatane adyatanaḥ vidyate . adyatane api adyatanaḥ vidyate . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:7007: vyapadeśivadbhāvena . parokṣe ca lokavijñāte prayoktuḥ darśanaviṣaye .
GS24pmbhasuu:7008: parokṣe ca lokavijñāte prayoktuḥ darśanaviṣaye laṅ vaktavyaḥ . aruṇat yavanaḥ sāketam . aruṇat yavanaḥ madhamikām . parokṣe iti kimartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:7009: udagāt ādityaḥ . lokavijñate iti kimartham . cakāra kaṭam devadattaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7010: prayoktuḥ darśanaviṣaye iti kimartham . jaghāna kaṃsam kila vāsudevaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7011: (P_3,2.114) KA_II,119.9-17 Ro_III,269-270 kim udāharaṇam . tatra saktūn pāsyāmaḥ . abhijānāsi devadatta tatra saktūn apibāma . bhavet pūrvam param ākāṅkṣati iti sākāṅkṣam syāt . param tu katham sākāṅkṣam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7012: param api sākāṅkṣam . katham asti asmin ākāṅkṣā iti ataḥ sākāṅkṣam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7013: vibhāṣā sākāṅkṣe sarvatra . vibhāṣā sākāṅkṣe sarvatra iti vaktavyam . kva sarvatra . yadi ca ayadi ca . yadi tāvat . abhijānāsi devadatta yat
GS24pmbhasuu:7014: kaśmīrān gamiṣyāmaḥ yat kaśmīrān agacchāma yat tatra odanam bhokṣyāmahe yat tatra odanam abhuñjmahi . abhijānāsi devadatta kaśmīrān gamiṣyāmaḥ kaśmīrān agacchāma tatra odanam bhokṣyāmahe tatra odanam abhuñjmahi .
GS24pmbhasuu:7016: kim parokṣam nāma . param akṣṇaḥ parokṣam . akṣi punaḥ kim . aśnoteḥ ayam auṇādikaḥ karaṇasādhanaḥ si pratyayaḥ . anute anena iti akṣi . yadi evam parākṣam iti prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . parobhāvaḥ parasya akṣe parokṣe liṭi dṛśyatām . paraśabdasya akṣaśabde uttarapade parobhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7017: utvam vā ādeḥ parāt akṣṇaḥ .atha vā paraśabdāt uttarasya akṣiśabdasya utvam vaktavyam . siddham vā asmāt nipātanāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7019: kāle . na vai kālādhikāraḥ asti . evam tarhi dhātoḥ iti vartate . dhātau parokṣe . dhātuḥ vai śabdaḥ . na ca śabdasya pratyakṣaparokṣatāyām sambhavaḥ asti . śabde asambhavāt arthe kāryam vijñāsyate . parokṣe dhātau parokṣe dhātvarthe iti . kaḥ punaḥ dhātvarthaḥ . kriyā . kriyāyām parokṣāyām . yadi evam hyaḥ apacat iti atra api liṭ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . kriyā nāma iyam atyantāparidṛṣṭā anumānagamyā aśakyā piṇḍībhūtā nidarśayitum yathā garbhaḥ nirluṭhitaḥ . evam tarhi sādhaneṣu parokṣeṣu .
GS24pmbhasuu:7020: sādhaneṣu ca bhavataḥ kaḥ sampratyayaḥ . yadi sāvad guṇasamudāyaḥ sādhanam sādhanam api anumānagamyam . atha anyat guṇebhyaḥ sādhanam bhavati prtayakṣaparokṣatāyām sambhavaḥ . atha yadā anena rathyāyām taṇḍulodakam dṛṣṭam katham tatra bhavitavyam . yadi tāvat sādhaneṣu parokṣeṣu papāca iti bhavitavyam . bhavanti hi tasya sādhanāni parokṣāṇi . atha ye ete
GS24pmbhasuu:7021: kriyākṛtāḥ viśeṣāḥ cītkārāḥ phūtkārāḥ ca teṣu parokṣeṣu evam api papāca iti bhavitavyam . kathañjātīyakam punaḥ parokṣam nāma . ke cit tāvat āhuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7022: . varṣaśatavṛttam parokṣam iti . apare āhuḥ . kaṭāntaritam parokṣam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7023: apare āhūḥ . dvyahavṛttam tryahvṛttam ca iti . sarvathā uttamaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:7024: sidhyati . suptamattoyoḥ iti vaktavyam . suptaḥ aham kila vilalāpa .
GS24pmbhasuu:7025: mattaḥ aham kila vilalāpa . suptaḥ nu aham kila vilalāpa . mattaḥ nu aham
GS24pmbhasuu:7026: kila vilalāpa . atha vā bhavati vai kaḥ cit jāgarat api vartamānakālam na upalabhate . tat yathā vaiyākaraṇānām śākaṭāyanaḥ rathamārge āsīnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7027: śakaṭasāṛtham yāntam na upalabhate . kim punaḥ kāraṇam jāgarat api vartamānakālam na upalabhate . manasā saṃyuktāni indriyāṇi upalabdhau kāraṇāni bhavanti . manasaḥ asānnidhyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7029: ca . parokṣe liṭ iti atra atyantāapahnave ca iti vaktavyam . no khaṇḍikān jagāma no kaliṅgān jagāma . na kārisomam prapau . na dārvajasya pratijagrāha . kaḥ me manuṣyaḥ praharet vadhāya . parobhāvaḥ parasya akṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:7030: parokṣe liṭi dṛśyatām . utvam vā ādeḥ parāt akṣṇaḥ . siddham vā asmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7032: (P_3,2.118) KA_II,121.2-122.3 Ro_III,275-278 sma purā bhūtamātre na sma purā adyatane . sma purā bhūtamātre na sma purā adyatane iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7033: . kim ayam smādividhiḥ purāntaḥ aviśeṣeṇa bhūtamātre bhavati . tatra vaktavyam smalakṣaṇaḥ purālakṣaṇaḥ ca adyatane na bhavataḥ iti . āhosvit smalakṣaṇaḥ purālakṣaṇaḥ ca aviśeṣeṇa bhūtamātre bhavataḥ iti . tatra smādyartham na sma purā adyatane iti vaktavyam . kim ca ataḥ . smādividhiḥ purāntaḥ yadi aviśeṣeṇa kim kṛtam bhavati na sma purā adyatane iti bruvatā kātyāyanena iha . smādividhiḥ purāntaḥ yadi aviśeṣeṇa bhavati kim
GS24pmbhasuu:7034: vārttikakāraḥ pratiṣedhena karoti na sma purā adyatane iti . anuvṛttiḥ anadyatanasya lāt sme iti tatra na asti nañkāryam . laṭ sme iti atra anadyatane iti etat anuvartiṣyate . aparokṣānadyatanaḥ nanau ca nanvoḥ ca nivṛttau na purā adyatane iti bhavet etat vācyam . tatra etāvat vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7035: syāt na purā adyatane iti . tatra ca api laṅgrahaṇam . tatra ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:7036: laṅgrahaṇam jñapakam na purālakṣaṇaḥ adyatane bhavati iti . atha buddhiḥ aviśeṣād sma purā hetū . atha buddhiḥ aviśeṣeṇa sma purā hetū iti . tatra ca api śrṇu bhūyaḥ . aparokṣe ce iti eṣaḥ prāk purisaṃśabdanāt avinivṛttaḥ sarvatra anadyatanaḥ . tathā sati nañā kim iha kāryam . smādau aparokṣe ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7037: iti akāryam iti śakyam etat api viddhi . śakyam hi nivartayitum parokṣe iti lāt sme iti atra . syāt eṣā tava buddhiḥ . smalakṣaṇe api evam eva siddham iti . laṭ sme iti bhavet na arthaḥ . tasmāt kāryam parārtham tu .
GS24pmbhasuu:7038: evam tarhi jñāpayati ācāryaḥ smalakṣaṇaḥ purālakṣaṇaḥ ca anadyatane bhavataḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7040: aśiṣyam kriyāsamāpteḥ vivakṣitatvāt . nanau pṛṣṭaprativacane iti aśiṣyaḥ laṭ . kim kāraṇam . kriyāsamāpteḥ vivakṣitatvāt . kriyāyāḥ atra asamāptiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7041: vivakṣitā . eṣaḥ nāma nyāyyaḥ vartamānaḥ kālaḥ yatra kriyāyāḥ asamāptiḥ bhavat . tatra vartamāne laṭ iti eva siddham . yadi vartamāne laṭ iti eva laṭ bhavati śatṛśānacau api prāpnutaḥ . iṣyete śatṛśānacau : nanu mām kurvantam paśya . nanu mām kurvāṇam paśya iti (P_3,2.122) KA_II,122.12-22 Ro_III,278-279 haśaśvadbhyām purā .
GS24pmbhasuu:7042: haśaśvallakṣaṇāt purālakṣaṇaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . haśaśvallakṣaṇasya avakāśaḥ . iti ha akarot . iha ha cakāra . śaśvat akarot . śaśvat cakāra .
GS24pmbhasuu:7043: purālakṣaṇasya avakāśaḥ . rathena ayam purā yāti . rathena ayam purā
GS24pmbhasuu:7044: ayāsīt . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . rathena ha śaśvat purā yāti . rathena ha śaśvat purā ayāsīt . purālakṣaṇaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . smaḥ sarvebhyaḥ vipratiṣedhena . smalakṣaṇaḥ sarvebhyaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:7045: haśaśvallakṣaṇāt purālakṣaṇāt ca . haśaśvallakṣaṇasya avakāśaḥ . iti ha akarot . iha ha cakāra . śaśvat akarot . śaśvat cakāra . purālakṣaṇasya avakāśaḥ . rathena ayam purā yāti . rathena ayam purā ayāsīt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7046: smalakṣaṇasya avakāśaḥ . dharmeṇa sma kuravaḥ yudhyante . iha sarvam prāpnoti . na ha sma vai purā śaśvat aparaśuvṛkṇam dahati . smalakṣaṇaḥ laṭ bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:7047: (P_3,2.123) KA_II,123.2-124.13 Ro_III,279-285 pravṛttasya avirāme śiṣyā bhavantī avartamānatvāt . pravṛttasya avirāme śiṣyā bhavantī . iha adhīmahe . iha vasāmaḥ . iha puṣyamitram yājayāmaḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . avartamānatvāt . nityapravṛtte ca kālāvibhāgāt . nityapravṛtte ca śāsitavyā bhavantī . tiṣṭhanti parvatāḥ . sravanti nadyaḥ iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . kālāvibhāgāt . iha bhūtabhaviṣyatpratidvandvaḥ vartamānaḥ kālaḥ . na ca atra bhūtabhaviṣyantau kālau staḥ . nyāyyā tu ārambhānapavargāt . nyāyyā tu eṣā vartamānakālatā . kutaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7048: ārambhānapavargāt . ārambhaḥ atra anapavṛktaḥ . eṣaḥ nām nyāyyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7049: vartamānaḥ kālaḥ yatra ārambhaḥ anapavṛktaḥ . asti ca muktasaṃśaye virāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7050: . yam khalu api bhavān muktasaṃśayam vartamānam kālam nyāyyam manyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7051: bhuṅkte devadattaḥ iti tena etat tulyam . saḥ api hi avaśyam bhuñjānaḥ hasati vā jalpati vā pānīyam vā pibati . yadi atra yuktā vartamānakālatā dṛśyate iha api yuktā dṛśyatām . santi ca kālavibhāgāḥ . santi khalu api
GS24pmbhasuu:7052: kālavibhāgāḥ . tiṣṭhanti parvatāḥ . sthāsyanti parvatāḥ . tasthuḥ parvatāḥ . kim śakyante ete śabdāḥ prayoktum iti ataḥ santi kālavibhāgāḥ . na avaśyam prayogāt eva . iha bhūtabhaviṣyadvartamānānām rājñām yāḥ kriyāḥ tāḥ tiṣṭhateḥ adhikaraṇam . iha tāvat tiṣṭhanti parvatāḥ iti . samprati ye rājānaḥ teṣām yāḥ kriyāḥ tāsu vartamānāsu . sthāsyanti parvatāḥ iti . itaḥ uttaram ye rājānaḥ bhaviṣyanti teṣām yāḥ kriyāḥ tāsu bhaviṣyantīṣu .
GS24pmbhasuu:7053: tasthuḥ parvatāḥ iti . ye rājānaḥ babhūvuḥ teṣām yāḥ kriyāḥ tāsu vbhūtāsu . aparaḥ āha : na asti vartamānaḥ kālaḥ iti . api ca atra ślokān udāharanti : na vartate cakram . iṣuḥ na pātyate . na syandante saritaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7054: sāgarāya . kūṭasthaḥ ayam lokaḥ na viceṣṭā asti . yaḥ hi evam paśyati saḥ api anandhaḥ . mīmāṃsakaḥ manyamānaḥ yuvā medhāvisammataḥ kākam sma iha anupṛcchati : kim te patitalakṣaṇam . anāgate na patasi atikrānte ca kāka
GS24pmbhasuu:7055: na . yadi samprati patasi sarvaḥ lokaḥ patati ayam . himavān api gacchati
GS24pmbhasuu:7056: . anāgatam atikrāntam vartamānam iti trayam . sarvatra gatiḥ na asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7057: gacchati iti kim ucyate . kriyāpravṛttau yaḥ hetuḥ tadartham yat viceṣṭitam tat samīkṣya prayuñjīta gacchati iti avicārayan . apraḥ āha .
GS24pmbhasuu:7058: asti vartamānaḥ kālaḥ iti . ādityagativat na upalabhyate . api ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:7059: ślokam udāharanti . bisasya vālāḥ iva dahyamānāḥ na lakṣyate vikṛtiḥ sannipāte . asti iti tām vedayante tribhabhāvāḥ . sūkṣmaḥ hi bhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7061: (P_3,2.124.1) KA_II,125.2-20 Ro_III,286-288 lasya aprathamāsamānādhikaraṇena ayogāt adeśānupapattiḥ yathā anyatra . lasya aprathamāsamānādhikaraṇena ayogāt adeśayoḥ nupapattiḥ yathā anyatra . tat yathā anyatra api lasya aprathamāsamānādhikaraṇena yogaḥ na bhavati . kva anyatra . laṅi . apacat odanam devadattaḥ iti . yogaḥ iti cet anyatra api yogaḥ syāt . atha matam etat bhavati yogaḥ iti anyatra api yogaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7062: kva anyatra . laṅi . apacat odanam devadattaḥ iti . na kva cit yogaḥ iti kṛtvā ataḥ sarvatra yogena bhavitavyam kva cit ayogaḥ iti kṛtvā sarvatra ayogena . tat yathā . samānam īhamānānām ca adhīyānānām ca ke cit arthaiḥ yujyante apare na . na ca idānīm kaḥ cit arthavān iti ataḥ sarvaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7063: arthavadbhiḥ śakyam bhavitum kaḥ cit anarthakaḥ iti sarvaiḥ anarthakaiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7064: tatra kim asmābhiḥ śakyam kartum . yat loṭaḥ aprathamāsamānādhikaraṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:7065: yogaḥ bhavati laṅaḥ na svābhāvikam etat . atha vā ādeśe sāmānādhikaraṇyam dṛṣṭvā anumānāt gantavyam prakṛteḥ api sāmānādhikaraṇyam bhavati iti . tat yathā dhūmam dṛṣṭvā agniḥ atra iti gamyate triviṣṭabdhakam dṛṣṭvā parivrājakaḥ iti . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . pratyakṣaḥ tena agnidhūmayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7066: abhisambandhaḥ kṛtaḥ bhavati triviṣṭabdhakaparivrājakayoḥ ca . saḥ tadvideśastham api dṛṣṭvā jānāti agniḥ atra parivrājakaḥ atra iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7067: bhavati vai pratyakṣāt api anumānabalīyastvam . tat yathā alātacakram
GS24pmbhasuu:7068: pratyakṣam dṛśyate anumānāt ca gamyate na etat asti iti . kasya cit khalu
GS24pmbhasuu:7069: api sakṛt kṛtaḥ abhisambandhaḥ atyantāya kṛtaḥ bhavati . tat yathā vṛkṣaparṇayoḥ ayam vṛkṣaḥ idam parṇam iti . saḥ tadvideśastham api dṛṣṭvā jānāti vṛkṣasya idam parṇam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7070: (P_3,2.124.2) KA_II,125.21-127.24 Ro_III,292 kim punaḥ ayam paryudāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7071: : yat anyat prathamāsamānādhikaraṇāt iti , āhosvit prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:7072: prathamāsamānādhikaraṇe na iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . laṭaḥ śatṛśānacau aprathamāsamānādhikaraṇe iti cet pratyayottarapadayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7073: laṭaḥ śatṛśānacau aprathamāsamānādhikaraṇe iti cet pratyayottarapadayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . kaurvataḥ pācataḥ kurvadbhaktiḥ pacadbhaktiḥ kurvāṇabhaktiḥ pacamānabhaktiḥ . astu tarhi prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7074: .prathamāsamānādhikaraṇe na iti . prasajyapratiṣedheuttarapade ādeśānupapattiḥ . prasajyapratiṣedheuttarapade ādeśayoḥ anupapattiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7075: kurvatī ca asau bhaktiḥ ca kurvadbhaktiḥ pacabhaktiḥ kurvāṇabhaktiḥ pacamānabhaktiḥ iti . ye ca api ete samānādhikaraṇavṛttayaḥ taddhitāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7076: tatra ca śatṛśānacau na prāpnutaḥ . kurvattaraḥ pacattaraḥ kurvāṇataraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7077: pacamānataraḥ kurvadrūpaḥ pacadrūpaḥ kurvāṇarūpaḥ pacamānarūpaḥ kurvatkalpaḥ pacatkalpaḥ kurvāṇakalpaḥ pacamānakalpaḥ iti . siddham tu pratyayottarapadayoḥ ca iti vacanāt . siddham etat . katham pratyayottarapadayoḥ ca śatṛśānacau bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam . tatra pratyayasya ādeśanimittatvāt aprasiddhiḥ . tatra pratyayasya ādeśanimittatvāt aprasiddhiḥ . ādeśanimittaḥ pratyayaḥ pratyayanimittaḥ ca ādeśaḥ . tat etat itaretarāśrayam bhavati . itaretarāśrayāṇi ca na
GS24pmbhasuu:7078: praklpante . uttarapadasya ca subantanimittatvāt śatṛśānacoḥ aprasiddhiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7080: uttarapadanimittaḥ sup subantanimittam ca uttarapadam . tat etat itaretarāśrayam bhavati . itaretarāśrayāṇi ca na praklpante . na vā lakārasya kṛttvāt prātipadikatvam tadāśrayam pratyayavidhānam . na vā eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7081: doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . lakārasya kṛttvāt prātipadikatvam . lakāraḥ kṛt kṛt
GS24pmbhasuu:7084: tiṅādeśaḥ kriyatām subutpattiḥ iti paratvāt subutpattiḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7085: tasmāt uttarapadaprasiddhiḥ . tasmāt uttarapadam prasiddham . uttarapade prasiddhe uttarapade iti śatṛśānacau bhaviṣyataḥ . iha api tarhi tiṅādeśāt subutpattiḥ syāt pacati paṭhati iti . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . nityaḥ atra tiṅādeśaḥ . utpanne api supi prāpnoti anutpanne api prāpnoti . nityatvāt tiṅādeśe kṛte subutpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi nityatvāt tiṅādeśaḥ syāt kurvadbhaktiḥ pacadbhaktiḥ pacamānabhaktiḥ iti . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . śatṛśānacau tiṅapavādau tau ca nimittavantau . na ca apavādaviṣaye utsargaḥ abhiniviśate . pūrvam hi apavādāḥ abhiniviśante paścāt utsargaḥ . prakalpya vā apavādaviṣayam tataḥ utsargaḥ abhiniviśate
GS24pmbhasuu:7086: . na tāvat atra kadā cit tiṅ bhavati . apavādau śatṛśānacau pratīkṣate .
GS24pmbhasuu:7087: tat etat kva siddham bhavati . yatra sāmānyāt utpattiḥ . yatra hi viśeṣāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7088: ataḥ iñ iti itaretarāśrayam eva tatra bhavati . vīkṣamāṇasya apatyam vaikṣamāṇiḥ iti . iha ca śatṛśānacau prāpnutaḥ . pacatitarām jalpatitarām pacatirūpam jalpatirūpam pacatikalpam jalpatikalpam pacati paṭhati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7089: tat etat katham kṛtvā siddham bhavati . śatṛśānacau yadi laṭaḥ vā . yadi śatṛśānacau yadi laṭaḥ vā bhavataḥ vyavasthitavibhāṣā ca . tena iha ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7090: bhaviṣyataḥ kaurvataḥ pācataḥ kurvadbhaktiḥ pacadbhaktiḥ pacamānabhaktiḥ kurvattaraḥ pacattaraḥ pacamānataraḥ kurvadrūpaḥ pacadrūpaḥ pacamānarūpaḥ kurvatkalpaḥ pacatkalpaḥ pacamānakalpaḥ pacan paṭhan iti ca laṭaḥ śatṛśānacau . iha ca na bhaviṣyataḥ pacatitarām jalpatitarām pacatirūpam jalpatirūpam pacatikalpam jalpatikalpam pacati paṭhati iti ca laṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7091: śatṛśānacau . tat tarhi vāvacanam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . nanvoḥ vibhāṣā iti . yadi tat anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:7092: vartamāne laṭa iti laṭ api vibhāṣā prāpnoti . sambandham anuvartiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:7093: nanvoḥ vibhāṣā . puri luṅ ca asme vibhāṣā . vartamāne laṭ puri luṅ ca asme
GS24pmbhasuu:7094: vibhāṣā . laṭaḥ śatṛśānacau vibhāṣā . puri luṅ ca asme iti nivṛttam . na tarhi idānīm aprathamāsamānādhikaraṇe iti vaktavyam . vaktavyam ca . kim prayojanam . nityāṛtham . aprathamāsamānādhikaraṇe nityau yathā syātām .
GS24pmbhasuu:7095: kva tarhi idānīm vibhāṣā . prathamāsamānādhikaraṇe . pacan pacati pacamānaḥ pacate iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7096: (P_3,2.126) KA_II,127.26-128.23 Ro_III,292-294 lakṣaṇahetvoḥ kriyāyāḥ guṇe upasaṅkhyānam . lakṣaṇahetvoḥ kriyāyāḥ guṇe upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7097: tiṣṭhan mūtrayati . gacchan bhakṣayati . kartuḥ ca lakṣaṇayoḥ paryāyeṇa acayoge . kartuḥ ca lakṣaṇayoḥ paryāyeṇa acayoge upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7098: yaḥ adhīyānaḥ āste saḥ devadatttaḥ . yaḥ āsīnaḥ adhīte saḥ devadattaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7099: acayoge iti kimartham . yaḥ āste ca adhīte ca saḥ caitraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7100: tattvānvākhyāne ca . tattvānvākhyāne ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . śayānā vardhate dūrvā . āsīnam vardhate bisam iti . sadādayaḥ ca bahulam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7101: sadādayaḥ ca bahulam iti vaktavyam . san brāhmaṇaḥ asti brāhmaṇaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7102: vidyate brāhmaṇaḥ vidyamānaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ iti . iṅjuhotyoḥ vāvacanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7103: iṅjuhotyoḥ vā iti vaktavyam . adhīte adhīyānaḥ . juhoti juhvat . māṅi ākrośe . māṅi ākrośe iti vaktavyam . mā pacan . mā pacamānaḥ . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . lakṣaṇahetvoḥ kriyāyāḥ iti eva siddham . iha tāvat tiṣṭhan mūtrayati iti . tiṣṭhatikriyā mūtrayatikriyāyāḥ lakṣaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7104: gacchan bhakṣayati iti . gacchatikriyā bhakṣayatikriyāyāḥ lakṣaṇam . yaḥ adhīyānaḥ āste saḥ devadatttaḥ iti . adhyayanakriyā āsanakriyāyāḥ lakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7105: . yaḥ āsīnaḥ adhīte saḥ devadattaḥ iti . āsikriyā adhyayanakriyāyāḥ lakṣaṇam . idam tarhi prayojanam . acayoge iti vakṣyāmi iti . iha mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:7106: . yaḥ āste ca adhīte ca saḥ caitraḥ iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . na etat kriyāyāḥ lakṣaṇam . kim tarhi . kartṛlakṣaṇam etat . śayānā vardhate dūrvā iti . śetikriyā vṛddhikriyāyāḥ lakṣaṇam . āsīnam vardhate bisam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7107: . āsikriyā vṛddhikriyāyāḥ lakṣaṇam . sadādayaḥ ca bahulam iṅjuhotyoḥ vā māṅi ākrośe iti vaktavyam eva.
GS24pmbhasuu:7108: (P_3,2.127.1) KA_II,128.25-129.23 Ro_III,294-296 taugrahaṇam kimartham . śatṛśānacau pratinirdiśyete . na etat asti prayojanam . prakṛtau śatṛśānacau anuvartiṣyete . kva prakṛtau . laṭaḥ śatṛsānacau aprathamāsamānādhikaraṇe iti . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . tau sat iti vacanam asaṃsargārtham ṭau grahaṇam kriyate asaṃsargārtham . asaṃsaktayoḥ etaiḥ viśeṣaiḥ śatṛśānacoḥ sañjñā yathā syāt . nanu ca ete viśeṣāḥ nivarteran .
GS24pmbhasuu:7109: yadi api ete viśeṣāḥ nivartante ayam tu khalu vartamānaḥ kālaḥ avaśyam uttarārthaḥ anuvartyaḥ . tasmin anuvartamāne vartamānakālavihitayoḥ eva śatṛśānacoḥ satsñjñā syāt . bhūtabhaviṣyakālavihitayoḥ na syāt . kim punaḥ bhūtabhaviṣyakālavihitayoḥ satsñjñāvacane prayojanam . pūraṇaguṇasuhitasat iti . brāhmaṇasya pakṣyan . brāhmaṇasya pakṣyamāṇaḥ . atha kriyamāṇe api
GS24pmbhasuu:7110: taugrahaṇe katham eva asaṃsaktayoḥ etaiḥ viśeṣaiḥ sañjñā labhyā . labhyā iti āha . katham . tau iti śabdataḥ sat iti yoge kriyamāṇe tau grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7111: yogāṅgam jāyate . sati ca yogāṅge yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . tau . tau etau śatṛśānacau dhātumātrāt parasya pratyayasya bhavataḥ . tataḥ sat .
GS24pmbhasuu:7112: satsñjñau bhavatau śatṛśānacau . iha api tarhi prāpnutaḥ . kārakaḥ hārakaḥ iti . avadhāraṇam lṛṭi vidhānam . lṛtaḥ sat vā iti etat niyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:7113: bhaviṣyati . lṛṭaḥ eva dhātumātrāt parasya na anyasya iti . kaimarthyakyāt niyamaḥ bhavati . vidheyam na asti iti kṛtvā . iha ca asti vidheyam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:7114: . nityau śatṛśānacau prāptau . tau vibhāṣā vidheyau . tatra apūrvaḥ vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7115: astu niyamaḥ astu iti apūrvaḥ eva vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati na niyamaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7116: yogavibhāgataḥ ca vihitam sat . evam tarhi yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . lṛṭaḥ sat . lṛṭaḥ satsañjñau bhavataḥ . kimartham idam . niyamārtham . lṛṭaḥ eva dhātumātrāt parasya na anyasya iti . tataḥ vā . vā ca lṛṭaḥ śatṛśānacau satsañjñau bhavataḥ . tatra ayam api arthaḥ . sadvidhiḥ nityam aprathamāsamānādhikaraṇe iti vakṣyati . tat na vaktavyam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7117: (P_3,2.127.2) KA_II,129.24-130.19 Ro_III,296-297 atha yau etau uttarau śatānau kim etau lādeśau āhosvit alādeśau . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7118: uttarayoḥ lādeśe vāvacanam . uttarayoḥ lādeśe vā iti vaktavyam . pavamānaḥ yajamānaḥ . pavate yajate iti api yathā syāt . sādhanābhidhānam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7119: sādhanābhidhānam ca prāpnoti . laḥ karmaṇi ca bhāve ca akarmakebhyaḥ iti bhāvakarmaṇoḥ api prāpnutaḥ . svaraḥ . svaraḥ ca sādhyaḥ . kati iha pavamānāḥ . adupadeśāt lasārvadhātukam anudāttam bhavati iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ prāpnoti . upagrahapratiṣedhaḥ ca . upagrahasya ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7120: kati iha nighnānāḥ . taṅānau ātmanepadam iti ātmanepadasañjñā prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7121: stām tarhi alādeśau . alādeśe ṣaṣṭhīpratiṣedhaḥ . alādeśe ṣaṣṭhīpratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . somam pavamānaḥ . naḍam āghnānaḥ . adhīyan pārāyaṇam . laprayoge na iti pratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam . tṛn iti eva bhaviṣyati . katham . tṛn iti na idam pratyayagrahaṇam . kim tarhi . pratyāhāragrahaṇam . kva sanniviṣṭāṇām pratyāhāraḥ . laṭaḥ śatṛ iti ataḥ ārabhya ā tṛnaḥ nakārāt . yadi pratyāhāragrahaṇam caurasya dviṣan vṛṣalasya dviṣan atra api prāpnoti . dviṣaḥ śatuḥ vāvacanam . dviṣaḥ śatuḥ vā iti vaktavyam . tat ca avaśyam vaktavyam pratyayagrahaṇe sati
GS24pmbhasuu:7122: pratiṣedhārtham . tat eva pratyāhāragrahaṇe sati vidhyartham bhaviṣyati.
GS24pmbhasuu:7124: anupasargasya . tṛnvidhau ṛtvikṣu ca anupasargasya iti vaktavyam . hotā potā . anupasargasya iti kimartham . praśāstā pratihartā . nayateḥ ṣuk ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7125: . nayateḥ ṣuk vaktavyaḥ . tṛn ca pratyayaḥ vaktavyañ. neṣṭā . na vā dhātvanyatvāt . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . dhātvanyatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7126: dhātvantaram neṣatiḥ . katham jñāyate . neṣatu neṣṭāt iti darśanāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7127: neṣatu neṣṭāt iti prayogaḥ dṛśyate . indraḥ naḥ tena neṣatu . gāḥ vaḥ neṣṭāt . tviṣeḥ devatāyām akāraḥ ca upadhāyāḥ aniṭvam ca . tviṣeḥ devatāyām tṛn vaktavyaḥ akāraḥ ca upadhāyāḥ aniṭvam ca iti . tvaṣṭā . kim punaḥ idam tviṣeḥ eva aniṭvam . na iti āha . yat ca anukrāntam yat ca anukraṃsyate sarvasya eṣaḥ śeṣaḥ aniṭvam iti . kṣadeḥ ca yukte . kṣadeḥ ca yukte tṛn vaktavyaḥ . kṣattā . chandasi tṛc ca . chandasi tṛc ca tṛn ca vaktavyaḥ . kṣattṛbhyaḥ saṅgrahītṛbhyaḥ . kṣattṛbhyaḥ saṅgrahītṛbhyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7129: īkārpratiṣedhaḥ . snoḥ kittve sthaḥ īkārpratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . sthāsnuḥ iti . ghumāsthāgāpājahātisām hali iti īttvam prāpnoti . evam tarhi na kit kariṣyate . akiti guṇapratiṣedhaḥ . yadi akit guṇapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7130: jiṣṇuḥ iti . bhuvaḥ iṭpratiṣedhaḥ ca . bhuvaḥ iṭpratiṣedhaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7131: kim ca anyat . guṇapratiṣedhaḥ ca . bhūṣṇuḥ iti . astu tarhi kit. nanu ca uktam snoḥ kittve sthaḥ īkārpratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7132: sthādaṃśibhyām snuḥ chandasi . sthādaṃśibhyām snuḥ chandasi vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7133: sthāsnu jaṅgamam . daṅkṣṇavaḥ paśavaḥ iti . saḥ idānīm sthaḥ aviśeṣeṇa vidhāsyate . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam astu. nanu ca uktam snoḥ kittve sthaḥ īkārpratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti . evam tarhi git kariṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:7134: sthoḥ gittvāt na sthaḥ īkāraḥ . sthoḥ gittvāt sthaḥ īkāraḥ na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7135: kim kāraṇam . kṅitoḥ īttvaśāsanāt . kṅitoḥ īttvam śiṣyate . iha tarhi jiṣṇuḥ iti guṇaḥ prāpnoti . guṇābhāvaḥ triṣu smāryaḥ . guṇābhāvaḥ triṣu smartavyaḥ . giti kiti ṅiti iti . tat gakāragrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . kriyate nyāse eva . kakāre gakāraḥ cartvabhūtaḥ nirdiśyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:7136: kkṅiti ca iti . iha tarhi bhūṣṇuḥ iti śryukaḥ kiti iti iṭpratiṣedhaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:7137: prāpnoti . śryuko aniṭtvam gakoḥ itoḥ . śryukaḥ aniṭtvam gakārakakārayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7138: iti vaktavyam . tat gakāragrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . kriyate nyāsaḥ eva . kakāre gakāraḥ cartvabhūtaḥ nirdiśyate . śryukaḥ kkiti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7139: yadi evam cartvasya asiddhatvāt haśi iti uttvam prāpnoti . sautraḥ nirdeśaḥ . atha vā asaṃhitayā nirdeśaḥ kariṣyate . śryukaḥ kkiti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7140: sthoḥ gittvāt na sthaḥ īkāraḥ kṅitoḥ īttvaśāsanāt . guṇābhāvaḥ triṣu smāryaḥ . śryuko aniṭtvam gakoḥ itoḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7142: ghinuṇi hi sati śaminau śaminaḥ taminau taminaḥ ugidacām sarvanāmasthāne adhātoḥ iti num prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . jhalgrahaṇam tatra codayiṣyati . iha tarhi : śaminitarā śaminītarā taminitarā taminītarā :
GS24pmbhasuu:7143: ugitaḥ ghādiṣu nadyāḥ anyatarasyām hrasvaḥ bhavati iti anyaratasyām hrasvatvam prasajyeta . iṣyate eva hrasvatvam . ghinuṇ akarmakāṇām .
GS24pmbhasuu:7144: ghinuṇ akarmakāṇām iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . sampṛṇakti śākam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7145: uktam vā . kim uktam . anabhidhānāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7147: vidhīyate na ṇvulā eva siddham . na hi asti viśeṣaḥ nindādibhyaḥ ṇvulaḥ vā vuñaḥ vā . tat eva rūpam saḥ eva svaraḥ . vuñm anekācaḥ . vuñm anekācaḥ prayojayanti . asūyakaḥ . atha ye atra ekācaḥ paṭhyante teṣām grahaṇam kimartham na teṣām ṇvulā eva siddham . na sidhyati . ayam tacchīlādiṣu tṛn
GS24pmbhasuu:7148: vidhīyate . saḥ viśeṣavihitaḥ sāmānyavihitam ṇvulam bādheta .
GS24pmbhasuu:7149: vāsarūpanyāyena ṇvul api bhaviṣyati . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . nindādibhyaḥ vuñvacanam anyebhyaḥ ṇvulaḥ pratiṣedhārtham . nindādibhyaḥ vuñvacanam kriyate jñāpakārtham . kim jñāpyam . etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ tacchīlādiṣu vāsarūpanyāyena anyebhyaḥ ṇvul na bhavati iti . tṛjādipratiṣedhāṛtham vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:7150: atha vā etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ . tacchīlādiṣu sarve eva tṛjāsayaḥ vāsarūpeṇa na bhavanti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7151: (P_3,2.150) KA_II,133.21-134.9 Ro_III,302-303 padigrahaṇam anarthakam anudāttetaḥ ca halādeḥ iti siddhatvāt . padigrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . anudāttetaḥ ca halādeḥ iti eva atra yuc siddhaḥ . na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7152: ayam padeḥ ukañ vidhīyate laṣapadapadsthābhūvṛṣahanakamagamaśṝbhyaḥ ukañ iti . saḥ viśeṣavihitaḥ sāmānyavihitam yucam bādheta . vāsarūpanyāyena yuc api bhaviṣyati . asarūpanivṛttyartham tu . asarūpanivṛttyartham tarhi padigrahaṇam kriyate . etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ tācchīlikeṣu tācchilikāḥ vāsarūpeṇa na bhavanti iti . yadi etat jñāpyate dūdadīpadīkṣaḥ ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7153: dīpagrahaṇam anarthakam . ayam dīpeḥ raḥ vidhīyate .

GS24pmbhasuu:7156: prayojanam . kamrā kanyā kamanā kanyā iti etat siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7157: (P_3,2.158) KA_II,134.11-16 Ro_III,303-304 kimartham āluc ucyate na luś eva ucyeta . kā rūpasiddhiḥ : spṛhayāluḥ gṛhayāluḥ . śapi kṛte ataḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:7159: śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anyebhyaḥ api ayam bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . āluci śīṅgrahaṇam codayiṣyati . tat na kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7160: bhavati . āluci śīṅgrahaṇam . āluci śīṅgrahaṇam kartavyam . śayāluḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7161: (P_3,2.171) KA_II,134.18-135.12 Ro_III,304-305 kimartham kikinoḥ kittvam ucyate na asaṃyogāt liṭ kit iti eva siddham . kikinoḥ kittvam ṝkāraguṇapratiṣedhāṛtham . kikinoḥ kittvam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7162: ṝkāraguṇapratiṣedhāṛtham . ayam ṝkārārāntānām liṭi guṇaḥ pratiṣedhaviṣaye ārabhyate ṛcchatyṝtrām iti . saḥ yathā iha bhavati ātastaratuḥ atastaruḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:7169: vāvahiḥ cācaliḥ pāpatiḥ . aparaḥ āha : sahivahicalipatibhyaḥ yaṅantebhyaḥ kikinau vaktavyau . etāni eva udāharaṇāni .
GS24pmbhasuu:7170: (P_3,2.174) KA_II,135.14 Ro_III,305 bhiyaḥ krukan api vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7173: na kvip anyebhyaḥ api dṛśyate iti eva siddham . kvibvidhiḥ anupapadārthaḥ . anupapadārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . paceḥ pak . bhideḥ bhit . chideḥ chit .
GS24pmbhasuu:7174: atha yaḥ atra sopasargaḥ tasya grahaṇam kimartham na tena eva siddham . na sidhyati . iha ke cit ā kveḥ iti sūtram paṭhanti ke cit prāk kveḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7175: tatra ye ā kveḥ iti paṭhanti taiḥ kvip api ākṣiptaḥ bhavati . tatra tacchīlādiṣu artheṣu kivp yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . yaḥ eva asau aviśeṣavihitaḥ saḥ tacchīlādiṣu bhaviṣyati anyatra ca . na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7176: ayam tacchīlādiṣu tṛn vidhīyate . saḥ viśeṣavihitaḥ sāmānyavihitam ṇvulam bādheta . vāsarūpanyāyena ṇvul api bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati . idānīm eva hi uktam tacchīlādiṣu vartheṣu vāsarūpeṇa tṛjādayaḥ na bhavanti iti . kvip ca api tṛjādiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7178: vacipracchyāyatastukaṭaprujuśrīṇām dīrghatvam ca vaktavyam kvip ca . vaci
GS24pmbhasuu:7179: . vāk . vaci . pracchi . śabdaprāṭ pracchi . āyatastu . āyatastūḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7180: āyatastu . kaṭapru . kaṭaprūḥ . kaṭapru . ju . jūḥ . ju . śri . śrīḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7181: aparaḥ āha : vacipracchyoḥ asamprasāraṇam ca iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . dīrghavacanasāmarthyāt samprasāraṇam na
GS24pmbhasuu:7182: bhaviṣyati . idam iha sampradhāryam . dīrghatvam kriyatām samprasāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7183: iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt samprasāraṇam . antaraṅgam dīrghatvam . kā antaraṅgatā . pratyayotpattisanniyogena dīrghatvam ucyate utpanne pratyaye samprasāraṇam . tatra antaraṅgatvāt dīrghatve kṛte samprasāraṇam . prasāraṇaparapūrvatve kṛte kāryakṛtatvāt punaḥ dīrghatvam na syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7184: tasmāt suṣṭhu ucyate dīrghavacanasāmarthyāt samprasāraṇam na bhaviṣyati iti . dyutigamijuhotīnām dve ca . dyutigamijuhotīnām dve ca iti vaktavyam . didyut. dyuti . gami . jagat . gami . juhoti . juhoteḥ dīrghaḥ ca .

GS24pmbhasuu:7186: . dhāyateḥ samprasāraṇam ca . dhāyateḥ samprasāraṇam ca kvip ca vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7188: (P_3,2.180) KA_II,136.21-137.2 Ro_III,307-308 ḍuprakaraṇe mitadrvādibhyaḥ upasaṅkhyānam dhātuvidhitukpratiṣedhārtham . ḍuprakaraṇe mitadrvādibhyaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . kim prayojanam dhātuvidhitukpratiṣedhārtham . dhātuvidheḥ tukaḥ ca pratiṣedhaḥ yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7189: . mitradruḥ mitadrū mitadravaḥ . aci śnudhātubhruvām iti uvaṅādeśaḥ mā bhūt . iha ca mitadrvā mitadrve na ūṅdhātvoḥ iti pratiṣedhaḥ mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7190: tugvidhiḥ . mitadruḥ . hrasvasya piti kṛti tuk bhavati iti tuk mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7191: (P_3,2.188) KA_II,137.4-8 Ro_III,308 śīlitaḥ rakṣitaḥ kṣāntaḥ ākruṣṭaḥ juṣṭaḥ iti api ruṣṭaḥ ca ruṣitaḥ ca ubhau abhivyāhṛtaḥ iti api hṛṣṭatuṣṭau tathā kāntaḥ tathā ubhau saṃyotodyatau . kaṣṭam bhaviṣyati iti āhuḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:7193: 22 Ro_III.309-312 bahulavacanam kimartham . bāhulakam prakṛteḥ tanudṛṣṭeḥ . tanvībhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ uṇādayaḥ dṛśyante . na sarvābhyaḥ dṛśyante . prāyasamuccayād api teṣām . prāyeṇa khalu api te samuccitāḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:7194: sarve samuccitāḥ . kāryasaśeṣavidheḥ ca tat uktam . kāryāṇi khalu api
GS24pmbhasuu:7195: saśeṣāṇi kṛtāni na sarvāṇi lakṣaṇena parisamāptāni . kim punaḥ kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7196: tanvībhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ uṇādayaḥ dṛśyante na sarvābhyaḥ dṛśyante . kim ca kāraṇam prāyeṇa samuccitāḥ na sarve samuccitāḥ . kim ca kāraṇam kāryāṇi saśeṣāṇi kṛtāni na sarvāṇi lakṣaṇena parisamāptāni . naigamarūḍibhavam hi susādhu . naigamāḥ ca rūḍhibhavāḥ ca auṇādikāḥ susādhavaḥ katham syuḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7197: nāma ca dhātujam āha nirukte . nāma khalu api dhātujam . evam āhuḥ nairuktāḥ . vyākaraṇe śakaṭasya ca tokam . vaiyākaraṇānām ca śākaṭāyanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7198: āha dhātujam nāma iti . atha yasya viśeṣapadārthaḥ na samuttitaḥ katham
GS24pmbhasuu:7199: tatra bhavitavyam . yat na viśeṣapadārthasamuttam pratyayataḥ prakṛteḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7200: tat ūhyam . prakṛtim dṛṣṭvā pratyayaḥ ūhitavyaḥ pratyayam ca dṛṣṭvā prakṛtiḥ ūhitavyā . sañjñāsu dhāturūpāṇi pratyayāḥ ca tataḥ pare kāryāt vidyāt anubandham . etat śāstram uṇādiṣu .
GS24pmbhasuu:7202: upasaṅkhyānam . bhaviṣyati iti anadyatane upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . śvaḥ grāmam gamī . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . lṛṭā ayam nirdeśaḥ kṛiyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:7203: lṛṭ ca anadyatane luṭā bādhyate . tena lṛṭaḥ eva viṣaye ete pratyayāḥ syuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7204: . luṭaḥ viṣaye na syuḥ . itaretarāśrayam ca . itaretarāśrayam ca bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7205: kā itaretarāśrayatā . bhaviṣyatkālena śabdena nirdeśaḥ kriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:7206: nirdeśottarakālam ca bhbhaviṣyatkālatā . tat etat itaretarāśrayam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7207: . itaretarāśrayāṇi ca na prakalpante . uktam vā . kim uktam . ekam tāvat uktam na vā apavādasya nimittābhāvāt anadyatane hi tayoḥ vidhānam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7208: aparam api uktam avyayanirdeśāt siddham iti. avyayavatā śabdena nirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7209: kariṣyate . avartamāne abhūte iti . saḥ tarhi avyayavatā śabdena nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . avyayam eṣaḥ bhaviṣyatiśabdaḥ na eṣā bhavateḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7210: lṛṭ . katham avyayatvam . vibhaktisvarapratirūpakāḥ ca nipātāḥ bhavanti iti nipātasañjñā . nipātam avyayam iti avayayasañjñā . atha api bhavateḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7211: lṛṭ evam api avayayam eva . katham na vyeti iti avyayam . kva punaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:7212: vyeti . etau kālaviśeṣau bhūtavartamānau . svabhāvataḥ bhaviṣyati eva
GS24pmbhasuu:7213: vartate . yadi tatri na vyeti iti avyayam . na vā tadvidhānasya anyatra abhāvāt . na vā bhaviṣyadādhikāreṇa arthaḥ . kim kāraṇam . tadvidhānasya anyatra abhāvāt . ye api ete itaḥ uttaram pratyayāḥ śiṣyante ete api etau kālaviśeṣau na viyanti bhūtavartamānau . svabhāvataḥ eva te bhaviṣyati eva vartante . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . bhaviṣyadadhikārasya prayojanam yāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:7216: pūrvavipratiṣiddham . yāvatpurādiṣu laḍvidhiḥ bhavati luṭaḥ pūrvavipratiṣedhena . yāvatpurānipātayoḥ laṭ bhavati iti asya avakāśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7217: yāvat bhuṅkte . purā bhuṅkte . luṭaḥ avakāśaḥ . śvaḥ kartā . śvaḥ adhyetā . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . yāvat śvaḥ bhuṅkte . purā śvaḥ bhuṅkte . laṭ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . anadyatane luṭ iti atra yāvatpurānipātayoḥ laṭ iti anuvartiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:7218: (P_3,3.7) KA_II,140.6-8 Ro_III,314 kimartham idam ucyate na lipsyamānasiddhiḥ api lipsā eva tatra kiṃvṛtte lipsāyām iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:7219: akiṃvṛttārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . yaḥ bhavatām odanam dadāti saḥ svargam
GS24pmbhasuu:7220: lokam gacchati . yaḥ bhavatām odanam dāsyati saḥ svargam lokam gamiṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7221: (P_3,3.10) KA_II,140.10-141.6 Ro_III,314-316 kimartham kriyāyām upapade kriyārthāyām ṇvul vidhīyate na aviśeṣeṇa vihitaḥ ṇvul saḥ kriyāyām upapade kriyārthāyām anyatra ca bhaviṣyati . ṇvuli sakarmakagrahaṇam coditam . akaramakārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . āsakaḥ vrajati . śāyakaḥ vrajati . pratyākhyātam tat na vā dhātumātrāt darśanāt ṇvulaḥ iti . evam tarhi tṛjādiṣu vartamānakālopādānam coditam . avartamānakālārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7222: . tat api pratyākhyātam na vā kālamātre darśanāt anyeṣām iti . idam tarhi prayojanam. akenoḥ bhaviṣyadādhamrṇyayoḥ iti atra ṣaṣṭhyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7223: uktaḥ . saḥ yathā syāt . etat api na asti prayojanam . yaḥ eva asau
GS24pmbhasuu:7224: aviśeṣavihitaḥ saḥ yadā bhaviṣyati bhaviṣyati tadā asya pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam tarhi bhaviṣyadadhikāravihitasya pratiṣedhaḥ yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7225: . iha mā bhūt : aṅga yajatām . lapsyante asya yājakāḥ . ye enam yājayayiṣyanti iti . na eṣaḥ bhaviṣyatkālaḥ . kaḥ tarhi . bhūtakālaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7226: katham tarhi bhaviṣyatkālatā gamyate . dhātusambandhe pratyayāḥ iti . yaḥ tarhi na dhātusambandhaḥ . ime asya yājakāḥ . ime asya lāvakāḥ iti . eṣaḥ api bhūtakālaḥ . katham tarhi bhaviṣyatkālatā gamyate . sambandhāt . saḥ ca tāvat taiḥ ayājitaḥ bhavati . tasya ca tāvat taiḥ yavāḥ alūnāḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:7227: . ucyate ca . idam tarhi prayojanam . ayam kriyāyām upapde kriyārthāyām tumun vidhīyate . saḥ viśeṣavihitaḥ sāmānyavihitam ṇvulam bādheta . etat api na asti prayojanam . bhāve tumun vidhīyate kartari ṇvul . tatra kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ yat bhāve vihitaḥ tumun kartari vihitam ṇvulam bādheta . lṛṭ tarhi bādheta . vāsarūpeṇa bhaviṣyati . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . ṇvulaḥ kriyārthopapadasya punarvidhānam tṛjādipratiṣedhārtham . ṇvulaḥ kriyārthopapadasya punarvidhānam kriyate jñāpakārtham . kim jñāpyam . etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ kriyāyām upapade kriyārthāyām vāsarūpeṇa tṛjādayaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:7229: (P_3,3.11) KA_II,141.8-20 Ro_III,316-317 kimartham idam ucyate na aviśeṣeṇa bhāve pratyayāḥ ye vihitāḥ te kriyāyām upapade kriyārthāyām anyatra ca bhaviṣyanti . bhāvavacanānām yathāvihitānām pratipadavidhyartham . bhāvavacanānām yathāvihitānām pratipadavidhyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7230: ayam ārambhaḥ . idānīm eva hi uktam kriyāyām upapde kriyārthāyām vāsarūpeṇa tṛjādayaḥ na bhavanti iti . bhāvavacanāḥ ca api tṛjādayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7231: asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . yathāvihitāḥ iti tu vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . iha yābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ yena viśeṣeṇa bhāve pratyayāḥ vihitāḥ tābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ tena eva viśeṣeṇa kriyāyām upapde
GS24pmbhasuu:7232: kriyārthāyām yathā syuḥ . vyatikaraḥ mā bhūt iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7233: na vaktavyam . iha bhāve pratyayāḥ bhavanti iti iyaṭa siddham . saḥ ayam evam siddhe sati yat vacanagrahaṇam karoti tasya etat prayojanam vācakāḥ yathā syuḥ iti . yadi ca yābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ yena viśeṣeṇa bhāve pratyayāḥ vihitāḥ tābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ tena eva viśeṣeṇa kriyāyām upapde kriyārthāyām bhavanti tataḥ amī vācakāḥ kṛtāḥ syuḥ . atha hi prakṛtimātrāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7234: vā syuḥ pratyayamātram vā syāt na amīvācakāḥ kṛtāḥ syuḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7235: (P_3,3.12) KA_II,141.22-142.13 Ro_III,317-318 kimartham idam ucyate na aviśeṣeṇa karmaṇi aṇ vihitaḥ saḥ kriyāyām upapade kriyārthāyām anyatra ca bhaviṣyati . aṇaḥ punarvacanam apavādaviṣaye anivṛttyartham . aṇaḥ punarvacanam kriyate apavādaviṣaye anivṛttiḥ yathā syāt . godāyaḥ vrajati . kambaladāyaḥ vrajati iti . kim ucyate apavādaviṣaye anivṛttiḥ yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7236: iti na punaḥ utsargaviṣaye pratipadavidhyartham syāt . idānīm eva hi uktam kriyāyām upapde kriyārthāyām vāsarūpeṇa tṛjādayaḥ na bhavanti iti . aṇ ca api tṛjādiḥ . evam tarhi ubhayam anena kriyate . apavādaviṣaye cānivṛttiḥ utsargaviṣaye pratipadavidhānam . katham punaḥ ekena yatnena ubhayam labhyam . labhyam iti āha . katham . karmagrahaṇasāmarthyāt . katham punaḥ antareṇa karmagrahaṇam karmaṇi aṇ labhyaḥ . vacanagrahaṇam prakṛtam anuvartate . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . aparyāyeṇa iti tu
GS24pmbhasuu:7237: vaktavyam . kadā cit hi karmaṇi syāt kadā cit kriyāyām upapade
GS24pmbhasuu:7238: kriyārthāyām iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . cena sanniyogaḥ kariṣyate . aṇ karmaṇi ca . kim ca anyat . kriyāyām upapade kriyārthāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:7239: iti . evam api pratyekam upapadasañjñā na prāpnoti . cena eva sanniyogaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:7269: . na hi atra nirdeśaḥ tantram . kayā cit vibhaktyā kena cit ca liṅgena nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . atha vā kṛbhvastayaḥ kriyāsāmānyavācinaḥ kriyāviśeṣavācinaḥ pacādayaḥ . yat ca atra pacateḥ bhavatiḥ bhavati na tat bhavateḥ pacatiḥ bhavati . yat ca bhavateḥ pacatiḥ bhavati na tat pacateḥ bhavatiḥ bhavati . kim ca pacateḥ bhavatiḥ bhavati . sāmānyam . kim ca bhavateḥ pacatiḥ bhavati . viśeṣaḥ . tat yathā upādhyāyasya śiṣyaḥ mātulasya bhāgineyam gatvā āha . upādhyāyam bhavān abhivādayatām iti . saḥ gatvā mātulam abhivādayate . tathā mātulasya bhāgineyaḥ upādhyāyasya śiṣyam gatvā āha . mātulam bhavān abhivādayatām iti . saḥ gatvā upādhyāyam

GS24pmbhasuu:7339: śakyam anuvartayitum iti . sambandham anuvartiṣyate . atha vā punaḥ santu ādeśāḥ . nanu ca uktam svaraḥ na sidhyati iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . akārāntaḥ ādeśaḥ . atha yadā iṣīkayā stambaḥ hanyate katham tatra bhavitavyam . ke cid tāvat āhuḥ . stambaghnā iti bhavitavyam . apare āhuḥ : stambahetiḥ iti bhavitavyam . ūtiyūtijūtisātihetikīrtayaḥ ca iti nipātanam iti . apare āhuḥ . stambahananīiti bhavitavyam iti . vakṣyati etat . ajabbhyām strīīkhalanāḥ . striyāḥ khalanau vipratiṣedhena iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7341: samprasāraṇapratiṣedhaḥ . yajādibhyaḥ nasya ṅittve samprasāraṇapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . praśnaḥ iti . evan tarhi āṅit kariṣyate . aṅiti guṇapratiṣedhaḥ . yadi aṅit guṇapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . viśnaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7342: sūtram ca bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam yajādibhyaḥ nasya ṅittve samprasāraṇapratiṣedhaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . nipātanāt etat siddham . kim nipātanam . praśne ca āsannakāle iti (P_3,3.94) KA_II,151.21-152.6 Ro_III,337 striyām ktin ābādibhyaḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:7343: striyām ktin iti atra ābādibhyaḥ ca iti vaktavyam . āptiḥ rāddhiḥ dīptiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7344: niṣṭhāyām vā seṭaḥ akāravacanāt siddham . atha vā niṣṭhāyām seṭaḥ akāraḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . yadi niṣṭhāyām seṭaḥ akāraḥ bhavati iti ucyate sraṃsā dhvaṃsā iti na sidhyati . srastiḥ dhvastiḥ iti prāpnoti . kim punaḥ idam parigaṇanam trayaḥ eva ābādayaḥ āhosvit udāharaṇamātram . kim ca ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7345: . yadi parigaṇanam bhedaḥ bhavati . atha udāharaṇamātram na asti bhedaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7347: (P_3,3.95) KA_II,152.8-20 Ro_III,338 sthādibhyaḥ sarvāpavādaprasaṅgaḥ . sthādibhyaḥ sarvāpavādaḥ ktin prāpnoti . saḥ yathā eva aṅam bādhate evam
GS24pmbhasuu:7348: ṇvuliñau api bādheta . kām tvam sthāyikām asthāḥ . kām sthāyim . siddham tu aṅvidhāne sthādipratiṣedhāt . siddham etat . katham . aṅvidhāne eva sthādipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . pratiṣiddhe tasmin ktin eva bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7349: sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:7350: sthādibhyaḥ sarvāpavādaprasaṅgaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . purastāt apavādāḥ anantarān vidhīn bādhante iti evam ayam striyām ktin aṅam bādhiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:7351: ṇvuliñau na bādhiṣyate . śrutijiṣistubhyaḥ karaṇe . śrutijiṣistubhyaḥ karaṇe ktin vaktavyaḥ . śrūyate anayā śrutiḥ . ijyate anayā iṣṭiḥ . iṣyate anayā iṣṭiḥ . stūyate anayā stutiḥ . glājyāhābhyaḥ niḥ . glājyāhābhyaḥ niḥ vaktavyaḥ . glāniḥ jyāniḥ hāniḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7353: kyabvidhiḥ adhikaraṇe ca iti vaktavyam . samajanti tasyām samajyā .
GS24pmbhasuu:7354: (P_3,3.100) KA_II,153.2-3 Ro_III,339 kṛñaḥ śa ca iti vāvacanam ktinartham . kṛñaḥ śa ca iti vāvacanam kartavyam ktin api yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7356: (P_3,3.102) KA_II,153.5-7 Ro_III,339 kim nipātyate . iṣeḥ śe yagabhāvaḥ . atyalpam idam ucyate icchā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7357: icchāparicaryāparisaryāmṛgayāṭāṭyānām nipātanam kartavyam . jāgarteḥ akāraḥ vā . jāgarya jāgarā
GS24pmbhasuu:7358: (P_3,3.104) KA_II,153.9-18 Ro_III,340 bhidā vidāraṇe . bhidā vidāraṇe iti vaktavyam . bhittiḥ anyā . chidhā dvaidhīkaraṇe . chidhā dvaidhīkaraṇe iti vaktavyam . chittiḥ anyā . ārā śastryām . ārā śastryām iti vaktavyam .

GS24pmbhasuu:7360: guhā giryoṣadhyoḥ . guhā giryoṣadhyoḥ iti vaktavyam . gūḍhiḥ anyā .
GS24pmbhasuu:7362: svarārthaḥ . citaḥ antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti antodāttatvam yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . udāttaḥ iti vartate bhūvīrāḥ udāttaḥ iti . yadi udāttaḥ iti vartate vajayajoḥ bhāve kyap kimarthaḥ pakāraḥ . tugarthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7363: hrasvasya piti kṛti tuk iti . udāttaḥ iti vartate . evam api kutaḥ etat tadantasya udāttatvam bhaviṣyati na punaḥ ādeḥ iti . udāttaḥ iti anuvartanasāmarthyāt yasya aprāptaḥ svaraḥ tasya bhavati . kasya ca aprāptaḥ . antyasya . sāmānyagrahaṇāvighātārthaḥ tarhi . kva sāmānyagrahaṇāvighātārthena arthaḥ . yuvoḥ anākau iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . vakṣyati etat . siddham tu yuvoḥ anunāsikavacanāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7364: (P_3,3.107.2) KA_II,154.8-13 Ro_III,341 yucprakaraṇe ghaṭṭivandividhibhyaḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam . yucprakaraṇe ghaṭṭivandividhibhyaḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . ghaṭṭanā vandanā vedanā
GS24pmbhasuu:7365: . iṣeḥ anicchārthasya . iṣeḥ anicchārthasya iti vaktavyam . anviṣyate anveṣaṇā . pareḥ vā . pareḥ vā iti vaktavyam . anyām parīṣṭim cara . anyām paryeṣaṇām cara .
GS24pmbhasuu:7366: (P_3,3.108) KA_II,154.15-155.10 Ro_III,34341-342 dhātvartanirdeśe ṇvul . dhātvartanirdeśe ṇvul vaktavyaḥ . kā nāma āsikā anyeṣu īhamāneṣu . kā nām śāyikā anyeṣu adhīyāneṣu . ikśtipau dhātunirdeśe . ikśtipau iti etau
GS24pmbhasuu:7367: pratyayau dhātunirdeśe vaktavyau . paceḥ brūhi . pacateḥ brūhi . varṇāt kāraḥ . varṇāt kārapratyayaḥ vaktavyaḥ . akāraḥ ikāraḥ . rāt iphaḥ . rāt iphaḥ vaktavyaḥ . rephaḥ . matvarthāt chaḥ . matvarthāt chaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7368: matvarthīyaḥ . iṇ ajādibhyaḥ . iṇ ajādibhyaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ājiḥ ātiḥ ādiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7369: iñ vapādibhyaḥ . iñ vapādibhyaḥ vaktavyaḥ . vāpiḥ vāsiḥ vādiḥ . ik kṛṣyādibhyaḥ . ik kṛṣyādibhyaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kṛṣiḥ kiriḥ giriḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7370: sampadādibhyaḥ kvip . sampadādibhyaḥ kvip vaktavyaḥ . sampat vipat pratipat āpat pariṣat
GS24pmbhasuu:7371: (P_3,3.113) KA_II,155.12-13 Ro_III,343 kṛtaḥ bahulam iti vaktavyam pādahārakādyartham . pādābhyām hriyate pādahārakaḥ . gale copyate galecopakaḥ . śvaḥ agnīn ādhāsyamānena . śvaḥ somena yakṣyamāṇena .
GS24pmbhasuu:7372: (P_3,3.119) KA_II,155.15-17 Ro_III,343 gocarādīnām agrahaṇam prāyavacanāt yathā kaṣaḥ nikaṣaḥ iti . gocarādīnām grahaṇam śakyam akartum
GS24pmbhasuu:7373: . ghañ kasmāt na bhavati . prāyavacanāt yathā kaṣaḥ nikaṣaḥ iti prāyavacanāt ghañ na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7374: (P_3,3.121) KA_II,155.19-21 Ro_III,344 ghañvidhau avahārādhārāvāyānām upasaṅkhyānam . ghañvidhau avahārādhārāvāyānām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .

GS24pmbhasuu:7377: iti eva siddham . anudake it vakṣyāmi iti . iha mā bhūt . udakodañcanaḥ .
