GS24pmbhasuu:9491: . kim prayojanam . sādhane ayam bhavan liṅgasaṅkhyābhyam yokṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9493: (P_5,1.118.2) KA_II.365.7-12 Ro_IV.80 strīpuṃsābhyām vatyupasaṅkhyānam . strīpuṃsābhyām vatyupasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . strīvat . puṃvat iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . imau nañsnañau prāk bhavanāt iti ucyete . tau viśeṣavihitau sāmānyavihitam vatim bādheyātām . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9494: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na vatyarthe nañsnañau bhavataḥ iti yat ayam striyāḥ puṃvat iti nirdeśam karoti . evam api strīvat iti na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9496: (P_5,1.119.1) KA_II.365.14-366.6 Ro_IV.81-82 strīpuṃsābhyām tvataloḥ upasaṅkhyānam . strīpuṃsābhyām tvataloḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9497: strībhāvaḥ strītvam strītā . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . imau nañsnañau prāk bhavanāt iti ucyete . tau viśeṣavihitau sāmānyavihitam
GS24pmbhasuu:9498: vatim bādheyātām . vāvacanam ca . vāvacanam ca kartavyam . kim prayojanam . nañsnañau api yathā syātām . strībhāvaḥ straiṇam . pummbhāvaḥ pauṃsnam iti . apavādasamāveśāt vā siddham . apavādasamāveśāt vā siddham etat . tat yathā imanicprabhṛtibhiḥ apavādaiḥ samāveśaḥ bhavati evam ābhyām api
GS24pmbhasuu:9499: bhaviṣyati . na eva īśvaraḥ ājñāpapayati na api dharmasūtrakārāḥ paṭhanti imanicprabhṛtibhiḥ apavādaiḥ samāveśaḥ bhavati iti . kim tarhi ā ca tvāt iti etasmāt yatnāt imanicprabhṛtibhiḥ apavādaiḥ samāveśaḥ bhavati . na ca etau atra abhyantarau . etau api atra abhyantarau . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:9500: apavādasadeśāḥ apavādāḥ bhavanti iti . etat ca eva na jānīmaḥ apavādasadeśāḥ apavādāḥ bhavanti iti . api ca kutaḥ etat etau api atra abhyantarau na punaḥ pūrvau vā syātām parau vā . evam tarhi vakṣyati ā ca tvāt iti atra cakārakaraṇasya prayojanam . nañsnañbhyām api samāveśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9503: abhiprāyādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ . tasya bhāvaḥ iti abhiprāyādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . iha api prāpnoti . abhiprāyaḥ devadattasya modakeṣu bhojane . ye naḥ bhāvāḥ te naḥ bhāvāḥ putrāḥ putraiḥ ceṣṭante iti . siddham tu yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9504: guṇasya bhāvāt dravye śabdaniveśaḥ tadabhidhāne tvatalau . siddham etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:9505: katham . yasya guṇasya bhāvāt dravye śabdaniveśaḥ tadabhidhāne tasmin guṇe vaktavye pratyayena bhavitavyam . na ca abhiprāyādīnām bhāvāt dravye devadattaśabdaḥ vartate . kim punaḥ dravyam ke punaḥ guṇāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9506: śabdasparśarūparasagandhāḥ guṇāḥ . tataḥ anyat dravyam . kim punaḥ anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:9507: śabdādibhyaḥ dravyam āhosvit ananyat . guṇasya ayam bhāvāt dravye śabdaniveśam kurvan khyāpayati anyat śabdādibhyaḥ dravyam iti . ananyat śabdādibhyaḥ dravyam . na hi anyat upalabhyate . paśoḥ khalu api
GS24pmbhasuu:9508: viśasitasya parṇaśate nyastasya na anyat śabdādibhyaḥ upalabhyate . anyat śabdādibhyaḥ dravyam tat tu anumānagamyam . tat yathā oṣadhivanaspatīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:9509: vṛddhihrāsau . jyotiṣām gatiḥ iti . kaḥ asau anumānaḥ . iha samāne varṣmaṇi pariṇāhe ca anyat tulāgram bhavati lohasya anyat kārpāsānām .
GS24pmbhasuu:9510: yatkṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ tat dravyam . tathā kaḥ cit spṛśan eva chinatti kaḥ cit lambamānaḥ api na chinatti . yatkṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ tat dravyam . kaḥ cit ekena
GS24pmbhasuu:9511: eva prahāreṇa vyapavargam karoti kaḥ cit dvābhyām api an karoti . yatkṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ tat dravyam . atha vā yasya guṇāntareṣu api prādurbhāvatsu tattvam na vihanyate tat dravyam . kim punaḥ tattvam . tadbhāvaḥ tattvam . tat yathā āmalakādīnām phalānām raktādayaḥ pītādayaḥ ca guṇāḥ prāduḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:9512: . āmalakam badaram iti eva bhavati . anvartham khalu api nirvacanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9513: guṇasandrāvaḥ dravyam iti . yadi tarhi ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt guṇe pratyayāḥ utapdyante kim iyatā sūtreṇa . etāvat vaktavyam : ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt guṇe iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9514: . ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt guṇe iti iyati ucyamāne dviguṇā rajjuḥ triguṇā rajjuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9515: atra api prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . guṇaśabdaḥ ayam bahvarthaḥ . asti eva sameṣu avayaveṣu vartate . tat yathā dviguṇā rajjuḥ triguṇā rajjuḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9516: asti dravyapadārthakaḥ . tat yathā guṇavān ayam deśaḥ iti ucyate yasmin gāvaḥ sasyāni ca vartante . asti aprādhānye vartate . tat yathā yaḥ yatra apradhānam bhavati saḥ āha guṇabhūtāḥ vayam atra iti . asti ācāre vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:9517: . tat yathā guṇavān ayam brāhmaṇaḥ iti ucyate yaḥ samyak ācāram karoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9518: asti saṃskāre vartate . tat yathā saṃskṛtam annam guṇavat iti ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9519: atha vā sarvatra eva ayam guṇaśabdaḥ sameṣu avayaveṣu vartate . tat yathā dviguṇam adhyayanam triguṇam adhyayanam iti ucyate . carcāguṇān kramaguṇān ca apekṣya bhavati na saṃhitāguṇān carcāguṇān ca . yadi evam guṇavat annam iti guṇaśabdaḥ na upapadyate . na hi annasya sūpādayaḥ guṇāḥ samāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9520: bhavanti . na avaśyam varṣmataḥ parimāṇataḥ eva vā sāmyam bhavati . kim tarhi yuktitaḥ api . ātaḥ ca yuktitaḥ . yaḥ hi mudgaprasthe lavaṇaprastham prakṣipet na adaḥ yuktam syāt . yadi tāvat adeḥ annam na adaḥ attavyam syāt . atha aniteḥ annam na adaḥ jagdvhā prāṇyāt . śuklādiṣu tarhi vartyabhāvāt vṛttiḥ na prāpnoti . śuklatvam . śuklatā iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam śuklādayaḥ eva udāhriyante na punaḥ vṛkṣādayaḥ api . vṛkṣatvam vṛkṣatā iti . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . ubhayavacanāḥ hi ete dravyam ca āhuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9521: guṇam ca . yataḥ dravyavacanāḥ tataḥ vṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati . ime api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:9522: ubhayavacanāḥ . katham . ārabhyate matublopaḥ guṇavacanebhyaḥ matupaḥ luk bhavati iti . yataḥ dravyavacanāḥ tataḥ vṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati . ḍitthādiṣu tarhi vartyabhāvāt vṛttiḥ na prāpnoti . ḍitthatvam . ḍitthatā .
GS24pmbhasuu:9523: ḍāmbhiṭṭatvam iti . atra api kaḥ cit prāthamakalpikaḥ ḍitthaḥ ḍāmbhiṭṭaḥ ca . tena kṛtām kriyām guṇam vā yaḥ kaḥ cit karoti saḥ ucyate ḍitthatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:9524: te etat ḍāmbhiṭṭatvam te etat . evam ḍitthāḥ kurvanti . evam ḍāmbhiṭṭāḥ kurvanti . yaḥ tarhi prāthamakalpikaḥ ḍitthaḥ ḍāmbhiṭṭaḥ ca tasya vartyabhāvāt vṛttiḥ na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yathā eva tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9525: kāthañcitkaḥ prayogaḥ evam vṛttiḥ api bhaviṣyati . yat vā sarve bhāvāḥ svena bhāvena bhavanti saḥ teṣām bhāvaḥ tadabhidhāne . kim ebhiḥ tribhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9526: bhāvagrahaṇaiḥ kriyate . ekena śabdaḥ pratinirdiśyate dvābhyām arthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9527: yat vā sarve śabdāḥ svena arthena bhavanti . saḥ teṣām arthaḥ iti tadabhidhāne vā tvatalau bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam . na evam anyatra bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:9528: . na hi tena raktam rāgāt iti atra śabdena rakte pratyayāḥ utpadyante .
GS24pmbhasuu:9529: śabde asambhavāt arthena rakte pratyayāḥ bhaviṣyanti . tat tarhi anyatarat
GS24pmbhasuu:9530: kartavyam . sūtram ca bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:9531: tasya bhāvaḥ iti abhiprāyādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ iti . uktam vā . kim uktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9532: anabhidhānāt iti . anabhidhānāt abhiprāyādiṣu utapattiḥ na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9533: (P_5,1.119.3) KA_II.368.5-369.2 Ro_IV.93-95 tvatalbhyām nañsamāsaḥ pūrvavipratiṣiddham tvataloḥ svarasiddhyartham . tvatalbhyām nañsamāsaḥ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣdhena . kim prayojanam . tvataloḥ svarasiddhyartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:9534: tvataloḥ svarasiddhiḥ yathā syāt . tvataloḥ avakāśaḥ bhāvasya vacanam pratiṣedhasya avacanam . brāhmaṇatvam . brāhmṇatā . nañsamāsasya avakāśaḥ pratiṣedhasya vacanam bhāvasya avacanam . abrāhmaṇaḥ . avṛṣalaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9535: ubhayavacane ubhayam prāpnoti . abrāhmaṇatvam . abrāhmaṇatā . nañsamāsaḥ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣdhena . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . na atra tvatalau prāpnutaḥ . kim kāraṇam . asāmarthyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:9536: katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asamartham bhavati iti . yāvatā brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ pratiṣedham apekṣate . nañsamāsaḥ api tarhi na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9537: kim kāraṇam . asāmarthyāt eva . katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asamartham bhavati iti . yāvatā brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ bhāvam apekṣate . pradhānam tadā brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ . bhavati ca pradhānasya sāpekṣasya api samāsaḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam . nañsamādāt anyaḥ bhāvavacanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9538: svarottarapadavṛddhyartham iti vakṣyati . tatra vyavasthārtham idam
GS24pmbhasuu:9539: vaktavyam . vā chandasi . vā chandasi nañsamāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ . nirvīryatām vai yajamānaḥ āśāste apaśutām . ayonitvāya . aśithilatvāya . agotām anapatyatām . bhavet idam yuktam udāharaṇam . ayonitvāya . aśithilatvāya iti . idam tu ayuktam apaśutām iti . na hi asau samāsabhāvam āśāste . kim tarhi . uttarapadābhāvam āśāste . na paśoḥ bhāvaḥ iti . nañsamāsāt anyaḥ bhāvavacanaḥ . nañsamāsāt anyaḥ bhāvavacanaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . kim prayojanam . svarottarapadavṛddhyartham . svarārtham uttarapadavṛddhyartham ca . svarārtham tāvat . aprathimā . amradimā .
GS24pmbhasuu:9542: anukarṣaṇārthaḥ . tvatalau anukṛṣyete . na etat asti prayojanam . prakṛtau tvatalau anuvartiṣyete . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . ā ca tvāt iti cakārakaraṇam apavādasamāveśārtham . ā ca tvāt iti cakārakaraṇam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9543: apavādasamāveśārtham . imanicprabhṛtibhiḥ apavādaiḥ samāveśaḥ yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:9544: na etat asti prayojanam . ā tvāt iti evam imanicprabhṛtibhiḥ apavādaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9545: samāveśaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . ā tvāt yāḥ prakṛtayaḥ tābhyaḥ ca tvatalau yathā syātām yataḥ ca ucyete . etat api na asti prayojanam . ā tvāt iti eva yāḥ prakṛtayaḥ tābhyaḥ tvatalau bhaviṣyataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9546: yataḥ ca ucyete . idam tarhi prayojanam . ā tvāt ye arthāḥ tatra tvatalau
GS24pmbhasuu:9547: yathā syātām yatra ca ucyete . etat api na asti prayojanam . ā tvāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9548: eva ā tvāt ye arthāḥ tatra tvatalau bhaviṣyataḥ yatra ca ucyete . idam tarhi prayojanam . ā tvāt yāḥ prakṛtayaḥ tābhyaḥ ca tvatalau yathā syātām
GS24pmbhasuu:9549: yasyāḥ ca prakṛteḥ atasmin viśeṣe anyaḥ pratyayaḥ utpadyate . kim kṛtam bhavati . strīpuṃsābhyām tvataloḥ upasaṅkhyānam coditam . tat na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9552: tvataloḥ iti āha . na etat asi prayojanam . iṣyete nañpūrvāt tatpuruṣāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9553: tvatalau : abrāhmaṇatvam abrāhmaṇatā iti . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . na nañpūrvāt iti uttarasya pratiṣedhaḥ . na nañpūrvāt iti uttarasya bhāvapratyayasya pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate . na etat asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9554: parigaṇitābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ uttaraḥ bhāvapratyayaḥ vidhīyate . na ca tatra kā cit nañpūrvā prakṛtiḥ gṛhyate . tadantavidhinā prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9555: grahaṇavatā prātipadikena tadantavidhiḥ pratiṣidhyate . yatra tarhi tadantavidhiḥ asti . patyantapurohitādibhyaḥ yak iti . yadi etāvat prayojanam syāt tatra eva ayam brūyāt apatyantāt yak bhavati nañpūrvāt tatpuruṣāt iti . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācārayaḥ uttaraḥ bhāvapratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9556: nañpūrvāt bahuvrīheḥ bhavati iti . na iṣyate . tvatalau eva iṣyete :
GS24pmbhasuu:9557: avidyamānāḥ pṛthavaḥ asya apṛthuḥ , apṛthoḥ bhāvaḥ apṛthutvam apṛthutā iti . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācārayaḥ uttaraḥ bhāvapratyayaḥ anyapūrvāt tatpuruṣāt bhavati iti . na iṣyate . tvatalau eva iṣyete : paramaḥ pṛthuḥ paramapṛthuḥ , paramapṛthoḥ bhāvaḥ paramapṛthutvam paramapṛthutā . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācārayaḥ uttaraḥ bhāvapratyayaḥ sāpekṣāt bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . nañsamāsāt anyaḥ bhāvavacanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9558: svarottarapadavṛddhyartham iti uktam . tat upapannam bhavati . etat api na
GS24pmbhasuu:9559: asti prayojanam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati sarve ete taddhitāḥ sāpekṣāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9560: bhavanti iti yat ayam nañaḥ guṇapratiṣedhe sampādyarhahitālamarthāḥ taddhitāḥ iti āha .
GS24pmbhasuu:9561: (P_5,1.122) KA_II.370.14-19 Ro_IV.100-101 vāvacanam kimartham . vākyam api yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . prakṛṭā mahāvibhāṣā . tayā vākyam api bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . tvatalau api yathā syātām
GS24pmbhasuu:9562: . etat api na asti prayojanam . ā ca tvāt iti etasmāt yatnāt tvatalau api bhaviṣyataḥ . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . pṛthvādibhyaḥ vāvacanam aṇsamāveśārtham . pṛthvādibhyaḥ vāvacanam kriyate aṇsamāveśaḥ yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:9564: (P_5,1.124) KA_II.370.21-371.2 Ro_IV.101 brāhmaṇādiṣu cāturvarṇyādīnām upasaṅkhyānam . brāhmaṇādiṣu cāturvarṇyādīnām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9565: cāturvarṇyam . cāturvaidyam . cāturāśramyam . arhataḥ num ca . arhataḥ num ca ṣyañ ca vaktavyaḥ . arhataḥ bhāvaḥ ārhantyam ārhatī .
GS24pmbhasuu:9566: (P_5,1.125) KA_II.371.4-6 Ro_IV.101-102 kim idam nalope varṇagrahaṇam āhosvit saṅghātagrahaṇam . kim ca ataḥ . yadi varṇagrahaṇam steyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9567: nalope kṛte ayādeśaḥ prāpnoti . atha saṅghātagrahaṇam antyasya lopaḥ kasmāt na bhavati . siddhaḥ antyasya lopaḥ yasya iti eva . tatra ārambhasāmarthyāt sarvasya bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9569: aṇprakaraṇe śrotriyasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam ghalopaḥ ca . śrotriyasya bhāvaḥ śrautram
GS24pmbhasuu:9571: tilādibhyaḥ khañ ca iti vaktavyam . tilyam . tailīnam . kimartham idam ucyate na yatā mukte dhānyānām bhavane kṣetre khañ iti eva siddham . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . umābhaṅgayoḥ adhānyatvāt . dhānyānām bhavane kṣetre khañ iti ucyate . na ca umābhaṅge dhānye . cameṣu yat paṭhyate tat dhānyam . na ca ete tatra paṭhyete . tat tarhi khañgrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . dhānyānām bhavane kṣetre
GS24pmbhasuu:9572: khañ iti . yadi tat anuvartate vrīhiśālayoḥ ḍhak yavayavakaṣaṣṭikāt yat iti khañ ca iti khañ api prāpnoti . sambandham anuvartiṣyate . dhānyānām bhavane kṣetre khañ . vrīhiśālayoḥ ḍhak bhavati . dhānyānām bhavane kṣetre
GS24pmbhasuu:9573: khañ . yavayavakaṣaṣṭikāt yat bhavati . dhānyānām bhavane kṣetre khañ bhavati . vibhāṣā tilamāṣomābhaṅgaṇubhyaḥ . bhavanekṣetregrahaṇam anuvartate . dhānyānām iti nivṛttam . atha vā maṇḍūkaplutayaḥ adhikārāḥ yathā maṇḍūkāḥ utplutya utplutya gacchanti tadvat adhikārāḥ . atha vā anyavacanāt cakārākaraṇāt prakṛtāpavādaḥ vijñāyate yathā utsargeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:9574: prasaktasya apavādaḥ . anyasya pratyayasya vacanāt cakārasya ca anukarṣaṇārthasya akaraṇāt prakṛtasya khañaḥ ḍhagyatau bādhakau
GS24pmbhasuu:9575: bhaviṣyataḥ yathā utsargeṇa prasaktasya apavādaḥ bādhakaḥ bhavati . atha vā etat jñāpayati anuvartante ca nāma vidhayaḥ na ca anuvartanāt eva
GS24pmbhasuu:9576: bhavanti . kim tarhi . yatnāt bhavanti . atha vā yatā mukte dhānyānām bhavane kṣetre khañ iti eva siddham . nanu ca uktam . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . umābhaṅgayoḥ adhānyatvāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . dhinoteḥ dhānyam . ete ca api dhinutaḥ . atha vā śaṇasaptadaśāni dhānyāni (P_5,2.6) KA_II.372.23-373.2 Ro_IV.105 sammukha iti kim nipātyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9577: sammukha iti samasya antalopaḥ . sammukha iti samasya antalopaḥ nipātyate . samamukhasya darśanaḥ sammukhīnaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9578: (P_5,2.9) KA_II.373.4-6 Ro_IV.105-106 ayānayam neyaḥ iti ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9579: tatra na jñāyate kaḥ ayaḥ kaḥ anayaḥ iti . ayaḥ pradakṣiṇam . anayaḥ prasavyam . pradakṣiṇaprasavyagaminām śārāṇām yasmin paraiḥ padānām asamāveśaḥ saḥ ayānayaḥ . ayānayam neyaḥ ayānayīnaḥ śāraḥ (P_5,2.10) KA_II.373.8-15 Ro_IV.106-107 parovara iti kim nipātyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9580: parovara iti parasotvavacanam . parovara iti parasya otvam nipātyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9581: yadi evam parasyautvavacanam iti prāpnoti . śakandhunyāyena nirdeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9582: atha vā na evam vijñāyate parasya otvam nipātyate iti . katham tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:9583: parasya śabdarūpasya ādeḥ utvam nipātyate iti . parān ca avarān ca anubhavati parovarīṇaḥ . atha parampara iti kim nipātyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9584: paraparatarāṇām paramparabhāvaḥ . paraparatarāṇām paramparabhāvaḥ nipātyate . parān ca paratarān ca anubhavati paramparīṇaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9585: (P_5,2.12) KA_II.373.17-374.9 Ro_IV.107-108 iha samāṃsamīnā gauḥ supaḥ dhātuprātipadikayoḥ iti subluk prāpnoti . samām samām vijāyate iti yalopavacanāt alugvijñānam . samām samām vijāyate iti yalopavacanāt alugvijñānam bhaviṣyati . yat ayam yalopam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na atra luk bhavati iti . samām samām vijāyate iti yalopavacanāt alugvijñānam
GS24pmbhasuu:9586: iti cet uttarapadasya lugvacanam . samām samām vijāyate iti yalopavacanāt alugvijñānam iti cet uttarapadasya luk vaktavyaḥ . siddham tu pūrvapadasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9587: yalopavacanāt . siddham etat . katham . pūrvapadasya yalopaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9588: anutpattau uttarapadasya ca vāvacanam . anutpattau pūrvapadasya uttarapadasya ca yalopaḥ vā vaktavyaḥ . samām samām vijāyate . samāyām samāyām vijāyate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9589: (P_5,2.14) KA_II.374.11-14 Ro_IV.108 āgavīnaḥ iti kim nipātyate . goḥ āṅpūrvāt a tasya goḥ pratidānāt kāriṇi khaḥ . goḥ āṅpūrvāt a tasya goḥ pratidānāt kāriṇi khaḥ nipātyate . a tasya goḥ pratidānāt karmakārī āgavīnaḥ karmakaraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9590: (P_5,2.20) KA_II.374.16-18 Ro_IV.109 kim yaḥ śālāyām adhṛṣṭaḥ saḥ śālīnaḥ kūpe vā yat akāryam tat kaupīnam . na iti āha . uttarapadalopaḥ atra draṣṭavyaḥ . śālāpraveśanam arhati adhṛṣṭaḥ saḥ śālīnaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9592: (P_5,2.21) KA_II.374.20-21 Ro_IV.109-110 vrātena jīvati iti ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9593: kim vrātam nāma . nānājātīyāḥ aniyatavṛttayaḥ utsedhajīvinaḥ saṅghāḥ vrātāḥ . teṣām karma vrātam . vrātakarmaṇā jīvati iti vrātīnaḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:9691: pravartante tathā nyāyyā vṛttiḥ bhavati pūraṇe . bahūnām vācikā saṅkhyā
GS24pmbhasuu:9692: pūraṇaḥ ca ekaḥ iṣyate . anyatvāt ubhayoḥ nyāyyā vārkṣī śākhā nidarśanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9694: tannirderdeśaḥ . maḍādiṣu yasya ādiḥ kriyate tannirderdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9695: asya ādiḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . akiryamāṇe hi pratyayādhikārāt pratyayaḥ ayam vijñāyeta . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . pratyayāntare hi svare doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9696: pratyayāntare hi sati svare doṣaḥ syāt . viṃśatitamaḥ . eṣaḥ svaraḥ prasajyeta . viṃśatitamaḥ iti ca iṣyate . saḥ tarhi tathā nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . prakṛtam ḍaḍgrahaṇam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . tasya pūraṇe ḍaṭ iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca arthaḥ . nāntāt iti pañcamī ḍaṭ iti prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati .

GS24pmbhasuu:9703: (P_5,2.52) KA_II.384.19-385.13 Ro_IV.135-136 bahukatipayavatūnām liṅgaviśiṣṭāt utpattiḥ . bahukatipayavatūnām liṅgaviśiṣṭād utpattiḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:9705: bhavati . na ca atra yajādim paśyāmaḥ . kim kāraṇam . tithukā vyavihitatvāt na prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam . tithuk kriyatām puṃvadbhāvaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt puṃvadbhāvaḥ . nityaḥ tithuk . kṛte api puṃvadbhāve prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti . tithuk api anityaḥ . anyasya kṛte puṃvadbhāve prāpnoti anyasya akṛte . śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . antaraṅgaḥ tarhi tithuk . kā antaraṅgatā . utpattisanniyogena tithuk ucyate utpanne pratyayte prakṛtipratyayau āśritya puṃvadbhāvaḥ . puṃvadbhāvaḥ api antaraṅgaḥ katham . uktam etat siddhaḥ ca pratyayavidhau iti . ubhayoḥ antaraṅgayoḥ paratvāt puṃvadbhāvaḥ . puṃvadbhāve kṛte punaḥprasaṅgavijñānāt tithuk siddhaḥ : bahutithī .
GS24pmbhasuu:9707: iha mā bhūt . ekaṣaṣṭaḥ . dviṣaṣṭaḥ . asaṅkhyādeḥ iti śakyam avaktum .
GS24pmbhasuu:9708: kasmāt na bhavati ekaṣaṣṭaḥ . dviṣaṣṭaḥ iti . ṣaṣṭiśabdāt pratyayaḥ vidhīyate . kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ yat ekaṣaṣṭiśabdāt syāt . na eva prāpnoti na arthaḥ pratiṣedhena . tadantavidhinā prāpnoti . grahaṇavatā prātipadikena tadantavidhiḥ pratiṣidhyate . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati iha
GS24pmbhasuu:9709: tadantavidhiḥ iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . ekaviṃśatitamaḥ . etat siddham bhavati

GS24pmbhasuu:9727: (P_5,2.72) KA_II.387.5-8 Ro_IV.141 kim yaḥ śītam karoti saḥ śītakaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:9739: (P_5,2.77) KA_II.388.4-8 Ro_IV.143 tāvatitham grahaṇam iti luk vāvacanānarthakyam vibhāṣāprakaraṇāt . tāvatitham grahaṇam iti luk vāvacanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . vibhāṣāprakaraṇāt . prakṛtā mahāvibhāṣā . tayā etat siddham . tāvatithena gṛhṇāti iti luk ca .

GS24pmbhasuu:9748: atha vā sāhacaryāt tācchabdyam bhaviṣyati . śṛṅkhalasahacaritam bandhanam śrṅkhalam bandhanam iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:9759: (P_5,2.94.1) KA_II.391.2-23 Ro_IV.147-153 kimartham imau arthau ubhau nirdiśyete : asya asmin iti na yat yasya bhavati tasmin api tat bhavati yat ca yasmin bhavati tat tasya api bhavati . na etayoḥ āvaśyakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9760: samāveśaḥ . bhavanti hi devadattasya gāvaḥ na ca tāḥ tasmin ādhṛtāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9761: bhavanti . bhavanti ca parvate vṛkṣāḥ na ca te tasya bhavanti . atha astigrahaṇam kimartham . sattāyām arthe pratyayaḥ yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . na sattām padārthaḥ vyabhicarati . idam tarhi prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:9762: : sampratisattāyām yathā syāt , bhūtabhaviṣyatsattāyām mā bhūt : gāvaḥ asya āsan . gāvaḥ asya bhavitāraḥ iti . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:9763: gomān āsīt . gomān bhavitā iti . bhavati na tu etasmin vākye . yadi etasmin vākye syāt yathā iha asteḥ prayogaḥ na bhavati gomān yavamān iti evam iha api na syāt : gomān āsīt . gomān bhavitā iti . sati api asteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9764: prayoge yathā iha bahuvacanam śrūyate gāvaḥ asya āsan gāvaḥ asya bhavitāraḥ evam iha api syāt . gomān āsīt . gomān bhavitā iti . kā tarhi iyam vācoyuktiḥ . gomān āsīt . gomān bhavitā iti . eṣā eṣā vācoyuktiḥ . na eṣā gavām sattā kathyate . kim tarhi . gomatsattā eṣā kathyate . asti atra vartamānakālaḥ astiḥ . katham tarhi bhūtabhaviṣyatsattā gamyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9765: dhātusambandhe pratyayāḥ iti . idam tarhi prayojanam . astiyuktāt yathā syāt . anantarādiyuktāt mā bhūt iti . gāvaḥ asya anantarāḥ . gāvaḥ asya samīpe iti . atha kriyamāṇe api astrigrahaṇe iha kasmāt na bhavati . gāvaḥ asya santi anantarāḥ . gāvaḥ asya santi samīpe iti . asāmarthyāt . katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asarmartham bhavati iti . yathā eva tarhi kriyamāṇe astrigrahaṇe asāmarthyāt anantarādiṣu na bhavanti evam akriyamāṇe api na bhaviṣyati . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . kriyamāṇe astrigrahaṇe na antareṇa tṛtīyasya padasya prayogam antarādayaḥ arthāḥ gamyante . akriyamāṇe punaḥ astrigrahaṇe antareṇa api tṛtīyasya padasya prayogam antarādayaḥ arthāḥ gamyante .
GS24pmbhasuu:9766: (P_5,2.94.2) KA_II.391.24-392.19 Ro_IV.153-156 atha iha kasmāt na bhavati . citraguḥ . śabalaguḥ iti . bahuvrīhyuktatvāt matvarthasya . atha iha kasmāt na bhavati . citrāḥ gāvaḥ asya santi iti . kutaḥ kasmāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:9767: bhavati . kim avayavāt āhosvit samudāyāt . avayavāt kasmāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9768: asāmarthyāt . katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asarmartham bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9769: samudāyāt tarhi kasmāt na bhavati . aprātipadikatvāt . nanu ca bhoḥ ākṛtau śāstrāṇi pravartante . tat yathā sup supā iti vartamāne anyasya ca anyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9770: ca samāsaḥ bhavati . satyam evam etat . ākṛtiḥ tu pratyekam parisamāpyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9771: . yāvati etat parisamāpyate ṅyāpprātipadikāt iti tāvataḥ utpattyā bhavitavyam . avayave ca etat parisamāpyate na samudāye . atha iha kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9772: na bhavati . pañca gāvaḥ asya santi pañcaguḥ . daśaguḥ iti . pratyekam asāmarthyāt samudāyāt aprātipadikatvāt samāsāt samāsena uktatvāt . na etat sāram . ukte api hi pratyayārthe utpadyate dvigoḥ taddhitaḥ . tat yathā dvaimāturaḥ pāñcanāpitiḥ iti . na eṣaḥ dviguḥ . kaḥ tarhi . bahuvrīhiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9773: apavādatvāt dviguḥ prāpnoti . antaraṅgatvāt bahuvrīhiḥ bhaviṣyati . kā antaraṅgatā . anyapadārthe bahuvrīhiḥ vartate viśiṣṭe anyapadārthe taddhitārthe dviguḥ . tasmin ca asya taddhite astigrahaṇam kriyate . yadi tarhi atiprasaṅgāḥ santi bahuvrīhau api astigrahaṇam kartavyam astiyuktāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9774: yathā syāt anantarādiyuktāt mā bhūt iti . atha na santi taddhitavidhau api na arthaḥ astigrahaṇena . satyam evam etat . kriyate tu idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:9775: taddhitavidhau astigrahaṇam . tat vai kriyamāṇam api pratyayavidhyartham na upādhyartham . astimān iti matup yathā syāt . kim ca kāraṇam na syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:9776: aprātipadikatvāt . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . avyayam eṣaḥ astiśabdaḥ . na eṣa asteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9777: laṭ . katham avyayatvam . vibhaktisvarapratirūpakāḥ ca nipātāḥ bhavanti iti nipātasañjñā . nipātaḥ avyayam iti avyayasañjñā . evam api na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:9778: . kim kāraṇam . astisāmānādhikaraṇye matup vidhīyate . na ca asteḥ astinā sāmānādhikaraṇyam . tat etat kriyamāṇam api pratyayavidhyartham na
GS24pmbhasuu:9779: upādhyartham . tasmāt dvigoḥ taddhitasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ yadi tat na asti sarvatra matvarthe pratiṣedhaḥ iti . sati hi tasmin tena eva siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:9780: (P_5,2.94.3) KA_II.392.20-393.10 Ro_IV.156-159 atha matvarthīyāt matvarthīyena bhavitavyam . na bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . arthagatyarthaḥ śabdaprayogaḥ . artham sampratyāyayiṣyāmi iti śabdaḥ prayujyate . tatra ekena uktatvāt tasya arthasya dvitīyasya prayogeṇa na bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . uktārthānām aprayogaḥ iti . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati :

GS24pmbhasuu:9892: . dvyātipratiṣedhāt kimaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . dvyātipratiṣedhāt kimaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kriyate . advyādibhyaḥ iti pratiṣedhe prāpte kimaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9893: (P_5,3.5.1) KA_II.403.2-15 Ro_IV.178-179 kva ayam nakāraḥ śrūyate . na kva cit śrūyate . lopaḥ asya bhavati nalopaḥ prātipadikāntasya iti . yadi na kva cit śrūyate kimartham uccāryate . anekālśit sarvasya iti sarvādeśaḥ yathā syāt . kriyamāṇe api nakāre sarvādeśaḥ na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9894: nalope kṛte ekāltvāt . idam iha sampradhāryam . nalopaḥ kriyatām sarvādeśaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt nalopaḥ . asiddhaḥ nalopaḥ . tasya asiddhatvāt sarvādeśaḥ bhavati . parigaṇiteṣu kāryeṣu nalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9895: asiddhaḥ na ca idam tatra parigaṇyate . evam tarhi ānupūrvyā siddham etat . na akṛte sarvādeśe prātipadikasañjñā prāpnoti na ca akṛtāyām prātipadikasañjñāyām nalopaḥ prāpnoti . tat ānupūrvyā siddham . na etat asti prayojanam . alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ bhavanti iti akārasya akāravacane prayojanam na asti iti kṛtvā antareṇa nakāram sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . asti anyat akārasya akāravacane prayojanam . kim . ye anye akārādeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9896: prāpnuvanti tadbādhanārtham . tat yathā maḥ rāji samaḥ kvau iti makārasya makāravacanasāmarthyāt anusvārādayaḥ na bhavanti . tasmāt nakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . kriyate nyāse eva .praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ ayama aa iti . saḥ anekālśit sarvasya iti sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9897: (P_5,3.5.2) KA_II.403.16-24 Ro_IV.180 etadaḥ iti yogavibhāgaḥ . etadaḥ iti yogavibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ . etadaḥ eta it iti etau ādeśau bhavataḥ tataḥ an . an ca bhavati etadaḥ iti . kena vihitena thakāre etadaḥ ādeśaḥ ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9898: . etadaḥ ca thamaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . etadaḥ ca thamaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . etatprakāram ittham . tat tarhi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . na kartavyam . etat jñāpayati bhavati atra thamuḥ iti yat ayam thakārādau
GS24pmbhasuu:9899: ādeśam śāsti . kutaḥ nu khalu etajjñāpakāt atra thamuḥ bhaviṣyati . na punaḥ yaḥ eva asau aviśeṣavihitaḥ thakārādiḥ tasmin ādeśaḥ syāt . idamā thakārādim viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . idamaḥ yaḥ thakārādiḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9900: (P_5,3.7, 10) KA_II.404.3-23 Ro_IV.180-182 idam vicāryate : ime tasilādayaḥ vibhaktyādeśaḥ vā syuḥ pare vā iti . katham ca ādeśaḥ syuḥ katham vā pare . yadi pañcamyāḥ saptamyāḥ iti ṣaṣṭhī tadā ādeśāḥ . atha pañcamī tataḥ pare . kutaḥ sandehaḥ . samānaḥ nirdeśaḥ . kaḥ ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:9902: subluksvaraguṇadīrghaittvauttvasmāyādividhipratiṣedhaḥ . tasilādayaḥ vibhaktyādeśāḥ cet subluksvaraguṇadīrghaittvauttvasmāyādividhipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . subluk . tatastyaḥ . yatastyaḥ . tatratyaḥ . yatratyaḥ . supaḥ dhātuprātipadikayoḥ iti subluk prāpnoti . subluk . svara . yadā . tadā .
GS24pmbhasuu:9903: anudāttau suppitau iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ prāpnoti . svara . guṇa . kasmāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:9904: kutaḥ . gheḥ ṅiti iti guṇaḥ prāpnoti . guṇa . dīrgha . tasmin . tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:9905: ataḥ dīrghaḥ yañi supi ca iti dīrghatvam prāpnoti . dīrgha . ettva. teṣu .
GS24pmbhasuu:9906: tatra . bahuvacane jhali et iti ettvam prāpnoti . ettva . auttva . kasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:9907: . kutra . idudbhyām aut at ca gheḥ iti auttvam prāpnoti . auttva .
GS24pmbhasuu:9908: smāyādividhiḥ . tasmāt . tataḥ . tasmin . tatra . ṅasiṅyoḥ smātsminau it
GS24pmbhasuu:9909: smādayaḥ prāpnuvanti . pañcamīnirdeśāt siddham . santu pare . yadi pare samānaśabdānām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . tasmāt tasyati . yasmāt tasyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9910: pañcamyantasya taseḥ tasil bhavati iti tasil prāpnoti . anādeśe svārthavijñānāt samānaśabdāpratiṣedhaḥ . anādeśe svārthavijñānāt samānaśabdāpratiṣedhaḥ . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . tasil kasmāt na bhavati . svārthavijñānāt . pañcamyantāt parasya taseḥ svārthe vartamānasya tasilā bhavitavyam . na ca atra pañcamyantāt paraḥ tasiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9912: (P_5,3.8) KA_II.405.2-8 Ro_IV.182-183 kimartham taseḥ tasil ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9913: taseḥ tasilvacanam svarārtham . taseḥ tasilvacanam kriyate svarārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:9914: liti pratyayāt pūrvam udāttam bhavati iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ yathā syāt . nanu ca ayam tasil tasim bādhiṣyate . na sidhyati . paratvāt tasiḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9915: tasilaḥ avakāśaḥ . tataḥ hīyate . tataḥ avarohati . taseḥ avakāśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9916: grāmataḥ āgacchati . nagarataḥ āgacchati . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . tataḥ āgacchati . yataḥ āgacchati . paratvāt tasiḥ prāpnoti . tasmāt suṣthu ucyate taseḥ tasilvacanam svarārtham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9917: (P_5,3.9) KA_II.405.10-12 Ro_IV.183 paryabhibhyām ca iti yat ucyate tat sarvobhayārthe draṣṭavyam . yāvat sarvataḥ tāvat paritaḥ . yāvat ubhayataḥ tāvat abhitaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9918: (P_5,3.14) KA_II.405.14-22 Ro_IV.183 iha kasmāt na bhavati . saḥ . tau
GS24pmbhasuu:9919: . te . bhavadādibhiḥ yoge iti vaktavyam . ke punaḥ bhavadādayaḥ . bhavān .
GS24pmbhasuu:9920: dīrghāyuḥ . devānāmpriyaḥ . āyuṣmān iti . saḥ bhavān . tatra bhavān .
GS24pmbhasuu:9921: tataḥ bhavān . tam bhavantam . tatra bhavantam . tataḥ bhavantam . tena bhavatā . tatra bhavatā tataḥ bhavatā . tasmai bhavate . tatra bhavate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9922: tataḥ bhavate . tasmāt bhavataḥ . tatra bhavataḥ . tataḥ bhavataḥ . tasmin bhavati . tatra bhavati . tataḥ bhavati . saḥ dīrghāyuḥ . tatra dīrghāyuḥ . tataḥ dīrghāyuḥ . tam dīrghāyuṣam . tatra dīrghāyuṣam . tataḥ dīrghāyuṣam . saḥ devānāmpriyaḥ . tatra devānāmpriyaḥ . tataḥ devānāmpriyaḥ . tam devānāmpriyam . tatra devānāmpriyam . tataḥ devānāmpriyam . saḥ āyuṣmān . tatra āyuṣmān . tataḥ āyuṣmān . tam āyuṣmantam . tatra āyuṣmantam . tataḥ āyuṣmantam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9923: (P_5,3.17) KA_II.406.2-3 Ro_IV.184 adhunā iti kim nipātyate . idamaḥ aśbhāvaḥ dhunā ca pratyayaḥ idamaḥ vā lopaḥ adhunā ca pratyayaḥ . asmin kāle adhuna .
GS24pmbhasuu:9924: (P_5,3.18) KA_II.406.5-10 Ro_IV.184 idānīm . idamaḥ tṛtīyādivibhaktiḥ udāttā bhavati iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ prāpnoti . dānīm iti nipātanāt svarasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9925: . dānīm iti nipātanāt svarasiddhiḥ bhaviṣyati . ādyudāttanipātanam kariṣyate . saḥ nipātanasvaraḥ vibhaktisvarasya bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9926: uktam vā . kim uktam . ādau siddham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9928: vihitatvāt . tadaḥ dāvacanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . vihitatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:9929: vihitaḥ atra pratyayaḥ sarvaikānyakiṃyattadaḥ kāle dā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9931: tayoḥ iti prātipadikanirdeśaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ . dveṣyam vijānīyāt :yogayoḥ vā pratyayayoḥ vā iti . tat ācāryaḥ suhṛt bhūtvā anvācaṣṭe : tayoḥ iti prātipadikanirdeśaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9932: (P_5,3.22) KA_II.407.2-408.2 Ro_IV.185-186 sadyaḥ iti kim nipātyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9933: samānasya sabhāvaḥ dyaḥ ca ahani . samānasya sabhāvaḥ nipātyate dyaḥ ca pratyayaḥ ahani abhidheye . samāne ahani sadyaḥ . parut parāri iti kim nipātyate . pūrvapūrvatayoḥ parabhāvaḥ udārī ca saṃvatsare .
GS24pmbhasuu:9934: pūrvapūrvatayoḥ parabhāvaḥ nipātyate udārī ca pratyayau saṃvatsare abhidheye . pūrvasmin saṃvatsare parut . pūrvatare saṃvatsare parāri .
GS24pmbhasuu:9935: aiṣamaḥ iti kim nipātyate . idamaḥ samasaṇ . idamaḥ samasaṇ pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9936: nipātyate saṃvatsare abhidheye . asmin saṃvatsare aiṣamaḥ . paredyavi iti kim nipātyate . parasmāt edyavi ahani . parasmāt edyavi pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9937: nipātyate ahani abhidheye . parasmin ahani paredyavi . adya iti kim
GS24pmbhasuu:9938: nipātyate . idamaḥ aśbhāvaḥ dyaḥ ca . idamaḥ aśbhāvaḥ nipātyate dyaḥ ca pratyayaḥ ahani abhidheye . asmin ahani adya . pūrvedyuḥ anyedyuḥ anyataredyuḥ itaredyuḥ aparedyuḥ adharedyuḥ ubhayedyuḥ uttaredyuḥ iti kim nipātyate . pūrvānyānyatarerāparādharobhayottarebhyaḥ edyusuc pūrvānyānyatarerāparādharobhayottarebhyaḥ edyusuc pratyayaḥ nipātyate ahani abhidheye . pūrvasmin ahani pūrvedyuḥ . anyasmin ahani anyedyuḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9939: anyatarasmin ahani anyataredyuḥ . itarasmin ahani itaredyuḥ . aparasmin ahani aparedyuḥ . adharasmin ahani adharedyuḥ . ubhayoḥ ahnoḥ ubhayedyuḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9940: uttarasmin ahani uttaredyuḥ . dyuḥ ca ubhayāt . ubhayaśabdāt dyuḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:9942: (P_5,3.27) KA_II.408.5 Ro_IV.187 iha kasmāt na bhavati . pūrvasmin deśe vasati iti . na eṣaḥ deśaḥ . deśaviśeṣaṇam etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:9943: (P_5,3.28) KA_II.408.7-22 Ro_IV.188-190 kimartham atasuc kriyate na tasuc eva kriyate . tatra ayam api arthaḥ . svarārthaḥ cakāraḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:9944: kartavyaḥ bhavati . pratyayasvareṇa eva siddham . kā rūpasiddhiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:9945: dakṣiṇataḥ grāmasya . uttarataḥ grāmasya . dakṣiṇottaraśabdau akārāntau .
GS24pmbhasuu:9946: tasuśabdaḥ pratyayaḥ . bhavet siddham yadā akārāntau . yatu tu khalu
GS24pmbhasuu:9947: ākārāntau tadā na sidhyati . tadā api siddham . katham . puṃvadbhāvena .
GS24pmbhasuu:9948: katham puṃvadbhāvaḥ . tasilādiṣu ā kṛtvasucaḥ iti . na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9949: bhāṣitapuṃskasya puṃvadbhāvaḥ na ca etau bhāṣitapuṃskau . nanu ca bho
GS24pmbhasuu:9950: dakṣiṇaśabdaḥ uttaraśabdaḥ ca puṃsi bhāṣyete . samānāyām ākṛtau yat
GS24pmbhasuu:9951: bhāṣitapuṃskam iti ucyate ākṛtyantare ca etau bhāṣitapuṃskau . dakṣiṇā uttarā iti dikśabdau . dakṣiṇaḥ uttaraḥ iti vyavasthāśabdau . yadi punaḥ dikśabdāḥ api vyavasthāśabdāḥ syuḥ . katham yāni digapadiṣṭāni kāryāṇi .
GS24pmbhasuu:9952: diśaḥ yadā vyavasthām vakṣyanti . yadi tari yaḥ yaḥ diśi vartate saḥ saḥ dikśabdaḥ ramaṇīyādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . ramaṇīyā dik śobhanā dik iti . atha matam etat diśi dṛṣṭaḥ digdṛṣṭaḥ digdṛṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ dikśabdaḥ diśam yaḥ na vyabhicarati iti ramaṇīyādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ na bhavati puṃvadbhāvaḥ tu prāpnoti . evam tarhi sarvanāmnaḥ vṛttimātre puṃvadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ dakṣiṇottarapūrvāṇām iti evamartham . viśeṣaṇārtham tarhi . kva viśeṣaṇārthena arthaḥ . ṣaṣṭhī atasarthapratyayena iti . ṣaṣṭhī tasarthapratyayene iti ucyamāne iha api syāt . tataḥ grāmāt . yataḥ grāmāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9953: (P_5,3.31) KA_II.409.2-4 Ro_IV.191 upari upariṣṭāt iti kim nipātyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9954: ūrdhvasya upabhāvaḥ riliṣṭātilau ca . ūrdhvasya upabhāvaḥ riliṣṭātilau ca pratyayau nipātyete . upari upariṣtāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:9955: (P_5,3.32) KA_II.409.6-16 Ro_IV.191 paścāt iti kim nipātyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9956: aparasya paścabhāvaḥ ātiḥ ca pratayayaḥ . aparasya paścabhāvaḥ nipātyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9957: ātiḥ ca pratayayaḥ . paścāt . dikpūrvapadasya ca . dikpūrvapadasya ca aparasya paścabhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ ātiḥ ca pratayayaḥ . dakṣiṇapaścāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:9958: uttarapaścāt . ardhottarapadasya ca samāse . ardhottarapadasya ca samāse
GS24pmbhasuu:9960: ardhe ca . ardhe ca parataḥ aparasya paścabhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . paścārdhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9961: (P_5,3.35) KA_II.409.18-20 Ro_IV.191 apañcamyāḥ iti prāk asaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9962: apañcamyāḥ iti yat ucyate prāk asaḥ tat draṣṭavyam . dveṣyam vijānīyāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:9963: aviśeṣeṇa uttaram apañcamyāḥ iti . tat ācāryaḥ suhṛt bhūtvā anvācaṣṭe :
GS24pmbhasuu:9966: citaḥ antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti antodāttatvam yathā syāt . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:9967: prayojanam . ekāc ayam . tatra na arthaḥ svarārthena cakāreṇa anubandhena
GS24pmbhasuu:9968: . pratyayasvareṇa eva siddham . viśeṣaṇārthaḥ tarhi . kva viśeṣaṇārthena arthaḥ . anyārāditarartedikśabdāñcūūttarapadājāhiyukte
GS24pmbhasuu:9969: (P_5,3.42) KA_II.410.7-15 Ro_IV.192-193 vidhārthe iti ucyate . kaḥ vidhārthaḥ nāma . vidhāyāḥ arthaḥ vidhārthaḥ . yadi evam ekā govidhā . ekā hastividhā . atra api prāpnoti . evam tarhi dhāvidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:9971: kaḥ punaḥ dhātvarthapṛthagbhāvaḥ . kim yat tat devadattaḥ kaṃsapātryām pāṇinā odanam bhuṅkte iti . na iti āha . kārakapṛthaktvam etat . yat tarhi tat kālye bhuṅke sāyam bhuṅkte iti . na iti āha . kālapṛthaktvam etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:9972: yat tarhi śītam bhuṅkte uṣṇam bhuṅkte iti . na iti āha . guṇapṛthaktvam etat . kaḥ tarhi dhātvarthapṛthagbhāvaḥ . kārakāṇām pravṛttiviśeṣaḥ kriyā
GS24pmbhasuu:9973: . yadi evam kriyāprakāre ayam bhavati . vidhayuktagatāḥ ca prakāre
GS24pmbhasuu:9974: bhavanti . evaṃvidham . evaṃyuktam . evaṅgatam . evamprakāram iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9975: (P_5,3.44) KA_II.410.17-20 Ro_IV.194 sahabhāve dhyamuñ . sahabhāve dhyamuñ vaktavyaḥ . eikadhyam rāśim kuru . saḥ tarhi vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . adhikaraṇavicāle iti ucyate na ca saḥ eva adhikaraṇavicālaḥ yat ekam anekam kriyate . yat api anekam ekam kriyate saḥ api adhikaraṇavicālaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9977: . dhamuñantāt svārthe ḍaḥ dṛśyate saḥ ca vidheyaḥ . pathi dvaidhāni .
GS24pmbhasuu:9979: (P_5,3.47) KA_II.411.5-10 Ro_IV.195 pāśapi kutsitagrahaṇam . pāśapi kutsitagrahaṇam kartavyam . vaiyākaraṇapāśaḥ . yājñikapāśaḥ . yaḥ hi yāpayitavyaḥ yāpyaḥ tatra mā bhūt iti . atha vaiyākaraṇaḥ śarīreṇa kṛśaḥ vyākaraṇena ca śobhanaḥ kartavyaḥ vaiyākaraṇapāśaḥ iti . na kartavyaḥ katham . yasya bhāvāt dravye śabdaniveśaḥ tadabhidhāne tadguṇe vaktavye pratyayena bhavitavyam . na ca kārśyasya bhāvāt dravye vaiyākaraṇaśabdaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9981: na hi apūraṇaḥ tīyaśabdaḥ asti yatra doṣaḥ syāt . nanu ca ayam asti mukhatīyaḥ pārśvatīyaḥ iti . arthavadgrahaṇe na anarthakasya iti evam asya
GS24pmbhasuu:9982: na bhaviṣyati . uttarārtham tarhi pūraṇagrahaṇam kartavyam . prāk ekādaśabhyaḥ acchandasi iti pūraṇāt yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:9983: (P_5,3.52) KA_II.411.17-412.10 Ro_IV.19196-197 ekāt ākinici dvibahvarthe pratyayavidhānam . ekāt ākinici dvibahvarthe pratyayaḥ vidheyaḥ . ekākinau . ekākinaḥ iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9984: ekaśabdaḥ ayam saṅkhyāpadam saṅkhyāyāḥ ca saṅkhyeyam arthaḥ . siddham tu saṅkhyādeśavacanāt . siddham etat . katham . dvibahvarthāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ ekaśabdaḥ ādeśaḥ vaktavyaḥ . asahāyasya vā . asahāyasya vā ekaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9985: ādeśaḥ vaktavyaḥ . asahāyaḥ ekākī . asahāyau ekākinau . asahāyāḥ ekākinaḥ . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:9986: ekāt ākinici dvibahvarthe pratyayavidhānam iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ayam ekaśabdaḥ asti eva saṅkhyāpadam . tat yathā ekaḥ dvau bahavaḥ iti . asti anyārthe vartate . tat yathā sadhamādaḥ dyumnaḥ ekāḥ tāḥ . anyāḥ iti arthaḥ . asti asahāyavācī . tat yathā . ekāgnayaḥ . ekahalāni . ekākibhiḥ kṣudrakaiḥ jitam iti . tat yaḥ asahāyavācī tasya eṣaḥ prayogaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9988: kim idam atiśāyane iti . deśyāḥ sūtranibandhāḥ kriyante . yāvat brūyāt prakarṣe atiśaye iti tāvat atiśāyane iti . kasya punaḥ prakarṣe pratyayaḥ utpadyate . ṅyāpprātipadikāt iti vartate . ṅyāpprātipadikasya prakarṣe .
GS24pmbhasuu:9989: ṅyāpprātipadikam vai śabdaḥ na ca śabdasya prakarṣāpakarṣau staḥ . śabde asambhavāt arthe kāryam vijñāsyate . kaḥ punaḥ ṅyāpprātipadikārthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9990: dravyam . na vai dravyasaya prakarṣe iṣyate . evam tarhi guṇaḥ . evam api guṇagrahaṇam kartavyam . dravyam api ṅyāpprātipadikārthaḥ guṇaḥ api .
GS24pmbhasuu:9991: tatra kutaḥ etat guṇasya prakarṣe bhaviṣyati na punaḥ dravyasya prakarṣe iti . kriyamāṇe ca api guṇagrahaṇe samānaguṇagrahaṇam kartavyam śuklāt kṛṣṇe mā bhūt iti . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati : adhvaryuḥ vai śreyān .
GS24pmbhasuu:9992: pāpīyān pratiprasthātā . andhānām kāṇatamaḥ iti . samānaguṇe eṣā spardhā
GS24pmbhasuu:9993: bhavati . adhvaryuḥ vai śreyān anyebhyaḥ praśasyebhyaḥ . pāpīyān pratiprasthātā anyebhyaḥ pāpebhyaḥ . andhānām kāṇatamaḥ iti kaṇiḥ ayam saukṣmye vartate . sarve ime kim cit paśyanti . ayam eṣām kāṇatamaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9994: adūraviprakarṣe iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . mahān sarṣapaḥ . mahān himavān iti . jāteḥ na iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt : vṛkṣaḥ ayam plakṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9995: ayam iti . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati : gotaraḥ . gotarā . aśvataraḥ iti . na eṣaḥ jāteḥ prakarṣaḥ . kasya tarhi . guṇasya . gauḥ ayam śakaṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:9996: vahati . gotararḥ ayam yaḥ śakaṭam vahati sīram ca . gauḥ iyam yā samām samām vijāyate . gotarā iyam yā samām samām vijāyate strīvatsā ca . aśvaḥ ayam yaḥ catvāri yojanāni gacchati . aśvataraḥ ayam yaḥ aṣṭau yojanāni gacchati . tathā tiṅaḥ ca iti atra kriyāgrahaṇam kartavyam sādhanaprakarṣe mā bhūt . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat tāvat ucyate guṇagrahaṇam kartavyam iti . na kartavyam . yasya prakarṣaḥ asti tasya prakarṣe bhaviṣyati . guṇasya ca eva prakarṣaḥ na dravyasya . katham jñāyate . evam hi dṛśyate loke . iha samāne āyāme vistāre paṭasya anyaḥ arghaḥ bhavati kāśikasya anyaḥ māthurasya . guṇāntaram khalu api śilpinaḥ utpādayamānāḥ dravyāntareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:9997: prakṣālayanti . anyena śuddham dhautakam kurvanti anyena śaiphālikam
GS24pmbhasuu:9998: anyena mādhyamikam . yat api ucyate kriyamāṇe ca api guṇagrahaṇe samānaguṇagrahaṇam kartavyam śuklāt kṛṣṇe mā bhūt iti . na kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9999: samānaguṇe eva spardhā bhavati . nahi āḍhyābhirūpau spardhete . vācakena khalu api utpattavyam na ca śuklāt kṛṣṇe pratyayaḥ utpadyamānaḥ vācakaḥ syāt . yat api ucyate adūraviprakarṣe iti vaktavyam iti . na vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10000: adūraviprakarṣe eva spardhā bhavati . na hi niṣkadhanaḥ śataniṣkadhanena spardhate . yat api ucyate jāteḥ na iti vaktavyam iti . na vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10001: jananena yā prāpyate sā jātiḥ na ca etasya arthasya prakarṣāpakarṣau staḥ . yat api ucyate tiṅaḥ ca iti atra kriyāgrahaṇam kartavyam sādhanaprakarṣe mā bhūt iti . na kartavyam . sādhanam vai dravyam na ca dravyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10002: prakarṣāpakarṣau staḥ . kim punaḥ ekam śauklyam āhosvit nānā . kim ca ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10003: . yadi ekam prakarṣaḥ na upapadyate . na hi tena eva tasya prakarṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10004: bhavati . atha nānā samānaguṇagrahaṇam kartavyam śuklāt kṛṣṇe mā bhūt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10005: . asti ekam śauklyam tat tu viśeṣavat . kiṅkṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10006: alpatvamahattvakṛtaḥ . atha vā punaḥ astu ekam nirviśeṣam ca . nanu ca uktam prakarṣaḥ na upapadyate . na hi tena eva tasya prakarṣaḥ bhavati iti . guṇāntareṇa pracchādāt prakarṣaḥ bhaviṣyati . atha vā punaḥ astu nānā .
GS24pmbhasuu:10007: nanu ca uktam samānaguṇagrahaṇam kartavyam śuklāt kṛṣṇe mā bhūt iti . na kartavyam . samānaguṇe eva spardhā bhavati . nahi āḍhyābhirūpau spardhete
GS24pmbhasuu:10008: . vācakena khalu api utpattavyam na ca śuklāt kṛṣṇe pratyayaḥ utpadyamānaḥ vācakaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:10010: bhavitavyam . dvitīyāntāt atiśayyamānāt . śuklam atiśete śuklataraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10011: kṛṣṇam atiśete kṛṣṇataraḥ . yadi dvitīyāntāt atiśayyamānāt kālaḥ atiśete kālīm kālitaraḥ iti prāpnoti kālataraḥ iti ca iṣyate . tathā kālī atiśete
GS24pmbhasuu:10012: kālam kālataraḥ iti prāpnoti kālitarā iti ca iṣyate . tathā gārgyaḥ atiśete gargān gargataraḥ iti prāpnoti gārgyataraḥ iti ca iṣyate . tathā gargāḥ atiśerate gārgyam gārgyatarāḥ iti prāpnoti gargatarāḥ iti ca iṣyate . evam tarhi prathamāntāt svārthikaḥ bhaviṣyati . kālaḥ atiśete kālataraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10013: . kālī atiśete kālitarā . gārgyaḥ atiśete gārgyataraḥ . gargāḥ atiśerate gargatarāḥ . yadi prathamāntāt svārthikaḥ kumāritarā kiśoritarā avyatiriktam vayaḥ iti kṛtvā vayasi prathame iti ṅīp prāpnoti . tarapā uktatvāt strīpratyayaḥ na bhaviṣyati . ṭāp api tarhi na prāpnoti . ukte api hi bhavanti ete ṭābādayaḥ . uktam etat svārthikāḥ ṭābādayaḥ iti . ṅīp api tarhi prāpnoti . evam tarhi guṇaḥ abhidhīyate . evam api liṅgavacanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:10014: na sidhyanti . śuklataram . śuklatarā . śuklataraḥ . śuklatarau .
GS24pmbhasuu:10015: śuklatarāḥ iti . āśrayataḥ liṅgavacanāni bhaviṣyanti . guṇavacanānām hi śabdānām āśrayata liṅgavacanāni bhavanti . śuklam vastram , śuklā śāṭī śuklaḥ kambalaḥ , śuklau kambalau śuklāḥ kambalāḥ iti . yat asau dravyam
GS24pmbhasuu:10016: śritaḥ bhavati guṇaḥ tasya yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat gu asya api bhaviṣyati . atha vā kriyā abhidhīyate . evam api liṅgavacanāni na sidhyanti . āśrayataḥ liṅgavacanāni bhaviṣyanti . evam api dvivacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:10017: prāpnoti . yaḥ ca atiśete yaḥ ca atiśayyate ubhau tau tasya āśrayau bhavataḥ . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . katham . śetiḥ akarmakaḥ . akarmakāḥ api dhātavaḥ sopasargāḥ sakarmakāḥ bhavanti . karmāpadiṣṭāḥ vidhayaḥ karmasthabhāvakānām karmasthakriyāṇam vā bhavanti kartṛsthabhāvakaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:10018: śetiḥ . atha yadi eva dvitīyāntāt utpattiḥ prathamāntāt vā svārthikaḥ atha
GS24pmbhasuu:10019: api guṇaḥ abhidhīyate atha api kriyā kim gatam etat iyatā sūtreṇa āhosvit anyatarasmin pakṣe bhūyaḥ sūtram kartavyam . gatam iti āha . katham . yadā tāvat dvitīyāntāt utpattiḥ prathamāntāt vā svārthikaḥ tadā kṛtyalyuṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10020: bahulam iti evam atra lyuṭ bhaviṣyati . yadā guṇaḥ abhidhīyate tadā nyāyasiddham eva . yadā lapi kriyā tadā api nyāyasiddham eva . atha vā atiśāyayati iti atiśāyanam . kaḥ prayojyārthaḥ . guṇāḥ guṇinam prayojayanti guṇī vā guṇān prayojayati . kaḥ punaḥ iha śetyarthaḥ . iha yaḥ yatra bhavati śete asau tatra . guṇāḥ ca guṇini śerate . śetyarthaḥ kāritārthaḥ vā nirdeśaḥ ayam samīkṣitaḥ . śetyarthe na asti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10021: kāritārthe bravīmi te . guṇī vā guṇasaṃyogāt guṇaḥ vā guṇinā yadi abhivyajyeta saṃyogāt kāritārthaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:10022: (P_5,3.55.3) KA_II.415.18-416.15 Ro_IV.209-211 iha asya api sūkṣmāṇi vastrāṇi asya api sūkṣmāṇi vastrāṇi iti paratvāt ātiśāyikaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10023: atiśāyane bahuvrīhau uktam . kim uktam . pūrvpadātiśaye ātiśāyikāt bahuvrīhiḥ sūkṣmavastratarādyarthaḥ . uttarapadātiśaye ātiśāyikaḥ bahuvrīheḥ bahvāḍhyatarādyarthaḥ iti . iha trīṇi śuklāni vastrāṇi prakarṣāpakarṣayuktāni . tatra pūrvam apekṣya uttare dve tarabante . tatra dvayoḥ tarabantayoḥ ekasmāt prakarṣayuktāt śuklataraśabdāt utpattiḥ prāpnoti śuklaśabdāt eva ca iṣyate . śuklatarasya śuklabhāvāt prakṛteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10024: pratyayavijñānam . śuklataraśabde śuklaśabdaḥ asti . tasmāt utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati . na etat vivadāmahe śuklataraśabde śuklaśabdaḥ asti na asti iti . kim tarhi . śuklataraśabdaḥ api asti . tataḥ utpattiḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10025: tadantāt ca svārthe chandasi darśanam śreṣṭhamāya iti . tadantāt ātiśāyikāntāt ca svārthe chandasi ātiśāyikaḥ dṛśyate . devo vaḥ savita
GS24pmbhasuu:10026: prarpayatu śreṣṭhamāya karmaṇe . evam tarhi madhyamāt śuklaśabdāt pūrvaparāpekṣāt utpattiḥ vaktavyā . madhyamaḥ ca śuklaśabdaḥ pūrvam apekṣya prakṛṣṭaḥ param apekṣya nyūnaḥ na ca nyūnaḥ pravartate . atha vā utpadyatām . luk bhaviṣyati . vācakena khalu api utpattavyam na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:10027: śuklataraśabdāt utpadyamānaḥ vācakaḥ syāt . na khalu api bahūnām prakarṣe tarapā bhavitavyam . kena tarhi . tamapā . pūrveṇa spardhamānaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:10028: labhate sitaḥ . parasmin nyūnatām eti na ca nyūnaḥ pravartate . apekṣya madhyamaḥ pūrvam ādhikyam labhate sitaḥ . parasmin nyūnatām eti yathā amātyaḥ sthite nṛpe . astu vā api taraḥ tasmāt . na apaśabdaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:10029: vācakaḥ cet prayoktavyaḥ vācakaḥ cet prayujyatām .
GS24pmbhasuu:10031: tatra idam na sidhyati . dantoṣṭhasya dantāḥ snigdhatarāḥ . pāṇipādasya pādau sukumāratarau . asmākam ca devadattasya ca devadattaḥ abhirūpataraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10032: iti . yadi punaḥ dvyarthopapade iti ucyeta . tatra ayam api arthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10033: vibhajyopapadagrahaṇam na kartavyam . iha api śaṅkāśyakebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10034: pāṭaliputrakāḥ abhirūpatarāḥ iti dvyarthopapade iti eva siddham . na evañjātīyakā dvyarthatā śakyā vijñātum . iha api prasjyeta . śaṅkāśyakānām pāṭaliputrakāṇām ca pāṭaliputrakāḥ abhirūpatamāḥ iti . avaśyam khalu api
GS24pmbhasuu:10035: vibhajyopapadagrahaṇam kartavyam yaḥ hi bahūnām vibhāgaḥ tadartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:10036: śaṅkāśyakebhyaḥ ca pāṭaliputrakebhyaḥ ca māthurāḥ abhirūpatarāḥ iti . tat tarhi dvyarthopapade iti vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . na idam pāribhāṣikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10037: dvivacanasya grahaṇam . kim tarhi anvarthagrahaṇam . ucyate vacanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10038: dvayoḥ arthayoḥ vacanam dvivacanam iti . evam api tarabīyasunoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10039: ekadravyasya utkarṣāpakarṣayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam . tarabīyasunoḥ ekadravyasya utkarṣāpakarṣayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam vaktavyam . parut bhavān paṭuḥ āsīt .
GS24pmbhasuu:10040: paṭutaraḥ ca aiṣamaḥ iti . siddham tu guṇapradhānatvāt . siddham etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:10041: katham . guṇapradhānatvāt . guṇapradhānaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ kriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:10042: guṇāntarayogāt ca anyatvam bhavati . tat yathā tam eva guṇāntarayuktam vaktāraḥ bhavanti anyaḥ bhavān saṃvṛttaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10044: na etat asti prayojanam . siddhe vidhiḥ ārabhyamāṇaḥ antareṇa evakāram niyamārthaḥ bhaviṣyati . iṣṭataḥ avadhāraṇārthaḥ tarhi . yathā evam vijñāyeta . ajādī guṇavacanāt eva iti . mā evam vijñāyi . ajādī eva guṇavacanāt iti . kim ca syāt na vyañjanādī guṇavacanāt syātām (P_5,3.60) KA_II.417.14-418.4 Ro_IV.215-217 idam ayuktam vartate . kim atra ayuktam . ajādī guṇavacanāt eva iti uktvā aguṇavacanānām api ajādyoḥ ādeśāḥ ucyante . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . etat eva jñāpayati bhavataḥ etebhyaḥ aguṇavacanebhyaḥ api ajādī iti yat ayam ajādyoḥ parataḥ ādeśān śāsti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10045: evam api tayoḥ iti vaktavyam syāt . tayoḥ parataḥ iti . yadi punaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:10046: vidhiḥ vijñāyeta . na evam śakyam . vyañjanādī hi na syātām upādhīnām ca
GS24pmbhasuu:10047: saṅkaraḥ syāt punarvidhānāt ajādyoḥ . nanu ca ete viśeṣāḥ anuvarteran .
GS24pmbhasuu:10048: yadi api ete anuvarteran vyañjanādī tarhi na syātām . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavataḥ etebhyaḥ aguṇavacanebhyaḥ api ajādī iti yat ayam ajādyoḥ parataḥ ādeśān śāsti . nanu ca uktam tayoḥ iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:10049: iti . na vaktavyam . prakṛtam ajādīgrahaṇam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10050: ajādī guṇavacanāt eva iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam saptamīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ . arthāt vibhaktivipariṇāmaḥ bhaviṣyati . tat yathā . uccāni devadattasya gṛhāṇi . āmantrayasva enam . devadattam iti gamyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:10051: devadattasya gāva aśvā hiraṇyam iti . āḍhyaḥ vaidhaveyaḥ . devadattaḥ iti gamyate . purastāt ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭam sat arthāt dvitīyānirdiṣṭam prathamānirdiṣṭam ca bhavati . evam iha api purastāt prathamānirdiṣṭam sat
GS24pmbhasuu:10054: ekavacanāntena ca . tena strīliṅgāt eva utpattiḥ syāt ekavacanāntāt ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:10055: punnapuṃsakaliṅgāt dvivacanabahuvacanāntāt ca na syāt . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na ayam pratyayārthaḥ . kim tarhi . prakṛtyarthaviśeṣaṇam etat . praśaṃsāyām yat prātipadikam vartate tasmāt rūpap bhavati . kasmin arthe . svārthe iti . svārthikāḥ ca prakṛtitaḥ liṅgavacanāni anuvartante . prakṛteḥ liṅgavacanābhāvāt tiṅprakṛteḥ ambhāvavacanam . prakṛteḥ liṅgavacanābhāvāt tiṅprakṛteḥ rūpapaḥ ambhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . pacatirūpam . pacatorūpam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10056: pacantirūpam iti . siddham tu kriyāpradhānatvāt . siddham etat . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:10057: kriyāpradhānatvāt . kriyāpradhānam ākhyātam ekā ca kriyā . dravyapradhānam nāma . katham punaḥ jñayate kriyāpradhānam ākhyātam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:10058: dravyapradhānam nāma iti . yat kriyām pṛṣṭaḥ tiṅā ācaṣṭe . kim devadattaḥ karoti . pacati iti . dravyam pṛṣṭaḥ kṛtā ācaṣṭe . kataraḥ devadattaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10059: yaḥ kārakaḥ hārakaḥ iti . yadi tarhi ekā kriyā dvivacanabahuvacanāni na
GS24pmbhasuu:10060: sidyanti . pacataḥ . pacanti iti . na etāni kriyāpekṣāṇi . kim tarhi sādhanāpekṣāṇi . iha api tarhi prāpnuvanti . pacatirūpam . pacatorūpam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10061: pacantirūpam iti . tiṅā uktatvāt tasya abhisambandhasya na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:10062: ekavacanam api tarhi na prāpnoti . samayāt bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:10063: dvivacanabahuvacanāni api tarhi samayāt prāpnuvanti . evam tarhi ekavacanam utsargaḥ kariṣyate . tasya dvibahvoḥ dvivacanabahuvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:10064: apavāvau bhaviṣyataḥ . evam api napuṃsakatvam vaktavyam . na vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10068: corarūpaḥ iti . siddham tu prakṛtyarthavaiśiṣṭyavacanāt . siddham etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:10069: katham . prakṛtyarthasya vaiśiṣṭye iti vaktavyam . vṛṣalarūpaḥ ayam . api ayam palāṇḍunā surām pibet . corarūpaḥ ayam . api ayam akṣṇoḥ añjanam haret . dasyurūpaḥ ayam . api ayam dhāvataḥ lohitam pibet .
GS24pmbhasuu:10072: paṭukalpau . paṭukalpāḥ iti . ekaḥ ayam arthaḥ īṣadasamāptiḥ nāma . tasya ekatvāt ekavacanam prāpnoti . prakṛtyarthaviśeṣaṇatvād siddham . siddham etat . katham . na ayam pratyayārthaḥ . kim tarhi prakṛtyarthaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:10073: etat . īṣadasamāptau yat prātipadikam vartate tasmāt kalpabādayaḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:10074: . kasmin arthe . svārthe iti . svārthikāḥ ca prakṛtitaḥ liṅgavacanāni anuvartante . prakṛtyarthe cet liṅgavacanānupapattiḥ . prakṛtyarthe cet liṅgavacanayoḥ anupapattiḥ . guḍakalpā drākṣā . tailakalpā prasannā .
GS24pmbhasuu:10075: payaskalpā yavāgūḥ iti . siddham tu tatsambandhe uttarapadārthe pratyayavacanāt . siddham etat . katham . tatsambandhe īṣadasamāptisambandhe uttarapadārthe pratyayaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:10076: īṣadasamāptaukriyāpradhānatvāt liṅgavacanānupapattiḥ iti . parihṛtam etat prakṛtyarthaviśeṣaṇatvād siddham iti . nanu ca uktam prakṛtyarthe cet liṅgavacanānupapattiḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati svārthikāḥ ativartante api liṅgavacanāni iti yat ayam ṇacaḥ striyām añ iti strīgrahaṇam karoti . yadi etat jñāpyate bahuguḍaḥ drākṣā . bahutailam prasannā . bahupayaḥ yavāgūḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . na api ativartante .
GS24pmbhasuu:10077: kim punaḥ iha udāharaṇam . paṭukalpaḥ . mṛdukalpaḥ iti . na etat asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10078: nirjñātasya arthasya samāptiḥ vā bhavati visamāptiḥ vā guṇaḥ ca anirjñātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10079: . idam tarhi . guḍakalpā drākṣā . tailakalpā prasannā . payaskalpā yavāgūḥ iti . dravyam api anirjñātam . idam tarhi . kṛtakalpam . bhuktakalpam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10081: bhūtakālalakṣaṇatvāt kalpādīnām ca asamāptivacanāt . ktāntāt pratyayavidhāneḥ anupapattiḥ . kim kāraṇam . ktasya bhūtakālalakṣaṇatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:10082: bhūtakālalakṣaṇaḥ ktaḥ . kalpādīnām ca asamāptivacanāt . visamāptivacanāḥ ca kalpādayaḥ . na ca asti sambhavaḥ yat bhūtakālaḥ ca syāt asamāptiḥ ca iti . siddham tu āśaṃsāyām bhūtavadvacanāt . siddham etat . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:10083: āśaṃsāyām bhūtavat ca iti evam atra ktaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:10084: udāharaṇam paṭukalpaḥ . mṛdukalpaḥ iti . nanu ca uktam nirjñātasya arthasya samāptiḥ vā bhavati visamāptiḥ vā guṇaḥ ca anirjñātaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10085: lokataḥ vyavahāram dṛṣṭvā guṇasya nirjñānam . tat yathā paṭuḥ ayam brāhmaṇaḥ iti ucyate yaḥ laghunā upāyena athān sādhayati . paṭukalpaḥ ayam iti ucyati yaḥ na tathā sādhayati . idam ca api udāharaṇam guḍakalpā drākṣā . tailakalpā prasannā . payaskalpā yavāgūḥ iti . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:10086: dravyam api anirjñātam iti . lokataḥ dravyam api nirjñātam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10087: (P_5,3.68.1) KA_II.420.19-422.4 Ro_IV.226-229 vibhāṣāgrahaṇam kimartham . vibhāṣā bahuc yathā syāt . bahucā mukte vākyam api yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10088: . na etat asti prayojanam . prakṛtā mahāvibhāṣā . tayā vākyam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:10089: idam tarhi prayojanam . kalpādayaḥ api yathā syuḥ iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . bahuc ucyate kalpādayaḥ api . tat ubhayam vacanāt bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:10090: . na evam śakyam . akriyamāṇe hi vibhāṣāgrahaṇe anavakāśaḥ bahuc kalpādīn
GS24pmbhasuu:10091: bādheta . kalpādayaḥ api anavakāśāḥ . te vacanāt bhaviṣyanti . sāvakāśāḥ kalpādayaḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . tiṅantāni avakāśaḥ . atha subgrahaṇam kimartham . subantāt utpattiḥ yathā syāt . prātipadikāt mā bhūt iti . na etat asti prayojanam . na asti atra viśeṣaḥ subantāt utpattau satyām prātipadikāt vā . yadi evam iha api na arthaḥ subgrahaṇena . supaḥ ātmanaḥ kyac iti . iha api na asti atra viśeṣaḥ subantāt utpattau satyām
GS24pmbhasuu:10092: prātipadikāt vā . ayam asti viśeṣaḥ . subantāt utpattau satyām padasañjñā siddhā bhavati . prātipadikāt utpattau satyām padasañjñā na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10093: nanu ca prātipadikāt api utpattau satyām padasañjñā siddhā . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:10094: ārabhyate naḥ kye iti . tat ca avaśyam kartavyam subantāt utpattau
GS24pmbhasuu:10095: niyamārtham . tat eva prātipadikāt utpattau satyām vidhyartham bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:10096: . idam tarhi prayojanam . subantāt utpattiḥ yathā syāt . tiṅantāt mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:10097: iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . ṅyāpprātipadikāt iti vartate . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . bahuci subgrahaṇāt pūrvatra tiṅaḥ vidhānam . bahuci subgrahaṇam kriyate pūrvatra tiṅaḥ vidhiḥ yathā vijñāyeta . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:10098: prayojanam . prakṛtam tiṅgrahaṇam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . atiśāyane tamabiṣṭhanau . tiṅaḥ ca iti . evam tarhi bahuci subgrahaṇam pūrvatra tiṅaḥ vidhānāt . bahuci subgrahaṇam kriyate . kim kāraṇam . pūrvatra tiṅaḥ vidhānāt . pūrvatra tiṅaḥ ca iti anuvartate . tat iha api prāpnoti . nanu ca tiṅgrahaṇam nivarteta . avaśyam uttarārtham anuvartyam
GS24pmbhasuu:10099: avyayasarvanāmnām akac prāk ṭeḥ iti pacataki jalpataki iti evamartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:10100: yadi subgrahaṇam kriyate svaraḥ na sidhyati . bahupaṭavaḥ evam svaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10101: prasajyeta bahupaṭavaḥ iti ca iṣyate . paṭhiṣyati hi ācāryaḥ citaḥ saprakṛteḥ bahvakajartham iti . svaraḥ katham . svaraḥ prātipadikatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:10102: subluki kṛte prātipadikatvāt svaraḥ bhaviṣyati . atha tugrahaṇam kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:10103: . tugrahaṇam nityapūrvārtham . tugrahaṇam kriyate nityam pūrvaḥ yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10104: . vibhāṣā mā bhūt iti . na etat asti prayojanam . na vibhāṣāgrahaṇena pūrvam abhisambadhyate . kim tarhi . bahuc abhisambadhyate : vibhāṣā bahuc bhavati iti . yadā ca bhavati tadā pūrvaḥ bhavati . idam tarhi prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:10105: . prāk utpatteḥ yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat utpanne api pratyaye yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10106: . bahuguḍaḥ drākṣā . bahutailam prasannā . bahupayaḥ yavāgūḥ iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . svāṛthikaḥ ayam svārthikāḥ ca prakṛtitaḥ liṅgavacanāni anuvartante . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat tugrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ svārthikāḥ ativartante api liṅgavacanāni iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . guḍakalpā drākṣā , tailakalpā prasannā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10107: payaskalpā yavāgūḥ iti etat siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:10108: (P_5,3.68.2) KA_II.422.5-10 Ro_IV.229-230 tamādibhyaḥ kalpādayaḥ vipratiṣedhena . tamādibhyaḥ kalpādayaḥ bhavanti vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:10109: tamādīnām avakāśaḥ prakarṣasya vacanam īṣadasamāpteḥ avacanam . paṭutaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10110: . paṭutamaḥ . kalpādīnām īṣadasamāpteḥ vacanam prakarṣasya avacanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10111: paṭukalpaḥ . mṛdukalpaḥ . ubhayavacane ubhayam prāpnoti . paṭukalpataraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10112: mṛdukalpataraḥ . kalpādayaḥ bhavanti vipratiṣedhena . yadi evam īṣadasamāpteḥ prakarṣe tamādiḥ pratyayaḥ prāpnoti prakṛteḥ eva ca iṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:10113: tamādiḥ īṣatpradhānāt . tamādiḥ īṣatpradhānāt api bhavati . asya prakarṣaḥ asti . tasya prakarṣe bhaviṣyati . kasya ca prakarṣaḥ asti. prakṛteḥ eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:10114: (P_5,3.71-72.1) KA_II.422.16-21 Ro_IV.230 kim ayam subantasya prāk ṭeḥ bhavati āhosvit ṅyāpprātipadikasya . kutaḥ sandehaḥ . ubhayam prakṛtam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10115: anyatarat śakyam viśeṣayitum . kim ca ataḥ . yadi subantasya yuṣmakābhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10116: asmakābhiḥ yuṣmakāsu asmakāsu yuvakayoḥ āvakayoḥ iti na sidhyati . atha prātipadikasya tvayakā mayakā tvayaki mayaki iti atra api prāpnoti . astu subantasya . katham yuṣmakābhiḥ asmakābhiḥ yuṣmakāsu asmakāsu yuvakayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10118: (P_5,3.71-72.2) KA_II.422.22-423.2 Ro_IV.230-231 akacprakaraṇe tūṣṇīmaḥ kām . akacprakaraṇe tūṣṇīmaḥ kām vaktavyaḥ . āsitavyam kila tūṣṇīkām etat paśyataḥ cintitam . śīle kaḥ malopaḥ ca . śīle kaḥ malopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10120: (P_5,3.71-72.3) KA_II.423.3-8 Ro_IV.231 iha bhinatti chinatti iti śanami kṛte śap prāpnoti . bahukṛtam bahubhuktam bahupītam iti bahuci kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:10121: kalpādayaḥ prāpnuvanti . uccakaiḥ nīcakaiḥ akaci kṛte kādayaḥ prāpnuvanti
GS24pmbhasuu:10122: . nanu ca śnambahujakacaḥ apavādāḥ te bādhakāḥ bhaviṣyanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10123: śnambahujakakṣu nānādeśatvāt utsargapratiṣedhaḥ . śnambahujakakṣu nānādeśatvāt utsargapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . samānadeśaiḥ apavādaiḥ utsargāṇām bādhanam bhavati . nānādeśatvāt na prāpnoti (P_5,3.71-72.4) KA_II.423.9-24 Ro_IV.231-232 kavidheḥ tamādayaḥ pūrvavipratiṣiddham . kavidheḥ tamādayaḥ bhavanti pūrvavipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:10124: kavidheḥ avakāśaḥ kutsādīnām vacanam prakarṣasya avacanam . paṭukaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10125: mṛdukaḥ . tamādīnām avakāśaḥ prakarṣasya vacanam kutsādīnām avacanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10126: paṭutaraḥ . paṭutamaḥ . ubhayavacane ubhayam prāpnoti . paṭutarakaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10127: paṭutamakaḥ . tamādayaḥ bhavanti pūrvavipratiṣedhena . kadā cit chinnakatarādayaḥ . kadā cit chinnakatarādayaḥ bhavanti vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:10129: ekadeśipradhānaḥ ca samāsaḥ kavidheḥ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:10131: kanvidhyartham . uttarapadārthapradhānaḥ ca samāsaḥ kavidheḥ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . kim prayojanam . sañjñāyām kanvidhyartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:10132: sañjñāyām kan yathā syāt . navagrāmakam . navarāṣṭrakam . navanagarakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10133: kadā cit dvandvaḥ . kadā cit dvandvaḥ kavidheḥ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:10136: iti svaśabdena uktatvāt tasya arthasya pratyayaḥ na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kutsitasya anukampāyām bhaviṣyati anukampitasya kutsāyām . atha vā svārtham abhidhāyaḥ śabdaḥ nirapekṣaḥ dravyam āha samavetam . samavetasya ca vacane liṅgam vacanam vibhaktim ca . abhidhāya tān viśeṣān apekṣamāṇaḥ ca kṛtsnamātmānam priyakutsanādiṣu punaḥ pravartate asau vibhaktyantaḥ katham punaḥ idam vijñāyate : kutsitādīnām arthe iti āhosvit kutsitādisamānādhikaraṇāt iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . kutsidādīnām arthe cet liṅgavacanānupapattiḥ . kutsidādīnām arthe cet liṅgavacanayoḥ anupapattiḥ . paṭukam . paṭukā . paṭukaḥ . paṭukau . paṭukāḥ iti . ekaḥ ayam arthaḥ kutsitam nāma . tasya ekatvāt ekavacanam eva prāpnoti . asti tarhi kutsitādisamānādhikaraṇāt iti . kutsidādisamānādhikaraṇāt iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:10137: atiprasaṅgaḥ yathā ṭābādiṣu . kutsidādisamānādhikaraṇāt iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:10138: atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati yathā ṭābādiṣu . katham ca ṭābādiṣu . uktam tatra strīsamānādhikaraṇāt iti cet bhūtādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ iti . evam iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:10139: kutsidādisamānādhikaraṇāt iti cet atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . idam ghṛtakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10140: idam tailakam . idamśabdāt api prāpnoti . siddham tu yena kutsitādivacanam tadyuktāt svārthe pratyayavidhānāt . siddham etat . katham . yena kutsitādayaḥ arthāḥ gamyante tadyuktāt svārthe pratyayaḥ bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10141: vaktavyam . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam kutsidādīnām arthe cet liṅgavacanānupapattiḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10142: . na ayam pratyayārthaḥ . kim tarhi prakṛtyarthaviśeṣaṇam etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:10143: kutsitādiṣu yat prātipadikam vartate tasmāt kādayaḥ bhavanti . kasmin arthe . svārthe . svāṛthikāḥ ca prakṛtitaḥ liṅgavacanāni anuvartante .
GS24pmbhasuu:10144: (P_5,3.83.1) KA_II.425.2-12 Ro_IV.237 caturthyāt . caturthyāt lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . bṛhaspatidattakaḥ . bṛhaspatikaḥ . prajāpatidattakaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10145: prajāpatikaḥ . anajādau ca . anajādau ca lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . devadattakaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10146: devakaḥ . yajñadattakaḥ . yajñakaḥ . lopaḥ pūrvapadasya ca . pūrvapadasya ca lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . devadattakaḥ . dattakaḥ . yajñadattakaḥ . dattakaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10147: apratyaye tathā eva iṣṭaḥ . devadattaḥ . dattaḥ . yajñadattaḥ . dattaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10148: uvarṇāt laḥ ilasya ca . uvarṇāt ilasya ca lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . bhānudattakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10151: na ike kṛte ajādau iti eva siddham . ṭhaggrahaṇam ukaḥ dvitīyatve
GS24pmbhasuu:10152: kavidhānārtham . ṭhaggrahaṇam kriyate ukaḥ dvitīyatve kavidhiḥ yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10153: . vāyudattakaḥ . vāyukaḥ . pitṛdattakaḥ . pitṛkaḥ . ajādilakṣaṇe hi māthikādivat prasaṅgaḥ . ajādilakṣaṇe hi māthikādivat prasajyeta . tat yatha mathitam paṇyam asya māthitikaḥ iti akāralope kṛte tāntāt iti kādeśaḥ na bhavati evam iha api na syāt . dvitīyāt acaḥ lope
GS24pmbhasuu:10154: sandhyakṣaradvitīyatve tadādeḥ lopavacanam . dvitīyāt acaḥ lope kartavye sandhyakṣaradvitīyatve tadādeḥ lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . lahoḍaḥ . lahikaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10156: (P_5,3.84) KA_II.426.2-15 Ro_IV.238-240 varuṇādīnām ca tṛtīyāt saḥ ca akṛtasandhīnām . varuṇādīnām ca tṛtīyāt lopaḥ ucyate . saḥ ca akṛtasandhīnām vaktavyaḥ . suparyāśīrdattaḥ . suparikaḥ , supariyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10157: suparilaḥ . iha ṣaḍaṅguliḥ ṣaḍikaḥ iti ajādilope kṛte padasañjñā na prāpnoti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . jaśtvam na syāt . ṣaḍike jaśtve uktam . kim uktam . siddham acaḥ sthānivatvāt iti . yadi evam vācikādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:10159: siddham ekākṣarapūrvapadānām uttarapadalopavacanāt . siddham etat . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:10160: . ekākṣarapūrvapadānām uttarapadasya lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . iha api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:10161: prāpnoti . ṣaḍaṅguliḥ . ṣaḍikaḥ iti . ṣaṣaḥ ṭhājādivacanāt siddham . ṣaṣaḥ ṭhājādivacanāt siddham etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:10162: (P_5,3.85-86) KA_II.426.18-21 Ro_IV.340 kimartham imau ubhau arthau nirdiśyete na yat alpam hrasvam api tat bhavati yat ca hrasvam alpam api tat bhavati . na etayoḥ āvaśyakaḥ samāveśaḥ . alpam ghṛtam . alpam tailam iti ucyate . na kaḥ cit āha hrasvam ghṛtam . hrasvam tailam iti . tathā hrasvaḥ paṭaḥ . hrasvaḥ śāṭakaḥ iti ucyate . na kaḥ cit āha alpaḥ paṭaḥ alpaḥ śāṭakaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10163: (P_5,3.88) KA_II.427.2-7 Ro_IV.241 kuṭīśamīśuṇḍābhyaḥ pratyayasanniyogena puṃvadbhāvaḥ . kuṭīśamīśuṇḍābhyaḥ pratyayasanniyogena puṃvadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kuṭī . kuṭīraḥ . śamī . śamīraḥ . śuṇḍā .
GS24pmbhasuu:10164: śuṇḍāraḥ iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . svārthikaḥ ayam svārthikāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10165: ca prakṛtitaḥ liṅgavacanāni anuvartante . uktam vā . kim uktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10168: pratiṣedhaḥ . vatsādibhyaḥ tanutve kārśye pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kṛśaḥ vatsaḥ vatsataraḥ iti mā bhūt iti . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . yasya guṇasya hi bhāvāt dravye śabdaniveśaḥ tadabhidhāne tasmin guṇe vaktavye pratyayena bhavitavyam . na ca kārśyasya sadbhāvāt dravye vatsaśabdaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10169: (P_5,3.92-93) KA_II.427.16-428.4 Ro_IV. 242 kimādīnām dvibahvarthe pratyayavidhānāt upādhyānarthakyam . kimādīnām dvibahvarthe pratyayavidhānāt upādhigrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . bahirdhāraṇam nirdhāraṇam . yāvatā dvayoḥ ekasya eva bahirdhāraṇam bhavati . aparaḥ āha : bahūnām jatiparipraśne ḍatamac iti atra bahugrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . kim iti etat paripraśne vartate paripraśnaḥ ca anirjñāte anirjñātam ca bahuṣu . dvyekayoḥ punaḥ nirjñātam . nirjñātatvāt dvyekayoḥ paripraśnaḥ na . paripraśnābhāvāt kim eva na asti . kutaḥ pratyayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10170: (P_5,3.94) KA_II.428.6-9 Ro_IV.242-243 prāgvacanam kimartham . vibhāṣā yathā syāt . prāgvacanānarthakyam ca vibhāṣāprakaraṇāt . prāgvacanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . prakṛtā mahāvibhāṣā . taya eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:10171: (P_5,3.95) KA_II.428.11-15 Ro_IV.243 avakṣepaṇe kan vidhīyate kutsite kaḥ . kaḥ etayoḥ arthayoḥ viśeṣaḥ . avakṣepaṇam karaṇam kutsitam karma .
GS24pmbhasuu:10172: avakṣepaṇam vai kutsitam karaṇam . tena yat kutysyate tat api kutsitam
