GS24pmbhasuu:11401: (P_6,1.150) KA_III.95.16-20 Ro_IV.482 viṣkiraḥ śakunau vikiraḥ vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:11402: viṣkiraḥ śakunau vikiraḥ vā iti vaktavyam . śakunau vā iti hi ucyamāne śakunau vā syāt anyatra api nityam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11403: na vāvacanena śakuniḥ abhisambadhyate . kim tarhi . nipātanam abhisambadhyate : viṣkiraḥ iti etat nipātanam śakunau vā nipātyate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11404: (P_6,1.147) KA_III.96.2-9 Ro_IV.482-483 āścaryam adbhute . āścaryam adbhute iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt . āścaryam uccatā vṛkṣasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:11405: āścaryam nīlā dyauḥ . āścaryam antarikṣe abandhanāni nakṣatrāṇi na patanti
GS24pmbhasuu:11406: iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . anitye iti eva siddham . iha tāvat āścaryam uccatā vṛkṣasya iti . āścaryagrahaṇena na vṛkṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11407: abhisambadhyate . kim tarhi . uccatā . sā ca anityā . āścaryam nīlā dyauḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11408: iti . na āścaryagrahaṇena dyauḥ abhisambadhyate . kim tarhi . nīlatā . sā ca anityā . āścaryam antarikṣe abandhanāni nakṣatrāṇi na patanti iti . na āścaryagrahaṇena nakṣatrāṇi abhisambadhyante . kim tarhi . patanakriyā .
GS24pmbhasuu:11409: sā ca anityā . tatra anitye iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:11411: katham maskarī parivrājakaḥ iti . ininā etat matvarthīyena siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:11412: maskaraḥ asya asti . na vai maskaraḥ asya asti iti maskarī parivrājakaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11413: kim tarhi mā kṛta karmāṇi . mā kṛta karmāṇi . śāntiḥ vaḥ śreyasī iti āha .
GS24pmbhasuu:11415: (P_6,1.157) KA_III.96.16-19 Ro_IV.483-484 avihitalakṣaṇaḥ suṭ pāraskaraprabhṛtiṣu draṣṭavyaḥ . pāraskaraḥ deśaḥ . kāraskaraḥ vṛkṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11416: rathaspā nadī . kiṣkindhā guhā . kiṣkuḥ . tadbṛhatoḥ karapatyoḥ coradevatayoḥ suṭ talopaḥ ca . taskaraḥ , bṛhaspatiḥ . prāyasya citticittayoḥ suṭ askāraḥ vā . prāyaścittiḥ , prāyaścittam (P_6,1.158.1) KA_III.97.2-6 Ro_IV.484-485 kim anudāttāni padāni
GS24pmbhasuu:11417: bhavanti ekam padam varjayitvā . na iti āha . pade yeṣām udāttaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11418: anudāttāḥ bhavanti ekam acam varjayitvā . saḥ tarhi tathā nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ : anudāttāḥ pade , anudāttāḥ padasya iti vā . na kartavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11419: anudāttam padam ekavarjam iti eva siddham . katham . matublopaḥ atra draṣṭavyaḥ . tat yathā puṣyakāḥ eṣām puṣyakāḥ , kālakāḥ eṣām kālakāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11420: atha vā akāraḥ matvarthīyaḥ . tat yathā tundaḥ , ghāṭaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11421: (P_6,1.158.2) KA_III.97.7-25 Ro_IV.485-486 kimartham punaḥ idam ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11422: . āgamasya vikārasya prakṛteḥ pratyayasya ca pṛthak svaranivṛttyartham ekavarjam padasvaraḥ . āgamasya . caturanaḍuhoḥ ām udāttaḥ . catvāraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11423: anaḍvāhaḥ . vikārasya . asthidadhisakthyakṣṇām anaṅ udāttaḥ . asthnā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11424: dadhnā . prakṛteḥ . gopāyati , dhūpāyati . pratyayasya ca . kartavyam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11425: taittirīyaḥ . eteṣām pade yugapat svaraḥ prāpnoti . iṣyate ca ekasya syāt iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati iti anudāttam padam ekavarjam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11426: evamartham idam ucyate . na etat asti prayojanam . yaugapadyam tavai siddham . yat ayam tavai ca antaḥ ca yugapat iti siddhe yaugapadye yaugapadyam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na yugapat svaraḥ bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11427: paryāyaḥ tarhi prāpnoti . paryāyaḥ riktaśāsanāt . yat ayam rikte vibhāṣā iti siddhe paryāye paryāyam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na paryāyaḥ bhavati iti . udātte jñāpakam tu etat . etat udātte jñāpakam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:11428: svaritena samāviśet . svaritena samāveśaḥ prāpnoti . svarite api udāttaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11429: asti . tasmāt na arthaḥ anena yogena .
GS24pmbhasuu:11431: yoge anudātte vipratiṣedhānupapattiḥ ekasmin yugapat sambhavāt . anudātte vipratiṣedhaḥ na upapadyate . paṭhiṣyati hi ācāryaḥ vipratiṣedham je dīrghāt bahvacaḥ iti . saḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ na upapadyate . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11432: ekasmin yugapat sambhavāt . asati khalu sambhave vipratiṣedhaḥ bhavati asti ca sambhavaḥ yat ubhayam syāt . katham sambhavaḥ yadā anudāttam padam ekavarjam iti ucyate . tat iha na asti . kim kāraṇam . na anena udāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:11433: pratiṣidhyate . kim tarhi anudāttatvam anena kriyate asti ca sambhavaḥ yat
GS24pmbhasuu:11434: ubhayoḥ ca udāttatvam syāt anyeṣām ca anudāttatvam . yadi punaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:11435: adhikāraḥ vijñāyeta . kim kṛtam bhavati . adhikāraḥ pratiyogam tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11436: anirdeśārthaḥ iti yoge yoge upatiṣṭhate . je dīrghāntasya ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati . upasthitam idam bhavati anudāttam padam ekavarjam iti . antyāt pūrvam bahvacaḥ . upasthitam idam bhavati anudāttam padam ekavarjam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11437: tatra pūrveṇa astu varjyamānatā pareṇa vā iti pareṇa bhaviṣyati paratvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:11438: na evam śakyam . ṣāṣthikaḥ ekaḥ svaraḥ saṅgṛhītaḥ syāt . ye anye saptādhyāyyām svarāḥ te na saṅgṛhītāḥ syuḥ . samānodare śayite o ca udāttaḥ . asthidadhisakthyakṣṇām anaṅ udāttaḥ iti . siddham tu ekānanudāttatvāt . siddham etat . katham . ekānanudāttatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:11439: ekānanudāttam padam bhavati iti vaktavyam . kim idam ananudāttatvāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11440: na udāttaḥ anudāttaḥ . na anudāttaḥ . ananudāttaḥ . ekaḥ ananudāttaḥ asmin
GS24pmbhasuu:11441: tat idam ekānanudāttam . ekānanudāttatvāt iti . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam anudātte vipratiṣedhānupapattiḥ ekasmin yugapat sambhavāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:11601: (P_6,1.186.3) KA_III.111.24-113.8 Ro_IV.518-520 citsvarāt tāsyādibhyaḥ anudāttatvam vipratiṣedhena . citsvarāt tāsyādibhyaḥ anudāttatvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . citsvarasya avakāśaḥ calanaḥ , copanaḥ . tāsyādibhyaḥ anudāttatvasya avakāśaḥ . āste śete . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . āsīnaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11602: śayānaḥ . tāsyādibhyaḥ anudāttatvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . na eṣaḥ yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . kim kāraṇam . dvikāryayogaḥ hi vipratiṣedhaḥ . na ca atra ekaḥ dvikāryayuktaḥ . ādeḥ anudāttatvam antasya udāttatvam . na avaśyam dvikāryayogaḥ eva vipratiṣedhaḥ . kim tarhi. asambhavaḥ api . nanu ca atra api asti sambhavaḥ . ādeḥ anudāttatvam antasya udāttatvam iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:11627: bibhayāni . na ca eva asti viśeṣaḥ pratyayāt vā pūrvasya udāttatve sati āṭaḥ vā . api ca pidbhaktaḥ pidgrahaṇena grāhiṣyate . idam tarhi prayojanam . pratyayāt pūrvasya udāttatvam yathā syāt . āṭaḥ eva mā bhūt iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . pidbhaktaḥ pidgrahaṇena grāhiṣyate evam tarhi siddhe sati yat pratyayagrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ svaravidhau saṅghātaḥ kāryī bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11628: citsvarāt tāsyādibhyaḥ anudāttatvam vipratiṣedhena iti uktam . tat upapannam bhavati . atha pūrvagrahaṇam kimartham na tasmin iti nirdiṣṭe pūrvasya iti pūrvasya eva bhaviṣyati . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat pūrvagrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ svaravidhau saptamyaḥ tadantasaptamyaḥ bhavanti iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . upottamam riti ridantasya . caṅi anyatarasyām caṅantasya . yadi etat jñāpyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11629: caturaḥ śasi iti śasantasya api prāpnoti . śasgrahaṇasāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati . itarathā hi tatra eva ayam brūyāt

GS24pmbhasuu:11631: bhaviṣyati . lope kṛte na asti vyavadhānam . sthānivadbhāvād vyavadhānam eva . pratiṣidhyate atra sthānivadbhāvaḥ svarasandhim prati na sthānivat iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:11636: kartṛyaki vā ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati . stīryate svayam eva . stīryate svayam eva . tat tarhi upadeśagrahaṇam kartavyam . na hi antareṇa upadeśagrahaṇam yogāṅgam jāyate . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11637: tāsyanudāttenṅidadupadeśāt lasārvadhātukam anudāttam ahnviṅoḥ iti . nanu ca uktam upadeśavacane janādīnām svaraḥ na sidhyati iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11638: na evam vijñāyate upadeśavacane janādīnām svaraḥ na sidhyati iti . katham tarhi . janādīnām api āttve upadeśavacanam kartavyam . tat tarhi tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:11639: upadeśagrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . anudāttopadeśavanatitanotyādīnām anunāsikalopaḥ jhali kṅiti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11641: thali iṭ antaḥ vā iti ucyeta . iṭ antaḥ vā iti ucyamāne iha api prasajyeta papaktha . na etat asti prayojanam . acaḥ iti vartate . idam tarhi prayojanam yayātha iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11642: (P_6,1.204) KA_III.116.3-21 Ro_IV.527-528 kimartham idam ucyate na ñniti ādiḥ nityam iti eva siddham . ñniti iti ucyate na ca atra ñnitam paśyāmaḥ . pratyayalakṣaṇena . na lumatā tasmin iti pratyayalakṣaṇapratiṣedhaḥ . aṅgādhikāroktasya saḥ pratiṣedhaḥ na lumatā aṅgasya iti . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati upamānasya ādyudāttavacanam jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:11643: anubandhalakṣaṇe svare pratyayalakṣaṇapratiṣedhasya . upamānasya ādyudāttavacanam jñāpakārtham kriyate . kim jñāpyate . etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anubandhalakṣaṇe svare pratyayalakṣaṇam na bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . gargaḥ , vatsaḥ , bidaḥ , urvāḥ , uṣṭragrīvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11644: , vāmarajjuḥ : ñniti iti ādyudāttatvam mā bhūt iti . iha ca : atrayaḥ iti : taddhitasya kitaḥ iti antodāttatvam na bhavati . yadi anubandhalakṣaṇe iti ucyate pathipriyaḥ , mathipriyaḥ iti : pathimathoḥ sarvanāmasthāne iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11645: ādyudāttatvam prāpnoti . evam tarhi ācāryaḥ jñāpayati svare pratyayalakṣaṇam na bhavati iti . evam api sarpiḥ āgaccha , sapta āgacchata iti : āmantritasya ca iti ādyudāttatvam na prāpnoti . iha ca :
GS24pmbhasuu:11646: ma hi datām , ma hi dhatām : ādiḥ sicaḥ anyatarasyām iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prāpnoti . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācāryaḥ saptamīnirdiṣṭe svare
GS24pmbhasuu:11647: pratyayalakṣaṇam na bhavati iti . evam api sarvastomaḥ , sarvapṛṣṭhaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:11648: sarvasya supi iti ādyudāttatvam na prāpnoti . astu tarhi anubandhalakṣaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:11649: iti eva . katham pathipriyaḥ , mathipriyaḥ . vaktavyam eva etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:11650: pathimathoḥ sarvanāmasthāne luki lumatā lupte pratyayalakṣaṇam na bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11651: (P_6,1.205) KA_III.116.23-117.12 Ro_IV.529-530 niṣṭhāyām yañi dīrghatve pratiṣedhaḥ . niṣṭhāyām yañi dīrghatve pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11652: dattābhyām , guptābhyām . na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . na vā vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11653: kim kāraṇam . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . bahiraṅgaḥ atra dīrghaḥ , antaraṅgaḥ svaraḥ . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . antareṇa pratiṣedham antareṇa ca etām paribhāṣām siddham . katham . na evam vijñāyate na cet ākārāntā
GS24pmbhasuu:11654: niṣṭhā iti . katham tarhi . na cet ākārāt parā niṣṭhā iti . yadi evam nirdeśaḥ ca eva na upapadyate . na hi eṣā ākārāt parā pañcamī yuktā . iha ca prāpnoti . āptaḥ , rāddhaḥ iti . evam tarhi na cet avarṇāt parā niṣṭhā iti . bhavet nirdeśaḥ upapannaḥ . iha tu prāpnoti . āptaḥ , rāddhaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11655: iha ca na prāpnoti . yataḥ , rataḥ . evam tarhi vihitaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11656: akāragrahaṇam . na cet akārārāntāt vihitā niṣṭhā iti . evam api dattaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11657: atra na prāpnoti iha ca prāpnoti . āptaḥ , rāddhaḥ iti . evam tarhi kāryiviśeṣaṇam akāragrahaṇam . na cet ākārāraḥ kāryī bhavati . evam api adya aṣṭaḥ , kadā aṣṭaḥ , atra na prāpnoti . tasmāt suṣṭhu ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11658: niṣṭhāyām yañi dīrghatve pratiṣedhaḥ , na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11659: (P_6,1.207) KA_III.117.14-19 Ro_IV.530 kim nipātyate . āśite kartari nipātanam upadhādīrhatvam ādyudāttatvam ca . āśitaḥ iti ktaḥ kartari nipātyate upadhādīrhatvam . āśitavān āśitaḥ . ādyudāttatvam ca nipātyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:11660: ādyudāttatvam anipātyam . adhikārāt siddham . upadhādīrhatvam anipātyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11661: āṅpūrvasya prayogaḥ . yadi evam avagrahaḥ prāpnoti . na lakṣaṇena padakārāḥ anuvartyāḥ . padkāraiḥ nāma lakṣaṇam anuvartyam . yathālakṣaṇam padam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11662: (P_6,1.208, 215) KA_III.117.22-118.3 Ro_IV.531 kim iyam prāpte vibhāṣā āhosvit aprāpte . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte . yadi sañjñāyām upamānam , niṣṭhā ca dvyac anāt iti nitye prāpte ārambhaḥ tata prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte . veṇuriktayoḥ aprāpte . veṇuriktayoḥ aprāpte vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:11663: prāpte nityaḥ vidhiḥ . veṇuḥ iva veṇuḥ . riktaḥ nāma kaḥ cit .
GS24pmbhasuu:11665: riti pūrvam iti eva ucyeta . tatra ayam api arthaḥ . matoḥ pūrvam āt
GS24pmbhasuu:11666: sañjñāyām striyām iti atra pūrvagrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati . evam tarhi upottamagrahaṇam uttarārtham . caṅi anyatarasyām upottamam iti eva . iha mā bhūt . mā hi sma dadhat .
GS24pmbhasuu:11667: (P_6,1.220-221) KA_III.118.11-15 Ro_IV.532 kimartham idam ucyate na vatyāḥ iti eva ucyate . vatyāḥ iti iyati ucyamāne rājavatī , atra api prasajyeta . atha avatyāḥ iti ucyamāne kasmāt eva atra na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11668: asiddhaḥ nalopaḥ . tasya asiddhatvāt na eṣaḥ avatīśabdaḥ . kaḥ tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:11669: anvatīśabdaḥ . yathā eva tarhi nalopasya asiddhatvāt na avatīśabdaḥ evam vatvasya api asiddhatvāt na avatīśabdaḥ . āśrayāt siddhatvam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:11671: cusvaraḥ ataddhite iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . dādhīcaḥ , mādhūcaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11672: tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . pratyayasvaraḥ atra bādhakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11673: bhaviṣyati . sthānāntaraprāptaḥ cusvaraḥ . pratyayasvarasya apavādaḥ anudāttau suppitau iti . anudāttau suppitau iti asya udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11674: udāttanivṛttisvarasya cusvaraḥ . saḥ yathā eva udāttanivṛttisvaram bādhate evam pratyayasvaram api bādheta . na atra udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11675: kim kāraṇam . na gośvansāvavarṇa iti pratiṣedhāt . na eṣaḥ udāttanivṛttisvarasya pratiṣedhaḥ . kasya tarhi . tṛtīyādisvarasya . yatra tarhi tṛtīyādisvaraḥ na asti dadhīcaḥ paśya iti . evam tarhi na
GS24pmbhasuu:11676: tṛtīyādilakṣaṇasya pratiṣedham ṣiṣmaḥ . kim tarhi . yena kena cit
GS24pmbhasuu:11677: lakṣaṇena prāptasya vibhaktisvarasya pratiṣedham . yadi vibhaktisvarasya pratiṣedhaḥ vṛkṣavān , plakṣavān atra na prāpnoti . matubgrahaṇam api prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . hrasvanuḍbhyām matup iti . yadi tat anuvartate vetasvān iti atra prāpnoti . matubgrahaṇam anuvartate ḍmatup ca eṣaḥ . yadi tari matubgrahaṇe ḍmatupaḥ grahaṇam na bhavati vetasvān iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11678: atra vatvam na prāpnoti . sāmānyagrahaṇam vatve iha punaḥ viśiṣṭasya grahaṇam . yatra tarhi vibhaktiḥ na asti dadhīcī iti . yadi punaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:11679: udāttanivṛttisvarasya api pratiṣedhaḥ vijñāyeta . na evam śakyam . iha api prasajyeta kumārī iti . satiśiṣṭaḥ khalu api cusvaraḥ . katham . cau iti ucyate . yatra asya etat rūpam . ajādau asarvanāmasthāne abhinirvṛtte
GS24pmbhasuu:11680: akāralope nakāralope ca . tasmāt suṣthu ucyate coḥ ataddhite iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11681: (P_6,1.223) KA_III.119.16-120.24 Ro_IV.534-537 samāsāntodāttatve vyañjanānteṣu upasaṅkhyānam . samāsāntodāttatve vyañjanānteṣu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam : rājadṛṣat, brāhmaṇasamit . halsvaraprāptau vā vyañjanam avidyamānavat . atha vā halsvaraprāptau vyañjanam avidyamānavat bhavati iti eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . kimartham idam ubhayam ucyate na halsvaraprāptau avidyamānavat iti eva ucyate svaraprāptau vyañjanam avidyamānavat bhavati iti vā . dvirbaddham subaddham bhavati iti . yadi halsvaraprāptau vyañjanam avidyamānavat iti ucyate dadhi , udāttāt anudāttasya svaritaḥ iti svaritatvam na prāpnoti . udāttāt ca svaravidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:11682: vyañjanam avidyamānavat bhavati iti eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . kāni etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni . prayojanam lidādyudāttāntodāttvidhayaḥ . liti pratyayāt pūrvam udāttam bhavati iti iha eva syāt : bhaurikividham ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11683: bhaulikividham . cikīrṣakaḥ , jihīrṣakaḥ iti atra na syāt . ñniti ādiḥ nityam iti iha eva syāt : ahicumbukāyaniḥ , āgniveśyaḥ . gārgyaḥ , kṛtiḥ iti atra na syāt . dhātoḥ antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti iha eva syāt ūrṇoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11684: pacati iti atra na syāt . idam tāvat yat ucyate halsvaraprāptau vyañjanam
GS24pmbhasuu:11685: avidyamānavat bhavati iti katham hi halaḥ nāma svaraprāptiḥ syāt . tat ca api bruvatā udāttāt ca svaravidhau iti vaktavyam . tathā anudāttādeḥ antodāttāt ca yat ucyate tat vyañjanādeḥ vyañjanāntāt ca na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11686: yadi punaḥ svaravidhau vyañjanam avidyamānavat bhavati iti ucyeta . atha svaravidhau vyañjanam avidyamānavat bhavati iti ucyamāne anudāttādeḥ antodāttāt ca yat ucyate tat kim siddham bhavati vyañjanādeḥ vyañjanāntāt ca . bāḍham siddham . katham . svaravidhiḥ iti sarvavibhaktyantaḥ samāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11687: : svareṇa vidhiḥ svaravidhiḥ , svarasya vidhiḥ svaravidhiḥ iti . na evam śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt . udaśvitvān ghoṣaḥ , vidyutvān balāhakaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11688: hrasvanuḍbhyām matup iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ prasajyeta . astu tarhi halsvaraprāptau vyañjanam avidyamānavat bhavati iti . nanu ca uktam katham hi halaḥ nāma svaraprāptiḥ syāt . uccaiḥ udāttaḥ , nīcaiḥ anudāttaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11689: atra ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭam ajgrahaṇam nivṛttam . tasmin nivṛtte halaḥ api svaraprāptiḥ bhavati . yat api ucyate udāttāt ca svaravidhau iti vaktavyam iti . na vaktavyam . na idam pāribhāṣikasya anudāttasya grahaṇam . kim tarhi . anvarthagrahaṇam . avidyamānodāttam anudāttam . tasya svaritaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11690: . yat api ucyate tat vyañjanādeḥ vyañjanāntāt ca na prāpnoti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11691: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati siddham tat bhavati vyañjanādeḥ vyañjanāntāt ca iti yat ayam na uttarapade anudāttādau iti uktvā apṛthivīrudralkpūṣamanthiṣu iti pratiṣedham śāsti . sā tarhi eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . na kartavyā . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati eṣā paribhāṣā yat ayam yataḥ anāvaḥ iti nāvaḥ pratiṣedham śāsti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11693: bahuvrīhisvaram śāsti samāsāntavidheḥ sukṛt . sukṛt ācāryaḥ samāsāntodāttatve prāpte bahuvrīhisvaram apavādam śāsti . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:11694: prayojanam . nañsubhyām niyamārtham tu . nañsubhyām iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . nañsubhyām eva bahuvrīheḥ antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati na anyasya iti . evam api kutat etat pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvam bhaviṣyati na punaḥ parasya iti . parasya śitiśāsanāt . śiteḥ nityābahvac iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . śiteḥ eva na anyataḥ iti . yat tāvat ucyate nañsubhyām niyamārtham iti kṣepe vidhiḥ nañaḥ asiddhaḥ . udarāśveṣuṣu kṣepe iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11695: etasmin prāpte tataḥ etat ucyate . yat api ucyate parasya śitiśāsanāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11696: parasya niyamaḥ bhavet . parasya eṣaḥ niyamaḥ syāt . śiteḥ nityābahvac iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11697: . yadi pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaram samāsāntodāttatvam bādhate capriyaḥ vāpriyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11698: , atra api prāpnoti . antaḥ cavāpriye sambhavāt . antodāttatvam cavāpriye siddham . kutaḥ . sambhavāt . asati khalu api sambhave bādhanam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11699: asti ca sambhavaḥ yat ubhayam syāt . sati api sambhave bādhanam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11700: tat yathā . dadhi brāhmaṇebhyaḥ dīyatām takram kauṇḍinyāya iti sati api sambhave dadhidānasya takradānam nivartakam bhavati . evam iha api sati api sambhave pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaram samāsāntodāttatvam bādhiṣyate . evam tarhi prakṛtāt vidheḥ . bahuvrīhau prkṛtyā pūrvapadam prakṛtisvaram bhavati iti . kim ca prakṛtam . udāttaḥ iti ca vartate . evam api kāryapriyaḥ , hāryapriyaḥ , atra na prāpnoti . svarite api udāttaḥ asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11701: atha vā svaritagrahaṇam api prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . tit svaritam iti . bahuvrīhau ṛte siddham . antareṇa api bahuvrīhigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11702: siddham . tatpuruṣe kasmāt na bhavati . tatpuruṣe tulyārthatṛtīyāsaptamyupamānāvyayadvitīyākṛtyāḥ iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . dvigau tarhi kasmāt na bhavati . igante dvigau iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . dvandve tarhi prāpnoti . rājanyabahuvacanadvandve andhakavṛṣṇiṣu iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . avyayībhāve tarhi prāpnoti . paripratyupāpāḥ varjyamānāhorātrāvayaveṣu iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . evam api kutaḥ etat evam niyamaḥ bhaviṣyati eteṣām eva
GS24pmbhasuu:11703: tatpuruṣādiṣu iti na punaḥ evam niyamaḥ syāt eteṣām tatpuruṣādiṣu eva iti . iṣṭataḥ ca avadhāraṇam . iṣṭataḥ ca avadhāraṇam bhaviṣyati . eteṣām tarhi bahuvrīheḥ ca paryāyaḥ prāpnoti . dvipāddiṣṭeḥ vitasteḥ ca paryāyaḥ na prakalpate . yat ayam dvitribhyām pāddanmūrdhasu bahuvrīhau diṣṭivitasyoḥ ca iti siddhe paryāye paryāyam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na paryāyaḥ bhavati iti . udātte jñāpakam tu etat . udātte etat jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:11704: syāt . svaritena samāviśet . svaritena samāveśaḥ prāpnoti . svarite api udāttaḥ asti . bahuvrīhisvaram śāsti samāsāntavidheḥ sukṛt . nañsubhyām niyamārtham tu . parasya śitiśāsanāt . kṣepe vidhiḥ nañaḥ asiddhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11705: parasya niyamaḥ bhavet . antaḥ cavāpriye sambhavāt . prakṛtāt vidheḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11706: bahuvrīhau ṛte siddham . iṣṭataḥ ca avadhāraṇam . dvipāddiṣṭeḥ vitasteḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:11707: paryāyaḥ na prakalpate . udātte jñāpakam tu etat . svaritena samāviśet .
GS24pmbhasuu:11708: (P_6,2.2) KA_III.123.5-21 Ro_IV.542-543 tatpuruṣe vibhaktiprakṛtisvaratve karmadhāraye pratiṣedhaḥ . tatpuruṣe vibhaktiprakṛtisvaratve karmadhāraye pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . paramam kārakam paramakārakam paramena kārakeṇa paramakārakeṇa , parame kārake paramakārake . siddham tu lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva grahaṇāt . siddham etat . katham . lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti pratipadam yaḥ dvitīyātṛtīyāsaptamīsamāsaḥ tasya grahaṇam lakṣaṇoktaḥ ca ayam . avyaye parigaṇanam kartavyam . avyaye nañkunipātānām . avyaye nañkunipātānām iti vaktavyam . nañ . abrāhmaṇaḥ , avṛṣalaḥ . nañ
GS24pmbhasuu:11709: . ku . kubrāhmaṇaḥ , kuvṛṣalaḥ . ku . nipāta . niṣkauśāmbiḥ , nirvārāṇasiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11710: . kva mā bhūt . snātvākālakaḥ , pītvāsthirakaḥ . ktvāyām vā pratiṣedhaḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:11713: kartavyam . tena eva yatnena svaraḥ bhaviṣyati .

GS24pmbhasuu:11773: (P_6,2.52.1) KA_III.129.4-21 Ro_IV.556-557 anigantaprakṛtisvaratve yaṇādeśe prakṛtisvarabhāvaprasaṅgaḥ . anigantaprakṛtisvaratve yaṇādeśe prakṛtisvarabhāvaḥ prāpnoti . pratyaṅ pratyañcau pratyañcaḥ anigantavacanam idānīm kimartham syāt . anigantavacanam kimartham iti cet ayaṇādiṣṭārtham . ayaṇādiṣṭārtham etat syāt . yadā yaṇādeśaḥ na . kadā ca yaṇādeśaḥ na . yādā śākalam . uktam vā . kim uktam . samāse śākalam na

GS24pmbhasuu:11812: paramakṣṛṇa iti . sarvagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . atha guṇagrahaṇam kimartham . sarvam kārtsnye iti iyati ucyamāne iha api prasajyeta sarvasauvarṇaḥ sarvarājataḥ iti . guṇagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:11813: na doṣaḥ bhavati . atha kārtsnyagrahaṇam kimartham . sarvam guṇe iti iyati ucyamāne iha api prasajyeta sarveṣām śvetaḥ sarvaśvetaḥ iti . katham ca atra samāsaḥ . ṣaṣṭhīsubantena samasyate iti . guṇena na iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . guṇāt tareṇa samāsaḥ taralopaḥ ca . guṇāt tareṇa samāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11814: taralopaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ . sarveṣām śvetataraḥ sarvaśvetaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11815: (P_6,2.105) KA_III.133.2-5 Ro_IV.563-564 ayuktaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ . na hi uttarapadam nāma vṛddhiḥ asti . katham tarhi nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11816: vṛddhimati uttarapade iti . saḥ tarhi tathā nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . na evam vijñāyate . uttarapadam vṛddhiḥ uttarapadavṛddhiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11817: uttarapadavṛddhau iti . katham tarhi . uttarapadasya vṛddhiḥ asmin saḥ ayam uttarapadavṛddhiḥ , uttarapadavṛddhau iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11819: sañjñāyām mitrājinayoḥ antaḥ .bahuvrīhau viśvasya antodāttāt sañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:11820: mitrājinayoḥ antaḥ iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . bahuvrīhau viśvam sañjñāyām iti asya avakāśaḥ , viśvadevaḥ , viśvayaśāḥ . sañjñāyām mitrājinayoḥ antaḥ iti asya avakāśaḥ kulamitram , kulājinam . iha ubhayam prāpnoti viśvamitraḥ , viśvājinaḥ . sañjñāyām mitrājinayoḥ antaḥ iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . antodāttaprakaraṇe marudvṛdhādīnām chandasi
GS24pmbhasuu:11821: upasaṅkhyānam . antodāttaprakaraṇe marudvṛdhādīnām chandasi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . marudvṛdhaḥ suvayāḥ upatasthe .
GS24pmbhasuu:11823: udarāśveṣuṣu kṣepe iti etasmāt nañsubhyām iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:11824: . udarāśveṣuṣu kṣepe iti asya avakāśaḥ kuṇḍodaraḥ , ghaṭodaraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11825: nañsubhyām iti asya avakāśaḥ ayavaḥ , atilaḥ , amāṣaḥ , suyavaḥ , sutilaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11826: , sumāṣaḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti , anudaraḥ , sūdaraḥ . nañsubhyām iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:11827: (P_6,2.117) KA_III.133.22-134.3 Ro_IV.565 soḥ manasoḥ kapi . soḥ manasī alomoṣasī iti etasmāt kapi pūrvam iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:11828: soḥ manasī alomoṣasī iti etasya avakāśaḥ suśarmāṇam adhi nāvam ruheyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11829: suśarmā asi supratiṣṭhānaḥ . susrotāḥ , supayāḥ , suvarcāḥ . kapi pūrvam iti asya avakāśaḥ ayavakaḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti suśarmakaḥ , susrotakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11830: . kapi pūrvam iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:11831: (P_6,2.121) KA_III.134.5-9 Ro_IV.565 pūrvādibhyaḥ kūlādīnām ādyudāttatvam . pūrvādibhyaḥ kūlādīnām ādyudāttatvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . paripratiupāpāḥ varyajānāhorātrāvayaveṣu iti asya avakāśaḥ paritrigatam , parisauvīram . kūlādīnām ādyudāttatvasya avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11832: , atikūlam , anukūlam . iha ubhayam prāpnoti parikūlam , kūlādīnām ādyudāttatvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:11836: avyayayasvarāvakāśaḥ , niṣkauśāmbiḥ , nirvārāṇasiḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:11837: kucelam , kurājyam . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . iṣṭavācī paraśabdaḥ . vipratiṣedhe param yat iṣṭam tat bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11838: (P_6,2.136) KA_III.19-21 Ro_IV.566 kuṇḍādyudāttatve tatsamudāyagrahaṇam . kuṇḍādyudāttatve tatsamudāyagrahaṇam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11839: vanasamudāyavācīcet kuṇḍaśabdaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:11841: (P_6,2.139) KA_III.135.2-136.6 Ro_IV.566-570 gatikārakopapadāt iti kimartham . iha mā bhūt . paramam kārakam , paramakārakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11842: gatikārakopapadāt iti ucyamāne api tatra prāpnoti . etat hi kārakam . idam tarhi . devadattasya kārakam , devadattakārakam . idam ca api udāharaṇam paramam kārakam , paramakārakam iti . na etat kārakam . kārakaviśeṣaṇam etat . yāvat brūyāt prakṛṣṭam kārakam śobhanam kārakam iti tāvat etat
GS24pmbhasuu:11843: paramakārakam iti . atha kṛdgrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:11844: niṣkauśāmbiḥ , nivārāṇasiḥ iti . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati gatyādibhyaḥ prakṛtisvaratve kṛdgrahaṇānarthakyam anyasya uttarapadasya abhāvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:11845: gatyādibhyaḥ prakṛtisvaratve kṛdgrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11846: anyasya uttarapadasya abhāvāt . na hi anyat gatiyādibhyaḥ uttarapadam asti
GS24pmbhasuu:11847: anyat ataḥ kṛtaḥ . kim kāraṇam . dhātoḥ hi dvaye pratyayāḥ vidhīyante tiṅaḥ kṛtaḥ ca . tatra kṛtā saha samāsaḥ bhavati tiṅā ca na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11848: tatra antareṇa kṛdgrahaṇam kṛtaḥ eva bhaviṣyati . nanu ca idānīm eva udāhṛtam niṣkauśāmbiḥ , nirvārāṇasiḥ iti . yatkriyāyuktāḥ tam prati
GS24pmbhasuu:11849: gatyupasargsañjñe bhavataḥ na ca nisaḥ kauśāmbīśabdam prati kriyāyogaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11850: kṛtprakṛtau vā gatitvāt adhikāṛtham kṛdgrahaṇam . kṛtprakṛtau tarhi gatitvāt adhikāṛtham kṛdgrahaṇam kartavyam . kṛtprakṛtiḥ dhātuḥ . dhātum ca prati kriyāyogaḥ . tatra yatkriyāyuktāḥ tam prati iti iha eva syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:11851: praṇīḥ , unnīḥ . iha na syāt . praṇāyakaḥ , unnāyakaḥ . etat api na asti prayojanam . yatkriyāyuktāḥ iti na evam vijñāyate . yasya kriyā yatkriyā
GS24pmbhasuu:11852: yatkriyāyuktāḥ tam prati gatyupasargsañjñe bhavataḥ iti . katham tarhi yā
GS24pmbhasuu:11853: kriyā yatkriyā yatkriyāyuktāḥ tam prati gatyupasargsañjñe bhavataḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11854: na ca kaḥ cit kevalaḥ śabdaḥ asti yaḥ tasya arthasya vācakaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:11855: kevalaḥ tasya arthasya vācakaḥ na asti iti kṛtvā kṛdadhikasya bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11856: nanu ca yayam tasya eva arthasya vācakaḥ praṇīḥ iti . eṣaḥ api hi
GS24pmbhasuu:11857: kartṛviśiṣṭasya . ayam tarhi tasya eva arthasya vācakaḥ prabhavanam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11858: tasmāt kṛdgrahaṇam kartavyam . yadi kṛdgrahaṇam kriyate āmante svaraḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:11859: prāpnoti . prapacatitarām , prajalpatitarām . asati punaḥ kṛdgrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:11860: kriyāpradhānam ākhyātam tasya atiśaye tarap utpadyate tarabantasya svārthe ām . tatra yatkriyāyuktāḥ iti bhavati eva saṅghātam prati kriyāyogaḥ . na ca kaḥ cit kevalaḥ śabdaḥ asti yaḥ tasya arthasya vācakaḥ syāt . kevalaḥ tasya arthasya vācakaḥ na asti iti kṛtvā adhikasya bhaviṣyati . nanu ca yayam tasya eva arthasya vācakaḥ prabhavanam iti . eṣaḥ api dravyaviśiṣṭasya . katham kṛdabhihitaḥ bhāvaḥ dravyavat bhavati kriyāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:11863: udāttaḥ bhavati āhosvit uttarapadasya . kutaḥ sandehaḥ . ubhayam prakṛtam . tatra anyatarat śakyam viśeṣayitum . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . antodāttatvam samāsasya iti cet kapi upasaṅkhyānam . antodāttatvam samāsasya iti cet kapi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . idametattadbhyaḥ prathamapūraṇayoḥ kriyāgaṇane kapi ca iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt . idamprathamakāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11864: astu tarhi uttarapadasya . uttarapadāntodāttatve nañsubhyām samāsāntodāttatvam . uttarapadāntodāttatve nañsubhyām samāsāntodāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:11865: vaktavyam . anṛcaḥ , bahvṛcaḥ . aparaḥ āha : uttarapadāntodāttatve nañsubhyām samāsāntodāttatvam vaktavyam . ajñakaḥ , asvakaḥ . kapi pūrvam iti asya apavādaḥ hrasvānte antyāt pūrvam iti . tatra hrasvānte antyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11866: pūrvaḥ udāttabhāvī na asti iti kṛtvā utsargeṇa antodāttatvam prāpnoti . na vā kapi pūrvavacanam jñāpakam uttarapadānantodāttatvasya . na vā eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11867: doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . yat ayam kapi pūrvam iti āha tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11868: na uttarapadasya antaḥ udāttatḥ bhavati iti . prakaraṇāt ca samāsāntodāttatvam . prakṛtam samāsagrahaṇam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11869: cau samāsasya iti . nanu ca uktam antodāttatvam samāsasya iti cet kapi upasaṅkhyānam iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . uttarapadagrahaṇam api prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:11870: anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . uttarapadādiḥ iti . tatra evam abhisambandhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11871: kariṣyate . nañsubhyām samāsasya antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati . idametattadbhyaḥ prathamapūraṇayoḥ kriyāgaṇane uttarapadasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11873: pratiṣedhaḥ . kārakāt dattaśrutayoḥ anāśiṣi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11874: anāhataḥ nadati devadattaḥ . siddham tu ubhayaniyamāt . siddham etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:11875: katham . ubhayaniyamāt . ubhayataḥ niyamaḥ āśrayiṣyate . kārakāt dattaśrutayoḥ eva āśiṣi. āśiṣi eva kārakāt dattaśrutayoḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11879: atideśaḥ kriyate na nañsubahubhyaḥ iti eva ucyeta . na evam śakyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11880: uttarapadabhūmni iti vakṣyati . tat bahoḥ eva yathā syāt . nañsubhyām mā bhūt iti . na etat asti prayojanam . ekayoge api hi sati yasya uttarapadabhūmā asti tasya bhaviṣyati . kasya ca asti . bahoḥ eva . idam tarhi prayojanam . na guṇādayaḥ avyavāḥ iti vakṣyati . tat bahoḥ eva yathā syāt . nañsubhyām mā bhūt iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . ekayoge api sati yasya guṇādayaḥ avayavā santi tasya kasya ca santi . bahoḥ eva . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati bahoḥ nañvat uttarapadādyudāttārtham . bahoḥ nañvat atideśaḥ kriayte uttarapadādyudāttārtham . uttarapadasya ādyudāttatvam yathā syāt . nañaḥ jaramaramitramṛtāḥ . ajaraḥ , amaraḥ , bahujaraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11883: mukhasya antodāttatvāt . mukhasya antodāttatvāt upasargāt svāṅgam dhruvam iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . mukhāntodāttatvasya avakāśaḥ gauramukhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11884: , ślakṣṇamukhaḥ . upasargāt svāṅgam iti asya avakāśaḥ prasphik , prodaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11885: . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . pramukhaḥ . upasargāt svāṅgam iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . kaḥ punaḥ viśeṣaḥ tena vā sati anena vā . sāpavādakaḥ saḥ vidhiḥ ayam punaḥ nirapavādakaḥ . avyayāt tasya pratiṣedhaḥ apavādaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11886: (P_6,2.185-186) KA_III.138.14-18 Ro_IV.576 kimartham idam ucyate na upasargāt svāṅgam dhruvam iti eva siddham . abheḥ mukham apāt ca adhruvārtham . adhruvārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . abhuvrīhyartham vā . atha vā bahuvrīheḥ iti vartate . abhuvrīhyarthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11887: (P_6,2.187) KA_III.138.20-139.2 Ro_IV.576 sphigapūtagrahaṇam kimartham na upasargāt svāṅgam dhruvam iti eva siddham . sphigapūtagrahaṇam ca . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:11889: (P_6,2.191) KA_III.139.4-6 Ro_IV.576 ateḥ dhātulope . ateḥ dhātulope iti vaktavyam . akṛtpade iti hi ucyamāne iha ca prasajyeta śobhanaḥ gārgyaḥ atigārgyaḥ , iha ca na syāt , atikāṛakaḥ, atipadā śakvarī .
GS24pmbhasuu:11891: mūrdhani akārāntagrahaṇam āhosvit nakārāntagrahaṇam . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11892: . dvitribhyām mūrdhani akārāntagrahaṇam cet nakārāntasya upasaṅkhyānam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11893: dvitribhyām mūrdhani akārāntagrahaṇam cet nakārāntasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . dvimūrdhā trimūrdhā . astu tarhi nakārāntagrahaṇam . nakārānte akārāntasya . nakārānte akārāntasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . dvimūrdhaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11894: trimūrdhaḥ . udāttalopāt siddham . astu tarhi nakārāntagrahaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11895: antodāttatve kṛte lopaḥ udāttanivṛttisvareṇa siddham . idam iha sampradhāryam . antodāttatvam kriyatām lopaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11896: paratvāt lopaḥ . evam tarhi idam iha sampradhāryam . antodāttatvam kriyatām samāsāntaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt antodāttatvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11897: nityaḥ samāsāntaḥ . kṛte api antodāttatve prāpnoti akṛte api .
GS24pmbhasuu:11898: antodāttatvam api nityam . kṛte api samāsānte prāpnoti akṛte api . anityam antodāttatvam . na hi kṛte samāsānte prāpnoti . paratvāt lopena bhavitavyam . yasya ca lakṣaṇāntareṇa nimittam vihanyate na tat anityam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11899: na ca samāsāntaḥ eva antodāttatvasya nimittam hanti . avaśyam lakṣaṇāntaram lopaḥ pratīkṣyaḥ . ubhayoḥ nityayoḥ paratvāt antodāttatvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11900: antodāttatve kṛte samāsāntaḥ , ṭilopaḥ . ṭilope kṛte udāttanivṛttisvareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:11901: siddham . yuktam punaḥ idam vicārayitum . nan u anena asandigdhena nakārāntasya grahaṇena bhavitavyam yāvatā mūrdhasu iti ucyate . yadi hi akārāntasya grahaṇam syāt mūrdheṣu iti brūyāt . sā eṣā samāsāntārthā
GS24pmbhasuu:11902: vicāraṇā . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācāryaḥ . vibhāṣā samāsāntaḥ bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11904: parādiḥ ca parāntaḥ ca pūrvāntaḥ ca dṛśyate .pūrvādayaḥ ca vidyante .
GS24pmbhasuu:11905: vyatayaḥ bahulam smṛtaḥ . antodāttaprakaraṇe tricakrādīnām chandasi
GS24pmbhasuu:11906: upasaṅkhyānam . antodāttaprakaraṇe tricakrādīnām chandasi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam : tricakreṇa tribandhureṇa trivṛtā rathena .
GS24pmbhasuu:11907: (P_6,3.1.2) KA_III.141.12-142.9 Ro_IV.582-584 ekavat ca aluk bhavati iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . stokābhyām muktaḥ , stokebhyaḥ muktaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11908: vigṛhya stokānmuktaḥ iti eva yathā syāt . ekavadvcanam anarthakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11909: ekavadbhāvaḥ ca anarthakaḥ . dvibahvoḥ aluk kasmāt na bhavati . dvibahuṣu asamāsaḥ . dvivacanabahuvacanānām asamāsaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi anucyamānaṃ gaṃsyate . uktam vā . kim uktam . anabhidhānāt iti . tat ca avaśyam anabhidhānam āśrayitavyam . ekavadvacane hi goṣucare atiprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11910: . ekavadvacane hi goṣucare atiprasaṅgaḥ syāt : goṣucaraḥ . varṣābhyaḥ ca je . varṣābhyaḥ ca je atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . varṣāsujaḥ . apaḥ yoniyanmatiṣu ca . apaḥ yoniyanmatiṣu ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . je care ca . je care ca atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . yoni . apsuyoniḥ . yat . apsavyam mati . apsumatiḥ . je . apsujaḥ . care . apsucaraḥ gahvareṣṭhāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11911: (P_6,3.2) KA_III.142.11-16 Ro_IV.584-585 pañcamīprakaraṇe brāhmaṇācchaṃsinaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . pañcamīprakaraṇe brāhmaṇācchaṃsinaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . brāhmaṇācchaṃsī . anyārthe ca . anyārthe ca eṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:11912: pañcamī draṣṭavyā . brāhmaṇāni śaṃsati iti brāhmaṇācchaṃsī . atha vā yuktaḥ eva atra pañcamyarthaḥ . brāhmaṇebhyaḥ gṛhītvā , āhṛtya āhṛtya śaṃsati iti brāhmaṇācchaṃsī .
GS24pmbhasuu:11913: (P_6,3.3) KA_III.142.18-22 Ro_IV.585 añjasaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . añjasaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . añjasākṛtam . puṃsānujaḥ januṣāndhaḥ vikṛtākṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11914: iti ca . puṃsānujaḥ januṣāndhaḥ vikṛtākṣaḥ iti ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11916: (P_6,3.5) KA_III.143.2-8 Ro_IV. 585-586 ātmanaḥ ca pūraṇe . ātmanaḥ ca pūraṇe upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . ātmanāpañcamaḥ , ātmanādaśamaḥ . anyārthe ca . anyārthe ca eṣā tṛtīyā draṣṭavyā . ātmā pañcamaḥ asya ātmāpañcamaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11917: atha vā yuktaḥ eva atra tṛtīyārthaḥ . ātmanā kṛtam tat tasya yena asau

GS24pmbhasuu:12211: anantyayoḥ iti tadoḥ grahaṇam na kartavyam . tatra hi tavargānirdeśe etat prayojanam iha mā bhūt . aneṣaḥ karoti iti . yāvatā pūrvāntaḥ saḥ api adoṣaḥ bhavati . na evam śakyam . anuṣṇaḥ iti nalopaḥ prātipadikāntasya iti nalopaḥ prasajyeta . nugvacanāt na bhaviṣyati . ṅamuṭ tarhi prāpnoti .

GS24pmbhasuu:12213: (P_6,3.76) KA_III.169.18-170.4 Ro_IV.644-645 kimartham āduk ucyate na aduk eva ucyate . kā rūpasiddhiḥ : ekānnaviṃśatiḥ , ekānnaśatam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12214: savarṇadīrghatvena siddham . na sidhyati . ataḥ guṇe iti pararūpatvam prāpnoti . evam tarhi aduṭ kariṣyate . aduṭ ca aśakyaḥ kartum .
GS24pmbhasuu:12215: ānunāsikyam hi na syāt . yat hi tat yaraḥ anunāsike anunāsikaḥ va iti padāntasya iti evam tat . kim punaḥ kāraṇam padāntasya iti evam tat . iha mā bhūt . budhnaḥ , bradhnaḥ , badhnāti . evam tarhi anuṭ kariṣyate . anuṭ ca aśakyaḥ kartum . vibhāṣayā ānunāsikyam . tena idam eva rūpam syāt ekānnaviṃśatiḥ . idam na syāt . ekānnaviṃśatiḥ iti . astu tarhi aduk eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:12216: nanu ca uktam ataḥ guṇe iti pararūpatvam prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12217: akāroccāraṇasāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati . yadi tarhi prāpnuvan vidhiḥ akāroccāraṇasāmarthyāt bādhyate savarṇadīrghatvam api na prāpnoti . yam vidhim prati upadeśaḥ anarthakaḥ saḥ vidhiḥ bādhyate . yasya tu vidhiḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:12247: (P_6,3.98) KA_III.173.7-8 Ro_IV.651 dīrghoccāraṇam kimartham na udanoḥ deśe iti eva ucyeta . kā rūpasiddhiḥ : anūpaḥ . savarṇadīrghatven siddham . na sidhyati . avagrahe doṣaḥ syāt (P_6,3.99) KA_III.173.11-13 Ro_IV.651 aṣaṣṭhyatṛtīyasthasya iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:12248: . tatra idam na sidhyati . anyasya idam anyadīyam . anyasya kārakam anyatkārakam . evam tarhi aviśeṣeṇa anyasya duk chakārakayoḥ iti uktvā tataḥ vakṣyāmi aṣaṣṭhyatṛtīyasthasya āśīrāśāsthāsthitotsukotirāgeṣu iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:12251: (P_6,3.109.1) KA_III.173.19-174.15 Ro_IV.652-654 pṛṣodarādīni iti ucyate . kāni pṛṣodarādīni . pṛṣodaraprakārāṇi . kāni punaḥ pṛṣodaraprakārāṇi . yeṣu lopāgamavikārāḥ śrūyante na ca ucyante . atha yathā iti kim idam . prakāravacane thāl . atha kim idam upadiṣṭāni iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:12253: . vaiyākaraṇāḥ . kutaḥ etat . śāstrapūrvikā hi śiṣṭiḥ vaiyākaraṇāḥ ca śāstrajñāḥ . yadi tarhi śāstrapūrvikā śiṣṭiḥ śiṣṭipūrvakam ca śāstram tat itaretarāśrayam bhavati . itaretarāśrayāṇi ca na prakalpante . evam tarhi nivāsataḥ ācārataḥ ca . saḥ ca ācāraḥ āryāvartte eva . kaḥ punaḥ āryāvarttaḥ . prāk ādarśāt [R adarśanāt] pratyak kālakavanāt dakṣiṇena

GS24pmbhasuu:12255: vidyāyāḥ pāragāḥ tatrabhavantaḥ śiṣṭāḥ . yadi tarhi śiṣṭāḥ śabdeṣu pramāṇam kim aṣṭādhyāyyā kriyate . śiṣṭajñānārthā aṣṭādhyāyī . katham punaḥ aṣṭādhyāyyā śiṣṭāḥ śakyāḥ vijñātum . aṣṭādhyāyīm adhīyānaḥ anyam

GS24pmbhasuu:12258: (P_6,3.109.2) KA_III.174.16-175.7 Ro_IV.654-655 dikśabdebhyaḥ tīrasya tārabhāvaḥ vā . dikśabdebhyaḥ tīrasya tārabhāvaḥ vā vaktavyaḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:12260: uttarapadasya iñi vaktavyaḥ . vāgvādasya apatyam vāḍvaliḥ . ṣaṣaḥ utvam datṛdaśasu uttarapadādeḥ ṣṭutvam ca . ṣaṣaḥ utvam vaktavyam uttarapadādeḥ ṣṭutvam ca vaktavyam . ṣoḍaśan , ṣoḍaśa . dhāsu vā . dhāsu vā iti

GS24pmbhasuu:12262: nānādhikaraṇavācī yaḥ dhāśabdaḥ tasya grahaṇam yathā vijñāyeta . iha mā bhūt . ṣaṭ dadhāti iti ṣaḍdhā iti . duraḥ dāśanāśadabhadhyeṣu . duraḥ dāśanāśadabhadhyeṣu utvam vaktavyam uttarapadādeḥ ca ṣṭutvam . dūḍāśaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:12263: dūṇāśaḥ , dūḍabhaḥ , dūḍhyaḥ . svaro rohatau chandasi . svaro rohatau chandasi utvam vaktavyam . ehi tvam jāye svo rohāva . pīvopavasanādīnām chandasi lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . pīvopavasanānām payopavasanānām śriyā idam .

GS24pmbhasuu:12270: (P_6,3.112) KA_III.175.16-176.4 Ro_IV.656-657 varṇagrahaṇam kimartham na sahivahoḥ ot asya iti eva ucyeta . vṛddhau api kṛtāyām yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:12271: udavoḍhām , udavoḍham , udavoḍha iti . atha avarṇagrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt . ūḍhaḥ , ūḍhavān iti . na etat asti prayojanam . bhavatu atra ottvam . śravaṇam kasmāt na bhavati . pūrvatvam asya bhaviṣyati . idam iha sampradhāryam . ottvam kriyatām pūrvatvam iti kim atra kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12272: paratvāt ottvam . antaraṅgam pūrvatvam . evam tarhi idam iha sampradhāryam . ottvam kriyatām samprasāraṇam iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt ottvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12273: nityam samprasāraṇam . kṛte api ottve prāpnoti akṛte api . ottvam api nityam . kṛte api samprasāraṇe prāpnoti akṛte api . anityam ottvam . na hi kṛte samprasāraṇe prāpnoti . antaraṅgam pūrvatvam . yasya ca lakṣaṇāntareṇa nimittam vihanyate na tat anityam . na ca samprasāraṇam eva ottvasya nimittam vihanti . avaśyam lakṣaṇāntaram pūrvatvam pratīkṣyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12274: ubhayoḥ nityayoḥ paratvāt ottvam . ottve kṛte samprasāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:12275: samprasāraṇapūrvatvam . tatra kāryakṛtatvāt punaḥ ottvam na bhaviṣyati .

GS24pmbhasuu:12287: (P_6,3.138) KA_III.177.5-10 Ro_IV.659 iha anye ācāryāḥ cau pratyaṅgasya pratiṣedham āhuḥ . tat iha api sādhyam . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . etat eva jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na pratyaṅgam bhavati iti yat ayam cau dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:12289: (P_6,3.139) KA_III.177.2-3 Ro_IV.659-660 ikaḥ hrasvāt samprasāraṇadīrghatvam vipratiṣedhena . ikaḥ hrasvāt samprasāraṇadīrghatvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . ikaḥ hrasvasya avakāśaḥ grāmaṇikulam , senānikulam . samprasāraṇadīrghatvasya avakāśaḥ . vibhāṣā hrasvatvam . yadā na hrasvatvam saḥ avakāśaḥ . hrasvaprasaṅge ubhayam prāpnoti . kārīṣagandhīputraḥ , kaumudagandhīputraḥ samprasāraṇadīrghatvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . atha idānīm dīrghatve kṛte punaḥprasaṅgavijñānāt hrasvatvam kasmāt na bhavati . sakṛdgatau vipratiṣedhena yat bādhitam tat bādhitam eva iti (P_6,4.1.1) KA_III.178.2-10 Ro_IV.661-662 ā kutaḥ ayam adhikāraḥ . ā saptamādhyāyaparisamāpteḥ aṅgādhikāraḥ . yadi ā saptamādhyāyaparisamāpteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12290: aṅgādhikāraḥ guṇaḥ yaṅlukoḥ iti yaṅluggrahaṇam kartavyam . prāk abhyāsavikārebhyaḥ punaḥ aṅgādhikāre sati pratyayalakṣaṇena siddham . astu tarhi prāk abhyāsavikārebhyaḥ aṅgādhikāraḥ . yadi prāk abhyāsavikārebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12291: aṅgādhikāraḥ vavraśca vakārasya samprasāraṇam prāpnoti . ā saptamādhyāyaparisamāpteḥ punaḥ aṅgādhikāre sati uḥ adatvasya sthānivadbhāvān na samprasāraṇe samprasāraṇam iti pratiṣedhaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . saḥ ca idānīm aparihāraḥ bhavati yat tat uktam aṅgānyatvāt ca siddham iti . astu tarhi ā saptamādhyāyaparisamāpteḥ aṅgādhikāraḥ . nanu ca uktam guṇaḥ yaṅlukoḥ iti yaṅluggrahaṇam kartavyam iti . kriyate nyāse eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:12293: sthānṣaṣṭhī , aṅgasya sthāne iti . evam bhavitum arhati . aṅgasya iti sthānaṣaṣṭhī cet pañcamyantasya ca adhikāraḥ . aṅgasya iti sthānaṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:12294: cet pañcamyantasya ca adhikāraḥ kartavyaḥ . aṅgāt iti api vaktavyam .

GS24pmbhasuu:12407: . ataḥ heḥ . tataḥ utaḥ ca . utaḥ ca heḥ luk bhavati iti . tataḥ pratyayāt . pratyayāt iti ubhayoḥ śeṣaḥ . atha kimartham anunāsikalopaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:12410: a gahi . marudbhiḥ agne agahi . samprasāraṇam avarṇalope . samprasāraṇam avarṇalope prayojanam . madhonaḥ paśya . maghonā , maghone . samprasāraṇe kṛte yasya iti lopaḥ prāpnoti . asiddhatvāt na bhavati . na etat asti
